9. To make the ginger cream cheese frosting, beat the softened cream cheese and butter in a large bowl until smooth.
10. Gradually add the powdered sugar, beating until the desired consistency is reached.
11. Add the grated ginger and vanilla extract, and beat until well combined.
12. Spread the frosting over the cooled cake.
13. Serve the Parsnip Spice Cake with Ginger Cream Cheese Frosting immediately or store it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.

Enjoy your delicious Parsnip Spice Cake with Ginger Cream Cheese Frosting!

3bcbe8be61.gt:
Directions
1.
Clean blueberries and place in a stainless steel pan over medium heat.
2.
Add sugar.
3.
Bring to rolling boil, stirring constantly, and then bring heat down to low.
4.
Cook on low for five minutes or until blueberries are mostly liquid (there will be some remaining chunks of blueberries).
5.
Remove from heat, pour mixture into a bowl and place in fridge until cool (about 1 hour).
6.
Remove blueberry mixture from fridge, mix in creme fraiche.
7.
Pour blueberry creme fraiche mixture into ice cream maker, following machine instructions.
If you dont have an ice cream maker (I borrowed my friend Annes) then follow David Lebovitzs instructions for making ice cream without a machine.
3bcbe8be61.pred:
1. Wash and pick the blueberries.
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the blueberries, sugar, and 1/2 cup of water.
3. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the blueberries are soft and the sugar has dissolved.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
5. Stir in the Creme Fraiche, and then transfer the mixture to a blender or food processor.
6. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
7. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
8. Once the ice cream is fully churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours.

After the ice cream has hardened, scoop it into bowls and enjoy!

5c4e65b3c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 200F.
Place flour for dredging in a shallow bowl; coat each fillet with seasoned flour and shake off excess.
Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes; add butter/olive oil combination then add the fillets, without crowding.
Increase heat to high and saute, shaking the pan from time to time, until bottom of the fish is nicely browned, about 3 minutes; turn and brown the other side.
Remove fish to a plate and keep warm in the oven; repeat with remaining fillets.
Deglaze the pan with white wine; cook, stirring over high heat until reduced by about 1/3; stir in remaining butter and drained capers.
Place fillets on individual serving plates and drizzle sauce around each fillet.
5c4e65b3c5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper.
3. Dredge the Chilean sea bass fillets in the seasoned flour mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
5. Add the seasoned Chilean sea bass fillets to the skillet and cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
6. Remove the cooked fillets from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
7. In the same skillet, add the butter and softened butter. Cook over medium heat until the butter is melted and bubbly.
8. Add the capers to the skillet and stir them in. Cook for about 1-2 minutes, or until the capers are heated through.
9. Place the cooked Chilean sea bass fillets on top of the caper mixture.
10. Transfer the skillet with the caper mixture to the preheated oven. Bake for about 5-7 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and the capers are slightly crispy.
11. Serve the Sauteed Chilean Sea Bass dish immediately.

[/INST]

bb2454b288.gt: Shake all of the ingredients over ice and strain into a shooter glass.
bb2454b288.pred:
To craft Canadian Day Cheers, follow these steps:

1. In a cocktail shaker, combine 1 fluid ounce of Crown Royal Canadian rye whisky, 1 fluid ounce of amaretto almond liqueur, and 1 tablespoon of grenadine.

2. Add 1 tablespoon of prepared sweet-and-sour mix to the shaker.

3. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 15-20 seconds.

4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.

5. Top the drink with a splash of lemon soda.

6. Stir the mixture gently to combine the ingredients.

7. Enjoy your Canadian Day Cheers!

This recipe creates a delicious and festive cocktail that celebrates Canadian Day. The combination of the Crown Royal Canadian rye whisky, amaretto almond liqueur, grenadine, sweet-and-sour mix, lemon soda, and ice results in a refreshing and flavorful drink that is perfect for toasting to the occasion.

2069c35857.gt:
Bring water to a boil in a covered saucepan.
Add butter, cumin, raisins, currants, zest, and rice.
Stir the rice and return to a rolling boil.
Cover and reduce heat to low.
Cook 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and add chives.
Fluff rice with fork and transfer to a serving dish.
Cover rice liberally with toasted sliced almonds or smoked almonds.
2069c35857.pred:
[INST]
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the water, butter, cumin seed, and 1/3 of the golden raisins. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for about 20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the water is absorbed.
2. Add the currants, lemon or orange zest, and the remaining golden raisins to the saucepan. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until the currants are tender.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the sliced almonds or smoked almonds. Allow the mixture to cool for a few minutes.
4. Stir in the enriched white rice and chopped fresh chives. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the Rachael Ray's Special Rice hot, garnished with additional chopped fresh chives if desired.

[/INST]

1b5ad8b724.gt:
Cut cauliflower into florets.
Add them to the food processor and process until finely ground.
Dice one tomato and slice another tomato for garnishing.
In a large bowl, place the processed cauliflower, diced tomato, green onion, and garbanzo beans and mix.
Add 1/2 cup pesto and mix.
Taste and add more pesto if needed.
Season with black pepper.
Arrange the salad on a plate with tomato slices.
Infuse love and serve!
1b5ad8b724.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the cauliflower into florets and steam them until they are tender but still crisp.
3. While the cauliflower is steaming, chop the green onions and tomatoes into small pieces.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower florets, green onions, and tomatoes.
5. In a small bowl, mix the garbanzo beans with a little bit of water to cover them.
6. Drain the garbanzo beans and add them to the large bowl with the cauliflower and tomatoes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the pesto sauce with a little bit of water to thin it out.
8. Pour the pesto sauce over the cauliflower and garbanzo beans mixture.
9. Season the salad with black pepper to taste.
10. Serve the Cauliflower, Chickpea and Pesto Salad immediately or refrigerate it for later.

[/INST]

bcb4dcacc0.gt:
Place all ingredients into your slowcooker.
Stir lightly.
Place lid on and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for about 3 1/2 hours or until your potatoes and carrots are tender.
If using stovetop, just bring everything to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer for about 45 minutes or until veggies are tender.
bcb4dcacc0.pred:
The key steps to prepare a perfect Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew include:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the sauerkraut, onion, potatoes, carrot, green bell peppers, garlic, and ham (or turkey kielbasa). Cook over medium heat until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the crushed pineapple, chicken broth, white wine, brown sugar, pepper, caraway seed, and salt. Stir to combine.
4. Cover the pot and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30-45 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the sauerkraut is cooked through.
5. Serve the Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and satisfying Sweet and Sour Sauerkraut Kielbasa Stew that everyone will enjoy.

33aa48e240.gt:
In a small bowl, whisk together 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil with the garlic, salt, chile powder, ground cumin, paprika, sugar and fresh lime juice.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the tomatillos to the dry pan and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on each side or until slightly charred all over.
Remove from pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add the oil and then stir in the chicken.
Cook for 2 minutes or until the chicken is lightly browned.
Stir in the onion and bell pepper and cook with the chicken for 3 to 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Stir in the spice mixture and cook for another 2 minutes or until everything is well combined and heated through.
Fold in the cooked tomatillos.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with tortillas and optional toppings.
33aa48e240.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe frying pan, heat 1/4 cup of the oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the chicken strips to the pan and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add the remaining 1/4 cup of oil and cook the onion and bell pepper until they are tender and slightly caramelized, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the tomatillos and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Stir in the chile powder, cumin, paprika, sugar, and lime juice. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the flavors have melded together.
7. Add the cooked chicken back to the pan and stir to combine.
8. Season the mixture with fresh black pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the fajita mixture to a baking dish or oven-safe casserole dish.
10. Bake the fajita mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the tomatillos are tender.
11. Serve the cooked fajitas with tortillas, shredded cheese, sour cream, avocado, cilantro, and salsa or chopped tomatoes, if desired.

[/INST]

b7d53a2696.gt:
Make the cookie base: Position a rack in the middle of the oven and heat the oven to 350 degrees F. Put the butter in a food processor, along with the flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
Pulse until the mixture is well combined (about 20 pulses).
Scatter the dough into a 9x9-inch baking pan and press it evenly over the bottom.
(Wipe out the processor bowl but don’t bother washing it.)
Bake the base until firm and lightly browned, about 25 minutes.
When the cookie base comes out of the oven, sprinkle the grated chocolate evenly over the top.
(Don’t turn off the oven.)
Set the pan aside.
Make the pecan topping: As the cookie base bakes, pulse the pecans in the food processor until coarsely chopped.
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, melt the butter.
Stir in the dark brown sugar, honey, cream, and salt.
Simmer for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the pecans.
Pour the pecan mixture over the chocolate-sprinkled cookie base, spreading evenly.
Bake until much of the filling is bubbling (not just the edges), 16 to 18 minutes.
Let cool completely in the pan.
When ready to serve, cut into 16 squares.
Tightly covered, these bars will keep for about five days (though they never last that long).
b7d53a2696.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x9 inch baking dish or line it with parchment paper.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cinnamon, and salt.

3. Add the cold unsalted butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.

4. Stir in the toasted pecans and chocolate.

5. In a small bowl, whisk together the heavy cream and honey.

6. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until the dough comes together.

7. Press the dough evenly into the prepared baking dish.

8. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.

9. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

These Pecan and Chocolate Squares are a delicious and satisfying treat, perfect for sharing with friends and family. The combination of the crunchy pecans, smooth chocolate, and the sweetness of the brown sugar and honey creates a delightful contrast of flavors and textures. Enjoy!

e910d0b6fc.gt:
Stir together the potato flakes, pancake mix, onion, Cheddar cheese, milk, egg, olive oil, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper in a bowl until well combined.
Grease a griddle or large skillet, and place over medium heat.
Drop pancakes, 1/4 cup at a time, onto the hot griddle, and cook until the edges look dry and 1 bubble appears in the center, about 3 minutes.
Flip the pancakes, and cook until browned on the other side, about 3 more minutes.
e910d0b6fc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the instant mashed potato flakes, complete dry pancake mix, chopped onion, shredded Cheddar cheese, skim milk, beaten egg, extra-virgin olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to taste. Mix until well combined.
3. If desired, add a pinch of cayenne pepper for extra flavor.
4. Pour the mixture onto a lightly floured surface and roll out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
5. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat.
6. Carefully place the rolled-out dough onto the skillet or griddle, and cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the edges are golden brown and the bottom is cooked through.
7. Transfer the pancakes to a wire rack or a plate to cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Mountain Mama's Potato Pancakes hot, with your favorite toppings or dips.

[/INST]

6d750b6d49.gt:
Heat pan, brown ground meat of choice
Finely chop peppers and onions.
Heat seperate pan with olive oil and saute peppers and onions with salt and pepper to taste.
Peel and dice Avocados.
Set aside.
Once peppers and onions are finished, combine meat, peppers, and avocados together.
Add 1 3/4 cups of Balsamic Vinaigrette to mixture and cook on low.
Add salt, black pepper, and garlic to taste.
Slice limes into wedges and set aside.
Finely dice Cilantro and set aside.
Cut heads off of Romaine lettuce and set aside.
Since we are using the lettuce as the wrap, the outer leaves typically work better.
Take two leaves of Romaine lettuce and spread hummus on the inside.
Add meat, pepper, onion, avocado, balsamic mix to wrap.
Finish off with Cilantro and Lime!
There are many things you can add to this such as rice, cheese, etc.
This is a healthier option we chose.
Enjoy!
6d750b6d49.pred:
1. First, wash and dry the lettuce thoroughly.
2. Next, chop the onion, green, red, and yellow bell peppers into small, bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the ground meat, chopped onion, green, red, and yellow bell peppers, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well to combine the ingredients.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the chopped cilantro, lime juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
5. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
6. Spread a thin layer of olive oil on a baking sheet or a large roasting pan.
7. Place the ground meat mixture on the baking sheet or roasting pan, and shape it into a patty.
8. Bake the meat patty in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
9. While the meat is baking, heat the Balsamic Vinaigrette in a small saucepan over low heat.
10. Once the meat is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin strips.
11. In a large salad bowl, combine the cooked meat, chopped cilantro mixture, and a drizzle of the warm Balsamic Vinaigrette.
12. To assemble the wraps, lay a lettuce leaf on a clean surface. Place a spoonful of the meat mixture on the lettuce leaf, and then add a dollop of Hummus on top.
13. Roll the lettuce leaf over the meat and Hummus mixture, and then slice the roll in half.
14. Serve the Trav's Cilantro Lime Lettuce Wraps immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

6002037e6e.gt:
Add Angostura bitters to a chilled old-fashioned glass and swirl to coat glass; pour off excess.
Add gin and, if you like, ice and a splash of soda water.
6002037e6e.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: 3 dashes Angostura bitters, 2 ounces London Dry-style gin, and a splash of soda water (optional).
2. In a mixing glass, combine the gin and bitters. Stir the mixture well to ensure the bitters are evenly distributed.
3. If desired, add a splash of soda water to the mixing glass. This will create a more refreshing and effervescent drink.
4. Strain the mixture into a chilled glass filled with ice.
5. Garnish the drink with a twist of lemon peel or a lemon slice, if desired.
6. Enjoy your delicious Pink Gin!

[/INST]

5de42f87b0.gt:
Whisk garlic powder, salt, black pepper, oregano, and turmeric together in a bowl.
Store in an airtight container.
5de42f87b0.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the garlic powder, salt, black pepper, oregano, and turmeric.
3. Spread the mixture on a baking sheet and bake for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Allow the seasoning mixture to cool completely before using it to season your dish.
5. To cook the dish, you can use any protein of your choice, such as chicken, beef, or tofu. Season the protein with the cooled seasoning mixture and cook it in a pan or oven until it is fully cooked through.
6. Serve the dish with your choice of side dishes, such as rice, potatoes, or vegetables.

[/INST]

641af093c6.gt:
In a large bowl, whisk the lime juice, fish sauce, sambal oelek and ginger.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the watermelon, radishes, scallions and red chiles and toss.
Fold in the mint and basil, season with salt and pepper and serve right away.
641af093c6.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large bowl, whisk together the lime juice, fish sauce, sambal oelek, and ginger. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
2. Add the watermelon, radishes, scallions, chiles, and mint leaves to the bowl. Toss everything together until the ingredients are evenly coated with the dressing.
3. Transfer the salad to a serving bowl and garnish with the torn Thai basil leaves.
4. Serve the Thai-Style Radish and Watermelon Salad immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This Thai-Style Radish and Watermelon Salad is a refreshing and flavorful dish that combines the sweetness of watermelon with the crunch of radishes and the spiciness of chiles. The combination of lime juice, fish sauce, and sambal oelek creates a tangy and savory dressing that complements the natural flavors of the ingredients. The mint and basil add a burst of freshness and aroma, while the chiles provide a spicy kick that balances the overall taste. This salad is perfect for a light and healthy meal or as a side dish to accompany other dishes during a gathering or party.

79b26bed8a.gt:
Spray 8 x 8-inch casserole dish with vegetable cooking spray or grease with olive oil.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic until soft in a little olive oil.
Toss with the cooked pasta.
Add and toss with the herbs, salt, pepper, a little (about 2 tsp.)
of the Parmesan cheese, all the ricotta, and beaten egg.
Toss well together.
Spread and press down half of the mixture in the prepared casserole dish.
Layer with half the tomato slices and zucchini.
Sprinkle with half of the Parmesan and mozzarella.
Repeat the process again.
Cover dish with foil and bake in a preheated 350F (180C) oven for 35 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 5 to 10 minutes, until cheese in oozy and light golden brown.
Let cool for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares like lasagna.
79b26bed8a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked and drained pasta, onion, garlic, beaten eggs, ricotta cheese, basil, parsley, kosher salt, black pepper, and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly into a well-greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Top the pasta mixture with the shredded mozzarella cheese and grated parmesan cheese.
5. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the pasta is cooked through.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
7. Enjoy your delicious Renee's Pasta-Vegetable Bake!

a203693020.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Roll out half of pastry to line pie pan, and roll out other half to cut into strips for lattice top.
In a medium mixing bowl combine eggs, sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, and grated lemon rind.
Mix well then stir in pineapple.
Spread filling into pastry-lined pie pan, make lattice top, and crimp edges.
Place in preheated oven and bake 40 minutes or until filling is set and crust is lightly browned.
Chill before serving.
a203693020.pred:
To prepare a perfect Pineapple and Lemon Pie, follow these key steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, salt, and lemon zest.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually pour in the lemon juice, mixing until the ingredients are well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into the pie crust and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is set.
7. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely before serving.

By following these steps, you will have a delicious and perfectly prepared Pineapple and Lemon Pie.

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.
131faa12b8.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Grilled Chicken Breasts in Spiced Yogurt, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, chili powder, cumin, coriander, black pepper, cinnamon, and minced shallots.
3. Add the chicken breast halves to the marinade and toss to coat evenly. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Remove the chicken from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
5. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
6. While the chicken is grilling, toss the fresh mint leaves with the lemon juice and olive oil.
7. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Slice the chicken into thin pieces and serve it alongside the fresh mint and lemon mixture.

[/INST]

064e7af1db.gt:
Preheat an indoor grill, and coat with cooking spray.
Place the chicken strips on the grill, and cook for about 7 minutes.
Allow them to cool slightly, then cut into cubes.
While the chicken is cooking, heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Place the onion rings in the skillet, and cook for a few minutes.
Add the red and yellow pepper, baby corn, and the stir-fry vegetables.
Increase the heat to medium-high; cook and stir for about 15 minutes.
Sprinkle in the sugar and salt.
Stir in the chicken.
Dissolve the cornstarch in water, and pour into the skillet along with the soy sauce.
Cook and stir until the sauce thickens.
064e7af1db.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken strips, olive oil, onion, and red and yellow bell peppers. Toss to coat evenly.
3. Spread the mixture on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with a little water to form a slurry. Set aside.
5. In a large skillet or wok, heat the remaining tablespoon of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the baby corn and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until it is heated through.
6. Add the vegetable mixture to the skillet or wok, along with the cornstarch slurry. Stir to combine.
7. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce thickens slightly.
8. Add the frozen stir-fry vegetables to the skillet or wok, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the vegetables are heated through.
9. Serve the Chinese Happy Family over rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

fe5d11c597.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup margarine in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until creamy.
Add egg and vanilla, and continue beating until well mixed.
Reduce speed to low,and add all remaining cookie ingredients except marshmallows.
Beat until well mixed.
Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 6-7 minutes or until edges are just set.
Remove from oven.
Press 1 marshmallow half onto center of each cookie.
Continue baking for 2 minutes or until marshmallow is softened.
Cool 1 minute; remove from cookie sheets.
Cool completely.
Combine all frosting ingredients except milk in small mixer bowl.
Beat at low speed, adding enough milk for desired spreading consistency.
Frost cooled cookies, covering entire marshmallow.
Variations: Before putting frosting over cooled cookies, spread a thin layer of peanut butter, caramel, or seedless raspberry jelly over marshmallow, and then add your frosting.
fe5d11c597.pred:
[INST]To prepare Brownie Surprise Cookies, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the sugar and margarine until smooth. Add the egg and vanilla, and mix well.
3. Gradually add the flour, cocoa, and baking soda, mixing until well combined.
4. Stir in the milk, salt, and cocoa powder.
5. Fold in the marshmallows, cut into halves.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cookie comes out clean.
8. Allow the cookies to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. To make the frosting, combine the powdered sugar, cocoa, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Gradually add the margarine, mixing until smooth and creamy. If the frosting is too thick, add a little more milk.
10. Spread the frosting over the cooled cookies, and garnish with additional marshmallows, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Brownie Surprise Cookies! [/INST]

a896ff3f80.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir shallot until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Pour balsamic vinegar into skillet and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer until balsamic vinegar mixture is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.
Stir often.
Cut chicken breasts from one side through the middle horizontally to within one-half inch of the other side.
Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.
Spread half the goat cheese onto one half of each chicken breast and drizzle 1/3 of the reduced balsamic vinegar mixture over the goat cheese.
Close the chicken breasts over the goat cheese and secure with toothpicks.
Arrange chicken into a baking dish.
Drizzle with remaining 1/3 of the balsamic reduction.
Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink inside, the filling is hot, and the juices run clear, 30 to 35 minutes.
An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of a filled breast should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
a896ff3f80.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, shallot, and minced garlic. Set aside.
3. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. While the chicken is resting, pour the balsamic vinegar mixture into the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Carefully slice the chicken breasts in half lengthwise, and spoon a small amount of the balsamic vinegar mixture into each half.
8. Fold the chicken breasts in half, and press the goat cheese into the mixture.
9. Place the stuffed chicken breasts on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the stuffing is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This cooking procedure involves several steps, including preparing the chicken, cooking it, stuffing it with goat cheese and balsamic vinegar, and finally baking it. The result is a delicious and flavorful Balsamic Goat Cheese Stuffed Chicken Breast that can be enjoyed with a side of your choice.

8590091d29.gt:
Lightly oil grill and preheat to high.
Loosen skin on chicken pieces with fingers, by sliding hand between skin and flesh.
In a small skillet, saute green onion and 2 cloves garlic in butter or margarine for 1 minute.
Stir in breadcrumbs and parsley.
Push this seasoning under chicken skins, working it down well.
Combine 1 cup butter or margarine with mustard, 1 clove garlic and curry powder.
Spread this seasoned butter or margarine over chicken and put on preheated grill.
Cook 10 to 15 minutes each side, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear.
Brush with remaining seasoned butter while grilling.
8590091d29.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the butter, garlic, and green onions. Season the chicken legs with salt and pepper.
3. In a large bowl, combine the bread crumbs, parsley, and coarse grained prepared mustard.
4. Dip each chicken leg into the butter mixture, then coat it with the bread crumb mixture.
5. Place the coated chicken legs on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This delicious Parsley Butter Seasoned Chicken dish is a simple yet flavorful meal that can be enjoyed by everyone. The combination of the crispy bread crumbs, the tender chicken, and the fresh herbs creates a delightful and satisfying dish.

55a63594d1.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg, cumin, red pepper, corn muffin mix, corn, and green chilies; stir until moist.
Pour into a 9 x 13 baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake for 15 minutes.
Pierce surface liberally with a fork.
Pour enchilada sauce over the top.
Top with chicken and remaining 3/4 cup cheese.
Bake for an additional 15 minutes or until cheese melts.
Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream on top.
Delicious!
55a63594d1.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded Mexican cheese, milk, egg, ground cumin, ground red pepper, and corn muffin mix. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the cream style corn, chopped green chilies, and red enchilada sauce to the mixture. Stir until well combined.
4. Add the shredded chicken and sour cream to the mixture. Stir until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Chicken Tamale Casserole recipe combines the flavors of Mexican cheese, corn, chilies, and enchilada sauce to create a delicious and hearty dish. The combination of ingredients results in a satisfying and comforting meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

bf5b8fd371.gt:
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add in the tomatoes, capers, anchovies, olives and garlic.
Cook until fragrant and tomatoes soften.
This will take about 5 minutes.
Add in the tomato puree and season with salt and pepper.
Cook for a couple more minutes.
In the meantime in a large pot cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Cook until pasta is al dente (according to package instructions for al dente).
Reserve a cup or so of pasta water.
Drain the pasta and add it right the the sauce.
Add some of the reserved pasta water to thin out the sauce as needed.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve right away.
You can sprinkle some grated Parmesan cheese on top to serve.
bf5b8fd371.pred:
1. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet or pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes, capers, and anchovies, and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the tomato puree, salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Drain the cooked spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the sauce. Toss the spaghetti and sauce together until well combined.
7. Serve the Spaghetti Puttanesca immediately, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

c5ede2d8c3.gt:
Smooth the asparagus stalks with a peeler.
Cut in half lengthwise, then slice into 4-5 cm lengths.
Put the asparagus, salt and sesame oil into a heatproof dish and mix gently.
Microwave unwrapped at 600 W for 2 minutes.
Add more salt and sesame oil if necessary, and sprinkle on some white sesame seeds to finish.
c5ede2d8c3.pred:
[INST]
1. Wash the asparagus thoroughly and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a small bowl, mix the salt and sesame oil.
3. Add the white sesame seeds to the bowl and mix well.
4. Place the asparagus pieces in a microwave-safe dish.
5. Pour the salt and sesame oil mixture over the asparagus.
6. Cover the dish with a microwave-safe lid or plastic wrap.
7. Microwave the dish on high for 2-3 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender and slightly crispy.
8. Remove the dish from the microwave and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

1ce32e6812.gt:
Toss lettuce with croutons and bacon in large bowl.
Add dressing and cheese; mix lightly.
Serve with lemon wedges.
1ce32e6812.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, whole wheat croutons, and chopped turkey bacon.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing and 2 tablespoons of the Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese.
4. Add the dressing mixture to the lettuce mixture, tossing to combine.
5. Place the salad mixture on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the croutons are golden and the dressing is slightly bubbly.
6. While the salad is baking, slice the lemon into 8 wedges.
7. Once the salad is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the salad immediately, and garnish with the remaining 2 tablespoons of the Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese and a lemon wedge.

Enjoy your delicious Turkey Bacon-Caesar Salad!

f7582fba0b.gt:
STOCK:.
Combine the first 7 ingredients in a large pot and bring to a full boil.
Cook at the full boil for approx 1 hour.
Use a colander to drain.
Return liquid to the pot.
Dispose of the carcass.
Puree the cooked vegetables and set a side to be used as a thickener later.
SOUP:.
Combine the rest of the ingredients (except the crackers) in your large pot.
Bring to a boil.
Cook for 1 - 1 1/2 hours on medium heat - stirring occasionally.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add the crackers approximately 15 - 20 minutes before serving.
The crackers dissolve and thicken your soup.
The crackers are used rather than flour or starch in order to freeze the soup without it separating and they do not take away any of the flavour.
f7582fba0b.pred:
[INST]To create a mouthwatering Creamy Lobster (Seafood) Vegetable Soup, follow these precise steps:
1. In a large pot, combine the lobsters, their bodies, and the large onion. Add enough water to cover the ingredients, and bring the mixture to a boil.
2. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 25-30 minutes or until the lobsters are cooked through.
3. Remove the lobsters from the pot, and let them cool. Once cooled, remove the meat from the shells and chop it into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a large skillet, cook the diced onion, celery, and carrots over medium heat until the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the imitation crabmeat or fresh crabmeat, chicken stock, vegetable stock, and heavy cream to the skillet, and stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, and cook for about 10-15 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and the soup is heated through.
7. Remove the soup from the heat, and stir in the garlic powder, fresh thyme, and sherry wine.
8. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Creamy Lobster (Seafood) Vegetable Soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh thyme and a drizzle of sherry wine, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Creamy Lobster (Seafood) Vegetable Soup!

c3da9b5a1f.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
In a bowl combine corn flakes, sugar, margarine, and corn syrup.
Press mixture evenly and firmly in bottom of 12-inch pan.
Bake for 5 minutes, cool completely.
Combine cream cheese and marshmallow creme, spread over crust.
Arrange fruit over cream cheese mixture.
Chill for 1 hour.
Cut into slices.
c3da9b5a1f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn flakes, sugar, and margarine. Mix until well combined.
3. Press the corn flake mixture evenly onto the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) round baking pan.
4. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and lightly golden. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool completely.
5. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened light cream cheese, light corn syrup, and marshmallow creme. Mix until well combined.
6. Add the sliced fruit to the cream cheese mixture and mix until well combined.
7. Spread the fruit mixture evenly over the cooled crust.
8. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the fruit is tender and the crust is golden brown.
9. Allow the pizza to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Corn Flakes Fruit Pizza!

010fbf4e3f.gt:
Shell (leave the tail on) the hrimp and devein.
Heat a skillet on medium heat.
Add butter and garlic.
When it starts to smell garlicky, add shrimp and stir until it turns pink.
Add zucchini, saute and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
When it's cooked, pour the soy sauce over.
Remove from the heat, and sprinkle with chives.
Squeeze over lemon juice if you like!
With rice!
it was Yummy~
010fbf4e3f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the shrimp to the skillet, season with salt and pepper, and cook until the shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the zucchini and cook until tender, about 4-5 minutes.
6. Add the soy sauce, lemon juice, and any desired seasonings to the skillet. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Add the cooked shrimp back to the skillet and toss everything together.
8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
9. Serve the Soy Sauce Shrimp Scampi immediately, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

[/INST]

aa4d853e28.gt:
Combine syrup, sugar, salt, butter and vanilla and mix well.
Add slightly beated eggs.
Pour into unbaked pe shell.
Sprinkle pecans over all.
Bake in preheated 350F (180C).
oven for approximately 45 minutes.
When cool, you may top with whipped cream or ice cream.
aa4d853e28.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn syrup, brown sugar, and salt. Stir until well combined.
3. Add the melted butter and vanilla extract, and mix until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs slightly.
5. Add the egg mixture to the corn syrup mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Fold in the pecans.
7. Pour the mixture into the pie shells.
8. Bake the pies for 45-50 minutes or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
9. Allow the pies to cool completely before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Dear Abby's Kentucky Pecan Pie!

10a4bdfe37.gt:
Cook the wild rice according to the directions on the package.
Wild rice generally takes 55-60 minutes to cook.
While thats cooking, in a large soup pot, melt the butter and saute the leeks, carrots, celery, mushrooms, garlic and thyme on medium high heat.
Cook for about 15 minutes, or until the vegetables have softened, stirring occasionally.
Add the flour and stir until blended into the vegetables.
Add the chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, cover, turn the heat down to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
At the 30 minute point, add the wild rice, chives and cooked and diced chicken.
Stir in the cream, half-n-half and sherry.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
10a4bdfe37.pred:
To prepare a perfect Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup, follow these key steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and peel the carrots, celery, and mushrooms. Clean and chop the leek, and dice the large one.

2. Cook the rice: Rinse the rice in a fine mesh strainer and cook it in a large pot with chicken broth until it is tender and the liquid is absorbed.

3. Cook the vegetables: In a large pot, cook the diced carrots, celery, and mushrooms until they are tender.

4. Add the chicken: Add the cooked chicken to the pot, and cook until it is heated through.

5. Add the wild rice: Add the cooked wild rice to the pot, and stir to combine.

6. Add the seasonings: Add the minced garlic, thyme, salt, pepper, and half-and-half to the pot. Stir to combine.

7. Cook the soup: Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the wild rice is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.

8. Serve: Serve the soup hot, garnished with fresh chives and a drizzle of heavy cream, if desired.

By following these key steps, you will create a delicious and comforting Minnesota Chicken Wild Rice Soup.

063b119d92.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees .
Cook the broccoli until tender-crisp; drain very well.
Put in a greased 2-quart casserole.
Mix in the cream cheese, cheddar, green onion, salt, pepper and bacon.
Bake for 20-30 minutes, until bubbly.
063b119d92.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the broccoli florets, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, green onions, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, cook the bacon until crisp. Once cooked, crumble the bacon and set aside.
4. Spread the mixture of broccoli, cream cheese, and cheddar cheese evenly in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Pour the melted butter over the top of the casserole mixture.
6. Sprinkle the crumbled bacon evenly over the top of the casserole.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the broccoli is tender.
8. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheesy Broccoli Casserole!

0ddb710349.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a small bowl, beat egg with milk.
In a shallow plate or bowl, mix bread crumbs with Italian seasonings.
Dip each piece of chicken into the egg/milk mixture, then into the bread crumb mixture to coat thoroughly.
Place coated chicken in a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, depending on how thick the chicken breasts are (bake until chicken is done and juices run clear).
In the last 3 to 4 minutes of baking, sprinkle the top of the chicken pieces with cheese.
Remove from oven and serve!
0ddb710349.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and milk together.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the seasoned dry bread crumbs and Italian seasoning.
4. Dip each chicken breast half into the egg mixture, then coat it with the bread crumb mixture.
5. Place the breaded chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the chicken for 15-20 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the bread crumbs are golden brown.
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Meanwhile, shred the mozzarella cheese using a cheese grater or a food processor.
9. Assemble the Cheesy Breaded Chicken by placing the cooked chicken on a serving plate, then topping it with the shredded mozzarella cheese.
10. Serve the Cheesy Breaded Chicken immediately.

[/INST]

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
3. Add the diced onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the diced celery and cook for an additional 3 minutes.
5. Pour in the chicken stock, and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Add the frozen cauliflower and broccoli to the pot, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10-12 minutes.
7. Add the cream of chicken soup, and stir to combine.
8. Reduce the heat to low, and let the soup simmer for about 10 minutes.
9. Add the shredded chicken, milk, and processed cheese to the pot. Stir to combine.
10. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the soup in bowls, and garnish with a sprinkle of crackers on top.

Enjoy your delicious Chunky Chowder!

cf03193597.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Lightly grease two baking sheets or cover them with parchment paper.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix well oats, coconut, flour, and sugar.
Mix in butter and honey.
In a small bowl, mix boiling water and baking soda together and add to the flour mixture.
Drop rounded teaspoonfuls of dough 3 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until crisp and golden brown.
Cool on the baking sheet for 30 seconds.
Loosen with a thin spatula and cool on wire racks.
If the cookies stick to the sheet, return to the oven for 1 minute, then loosen with a spatula.
When cool, store in an airtight container.
cf03193597.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the rolled oats, sweetened flaked coconut, and all-purpose flour.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the butter and honey or light corn syrup until smooth.
4. Add the baking soda to the butter mixture and mix until well combined.
5. Gradually add the boiling water to the butter mixture, stirring until smooth.
6. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients and mix until a dough forms.
7. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead until it comes together.
8. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
9. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
10. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the cookies for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
12. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Anzac Cookies!

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.
6902fabddb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the kosher salt, ground black pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and ground red pepper.
3. Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet, making sure there is enough space between the seasonings for even cooking.
4. Bake the seasoned salt mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. The seasoned salt should be slightly crispy and fragrant.
5. Allow the seasoned salt to cool completely before using it as a seasoning for your dish.

6. To make the savory Homemade Seasoned Salt dish, combine the seasoned salt with your desired protein, such as chicken, beef, or tofu. Cook the protein according to your recipe, then add the seasoned salt mixture to the dish.
7. Serve the dish hot, and enjoy the delicious, homemade seasoned salt flavor.

e95f227a6f.gt:
Lightly grease and line a 23cm square tin.
In a large pan, melt the chocolate, condensed milk, butter and Horlicks powder over low heat.
Stir until you have a smooth mixture.
The mixture should come away from the pan quite easily.
It looks a bit like a funny slime monster.
A yummy, funny slime monster.
Pour and scrape the mixture into the tin.
Scatter the Maltesers over the top and gently press them into the fudge a teeny bit.
Chill for a few hours until firm (I put mine in the fridge overnight).
Cut into squares.
Marvel at how little it now resembles a monster.
e95f227a6f.pred:
[USER] I would like to create a mouthwatering Malted Milk Chocolate Fudge dish. What are the precise steps to achieve this?

[/USER]

[SYS] To create a mouthwatering Malted Milk Chocolate Fudge dish, follow these precise steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1/2 pound of broken Milk Chocolate and 3/4 pound of broken Plain/semi-sweet Chocolate (about 50% Cocoa Solids).
2. Melt the chocolates in a double boiler or a heat-proof bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
3. Once the chocolates are melted, remove the bowl from the heat and stir in 2 ounces of Condensed Milk.
4. Add 2-18 ounces of Butter, cut into chunks, and stir until smooth.
5. Stir in 3 Tablespoons Horlicks Powder.
6. Gradually add 3-58 ounces of Maltesers or Whoppers, breaking them into smaller pieces as you go.
7. Mix until the ingredients are well combined and the fudge reaches your desired consistency.
8. Pour the fudge into a lined 9x9 inch baking dish, smooth the top, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until set.
9. Cut the fudge into squares and serve.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

390edd893c.gt:
1.
In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat the butter and oil until the butter froths up a bit.
Add in the leeks, garlic, carrots and celery and cook for 5 minutes, or until just softened.
2.
Add in the sweet potato, potato and celeraic and stir and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Pour in the vegetable stock, red lentils, cumin, bay leaf and thyme and bring to a boil.
Once boiling, reduce to a simmer and cover the pot.
Taste and add salt and pepper as needed.
Let it simmer for 30 minutes, or until all the vegetables have softened.
At the moment the vegetables have softened, remove the pot from the heat immediaely.
3.
Ladle the soup into bowls and grate the fresh Parmesan over top.
Recipe slightly adapted from Cannelle et Vanillecannellevanille.com.
390edd893c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Heat the olive oil and butter in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the leek and garlic, and cook until the leek is softened and the garlic is fragrant, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the carrots, celery, sweet potatoes, and potato, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
4. Add the celeraic, vegetable stock, lentils, cumin, bay leaf, thyme, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender and the vegetables are fully cooked.
6. Remove the bay leaf and discard.
7. Using a hand blender or transferring the soup to a blender, puree the soup until smooth.
8. Return the soup to the pot and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese.
9. Serve the savory Red Lentil Soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh thyme leaves if desired.

[/SYS]

In this cooking tutorial, you'll learn how to prepare a delicious and hearty Red Lentil Soup. The soup is packed with flavorful ingredients like olive oil, butter, garlic, carrots, celery, sweet potatoes, and potatoes, which create a rich and comforting taste. The addition of lentils and thyme adds a nutritious element to the dish, while the Parmesan cheese provides a creamy and savory finish. This soup is perfect for a cozy meal or a warm dish to share with friends and family.

0af8036e1e.gt:
Grease an 11 x 7-inch-inch baking pan.
Set oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, beat 1 cup sugar and the shortening with an electric mixer on medium or high speed until well mixed.
Add in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition, then add in orange extract.
In a small bowl mix together flour, baking soda and salt.
Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately to egg mixture, beating on low speed after each addition JUST until combined.
By hand stir in the orange peel, raisins and nuts.
Transfer and spread the batter into prepared baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
Stir together 1/3 cup sugar and the orange juice; gradually pour over the baked cake.
Cool in pan on a wire rack for 30 minutes.
Serve warm, or cool completely.
0af8036e1e.pred:
To make a delicious Orange Snack Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, shortening, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, and salt, mixing until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, orange extract, and orange zest.
5. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the chopped raisins and nuts.
7. Grease a 9x9 inch baking dish and pour the batter into it.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Orange Snack Cake!

3bcfc9dd72.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Drizzle olive oil on a rimmed baking sheet.
Spread spinach leaves in a thick layer covering the baking sheet.
Arrange onions and artichokes over the spinach, and drizzle the marinade from the jar over the entire salad.
Sprinkle with the cheese (and sausage, if you wish).
Bake for about 10 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted but NOT crispy.
3bcfc9dd72.pred:
To prepare a delicious Hot Spinach and Artichoke Salad, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the spinach, red onion, and marinated artichoke hearts.
2. In a small bowl, mix the crumbled feta cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. In a small frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
4. Add the crumbled feta cheese to the frying pan and stir until the cheese is melted and slightly browned.
5. Pour the melted cheese mixture over the spinach mixture in the large bowl.
6. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
7. Serve the Hot Spinach and Artichoke Salad immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

This Hot Spinach and Artichoke Salad is a delicious and nutritious meal option that can be enjoyed as a main course or as a side dish. The combination of spinach, artichoke hearts, and feta cheese provides a balance of flavors and textures, making it a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

85b79cc54f.gt:
In a large skillet over medium heat, add meatless ground burger, water and spices.
Mix well and let simmer for 10-15 minutes until heated through and water is absorbed.
Use this mixture to replace the seasoned ground beef in any of your favorite Mexican recipes!
Another note* One can use 1 cup of TVP in place of the soy crumbles or Boca.
You might need a bit more that 1 cup of water to keep mixture from getting too dry.
85b79cc54f.pred:
To prepare Vegetarian Taco "meat," follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the instant minced onion, vegetable bouillon cube, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, and oregano.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the water, vegetarian ground beef (or your choice of vegetarian protein), and the spice mixture.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the liquid has been absorbed and the "meat" is cooked through.
4. Stir occasionally to ensure even cooking.
5. Once the "meat" is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it cool slightly.
6. Serve the cooked "meat" in your favorite taco shells, garnished with your favorite toppings, such as lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.

Enjoy your delicious Vegetarian Taco "meat"!

5c278f764a.gt: Stir mayonnaise, salad dressing, relish, vinegar, sugar, lemon juice, and paprika together in a small bowl until smooth.
5c278f764a.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, French salad dressing, relish, vinegar, white sugar, lemon juice, and paprika.
2. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the sauce for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve the sauce on top of your favorite burger or use it as a base for a variety of dishes, such as sandwiches or wraps.

[/INST]

7b4784ea40.gt:
Slice the body of the prepped squid into rounds, then cut into 1cm dice.
Combine the flours, dashi stock granules, and water, and mix until it's slightly sticky (meaning the gluten in the flour has formed).
Add the squid to the batter, and leave for at least 30 minutes.
If the batter becomes too firm, add a little water so that it's the consistency of crepe batter.
Add oil in a pan, and pour in the batter (You can add an egg here to upgrade the pancake to a deluxe version.)
When one side is browned, turn the pancake over.
Cook the other side while pressing down hard on the pancake with your spatula.
When the pancake is cooked, spread the combined okonomiyaki and takoyaki sauces, fold in half and press.
If you add too much squid, the pancakes will be hard to cook.
I'm not too good at cooking these myself.
If you're not used to making pancakes, try cooking one with just a little squid added to the batter.
7b4784ea40.pred:
To craft an Osaka Specialty: Ika-yaki (Squid Pancakes), follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine 100 grams to 180 grams of squid, depending on the desired size of the pancakes.
2. In a separate bowl, mix 140 grams of cake flour, 10 grams of bread flour, 5 grams of katakuriko, and 1 tsp of dashi stock granules.
3. Gradually add 200 grams of water to the squid mixture, stirring to combine.
4. Add 1 vegetable oil to the mixture and stir to ensure the squid is evenly coated.
5. Add the katakuriko mixture to the squid mixture, stirring to combine.
6. Gradually add the cake flour mixture to the squid mixture, stirring to combine.
7. Add the dashi stock granules and stir to combine.
8. Cook the Ika-yaki on a griddle or frying pan over medium heat, using a small amount of oil to prevent sticking. Cook until the pancakes are golden brown and cooked through.
9. Serve the Ika-yaki with a dollop of Okonomiyaki sauce and a drizzle of takoyaki sauce, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Ika-yaki, a popular Osaka specialty!

51e70cd927.gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
Cut potatoes lengthwise in half; place, cut sides down, on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.
Bake 30 to 35 min.
or until tender.
Scoop out centers of potatoes into bowl, leaving 1/4-inch-thick shells.
Add Neufchatel, milk, sugar and cinnamon to potatoes; mash until blended.
Fill shells with potato mixture; top with nuts.
Bake 8 min.
or until potatoes are heated through and nuts are toasted.
51e70cd927.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry.
3. Prick the sweet potatoes with a fork, then place them in a large baking dish.
4. In a small bowl, mix the Neufchatel cheese, fat-free milk, brown sugar, and ground cinnamon.
5. Pour the cheese mixture over the sweet potatoes, making sure they are evenly coated.
6. Roast the sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the sweet potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, mix the chopped pecans with melted butter.
9. Carefully scoop the sweet potatoes out of the baking dish and place them on a serving plate.
10. Sprinkle the pecan mixture evenly over the sweet potatoes.
11. Serve the Twice-Baked Sweet Potatoes immediately.

[/INST]

06a62bd371.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease 9x13 inch baking dish.
Arrange potatoes over the bottom of the dish, and set aside.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onion; cook and stir until the onion is transparent, about 5 minutes.
Stir in 3 tablespoons butter until melted.
Sprinkle the flour, salt, and pepper over the onion mixture.
Cook and stir until mixture bubbles and thickens, about 2 minutes.
Continue to stir the flour mixture while gradually pouring in the milk and buttermilk, and return the mixture to boiling.
Stir in 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese; cook for 2 minutes until melted, and mixture is smooth.
Pour the mixture over the potatoes in the baking dish, stirring to coat evenly.
Bake in preheated oven for 1/2 hour, and stir.
Bake 1/2 hour longer, stir the potato mixture again, and sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes more.
06a62bd371.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the cubed potatoes with the minced garlic, red onion, and 1 tablespoon of butter. Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2% milk, buttermilk, and 1/3 cup of flour. Pour the mixture over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly.
4. Transfer the potatoes to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the potatoes for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
6. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the remaining 1/2 cup of flour with the remaining 1/4 cup of butter. Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika.
7. Once the potatoes are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Pour the melted butter mixture over the potatoes and toss to coat evenly.
9. Sprinkle the potatoes with the remaining 1/2 cup of freshly grated Parmesan cheese.
10. Return the potatoes to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Serve the Buttermilk Parmesan Potatoes immediately.

[/INST]

0998cbac3e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
In a large bowl, combine whole wheat flour, 1 cup white flour, brown sugar, baking powder and salt.
Using a pastry blender, or two knives scissors-fashion, cut butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Add nuts or wheat berries.
Stir in the maple syrup and egg and just enough milk so that dough leaves side of bowl and forms a ball.
Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface; gently roll in flour to coat.
Knead lightly; if dough is very soft, roll in flour again.
Transfer to a lightly greased baking sheet.
Pat or roll into an 8-inch disk; cut into 8 wedges, but do not separate.
Bake until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
Immediately remove from baking sheet, and carefully separate.
Serve warm.
0998cbac3e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, white flour, brown sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut the chilled butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Use your hands or a pastry cutter to mix the butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and milk together.
5. Add the wet ingredients to the dry mixture, stirring until the dough comes together. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more milk, 1 tablespoon at a time.
6. Fold in the chopped walnuts or wheat berries.
7. Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface and pat it into a 1-inch thick disk.
8. Cut the dough into 8 equal pieces and shape each piece into a scone.
9. Place the scones on a greased baking sheet and brush the tops with maple syrup.
10. Bake the scones for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
11. Remove the scones from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Maple Scones!

8582739828.gt:
Whisk together 2/3 cup broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup, ginger, garlic, and vinegar and pour into a large sealable plastic bag.
Add tenderloin and seal bag, then marinate, chilled, turning bag over occasionally, 2 hours.
Bring tenderloin to room temperature, about 1 hour.
Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 425F.
Pat tenderloin dry and reserve marinade.
Heat oil in a 12-inch ovenproof skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides, turning with tongs, about 3 minutes total.
Transfer skillet to oven and roast pork until thermometer inserted diagonally into center of meat registers 155F, 12 to 15 minutes.
Transfer to a cutting board and let stand, loosely covered with foil, 10 minutes.
While meat is roasting, pour marinade through a fine-mesh sieve into a small saucepan and boil until reduced to about 1/3 cup, 10 to 15 minutes.
Stir in remaining cup broth and bring sauce to a simmer.
Serve slices of tenderloin with sauce.
8582739828.pred:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, brown sugar, ketchup or tomato paste, and minced garlic. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.

2. While the sauce is simmering, preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).

3. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper, then place it in a roasting pan or on a baking sheet. Drizzle the olive oil over the pork, then roast it in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C) for medium-rare.

4. Remove the pork from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.

5. While the pork is resting, carefully remove the sauce from the saucepan and discard the garlic cloves. Stir in the cider vinegar or balsamic vinegar, and adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper if needed.

6. Serve the pork slices with the ginger-marinated sauce on the side. Enjoy your delicious Ginger-Marinated Pork Tenderloin!

e4f1c20d6c.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Beat egg yolks thoroughly with salt and paprika.
Beat in oil a little at a time.
Beat in butter a little at a time.
Stir in 3/4 of the cheese.
Combine with spinach.
Pour one third of spinach mixture into a greased shallow 9" square baking dish.
Season both sides of fish with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Roll fish up and place rolls, loose side down, in pan on top of spinach.
Top with remaining spinach mixture.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes.
e4f1c20d6c.pred:
Fillet of Plaice De Luxe

Ingredients:
- 4 egg yolks
- 12 teaspoon salt
- 12 teaspoon paprika
- 2 tablespoons salad oil
- 6 tablespoons butter, melted and cooled slightly
- 14 lb shredded cheese (Danish Tybo preferred, or mild cheddar may be substituted)
- 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen spinach, cooked according to package directions and drained well
- 8 fillets plaice
- 1 fresh lemon, juice of
- salt
- pepper

Instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, beat the egg yolks until they are light and fluffy. Gradually add the melted butter and salt, stirring constantly.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the paprika, salt, and pepper. Add the mixture to the egg yolks and stir until well combined.
4. In a large skillet, heat the salad oil over medium heat. Add the shredded cheese and stir until melted and smooth.
5. Add the cooked and drained spinach to the cheese mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. Place the fillets of plaice on a baking sheet and season with salt and pepper.
7. Pour the egg yolk mixture over the plaice fillets, making sure to cover them evenly.
8. Bake the plaice in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and the egg mixture is set.
9. Remove the plaice from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.
10. Serve the Fillet of Plaice De Luxe hot, garnished with a squeeze of fresh lemon juice and a sprinkle of paprika.

Enjoy your delicious Fillet of Plaice De Luxe!

23d569666a.gt:
combine all ingredients above and refrigerate for several hours, check for taste and season accordingly.
(If you find it to vinegary for your taste simply add some sugar and olive oil).
Serve on garlic bread with some parm cheese (the fresh, block kind you grate your self) or bake on the bread with a little feta or assagio cheese for a change of pace.
Enjoy.
23d569666a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the minced tomatoes, onion, garlic, chives or garlic sprouts, and basil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Add the olive oil and balsamic vinegar to the bowl, and mix well.
4. Transfer the mixture to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Roast the mixture in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the tomatoes are tender and the mixture is slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Add the oregano to the mixture and stir to combine.
8. Transfer the mixture to a serving platter or individual plates.
9. Season the bruschetta with additional salt and pepper, if needed.
10. Serve the bruschetta immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

This recipe for Basically the Best Bruschetta Ever is a delicious and flavorful twist on the classic Italian appetizer. The combination of tender plum tomatoes, minced onion, garlic, and chives or garlic sprouts creates a rich and savory base. The addition of extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar brings out the natural flavors of the ingredients, while the basil and oregano add a burst of freshness and herbal notes. The result is a delightful and satisfying appetizer that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

f4794c8922.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Smooth all filling ingredients together in a large bowl.
Place filling in a 9-inch glass pie plate and bake for 35-40 minutes, until golden.
Let cool for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir together topping ingredients and spread on top of cheesecake.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
f4794c8922.pred:
Grandma's Crustless Baked Cheesecake Pie

Ingredients:
- 2 (8 ounce) packages reduced-fat cream cheese, softened
- 23 cup natural cane sugar
- 4 eggs
- 1 cup low-fat sour cream
- 3 tablespoons organic unbleached cane sugar
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, sugar, and eggs. Mix until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the sour cream and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a pie crust (if using) or a springform pan. If using a pie crust, press it into the bottom and up the sides of the pan.
5. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are slightly golden.
6. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
7. Refrigerate the pie for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Grandma's Crustless Baked Cheesecake Pie!

6eccb4afe2.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain pasta in a large colander over a bowl, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Rinse pasta under cold water; drain.
Drain tuna, reserving 2 tablespoons oil.
Grate 2 teaspoons rind from lemon; squeeze 3 tablespoons juice.
Combine reserved oil, rind, and juice in a large bowl; stir with a whisk.
Add pasta to oil mixture, tossing to coat.
Fold in tuna and apple.
Remove fronds from fennel bulb; finely chop fronds to measure 3 tablespoons.
Remove and discard stalks.
Thinly slice fennel bulb.
Stir fronds and sliced fennel into pasta mixture.
Add reserved pasta liquid and 1/2 teaspoon salt, tossing to coat pasta salad evenly.Sustainable Choice: Industry label regulations require solid white tuna to be from the albacore variety.
6eccb4afe2.pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, usually boiling for 8-10 minutes.
2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the tuna by removing the packing from the jar and flaking the tuna into a bowl.
3. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and add it to the bowl with the tuna.
4. Squeeze the lemon juice over the pasta and tuna mixture, and toss everything together.
5. Slice the Fuji apple into thin matchsticks and add them to the pasta and tuna mixture.
6. Slice the fennel bulb into thin strips and add them to the pasta and tuna mixture.
7. Toss everything together until well combined.
8. Serve the Tuna-Fennel Pasta Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

The Tuna-Fennel Pasta Salad is a delicious and nutritious dish that can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish. The combination of pasta, tuna, and fennel provides a balanced mix of carbohydrates, proteins, and vitamins, making it a healthy and satisfying meal.

f537025690.gt:
Mix chili sauce, lime juice, fish sauce, and cilantro; set aside.
Divide shrimp into 4 equal portions.
Lay each portion of shrimp in a neat row with tails pointed in the same direction.
Thread 2 thin wood or metal skewers (8 to 10 inches long) about 1 1/2 inches apart through center of each row of shrimp, pushing the shellfish close together.
Place shrimp on an oiled grill above a solid bed of hot coals or high heat on a gas barbecue (you can hold your hand at grill level only 2 to 3 seconds); close lid on gas grill.
Cook, turning once, until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes a side.
Brush tops of shrimp with the chili sauce mixture, turn over, and cook just until glaze bubbles and browns slightly, about 30 seconds (watch closely; glaze burns easily).
Brush tops with more chili mixture, then turn glaze down and cook just until it darkens slightly, about 30 seconds more.
Transfer shrimp to plates or a platter.
Season to taste with remaining chili mixture and juice from lime wedges.
f537025690.pred:
To create delicious Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- In a small bowl, mix the Thai sweet chili sauce, lime juice, and fish sauce until well combined.
- Rinse the shrimp and pat them dry with a paper towel.
- Chop the fresh cilantro.

2. Prepare the skewers:
- Cut the shrimp into bite-sized pieces.
- Thread the shrimp onto the skewers, alternating between shrimp and cilantro pieces.

3. Cook the skewers:
- Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
- Place the skewers on the grill or grill pan and cook for about 3-5 minutes, or until the shrimp is cooked through and the cilantro is slightly charred.

4. Serve and enjoy:
- Remove the skewers from the grill or grill pan and let them rest for a few minutes.
- Serve the Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers immediately, garnished with additional chopped cilantro if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chili Glazed Shrimp Skewers, a perfect appetizer or main course for any gathering or meal.

8a241fe45b.gt:
First you separate the romaine hearts.
.Then you dice the other vegetables(excluding the apple).
Then put the diced vegetables in with the rest of the ingredients (Croutons,Cherry tomatoes).
Then add the apple inches.
Enjoy.
8a241fe45b.pred:
1. Wash and peel the apples, onions, and carrots thoroughly.
2. Cut the apples into bite-sized pieces.
3. Chop the onions and carrots into similar-sized pieces.
4. Cut the red and green peppers into strips.
5. Wash the cherry tomatoes and remove the seeds.
6. Cut the croutons into small pieces.
7. Wash the romaine lettuce hearts.

1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped apples, onions, carrots, red and green peppers, cherry tomatoes, and croutons.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, honey, salt, and pepper.
3. Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and toss to combine.
4. Allow the salad to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the Healthy Apple Salad immediately, garnished with additional croutons if desired.

This Healthy Apple Salad is a delicious and nutritious meal option that combines the natural sweetness of apples with the crunchy texture of croutons, and the freshness of the vegetables. The dressing adds a tangy and refreshing touch to the salad, making it a delightful and healthy choice for a meal or a side dish.

12fdd3534c.gt:
Preheat oven to 180 degrees.
Place in a saucepan the sugar, mashed banana, bi-carb soda, milk and margarine/butter.
Stir until it is a caramel colour.
Cool mixture.
When mixture is cool, add the eggs and flour.
Mix until combined.
Place into a greased cake/loaf tin.
Bake in the oven for approx 25-30 mins or until a skewer comes out clean when inserted.
Top with your favourite Cream Cheese Icing when cooled.
12fdd3534c.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine or butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the mashed banana and bicarbonate of soda, and mix until combined.
5. Gradually add the milk, mixing until smooth.
6. Add the flour, one cup at a time, mixing until just combined.
7. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing until fully incorporated.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
9. Bake the cake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. Once cooled, use a knife to slice the cake into equal portions.

[/INST]

5f080b5a48.gt:
Preheat oven to 375.
Cream together eggs, butter, both sugars, crisco, and vanilla.
In separate bowl mix dry ingredients and slowly add to the wet.
Spoon on to cookie sheets.
You can roll each dough ball in sugar or icing them later if desired.
Bake at 375 for 12-15 minutes.
5f080b5a48.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and Crisco until smooth.
3. Add the sugar, one cup at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Add the vanilla and eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Gradually add the flour, salt, baking soda, and cream of tartar, mixing until a dough forms.
6. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the ingredients to come to room temperature.
