7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 8-10 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/INST]

By following these steps, you will have successfully prepared a batch of Old Time Sugar Cookies, also known as Grease Cookies. These delicious treats are perfect for enjoying with a cup of tea or coffee and are sure to be a hit with your family and friends.

bd4aa24126.gt:
Marinate steaks in marinade for 2 hours.
Saute steaks in butter; remove from pan when cooked to doneness you like.
Add mushrooms to pan.
Add peppercorns.
Add brandy OFF stove.
Deglaze pan, scraping browned bits off bottom of pan.
Don't ignite; fire scares me.
Add cream.
Reduce; pour over steaks.
bd4aa24126.pred:
To make a delicious Beef Tenderloin With Brandy Sauce dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the beef tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and add the butter. Once melted, add the sliced beef and cook until browned on all sides. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the scotch whiskey and cook until it has reduced by half.
5. Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender.
6. Add the garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, thyme, crushed peppercorn, and peppercorns to the skillet. Cook for a few more minutes until the flavors have melded together.
7. Return the beef to the skillet and stir to combine the sauce with the beef.
8. Pour the cream into the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
10. Remove the skillet from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Beef Tenderloin With Brandy Sauce dish!

97ad761304.gt:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees.
Grease a springform pan; dust with cocoa.
Line bottom with kitchen parchment.
In 2 qt saucepan over low heat, melt chocolate with butter.
In large bowl, with wire whisk beat egg yolks and vanilla.
Slowly beat warm chocolate mixture into yolk mixture until blended.
In small bowl with mixer at high speed, beat egg whites until soft peaks form.
Gradually beat in 1/4 cup powdered sugar until sugar dissolves and whites stand in stiff peaks.
Fold beaten egg whites into chocolate mixture, one third at a time.
Spoon batter into pan spreading evenly.
Bake torte 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out almost clean.
Cool torte in pan.
When torte is cool, remove side of pan then remove torte from pan bottom; discard parchment.
Cut torte in 12 wedges.
Sprinkle 6 wedges with cocoa, remaining 6 wedges with confectioners sugar.
Arrange wedges alternately on cake plate.
97ad761304.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chopped chocolate and butter.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the vanilla and confectioners' sugar.
5. Add the vanilla mixture to the chocolate mixture, mixing until smooth.
6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
7. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove the sides of the pan and let it cool completely.
9. Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Torte!

e946c009a6.gt:
In a large nonstick skillet, combine mushrooms, chopped onions and 1/2 cup water.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring often, until liquid has evaporated and vegetables are beginning to brown.
To deglaze, add 1/3 cup of the vegetable broth and stir to scrape any browned bits free from pan bottom.
Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables begin to brown again.
Repeat deglazing and browning steps 2 more times, using 1/3 cup broth each time.
Onion should be golden brown.
This should take about 15 to 20 minutes total.
Remove pan from heat.
In a large bowl, beat eggs to blend.
Stir in shredded zucchini, mushroom mixture, bread crumbs, cheese, pepper and oregano.
Turn into greased 9x13" baking dish, spreading out evenly.
Bake uncovered at 350 until casserole appears set in center when dish is gently shaken -- about 35 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes, then serve.
e946c009a6.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, vegetable broth, and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the grated parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, and oregano.
4. Dip the sliced mushrooms in the egg mixture, then coat them in the breadcrumb mixture.
5. Place the mushrooms on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the mushrooms for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through.
7. Serve the mushrooms as a side dish or add them to your favorite pasta dish.

[/SYS]

a1302a9a8e.gt:
In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth and whipping cream.
Bring to a boil.
Add the grits, and return to boiling.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 5-7 minutes.
Add the cheese, stirring until melted.
Allow to sit for about 10 minutes.
Serve.
a1302a9a8e.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth, whipping cream, and grits. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
2. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the grits are tender and creamy.
3. Stir in the shredded cheddar cheese until it is melted and fully incorporated.
4. Season the grits with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the Easy, Creamy Cheese Grits immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

acbf7b5cb9.gt:
Combine flour, salt and pepper in a bag.
Add ribs and coat well.
In skillet, brown ribs in butter; place in slow cooker.
To same skillet add all remaining ingredients.
Cook and stir until mixture boils.
Pour over ribs.
Cover and cook on low for 9 hours.
acbf7b5cb9.pred:
To create Can't Get Enough Slow-Cooker Ribs, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large bowl, mix together the flour, salt, and pepper.

3. Add the beef short ribs to the bowl and toss them to coat evenly with the flour mixture.

4. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef short ribs to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.

5. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.

6. In the same skillet, add the chopped onions and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.

7. Add the beef broth, cider vinegar, brown sugar, chili sauce, catsup, and Worcestershire sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.

8. Return the beef short ribs to the skillet and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the sauce has thickened.

9. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.

10. In a small bowl, mix the minced garlic and chili powder.

11. Add the mixture to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.

12. Serve the Can't Get Enough Slow-Cooker Ribs over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

e03a1d1119.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Saute squash in butter until tender, about 10 minutes.
Set aside.
In a large skillet, cook the ground beef, onion, and jalapeno, stirring until beef is evenly browned.
Drain off grease.
In a large bowl, mix together the squash, eggs, and mayonnaise.
Stir in the ground beef mixture and Cheddar cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish, and sprinkle cracker crumbs evenly over the top.
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until heated through, and the top is nicely browned.
e03a1d1119.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onion and jalapeno peppers to the skillet, and cook until the onion is tender.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, mayonnaise, and seasonings.
5. In a 9x13 inch baking dish, layer the sliced squash, ground beef and onion mixture, and the egg mixture.
6. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over the top.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the Spicy Squash Casserole hot.

[/INST]

c382163c5c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F. Set a rack on each of 2 baking sheets.
In a bowl, toss the sweet potato slices with the oil and season with salt and pepper; make sure each slice is coated with oil.
Arrange the slices in a single layer on the racks.
Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, rotating the sheets halfway through baking, until the chips are deeply golden.
The chips will crisp as they cool.
Looking for more quick and easy recipes?
Check out our quick family-favorites, fast dinners for weeknights, and healthy recipes for less than $3 a serving.
c382163c5c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash the sweet potato thoroughly and pat it dry.
3. Cut the sweet potato into thin, evenly sized wedges.
4. In a large mixing bowl, toss the sweet potato wedges with the extra-virgin olive oil, kosher salt, and freshly ground pepper.
5. Spread the sweet potato wedges out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Roast the sweet potato wedges in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.

fa898117da.gt:
These few potatoes weighed about 1 kg this time.
Peel them, cut into pieces, and soak in water.
Bring the butter to room temperature.
Boil the sweet potatoes until they become soft.
When finished boiling, drain the water.
Mash with a masher while they are still hot.
Add the butter, sugar, and heavy cream into a pot, and mix over medium heat, without burning the mixture, until the butter melts.
When the butter is melted, add the Step 3 potatoes and evaporate the water while kneading and mixing.
Add vanilla extract, as well.
Preheat the oven to 200C.
Form into your desired shapes and brush with the egg yolk and water mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 ~ 20 minutes at 200C.
fa898117da.pred:
To prepare a delicious Our Family's Sweet Potato Dessert, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. Wash the sweet potatoes thoroughly and peel the skin. Cut the sweet potatoes into evenly sized pieces.

3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, salted butter, sugar, heavy cream, egg yolks, vanilla extract, and water. Mix well until the ingredients are well combined.

4. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish, making sure to evenly distribute the ingredients.

5. Bake the sweet potato mixture in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.

6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.

7. Serve the Our Family's Sweet Potato Dessert warm, garnished with whipped cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious homemade dessert!

84cd401629.gt:
Roast the poblano peppers direct in the stove until the skin turns black, be careful not to burn the pepper.
Put the roast poblano peppers into a plastic bag and top with a cloth, wait 10 minutes.
Put oil on your hands and peel the poblano peppers.
With a thin knife carefully opened vertically and cut the base of the seeds, remove seeds and wash if necessary.
Fill poblano peppers with cheese.
Heat the oil in an 1 inch pan and stir the garlic, add the rice, stir for 2 minutes until rices start move and stick together, add 1 1/2 cup of water, put the poultry seasoning and the salt move carefully.
place the poblano peppers on the pan.
Turn heat to low.
cover and let cook until water is absorbed.
Add 1 cup of water, wait until water gone and taste the rice.
84cd401629.pred:
[INST]To craft a delicious Poblano Peppers Rice, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the Poblano peppers in half lengthwise and remove the seeds and membranes. Place them on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly charred.
3. In a large saucepan, cook the rice according to the package instructions.
4. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, or until fragrant.
5. Add the roasted Poblano peppers to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until they are heated through.
6. Add the cooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
8. Season the rice with poultry seasoning and salt, to taste.
9. Serve the Poblano Peppers Rice hot, garnished with sliced mozzarella cheese.

Enjoy your delicious Poblano Peppers Rice!

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
1090169845.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the fish fillet with salt and pepper, to taste.
3. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice, lemon slices, and dill sprigs.
4. Place the fish fillet in a baking dish, and pour the lemon mixture over it.
5. Add butter (optional) to the dish, if desired.
6. Bake the fish in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
7. Remove the fish from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking guide provides a simple and delicious recipe for preparing It's Fish, Okay? using fresh ingredients. The essential ingredients include a 34 lb new zealand orange roughy fillet, 2 sprigs fresh dill, salt and pepper, lemon juice or lemon slices, and butter (optional). The fish is seasoned with salt and pepper, and then baked with a lemon and dill mixture, which adds a burst of flavor and aroma. The dish is cooked until it is fully cooked and flakes easily with a fork, ensuring a tender and delicious result.

f62b39d078.gt:
Preheat oven to 375*.
Lightly spray bottom of 8- or 9-inch square pan with cooking spray.
Place apples in bottom of pan.
Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly; sprinkle over apples.
Bake for 30-45 minutes.

1db4782a47.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F
Place a paper cupcake liner in each cup (12 total) of muffin pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer until fluffy.
Add sugar and vanilla, beating well.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.,.
Place one of the Oreo halves, cream side up, in each muffin cup.
Spoon cream cheese mixture over wafers filling each to about 1/4 inch from top of paper.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Cool completely.
Spoon a tablespoon of the cherry pie filling on top of each tart.
Chill before serving.

1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, beat the softened cream cheese until smooth.
3. Add the sugar and vanilla extract, and continue to beat until well combined.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.

776b79b2b7.gt:
Toss the romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and parsley together in a large bowl; season with salt.
Drizzle the lemon juice and olive oil over the salad; stir.
Add the sour cream and mix until evenly coated.

73d512de54.gt:
Split eggplants in half and scoop out flesh, leaving 1/4 inch thick sides.
Drop flesh in boiling water for 5 minutes, remove, drain in colander.
Repeat with shells, remove and drain, set aside.
Cook onion, garlic, green pepper and celery in half of the butter until tender.
Add eggplant flesh, parsley, thyme, shrimp, salt and pepper, worcestershire and cayenne.
Add eggs to above, cook 5 minutes.
Fill shells with mixture, sprinkle with bread crumbs and bake 20-30 minutes at 350 degrees.
Melt remaining butter, pour over eggplants, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, serve hot.

048c81274c.gt:
in small sauce pan boil chiles and tomatillos.
when tender add to blender with onion and garlic.
blend on high until smooth.
in large fry pan melt butter/margerine and add cooked pasta.
cooke mixing every few minutes to prevent burning.
the color ur looking for is about 1/4-1/2 of the pasta turning golden brown.
add salsa from blender to pasta and mix thoroughly.
Then add sour cream/ crema mexicana and mix thoroughly.
salt to taste at this time.
lower heat to low and let simmer and obsorb juices.
crumble cheese on top and cover with lid to allow some melting...
serve right away and enjoy..goes well with any meat dish or even just a salad...

1. Cook the angel hair pasta according to the package instructions.

62dc1dc5a4.gt:
Bring 6 cups water to boil in large saucepan.
Add tea bags, broken cinnamon sticks, and fresh ginger.
Remove from heat.
Cover; steep 10 minutes.
Mix in juice concentrate and sugar.
Chill until cold.
Strain tea mixture into pitcher.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover and chill.
).
Fill 8 wineglasses with ice.
Pour tea mixture over.
Garnish with cinnamon sticks and ginger rounds.

1. In a large pot, combine the 6 cups of water and the 12 wild black currant herbal tea bags. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and let it cook for about 5-7 minutes.
2. While the tea is simmering, prepare the cinnamon and ginger by breaking the cinnamon sticks in half and mincing the fresh ginger.
3. Once the tea has reached the desired strength, remove the tea bags and add the broken cinnamon sticks and minced ginger to the pot. Stir gently to ensure the spices are evenly distributed.
4. Add the frozen raspberry-cranberry frozen juice concentrate to the pot and stir gently to combine.

This cooking procedure for Black Currant Tea With Cinnamon and Ginger involves a combination of ingredients, including wild black currant herbal tea bags, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, frozen raspberry-cranberry frozen juice concentrate, sugar, and ice. The tea is simmered with the spices, and then the frozen juice concentrate is added to enhance the flavor. The tea is then chilled with an ice cube, and it is strained before being poured into a mug and garnished with crystallized ginger and rounds. This recipe creates a delicious and refreshing tea that combines the natural flavors of black currants, cinnamon, and ginger with the sweetness of the frozen juice concentrate and the coolness of the ice.

77ef934d1a.gt:
Process cranberries in blender or food processor; pour sugar over cranberries and stir to dissolve.
Bring 3/4 cup of water to a boil; stir in gelatin and let cool.
Stir cooled gelatin into cranberries, and add pineapple, orange juice, apple and pecans.
Mix well, cover and refrigerate overnight.
Whip cream and beat in cream cheese.
In a glass serving dish, layer half of the cranberry mixture, then the whipped cream mixture, then the remaining cranberry mixture.

1. Wash and drain the cranberries.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cranberries, white sugar, and red Jell-O mix.
3. Add the crushed pineapple, drained, and orange juice.

This Creamy Cranberry Salad is a delicious and refreshing dish that combines the tangy flavors of cranberries, the sweetness of white sugar and red Jell-O, the zesty taste of orange juice, and the crunchiness of pecans and apples. The cream cheese adds a rich, creamy texture, and the whipped cream provides a light, fluffy touch. This salad is perfect for a summer gathering or as a side dish to any meal.

5351aea004.gt:
Bring 1/2 cup sugar, the mint leaves, and 1/2 cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Remove from the heat and steep for 20 minutes.
Strain the liquid through a fine sieve into a small bowl.
Press the leaves to extract all juices.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour the Pimm's No.

Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint and serve immediately.
