e531d7ab07.gt:
Cut the fat cap side off of the beef.
Rinse meat in water, then place in a slow cooker.
Sprinkle all sides of meat with salt generously.
Add up to 4 cups of baby carrots to the slow cooker.
Fill a large measuring cup with 4 cups of hot water.
Pour contents of seasoning envelope into the water and stir until blended.
Pour water and seasoning into the slow cooker.
Set slow cooker to cook on low for 8 to 10 hours.
If you only have 6 to 8 hours for cooking, set slow cooker on high for the last 3 hours, or all of the cooking time.
Additional ingredients can be added to the slow cooker during preparation, such as: quartered red potatoes, sliced celery, sliced onions, green peas.
If adding these extra ingredients, you may need to use a smaller meat portion in order to fit everything in your slow cooker.
My preference is to cook the largest meat portion I can and prepare mashed potatoes just before serving.
This option provides enough meat for pot roast leftovers the next night and two nights of beef enchiladas through the week.
Check out my recipes for Easy Extraordinary Mashed Potatoes and Pot Roast Turned Enchiladas.
e531d7ab07.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the beef roast with 5 tablespoons of salt.
3. Place the beef roast in a large, oven-safe pot or Dutch oven.
4. Add 4 cups of water to the pot or Dutch oven.
5. In a small bowl, mix the baby carrots with the remaining 1.5 oz of pot roast or beef stew seasoning.
6. Place the seasoned carrots around the beef roast in the pot or Dutch oven.
7. Cover the pot or Dutch oven with a lid, and place it in the preheated oven.
8. Cook the beef roast for about 2-3 hours, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
9. Remove the beef roast from the oven, and let it rest for about 15-20 minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Rachymommys Pot Roast!

df2a03b294.gt:
Cut tomatoes into wedges.
Slice cucumber in 1/2 lenghtwise then in cut in chunks.
Wash, core and seed peppers.
Cut in half then cut into thick strips.
Separate onion slices into rings.
Place prepared ingredients in a bowl; top with the olives.
Pour on dressing just before serving.Top with strips of Feta Cheese and sprinkle with oregano.
For dressing: Put ingredients a screw top jar, seal and shake well.
Shake again just before serving.
Serve in individual salad bowls.
df2a03b294.pred:
To cook a delicious Greek Village Salad, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced tomatoes, green cucumber, green pepper, red peppers, red onion, and chopped parsley.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the crushed garlic, olive oil, red wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, and black pepper.
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. While the vegetables are roasting, crumble the feta cheese into small pieces.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the roasted vegetables, crumbled feta cheese, and the remaining ingredients: 3 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and fresh ground black pepper.
8. Toss the ingredients together until well combined, and serve immediately.

This Greek Village Salad is a delicious and healthy meal option, perfect for a light lunch or a side dish. The combination of roasted vegetables, crumbled feta cheese, and the tangy dressing creates a flavorful and satisfying dish.

6cb33feaa0.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F Lightly grease cookie sheets.
Combine dry ingredients.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars together.
Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
Stir in the vanilla.
Stir in the dry ingredients until well mixed, then stir in the chocolate chips, coconut and almonds.
Drop by rounded tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
6cb33feaa0.pred:
To make delicious Almond Joy Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking soda, and salt, mixing until well combined.
6. Fold in the chocolate chips and sweetened coconut.
7. Fold in the chopped almonds.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Almond Joy Cookies!

08d0d4295c.gt:
Wash the sweet potato well and use a paper towel to dry.
Heat the oil.
Cut the parts of the potato that you are going to fry into long strips.
If you aren't going to be washing in water, you should fry it quickly or it'll change color.
Fry slowly at about 170C for a nice color.
Sandwich between paper towels to remove the oil, shake some salt over all of them.
Repeat steps 2 - 4.
08d0d4295c.pred:
1. Wash the sweet potato thoroughly to remove any dirt or bacteria.
2. Cut the sweet potato into evenly sized sticks, approximately 1-2 inches long.
3. In a large bowl, mix the sweet potato sticks with enough oil to cover them evenly.
4. Add salt to the bowl and mix well to ensure even distribution.
5. Cover the bowl and let the sweet potato sticks marinate in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.
6. After marinating, heat the oil in a large frying pan or deep fryer to a temperature of 350°F (175°C).
7. Carefully place the marinated sweet potato sticks into the hot oil, ensuring they are evenly distributed.
8. Fry the sticks for approximately 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
9. Remove the fried sticks from the oil using a slotted spoon or tongs, and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
10. Serve the Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks immediately, as they will become soggy if left in the oil for too long.

By following these key steps, you can prepare a delicious and crispy Deep-Fried Salty Sweet Potato Sticks that are both tasty and satisfying.

eee6e2952e.gt:
In a bowl, toss the beef with 1/2 tablespoon of vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon of garlic, 2 teaspoons of sugar and the fish sauce; season with pepper.
Let stand.
In a bowl, toss the onion and vinegar.
In another bowl, mix the soy sauce with the olive oil and remaining 1/2 teaspoon of sugar.
Season with salt and pepper.
In a wok, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil over high heat until smoking.
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of garlic and 1/4 teaspoon of salt; cook until golden, about 30 seconds.
Add half of the meat and cook for 3 minutes without stirring; turn and cook 1 minute longer.
Transfer to a plate; cook the second batch.
Return the meat to the wok and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
On a large platter, toss the pea shoots with the onion and the soy dressing.
Spoon the beef on top and serve.
eee6e2952e.pred:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook until browned, stirring occasionally.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
3. Add the sugar, Asian fish sauce, and freshly ground pepper. Cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the sugar has dissolved.
4. Add the sliced onion and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it is softened.
5. Pour in the white wine vinegar and soy sauce, and stir to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the liquid has almost completely evaporated.
6. Add the extra-virgin olive oil, stirring to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Season the beef with salt to taste.
8. In a large bowl, combine the baby pea shoots and a pinch of salt. Toss to combine and set aside.
9. Serve the Shaking Beef over the pea shoots, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly ground pepper.

[/INST]

020aa88369.gt:
Halve dough.
Roll out both to 34cm X 30cm.
Leave to rise for 10 minutes.
Carefully spread each one with 1 TBSP of vegemite, coating all the dough.
Sprinkle the grated cheese over the bases, keeping some for sprinkling on the top.
Roll the dough from the 34cm end loosely til you have a sausage.
Slice into 10 pieces and arrange on baking tray, loosening them up a little.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on the scrolls.
Bake at 200.C for about 20 minutes.
I always check after 10 to see how they are going.
Enjoy!
020aa88369.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch.
3. Spread a thin layer of vegemite evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
4. Sprinkle the grated cheese evenly over the vegemite layer.
5. Roll the dough over the cheese and vegemite layers, starting from the long side, to form a log shape.
6. Place the rolled dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the dough in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the baked dough from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into even pieces.
9. Serve the Ange's Awesome Cheeseymite Scrolls warm.

[/INST]

50f54a2ed3.gt:
Mix the salt and baking soda with the flour, then layer the ingredients into a 1 quart, wide mouth jar.
Use scissors to cut a 9 inch-diameter circle from calico.
Place over lid, and secure with rubber band.
Tie on a raffia or ribbon bow to cover rubber band.
Enclose a card with the following mixing and baking directions: Chocolate Chip Cookies 1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
2.
In a large bowl, cream 1 cup of unsalted butter or margarine until light and fluffy.
Beat in 1 egg and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Mix in cookie mix.
Drop teaspoonfuls of dough, spaced well apart, onto a greased cookie sheet.
3.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in preheated oven, or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
50f54a2ed3.pred:
1. First, gather all the ingredients, including the cup of brown sugar, 1/2 cup of white sugar, 1 1/2 cups of semisweet chocolate chips, 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of baking soda.

2. Next, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brown sugar, white sugar, and salt.

4. Add the melted butter and mix until well combined.

5. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a dough forms.

6. Fold in the chocolate chips.

7. Transfer the dough to a jar with a lid.

8. Store the jar in a cool, dry place for up to 2 weeks.

9. When ready to use, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and prepare your baking sheets by lining them with parchment paper or a non-stick baking mat.

10. To bake the cookies, scoop small balls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing them about 2 inches apart.

11. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden.

12. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

13. Enjoy your delicious homemade cookies!

[/INST]

a9c2e7ef04.gt:
Combine the flour and cocoa powder, and sift.
Preheat the oven for 170C.
Crush the chocolate and put into a bowl.
Add the butter, and melt them over a double-boiler or in a microwave.
(When you are using the double-boiler, remove the chocolate from it at this point.)
Add the eggs, and mix well quickly.
The mixture will become a little bit thick.
Add the sifted flour and cocoa powder, and mix well.
Pour the mixture into the ramekins.
Bake for 10-15 minutes in the oven at 170C.
When you bake too long, the inside won't be creamy, so bake until just the surface is cooked.
Once it's cooled, you can microwave for 20 seconds at 600 W, and the creaminess on the inside will come back.
Addendum: When you are making this using paper cups, bake for about 9 minutes.
Please check them occasionally.
Even when you are using baking ceramic crocks, check them after about 10 minutes of baking.
Once the surface is cooked, insert a bamboo skewer around the edge instead of the middle, and check the doneness.
If the edge is not liquidy, you can take it out from the oven.
a9c2e7ef04.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Grease and flour a 20cm (8 inch) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, and baking powder.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is completely cool, use a sharp knife to cut it into slices and serve.

Enjoy your delicious Creamy and Rich Easy Molten Chocolate Cake!

8c25573d0e.gt:
In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Beat in flour.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Roll out onto a well-floured surface to 1/4-in.
thickness.
Brush lightly with egg.
Sprinkle with almonds and sugar if desired.
Using a fluted pastry cutter or knife, cut into 2-in.
x 1-in.
strips.
Place 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minute or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
8c25573d0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until smooth and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and beat until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour, mixing until a soft dough forms.
5. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
6. After chilling, roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness.
7. Cut out your desired cookie shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
10. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. Once the cookies are fully cooled, you can decorate them with colored crystal sugar, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Finnish Christmas Cookies with almonds!

b7bd1b9a99.gt:
Combine 1 cup broth and butter in small saucepan.
Bring to boil over high heat.
Continue to boil until liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup and has a syrupy consistency, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in cream.
Set aside.
Bring remaining 12 cups broth to a boil in Dutch oven.
Add egg noodles and celery; cook until noodles are tender.
Stir in reserved cream mixture; add chicken.
Season to taste with salt and pepper, add parsley.
Heat just to serving temperature.
Do not boil.
b7bd1b9a99.pred:
[INST]
1. In a large pot, bring the 13 cups of chicken broth to a boil.
2. Add the 4 tablespoons of butter and the 1 cup of whipping cream to the pot.
3. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 10 minutes or until the cream is fully incorporated and the soup is heated through.
4. Add the 1 (12 ounce) package of egg noodles to the pot, stirring to combine.
5. Cook the noodles according to the package instructions, usually about 8-10 minutes.
6. While the noodles are cooking, in a small bowl, mix the 2 stalks of celery, 34 cup of baby carrots, and the diced cooked chicken.
7. Once the noodles are cooked, add the celery and carrot mixture to the pot.
8. Add the 1 teaspoon of poultry seasoning, 1 teaspoon of parsley, salt, and pepper to taste. Stir to combine.
9. Serve the Comforting Chicken Noodle Soup hot.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

d899465f16.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees .
Spray 2 loaf pans with baking spray (oil + flour)I use Bakers Joy in the blue can.
In a large bowl, add your mushy bananas, white sugar and melted butter.
Use a fork to mash them all together.
Dont worry about the banana lumps, its all good!
Add eggs and mix with a fork to combine.
Add all the dry ingredients and mix with a large spoon or spatula to combine (no need to break out the mixer for this one!).
Now add your sour cream and vanilla.
Divide mixture between your 2 loaf pans.
(Its ok that it only fills them each 1/2 way upthis loaf will rise!
I made the mistake once of putting all the batter in one pan.
Total overflow to the max!)
For the streusel topping, combine brown sugar, white sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl.
Sprinkle generously on top of each unbaked loaf.
Bake at 325 degrees for about an hour (check after 50 minutes in case your oven runs hot), until a toothpick inserted in center of the loaf comes out clean.
This banana bread is so moist and flavorful, youll never look back!
d899465f16.pred:
To prepare a delicious Extra Special Banana Bread dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, and ground cinnamon to the bowl. Mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Add the thawed, ripe bananas to the mixture and stir until they are evenly distributed.
5. Gradually add the sour cream and white sugar, mixing until the batter is smooth and well combined.
6. Pour the batter into a well-greased loaf pan, and smooth the top with a spatula.
7. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
8. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

This Extra Special Banana Bread dish is a delicious and moist treat, perfect for breakfast or a snack. The combination of ripe bananas, sweet and tangy sour cream, and warm spices creates a delightful taste that will leave you wanting more.

c79defe8f0.gt:
Prepare the potatoes by cutting each into wedges lengthwise about 8 wedges for each potatoes.
Place in a bowl with ice cubes and add water to cover.
Place in fridge for at least 45 minutes.
Drain and pat with paper towels to dry.
Melt butter with minced garlic salt and pepper.
I usually use a cast iron skillet, but any oven-proof pan will do.
Pour butter over potatoes in skillet, the butter mixture will stick because the potatoes are so cold!
Bake in a 425 degree oven about 25 minutes.
Broasted!
c79defe8f0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash the potatoes thoroughly and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. Cut the potatoes into evenly sized pieces, about 1-2 inches in size.
4. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with the minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
5. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
6. Add the potatoes to the skillet and cook for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are golden brown and tender.
7. Remove the potatoes from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
8. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are cooked through and slightly crispy on the outside.
9. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Place the potatoes back in the skillet and add the ice cube.
11. Stir the potatoes gently to incorporate the ice, and let it cook for a few minutes until the ice has melted and the potatoes are coated with a light glaze.
12. Serve the Ice Water Potatoes immediately.

Please note that these are general instructions and may vary depending on the specific type of potatoes and the desired level of crispiness.

a22e0c83cf.gt:
1.
Cook pasta according to package directions, omitting salt and fat.
Drain.
Place pasta in a large bowl; keep warm.2.
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add onion; saute 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic and tomatoes; saute 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle shrimp with Cajun seasoning, red pepper, and salt.
Add shrimp mixture to pan; saute 3 minutes or until shrimp are almost done; remove from heat.
Stir in half-and-half.
Pour shrimp mixture over pasta; toss.
Sprinkle with parsley.Wine note: Linguine with Spicy Shrimp combines peppery heat with a creamy sauce, making a fuller-bodied white a good partner.
Little Penguin Chardonnay 2008 ($6), from Australia, has tropical and pear fruit, with just a bit of sweetness and refreshing acidity.
--Jeffery Lindenmuth
a22e0c83cf.pred:
[INST]
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the linguine and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the shrimp to the skillet, and cook until they are pink and cooked through. Season with the Cajun seasoning, red pepper flakes, and salt. Cook for a few more minutes until the shrimp are cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
4. Drain the cooked linguine, and return it to the pot. Pour the half-and-half over the linguine, and stir to combine.
5. Add the cooked shrimp mixture to the linguine, and stir to combine.
6. Add the chopped parsley, and toss to combine.
7. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Linguine with Spicy Shrimp.

[/INST]

a2917226da.gt:
Place the tofu on a heat-resistant dish (preferably a deep dish) and cut into 6 pieces.
Of course you don't need to cut it at all.
Top with kimchi.
Cut the pork into easy to eat pieces and place on top of the kimchi.
Lightly cover with plastic wrap and microwave at 500 W for 3 minutes.
Since the meat doesn't cook completely through very easily, turn the meat over after about 2 minutes.
Once the pork has cooked through, pour in the sesame oil, soy sauce, and optionally garnish with green onion to finish.
a2917226da.pred:
1. Preheat the microwave to high power.
2. In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the tofu, pork belly, and kimchi.
3. Add the sesame oil and soy sauce, stirring to combine.
4. Cover the bowl with a microwave-safe lid or plastic wrap.
5. Cook the mixture on high power for 2-3 minutes or until the tofu is softened and the pork belly is cooked through.
6. If desired, add green onions for extra flavor and garnish.
7. Serve the Super Quick Kimchi & Tofu Simmer immediately, as it is a quick and easy dish that can be enjoyed hot.

This cooking procedure is designed to create a delicious and satisfying meal using the provided ingredients. The microwave is an excellent choice for cooking this dish as it ensures even heat distribution and cooks the ingredients quickly. The combination of tofu, pork belly, and kimchi results in a flavorful and satisfying dish that can be enjoyed by vegetarians and meat-eaters alike.

b7705a9251.gt:
Saute -- In a large pan, heat the oil.
Add the garlic, onion and red pepper and saute for 2-3 minutes on medium until slightly soft.
Beans and spinach -- Add the beans, seasoning and saute on medium high to high until cooked through, about 5 minutes.
As they cook I like to take a fork and slightly mash the beans a bit to get a good consistency.
I like to get them a little crisp and browned but not fried dark brown.
Just a light browning is good.
Add the spinach and break up as it cooks.
If too dry you can use a little white wine, chicken broth or just water to loosen the sauce if necessary.
Garnish with some good olive oil and ground pepper.
b7705a9251.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the cannellini beans, onion, garlic, parsley, rosemary, red pepper flakes, kosher salt, and black pepper. Cook over medium heat until the onion is tender, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the spinach to the pot and cook until it has wilted, about 3 minutes.
4. Pour in the white wine (or chicken broth or water) and stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Season the sauce with more salt and pepper if needed.
6. Serve the sauteed cannellini with spinach and garlic over cooked pasta or rice, drizzled with olive oil as a garnish.

[/INST]

a7cd3b464c.gt:
Heat oil in large saucepan or Dutch oven.
Add garlic, ginger, lemon peel and hot pepper flakes.
Cook gently until very fragrant.
Add broth, soy sauce and lemon juice and bring to boil.
Add carrots.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 15 minutes.
Add scallops, shrimp, sesame oil and green onions, Cook for just a few minutes, or until seafood is barely cooked.
Serve sprinkled with cilantro.
a7cd3b464c.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and gingerroot, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the lemon peel and red pepper flakes, and cook for another minute.
4. Pour in the chicken broth, soy sauce, and lemon juice, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Add the carrots, scallops, and shrimp to the pot, and cook until the seafood is cooked through, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the sesame oil, green onions, and cilantro, and stir to combine.
7. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Seafood Soup With Ginger Broth hot, garnished with a drizzle of sesame oil and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro.

[/INST]

83b98d7ee9.gt:
Saute diced onion in olive oil, add to crock pot.
Pour canned ingredients into crock pot, do not drain beans.
Add spices.
And the diced chicken.
(I used bagged chicken breast that was still partially frozen).
Heat on medium heat for 6 hours.
Microwave cream cheese for 45 seconds until it is easy to stir and pour.
Add the the soup.
Using a blender or immersion blender, blend until smooth.
Add 1 cup of favorite shredded cheese.
I used Colby Jack.
Hollow out your bead bowl if you so desire and pour soup into it.
Top with remaining shredded cheese.
83b98d7ee9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Crockpot, combine the olive oil, onion, and ground cumin. Cook over medium heat until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped chicken and cook until it is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the chicken broth, white beans, ground smoked chipotle, salt, and oregano. Stir to combine.
5. Cover the pot or Crockpot and cook on low heat for 6-8 hours, or until the chicken is tender and the beans are cooked through.
6. Remove the chicken from the pot and shred it using two forks. Return the chicken to the pot and stir to combine.
7. Add the cream cheese and shredded cheese to the pot. Stir until the cheese is melted and the mixture is smooth.
8. If using a bread bowl, place it in the oven and preheat for 10-15 minutes.
9. Serve the Crockpot White Chili in the bread bowl, if using, or in a bowl. Enjoy!

[/INST]

128f70ff9b.gt:
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy pot over medium-high heat.
Stir in the onion, garlic, and serrano chili; cook until the onion has softened, about 1 minute.
Add the chicken, and continue to cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the cilantro, peas, corn, and red pepper; cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the chicken broth, potatoes, and rice.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the chicken is opaque and the potatoes are tender, about 40 minutes.
128f70ff9b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the chicken breast halves, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned on both sides and cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
5. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
6. In the same pot, add the serrano chile, cilantro, green peas, corn, red bell pepper, and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the cooked chicken back to the pot, and stir to combine.
8. Add the Yukon Gold potatoes to the pot, and cook until they are tender, about 20-25 minutes.
9. Add the uncooked white rice to the pot, and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
10. Serve the Peruvian Chicken Soup (Aguadito de Pollo) hot, garnished with a sprinkle of cilantro and a drizzle of olive oil, if desired.

86795284d9.gt:
In small saucepan bring broths, clam juice and Port to boil.
Season with pepper.
Divide scallops between 2 bowls.
Ladle over the very heated broth.
Garnish with the green onions or chives and serve.
86795284d9.pred:
[/INST]

1. In a large pot or saucepan, combine the chicken broth and beef broth. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
2. Add the bottled clam juice, white pepper, and sea scallops to the pot. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the scallops are cooked through.
3. Remove the scallops from the pot and set aside.
4. In a small bowl, mix the green onion tops or chives with a little bit of water. This will create a flavorful broth to be used as a base for the soup.
5. Return the scallops to the pot and stir them into the broth.
6. Simmer the soup for an additional 5 minutes, or until the flavors are well combined and the soup is heated through.
7. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of freshly ground white pepper.

[/INST]

[/INST]

88e444eb93.gt:
Preheat oven to broil.
Line a baking sheet with foil.
Halve the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, and serrano peppers lengthwise and discard stems and seeds.
Place on baking sheet and brush the peppers with olive oil.
Roast peppers under the broiler until the skin blackens and blisters, 3 to 5 minutes.
Place peppers in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap; allow the peppers to steam until the skins loosen, about 10 minutes.
Peel skin off the peppers and discard.
Combine the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapenos, serrano, onion, tomato, garlic, cilantro, diced tomato with juice, lime juice, salt, black pepper, and beer in a blender.
Blend to desired consistency.
Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.
88e444eb93.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the green and red bell peppers, jalapeno peppers, and serrano peppers.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the olive oil, minced garlic, and cilantro leaves.
4. Add the olive oil mixture to the pepper mixture and toss to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the peppers are tender and slightly charred.
6. Meanwhile, in a large saucepan, combine the canned diced tomatoes, their juice, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
8. Remove the roasted pepper mixture from the oven and stir it into the tomato mixture.
9. Serve the Drunken Roasted Salsa immediately, or let it cool and refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Drunken Roasted Salsa!

bc57597208.gt:
Mix together all ingredients.
Salt should not be needed because of the anchovies.
bc57597208.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, and black pepper.
2. Add the anchovy fillets to the bowl and mix until they are well combined.
3. Add the capers to the bowl and mix until they are evenly distributed.
4. Taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Serve the dressing over your desired dish, such as salad or pasta, to enhance the flavors of the ingredients.

[/SYS]

af9fb785aa.gt:
Preheat oven to 275F/135C.
In a large bowl toss oatmeal, coconut, nuts, and sunflower seeds together.
In a separate bowl whisk together oil, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Pour liquid mixture over oats and stir until everything is coated.
Pour mixture into a large rimmed baking sheet.
I also cover the baking sheet with baking paper but it's not necessary if you have a non-stick pan.
Bake for approximately 20-25 minutes, stirring once or twice.
Keep an eye on it so it doesn't burn.
Let it cool completely.
Blend in cornflakes if using.
Store in an airtight container.
af9fb785aa.pred:
To cook a delightful Nutty Fruit Free Granola dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, coconut, almonds, walnuts, sunflower seeds, and corn flakes (if using).
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, honey, and cinnamon.
4. Pour the wet ingredients over the dry ingredients, and mix until well combined.
5. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the granola in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the granola is golden brown and fragrant.
7. Remove the granola from the oven, and let it cool completely.
8. Once the granola is cool, stir in the vanilla extract.
9. Store the granola in an airtight container for up to 1 week or freeze for up to 3 months.

This Nutty Fruit Free Granola dish is a delicious and healthy breakfast option, packed with nutrients and natural flavors. The combination of oats, coconut, almonds, walnuts, sunflower seeds, corn flakes, and honey creates a satisfying and crunchy texture that is perfect for enjoying on its own or as a topping for yogurt, ice cream, or fruit.

d7f3a33c04.gt:
Heat olive oil in a cast iron pot.
Add onion and saute for 34 minutes until tender.
Add garlic and saute for an additional minute.
Take the onion and garlic out of the pot and set aside.
Add sausage to pan and brown.
(You do not have to add more oil.
The sausage tends to render a lot of grease when it is cooked.)
Drain excess grease and add the onion and garlic back to the pot.
Add broth, tomatoes and bay leaf.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
Add gnocchi and cook until it floats to the top, 23 minutes.
Stir in spinach and kale and cook for an additional 12 minutes, until the greens are wilted.
Season soup to taste with salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes and Italian seasoning.
Serve immediately.
d7f3a33c04.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and sauté until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add the hot Italian sausage and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. Add the chicken broth, diced tomatoes, bay leaf, and seasonings (salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, and Italian seasoning).
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sausage is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
7. Add the gnocchi to the pot and stir to combine.
8. Add the spinach and kale, stirring to ensure they are evenly distributed.
9. Cook the soup for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the gnocchi is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
10. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.

This delicious Easy Italian Gnocchi Soup is ready to be enjoyed.

592c968c3a.gt:
Flatten chicken thighs.
MAKE PESTO: Microwave oil and garlic together on HIGH 40 seconds; process with basil through pepper in a food processor.
Spread about 1 tsp pesto down center of each thigh, leaving a 1/4-inch border on short ends.
Starting at a short end, roll each thigh up with pesto inside and secure with a toothpick.
Arrange rolls 1/2 inch apart, seam sides down, in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 375 until a cooking thermometer registers 170 (about 30 minutes), turning rolls after 15 minutes.
IMPORTANT: Cool, transfer to a covered container and refrigerate overnight.
Remove toothpicks and cut each roll crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices.
592c968c3a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken thighs, nonstick cooking spray, and 2 teaspoons of extra virgin olive oil. Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
3. Spread the chicken evenly on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
4. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the pesto sauce by combining the basil leaves, chopped flat-leaf parsley, grated parmesan cheese, and reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth in a small bowl. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, slice the chicken into thin strips.
6. To assemble the Pesto Chicken Spirals, place a small amount of pesto sauce on the center of each chicken strip. Roll the chicken up and secure with a toothpick or skewer.
7. Heat a non-stick skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of nonstick cooking spray and cook the chicken spirals until they are golden brown and cooked through.
8. Serve the Pesto Chicken Spirals immediately. Enjoy your delicious homemade meal!

2271c8f464.gt:
In a small bowl, place 1/2 cup olive oil and saffron threads.
Stir and allow the saffron to steep for 15 minutes.
Add garlic, egg yolks, mustard and lemon juice into a blender.
Pulse several times until the items have mixed together.
Turn the blender on low and slowly stream in the saffron steeped olive oil.
Stop to scrape down the sides and continue to blend on low and stream in the remaining olive oil.
Then add the parsley and paprika and season with kosher salt and pepper as needed.
Pulse to combine.
Refrigerate, covered for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Optional: Before service, sprinkle with additional parsley and a saffron threads.
2271c8f464.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the 1 cup of Extra Virgin Olive Oil and the minced garlic.
2. Add the saffron threads and whisk until the saffron is fully incorporated into the oil.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 2 whole large egg yolks, 1/2 tablespoon of Dijon mustard, 1/2 tablespoon of lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon of minced parsley.
4. Slowly pour the whisked egg mixture into the bowl with the saffron-infused oil, while continuously whisking the mixture.
5. Add the Spanish smoked paprika, kosher salt, and black pepper to the mixture, and whisk until well combined.
6. Taste the aioli and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate the aioli for at least 2 hours or overnight before using.

This recipe for crafting Saffron Aioli involves combining the ingredients in a specific order to achieve the desired flavor profile. The process involves whisking the olive oil and garlic together, followed by incorporating the saffron threads, egg yolks, mustard, lemon juice, parsley, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper. The aioli is then refrigerated to allow the flavors to meld together and develop over time. The final product is a delicious and flavorful aioli that can be used as a dip, spread, or as a base for various dishes.

bb41f986c4.gt:
Remove the skin from the chicken and quickly rinse with water.
Pat dry with a paper towel and cut into 7-8 mm thick pieces.
Season with salt and white pepper.
Beat the egg, add the ingredients and mix well.
Heat sesame oil in a frying pan.
Lightly coat the chicken from Step 1 in flour and then dip into the mixture from Step 2 and place in the frying pan.
Temporarily turn off the heat until all the chicken is lined up in the pan.
Fry the chicken on low heat, being careful not to let it burn.
When it begins to cook through, pour in the remaining Step 2 egg mixture.
Flip over the chicken and fry while forming the shapes.
Arrange onto a plate and it's finished.
bb41f986c4.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chicken Breast Piccata Jeon dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together the eggs, soy sauce, honey, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

4. In a large skillet or wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.

5. Add the green onions and cook until they are softened and fragrant.

6. Add the chicken breast to the skillet and cook until it is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.

7. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.

8. In a small bowl, mix the cake flour and a pinch of salt and pepper.

9. Pour the egg mixture over the chicken in the skillet, and stir to coat the chicken evenly.

10. Cook the chicken and egg mixture over medium heat until the sauce thickens and the chicken is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.

11. Transfer the chicken and egg mixture to a plate and let it cool for a few minutes.

12. To assemble the dish, place a piece of chicken on the center of a piece of dough, leaving a border around the edges. Fold the dough over the chicken to form a half-moon shape.

13. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet and cook the jeon until the edges are golden brown and the bottom is crispy. Carefully flip the jeon and cook the other side until golden brown.

14. Serve the Chicken Breast Piccata Jeon hot, garnished with additional green onions and sesame seeds, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chicken Breast Piccata Jeon dish!

efba40ac8b.gt:
In a medium saucepan, bring 2 1/4 cups of water to a boil.
Add the rice and a generous pinch of salt.
Stir once, cover and simmer over low heat until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender, about 20 minutes.
Remove from the heat and let steam, covered, for 20 minutes.
Fluff the rice with a fork and spread it out on a plate to cool slightly.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, toast the tea over moderately low heat, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Transfer the tea to a plate and let cool, then finely crumble with your fingers.
In the skillet, melt the butter.
Add the onion and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until very soft but not browned, about 12 minutes; season with salt.
Add the rice and tea and cook over moderate heat, stirring gently, until the rice is hot and the tea is evenly distributed, about 2 minutes.
Gently fold in the crabmeat and cook until warmed through, about 2 minutes.
Season generously with pepper.
Transfer to a platter and garnish with sesame seeds.
Serve right away.
efba40ac8b.pred:
[/SYS]

To make Fragrant Crab Rice, follow these steps:

1. Rinse the jasmine rice in a fine mesh strainer and drain well.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the rice, kosher salt, and pepper. Cook the rice over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until it is tender and the water has been absorbed, about 20-25 minutes.
3. While the rice is cooking, melt the butter in a small saucepan over low heat.
4. Add the minced white onion to the saucepan with the melted butter and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the jumbo lump crabmeat to the saucepan and cook until it is heated through and the flavors have melded together, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the black sesame seeds.
7. Serve the Fragrant Crab Rice hot, garnished with black sesame seeds if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Fragrant Crab Rice!

12da18d9e5.gt:
In a large pot, cook the wheat berries according to the package directions.
Set aside and let cool to room temperature.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, orange juice, salt, pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, olive oil and lemon juice.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, toss the cooked wheat berries, Goji berries, apple, celery, scallions, parsley and pecans together until combined.
Pour half the dressing over the salad and stir thoroughly.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Prior to serving, pour the remaining dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately or store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
12da18d9e5.pred:
1. Cook the wheat berries according to package instructions or par-cook them beforehand.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked wheat berries, apple cider vinegar, orange juice, kosher salt, pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, and olive oil. Mix well.
3. Add the chopped large apple, goji berries, celery, scallions, and parsley to the bowl.
4. In a small bowl, mix the chopped pecans, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt.
5. Gradually pour the vinaigrette into the bowl with the wheat berries mixture, stirring gently to combine.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Serve the Wheat Berry Waldorf Salad immediately or store it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days.

This Wheat Berry Waldorf Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette is a delicious and nutritious dish that combines the hearty taste of cooked wheat berries with the tangy flavor of apple cider vinegar and the sweetness of orange juice. The vinaigrette adds a zesty and refreshing touch to the salad, making it a delightful and healthy meal option.

cd2f6516bb.gt:
For the crust; in a bowl combine all crust ingredients together until well blended.
Press into bottom of a 9-inch pie plate, or a 9-inch glass baking pan.
Bake 375 degrees F for 8-10 minutes; cool then place the empty crust into the freezer until ready to fill.
In a large bowl combine the soft ice cream with peanut butter until well combined, then mix in the frozen chopped peanut butter cups (if using) pour into the frozen pie crust, then sprinkle with chopped peanuts.
Return to the freezer until firm.
When the pie is completely frozen drizzle the magic shell on top.
Return to freezer until ready to use.
cd2f6516bb.pred:
1. First, prepare the ice cream by pouring the desired amount of chocolate ice cream into a mixing bowl. If using vanilla ice cream, soften it according to the package instructions.
2. Add the softened butter to the ice cream and mix until smooth.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the crunchy peanut butter with the chopped Reese's Peanut Butter cups until well combined.
4. If using chopped salted peanuts, add them to the bowl with the peanut butter mixture.
5. In a small saucepan, heat the Magic Shell ice cream topping according to the package instructions.
6. Once the topping is melted, pour it over the ice cream mixture and stir until well combined.
7. Add the chopped chocolate cookie crumbs to the mixture and stir until well combined.
8. If desired, add more sugar to taste.
9. Pour the mixture into a freezer-safe container and freeze for at least 4 hours or overnight.
10. Before serving, let the dessert sit at room temperature for a few minutes to soften the ice cream slightly.

Enjoy your delicious Kittencal's Reese's Peanut Butter-Chocolate Ice Cream Dessert!

d662ecac80.gt:
Preheat a grill for high heat.
In a large bowl, mix together the Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, onion, egg, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.
Crumble in the ground beef, and mix together by hand.
Form into 6 patties, and wrap a slice of bacon around each one.
Secure bacon with toothpicks.
Place patties on the grill, and cook for 5 minutes per side, or until well done.
Remove toothpicks before serving on hamburger buns.
d662ecac80.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, chopped onion, egg, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Form the mixture into 6 equal-sized patties.
3. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Wrap each patty with a slice of bacon, securing it with a toothpick.
5. Place the bacon-wrapped burgers on the baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the bacon is cooked and the internal temperature of the burgers reaches 160°F (70°C).
6. While the burgers are baking, prepare the cheese sauce by melting the cheddar cheese and grated parmesan cheese in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir until smooth and creamy.
7. Once the burgers are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. Place the cooked burgers on the buns and top with the cheese sauce.
9. Serve the Mmmm Good Bacon Wrapped Hamburgers immediately.

e91cf4e18b.gt:
Pour bean with bacon soup into a large saucepan and cook over medium-low heat until warmed through, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir tomatoes, sausage, onion, mushrooms, and hot sauce into the soup.
Reduce heat to low and cook soup at a simmer, stirring occasionally, until the tomatoes are breaking down, about 1 hour.
e91cf4e18b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add the thinly sliced sausage and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the drained beans, diced tomatoes, mushrooms (if using), and any additional seasonings, such as salt, pepper, and paprika. Stir to combine.
5. Pour in the canned soup and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Cover the pot and transfer it to the preheated oven. Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the sausage is cooked through and the soup is hot and bubbly.
7. Remove the pot from the oven and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.
8. Serve the Smoked Sausage and Bean Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream or a sprinkle of grated cheese, if desired.

[/INST]

f5d92fa57b.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Place apples in a large bowl with raisins.
Whisk together sugar, cornstarch, cinnamon, and salt in a small bowl until combined.
Sprinkle over apples and raisins and toss to evenly coat.
Arrange a sheet of phyllo on a large, flat surface with the shorter side toward you.
Brush with melted butter and arrange another sheet on top.
Repeat, alternating butter and phyllo, until there are 6 layers, then brush the top layer with butter.
Evenly arrange apple-raisin mixture on phyllo, leaving a 1-1/2-inch border at the top and sides.
Begin to roll the phyllo away from you, folding in the sides as you roll.
When youve rolled up the entire pastry, brush any exposed phyllo with butter.
Place the strudel seam side down on the prepared baking sheet, brush again with butter (you may have a little left over), and cut 4 (1-inch) diagonal slits into the top just through the phyllo.
Bake until golden brown, about 10 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350 degrees F and bake until the apples are knife tender and the juices are bubbling, about 30 to 40 minutes more.
Let cool at least 10 minutes before slicing.
f5d92fa57b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the apple slices with the granulated sugar, cornstarch, and cinnamon.
3. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, raisins, and kosher salt.
4. Spread the apple mixture evenly over the bottom of a 13-by-17-inch baking dish.
5. Layer the apple mixture with the butter mixture, alternating between the two.
6. Roll out the phyllo sheets on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/8 inch.
7. Cut the phyllo sheets into strips, and use them to cover the apple mixture.
8. Bake the strudel in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly and hot.
9. Remove the strudel from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and then carefully cut it into slices.
10. Serve the strudel warm, and enjoy your delicious homemade dessert!

[/INST]

68ce5e6dca.gt:
Melt 1 tablespoon of butter in a soup pot and lightly saute 4 or 5 chopped tomatoes, 2 finely chopped cloves of garlic and a few thin slices of onion for a few minutes, or until the onion and garlic begin to soften.
Feel free to mash the ingredients a little while cooking if youd like a less lumpy texture.
But personally I quite like lumpy, broth-like soups and I wanted to avoid using the blender.
Add a few chopped fresh basil leaves and a cup of vegetable broth, some freshly ground black pepper and a little sea salt.
If you are using regular (not low sodium) broth from a can, taste before adding salt as it may have enough already.
Ideally Id recommend using low sodium or homemade broth.
Bring the soup slowly to the boil, give it a stir, put on the lid and reduce the heat to a simmer.
Leave to simmer for about 20 minutes.
After 20 minutes, taste the soup and add more salt and pepper if needed.
Add a few drops of Tabasco sauce, tasting as you go, until you get the flavour you want.
I find that of all things, soup needs to be continually tasted throughout the cooking process to make sure its turning out right.
Leave the soup to sit with the lid off and heat still at a low simmer while you lightly brush a few slices of fresh bread with olive oil and lightly grill them.
You can do this outside if so inclined, or inside in a stovetop grill pan.
When the bread is done, spoon the soup into bowls and serve with the bread.
You can add a dollop of creme fraiche to the soup if youre feeling particularly extravagant.
68ce5e6dca.pred:
To prepare a delicious Fresh Tomato and Basil Soup, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the sliced onion and sauté until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and continue cooking for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced tomatoes, and cook until they start to release their juices.
5. Add the vegetable broth, and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the tomatoes are tender and the flavors have melded together.
7. Remove the soup from the heat, and let it cool slightly.
8. Strain the soup through a fine mesh sieve, discarding the solids.
9. Season the soup with salt, pepper, and a dash of Tabasco Sauce to taste.
10. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprig of fresh basil.

Enjoy your delicious Fresh Tomato and Basil Soup, made with fresh ingredients and a touch of spice from the Tabasco Sauce.

e8c76f1472.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine macaroni, 1-1/2 cups of the cheddar cheese, the spinach, tomatoes and Parmesan cheese in large bowl; set aside.
Heat oil in medium saucepan on low heat 1 min.
Add onions; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until crisp-tender.
Add flour; mix well.
Cook 2 min., stirring constantly.
Gradually add milk, stirring until well blended after each addition.
Increase heat to medium.
Bring to boil; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until thickened, stirring constantly.
Add to macaroni mixture; toss to coat.
Spoon into 1-1/2-qt.-casserole dish sprayed with cooking spray; sprinkle with remaining Cheddar cheese.
Bake 20 min.
or until heated through.
e8c76f1472.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, cook the macaroni according to package instructions until it is tender but still firm. Drain the cooked macaroni and set aside.
2. In a separate saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
3. Add the flour to the onions and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until the flour is lightly browned.
4. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
5. Add the cooked macaroni to the saucepan and stir to combine.
6. Add the divided KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, the chopped spinach, and the chopped tomato. Stir until the cheese is melted and the spinach is wilted.
7. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Pour the mixture into a casserole dish and sprinkle the remaining KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese on top.
9. Bake the casserole in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Oh-So-Good Macaroni and Cheese hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]

11e9299476.gt:
Preheat the oven according the directions for the biscuits.
Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.
Once cook drain out the oil that's in the pan
Leave sausage in pan.
Add the flour and the milk.
Put heat to high and continue to mix.
Don't stop mixing until the gravy starts to boil.
Once its boiling, lower down heat to simmer for 5min.
Don't touch for those 5min.
Now put in the biscuits in the oven
Once the 5min is up give the gravy a little mix and set aside to cool down.
The longer it sits outside the thicker it would get.
When the biscuits are ready open them up and pour the sausage gravy on top.
Enjoy.
11e9299476.pred:
1. First, preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Once the sausage is cooked, remove it from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the flour and cook over medium heat until it turns golden brown. This will create a roux, which is a base for the gravy.
5. Gradually pour in the milk, stirring continuously to prevent lumps.
6. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the gravy has thickened.
7. Season the gravy with salt and pepper to taste.
8. In a mixing bowl, combine the sausage, flour, and any remaining gravy. Mix well to combine.
9. Place the sausage mixture on a lightly floured surface and shape it into a log or patty.
10. Place the sausage patty on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through.
11. Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
12. In a mixing bowl, combine the biscuits, milk, and melted butter. Mix until the biscuits are evenly coated.
13. Place the biscuit mixture on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, or until the biscuits are golden brown.
14. Serve the sausage biscuit with gravy on the side.

This dish combines the flavors of sausage, biscuits, and gravy to create a delicious and satisfying meal. The sausage adds a savory element, while the biscuits provide a warm, slightly sweet base. The gravy complements the dish, adding a rich and creamy texture that pairs well with the sausage and biscuits.

0ca9bd3da2.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.To prepare aioli, combine first 5 ingredients in a small bowl; set aside.To prepare crab cakes, combine bell pepper and next 7 ingredients (through black pepper) in a large bowl; stir well with a whisk.
Add panko and crabmeat; toss gently.
Divide the crab mixture into 12 equal portions, shaping each into a 1-inch-thick patty.Heat oil in a large ovenproof skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add patties; cook 2 minutes.
Carefully turn patties over.
Place pan in oven; bake at 350 for 6 minutes.
0ca9bd3da2.pred:
[INST]1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, chopped chives, parsley, lemon juice, garlic, red bell pepper, panko, lump crabmeat, and Worcestershire sauce. Season with black pepper to taste.
3. Using a spoon, form the mixture into small, evenly-sized balls.
4. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Carefully place the crab cake balls into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and cooked through.
5. Remove the crab cakes from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet. Spray the crab cakes with cooking spray and bake in the preheated oven for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until cooked through and golden brown.
6. Serve the Mini Crab Cakes with Herbed Aioli as a delicious appetizer or main course.

d9c04f21ab.gt:
Add the Bombay Sapphire, lemon juice and caster sugar to a short glass / tumbler and stir.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Drizzle the berry liqueur over the top and watch it 'marble' through the drink.
Top up with more crushed ice and garnish with 1 blackberry and a wedge of fresh lemon.

5. Strain the cocktail mixture into a glass filled with crushed ice.
