1. In a

2f161399c5.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir in cream cheese.
Unroll crescent dough and separate into individual pieces; spoon 2 to 3 teaspoons sausage mixture onto each piece of dough.
Roll dough around filling.
Brush each crescent roll with egg white.
Arrange crescent rolls on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until rolls are lightly browned, about 15 minutes.
2f161399c5.pred:
1. First, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the sausage, cream cheese, and egg white until well combined.
3. Unroll one of the crescent rolls and place the sausage mixture in the center.
4. Fold the dough over the sausage mixture, creating a half-moon shape.
5. Place the filled crescent roll on a baking sheet and repeat with the remaining crescent roll and sausage mixture.
6. Bake the rolls for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
7. Remove the rolls from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

This dish is a delicious and easy way to enjoy breakfast sausage in a warm and flaky crescent roll. The combination of the sausage, cream cheese, and egg white creates a savory and tender filling that is perfect for breakfast or brunch. The crescent rolls provide a soft and buttery base that complements the sausage filling well.

e81515ca45.gt:
Slice the chicken tenders diagonally into thin strips and season lightly with salt and pepper.
It's easiest to slice partially defrosted tenders.
Cut off both ends of the cucumbers and chop roughly into thin long pieces.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo, it's done.
Heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil in a pan over medium heat, and add the chicken tenders.
Spread out the pieces and fry.
Lightly fry both sides, add the cucumbers and stir fry for about 1 minute.
Turn up the heat to high, and add the ingredients listed under [A] (water or soup stock, vinegar, sugar, ketchup, tonkatsu sauce and salt).
Stir fry for 3 minutes while shaking the pan, being careful not to let the sauce burn.
After 3 minutes, when the sauce thickens from the katakuriko coated on the chicken like the photo above, it's done.
Doesn't it look delicious?
e81515ca45.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your wok or large skillet on medium heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the Katakuriko, salt, and pepper.
3. In a separate small bowl, mix the sugar, ketchup, and tonkatsu sauce.
4. Add the chicken tenders to the wok and cook until browned on all sides. Remove from the wok and set aside.
5. Add the small cucumbers to the wok and cook until slightly tender.
6. Add the Katakuriko mixture to the wok and stir-fry for a few minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Add the cooked chicken tenders back to the wok and stir-fry for a few more minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has coated the chicken evenly.
8. Add the water or Chinese soup and vinegar to the wok, stirring to combine.
9. Cook for a few more minutes, until the sauce has thickened and coated the chicken and cucumbers evenly.
10. Serve the Cucumber and Chicken Sweet and Sour Stir-fry over rice or noodles, garnished with chopped green onions.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

fd3e9f4f9e.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Combine sugar, butter and cream cheese in large bowl.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy.
Add milk, eggs and vanilla.
Continue beating until smooth.
Stir in flour and coconut.
Spoon into paper-lined or greased muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full.
Bake 32-38 minutes or until light golden brown.
Serve warm or at room temperature; top with fruit preserves or jam.
fd3e9f4f9e.pred:
To prepare a delicious Individual Coconut Pound Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and cream cheese until smooth.

3. Add the sugar and mix until well combined.

4. Add the milk, eggs, and vanilla extract, mixing until smooth.

5. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, coconut, and sweetened flaked coconut.

6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating between the flour mixture and milk, until well combined.

7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.

8. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.

9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

10. To assemble the cake, spread a layer of fruit preserves or jam on the top of the cooled cake.

11. Add a layer of whipped cream or a dollop of cream cheese frosting on top of the jam.

12. Repeat the layering process with another cake, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Individual Coconut Pound Cakes!

fcf4d62dec.gt:
Measure the sugar and 1 tablespoon of water, and put into a pan.
You don't have to dissolve the sugar.
Measure out the water you will add later, and prepare in a cup.
Start heating over a medium-high heat.
It will gradually bubble up.
Keep watching it, and you'll see it starting to brown from the edges.
When all of the syrup has browned, turn off the heat.
It will keep cooking and the flavor will continue to deepen, so watch out!
If you like bitter caramel wait for a while before adding the water.
If you prefer less bitter caramel or you're serving this to little kiddies, add the water immediately.
It will splatter, so be careful.
Shake the pan to even out the consistency of the mixture.
If you added too much water, put the pan back on the heat to evaporate some.
Pour the caramel sauce into flan or pudding cups while it's still hot.
If you don't add it right away, it will harden!
Swirl the cups around so that the sauce is evenly distributed.
When the surface of the sauce hardens and no longer sticks to your fingers when you touch it, add the flan mixture and get going!
fcf4d62dec.pred:
[/INST]

1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: 40 grams of sugar, 1 tablespoon of water (to add at the beginning), and 1 to 2 tablespoons of water (to add later).

2. In a small saucepan, combine the sugar and water (to add at the beginning). Place the saucepan on medium heat and stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.

3. Once the sugar is fully dissolved, add the water (to add later). Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.

4. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 5 minutes, or until it reaches a smooth, caramel-like consistency.

5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.

6. If the caramel sauce is too thick, you can add a little more water (to add later) to achieve the desired consistency.

7. To serve, pour the caramel sauce over the custard flans and enjoy!

Remember to use caution when handling hot liquids and to ensure that the ingredients are fresh and of good quality.

9c987e0b4b.gt:
Saute sauerkraut and caraway in a skillet over medium-high heat.
When most of the moisture has evaporated and sauerkraut begins to brown, stir in lemon juice and set aside.
Arrange an egg roll wrapper on a work surface with a corner towards you; brush edges with egg wash.
Place a strip of cheese on the wrapper, about 1 inch above the bottom corner, then top with strips of beef and about 3 tbsp sauerkraut mixture.
Drizzle with mustard.
Fold the bottom corner up over the filling to enclose, fold in the sides, then roll to the top corner of the wrapper.
Repeat with remaining wrappers and filling.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat to about 360*.
Add half the egg rolls and fry on all sides until brown and crisp, 5-7 minutes.Drain on paper towels while frying remaining rolls.
Serve Egg Rolls with Thousand Island Dressing for dipping.
9c987e0b4b.pred:
To prepare Reuben Egg Roll Wraps With Dipping Sauce, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, mix the sauerkraut, caraway seeds, lemon juice, and beaten egg. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

2. In a separate bowl, mix the corned beef, Swiss cheese, and egg roll wraps.

3. Preheat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.

4. Working with one egg roll wrap at a time, place a small amount of the corned beef and Swiss cheese mixture in the center of the wrapper. Fold the wrapper over the filling, creating a half-moon shape.

5. Carefully place the egg roll wraps in the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, or until the wraps are golden brown and cooked through.

6. Remove the egg rolls from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.

7. Serve the Reuben Egg Roll Wraps With Dipping Sauce immediately.

To make the dipping sauce, combine the prepared thousand island dressing with a small amount of water to achieve the desired consistency.

Enjoy your delicious Reuben Egg Roll Wraps With Dipping Sauce!

ab4c597668.gt:
BEAT margarine at medium speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy; beat in jelly powder.
Mix in egg.
Stir in flour and baking powder.
SHAPE dough as illustrated; chill 2 hours.
CUT and bake at 350F for 8-10 min.
; cool.
GLAZE: Mix 2 cups icing sugar and 3 Tbsp water until smooth.
Blend in 3 to 4 drops food colouring to tint to desired colour.
Dip edges of cookies in frosting and dry on rack.
ab4c597668.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and beat until well combined.
4. Gradually add the Jell-O Jelly Powder and mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until well combined.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are lightly golden.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious JELL-O Fruit Bowl Cookies!

c7e6c70205.gt:
In a medium bowl place first 7 ingredients up to lemon juice.
Stir until combined.
Set aside.
In a medium saute pan place 1/4 cup oil and heat to medium hot.
Fry each tortilla for 15 seconds, or until softened.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
In a large, heavy pan place 4 cups of oil and heat over high heat until very hot.
Loosely roll each tortilla and deep-fry it for 1-2 minutes, or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
Stuff reserved vegetable mixture inside each tortilla.
Cut the taquitos in half, crosswise.
c7e6c70205.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the feta cheese, crumbled, with the diced tomatoes, green bell pepper, and minced jalapeno pepper (optional). Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Place the mixture in the center of the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. While the cheese mixture is baking, prepare the blue corn tortillas by heating them in a pan with oil over medium heat until they become crispy.
7. Once the cheese mixture is done, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. To assemble the taquitos, place a spoonful of the cheese mixture on one end of each tortilla, leaving a small border around the edges.
9. Roll the tortilla over the filling, enclosing the cheese mixture, and press the edges to seal.
10. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Carefully place the taquitos in the hot oil, a few at a time, and fry them until they are golden brown on both sides.
11. Remove the taquitos from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
12. Serve the Blue Corn Feta Taquitos warm, with a squeeze of lemon juice and a sprinkle of fresh cilantro.

Enjoy your delicious Blue Corn Feta Taquitos!

f1211da4d4.gt:
In a serving dish, add quinoa, watermelon, red onion, feta and mint.
Gently toss to combine.
Drizzle in olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Toss to combine.
Top with mint garnish.
Serve chilled.
f1211da4d4.pred:
1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions, usually by boiling in water and then simmering until the quinoa is tender and fluffy.
2. While the quinoa is cooking, prepare the watermelon by cutting it into balls or cubes.
3. Chop the red onion into thin slices.
4. Crush the feta cheese into crumbles.
5. Rinse the mint leaves and pat them dry.
6. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, watermelon, red onion, and crumbled feta cheese.
7. In a small bowl, whisk together the extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
8. Pour the dressing over the quinoa mixture and toss to combine.
9. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Garnish with the torn mint leaves and serve immediately.

[/SYS]

13da1b6a5b.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F.
Coat a pie pan with cooking spray.
Heat a medium nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat.
Cook the scallions, bell pepper, and bacon for 3 minutes, or until softened.
Spoon into the prepared pie pan.
Top with the Cheddar.
In a large bowl combine the milk, egg substitute, mustard, and nutmeg.
Pour into the pie pan.
Sprinkle with the Parmesan.
Bake for 35 minutes, or until golden and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
13da1b6a5b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped scallion, green pepper, and Canadian bacon.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese, fat-free evaporated milk, liquid egg substitute, Dijon mustard, ground nutmeg, and grated parmesan cheese.
4. Pour the cheese mixture over the vegetable mixture and mix well.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
6. Bake the quiche for 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are golden brown.
7. Allow the quiche to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that the above recipe is a general guideline and may vary depending on individual preferences and dietary restrictions. Feel free to adjust the ingredients or cooking time as needed.

9a8cea064f.gt: Puree all ingredients together in a blender until smooth.
9a8cea064f.pred:
To prepare a delicious Cucumber Herb Vinaigrette, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped cucumber, red wine vinegar, and sugar. Allow the mixture to sit for about 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the nonfat yogurt, Dijon mustard, prepared horseradish, and salt.

3. After the cucumber mixture has sat for a while, carefully pour the vinegar mixture into the yogurt mixture, whisking constantly to ensure the ingredients are well combined.

4. Slowly drizzle in the olive oil, continuing to whisk until the vinaigrette reaches the desired consistency.

5. Stir in the chopped chives and parsley, and season with additional salt and pepper, if needed.

6. Cover the vinaigrette mixture and refrigerate it for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together and the vinaigrette to thicken slightly.

7. Serve the Cucumber Herb Vinaigrette over salads, as a dip for vegetables, or as a topping for sandwiches or wraps. Enjoy!

6aecc26678.gt:
1 Prepare millet corn meal: Pour whole grain millet into a grain mill and mill to a cornmeal-like consistency.
See the attached blog link for more detailed instructions on how to mill.
2 Preheat the oven to 400 F. 3 Spray the bottom and sides of an 8 x 8 glass pan with olive oil.
4 Mix together all dry ingredients in a large bowl.
5 Lightly beat egg in a separate small bowl.
6 Combine and stir the beaten egg with the goats milk and oil.
7 Add the liquids to the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly.
8 -Pour the batter into the greased pan and smooth the top with the back of your spoon.
9 Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
10 Allow to cool for a few minutes, slice into single-size portions, and serve!
Makes 9-16 servings, depending on how you slice it.
6aecc26678.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the millet "corn" meal, whole wheat flour, wheat gluten, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg, goat's milk, and oil.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Do not overmix.
5. Fold in the corn kernels.
6. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
7. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

ebbeab0277.gt:
Cover baking sheet with parchment.
Dip 12 plastic teaspoons, 1 at a time, in white chocolate; shake spoon gently over bowl of melted chocolate to remove excess chocolate.
Place on prepared baking sheet.
Refrigerate 10 min.
or until chocolate is firm.
Melt semi-sweet chocolate.
Partially dip each spoon in chocolate; return to baking sheet.
Refrigerate 10 min.
Use decorating gels to decorate spoons to resemble snowmen faces as shown in photo.
ebbeab0277.pred:
To make a delicious Snowmen Chocolate Spoons dish, follow these steps:

1. Melt the Baker's White Chocolate in a double boiler or a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
2. Once the chocolate has melted, remove it from the heat and stir in the melted Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate.
3. Add the orange and black decorating gels to the chocolate mixture.
4. Using a small spoon, scoop out small amounts of the chocolate mixture and shape them into spoon-like shapes.
5. Allow the chocolate spoons to cool and harden completely.
6. Once the chocolate spoons are hard, you can serve them as a delicious and festive dessert or snack.

Ingredients:
- 4 oz. (1/2 of 225-g pkg.) Baker's White Chocolate
- 2 oz. Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate
- Orange and black decorating gels

By following these steps, you can create a delightful and visually appealing Snowmen Chocolate Spoons dish that is sure to impress your guests or loved ones.

32186ea03f.gt:
In a large skillet, cook the beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Stir in the water, tomato paste, parsley, salt, mint if desired, cinnamon and pepper.
Set aside.
For sauce, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in flour until smooth; gradually add milk.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Remove from the heat.
Stir a small amount of hot mixture into eggs; return all to the pan, stirring constantly.
Add the Parmesan cheese and salt.
Place half of the potato slices in a greased shallow 3-qt.
baking dish.
Top with half of the Parmesan sauce and all of the meat mixture.
Arrange the remaining potatoes over meat mixture; top with the remaining Parmesan sauce.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
32186ea03f.pred:
1. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet. Cook until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Pour in the water and tomato paste, stirring to combine. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the liquid has been absorbed and the beef is tender.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked beef, onion, and garlic mixture, the sliced potatoes, and the parsley. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and the optional dried mint.
5. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
6. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beef mixture, the butter, flour, milk, eggs, and grated parmesan cheese. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and the cinnamon and ground cinnamon.
7. Pour the mixture into a large baking dish, and top it with the remaining butter.
8. Bake the moussaka in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until it is cooked through and the top is golden brown.
9. Serve the Beef-N-Potato Moussaka hot.

d25661eadd.gt:
Place your pork tenderloin in an oven proof pot.
Grate your garlic cloves and rub it into the pork tenderloin.
Rub smoked paprika powder into the pork tenderloin.
Dice the onions and place them in the pot with the pork tenderloin.
Cover with bbq sauce.
Put on the lid and make sure it is closed.
Cook in the oven at 125F celsius/255F for 5,5 hours.
Take out your pot and remove the lid.
Using to forks, pull the meat apart.
Serve with tortillas, vegetables and a sauce of your chosing.
d25661eadd.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook for about 5 minutes on each side, or until it is browned and cooked through.
4. Remove the pork from the skillet and place it on a cutting board.
5. Add the minced garlic and onions to the skillet and cook for about 2 minutes, or until they are softened.
6. Add the bbq sauce to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Place the pork tenderloin back into the skillet and cook for about 10 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
8. Remove the pork from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Using a fork, shred the pork into bite-sized pieces.
10. Serve the pulled pork on a bun or as a topping for a salad or sandwich.

[/INST]

794b47fa63.gt:
Saute onions in a small amount of oil until translucent.
Add garlic and ginger and saute until fragrant.
Add the rest of the ingredients except the prawns.
Bring to a boil.
Turn down the heat and add the prawns.
Simmer until the prawns turn pink and are cooked through.
794b47fa63.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chopped onions and sauté until they are soft and translucent.
2. Add the minced garlic and ginger, and sauté for a few more seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the chili powder and cayenne, and stir to combine.
4. Pour in the tomato paste and stir to coat the onions and garlic evenly.
5. Add the coconut milk, sugar, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then add the prawns. Cook for about 5-7 minutes or until the prawns are cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the Finger-Lickin' Prawns over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

46aa69285e.gt:
Add oil to pot.
Over medium heat, saute chicken, season with salt, cook until no longer pink.
About 3-4 minutes.
Remove chicken from pot, set aside.
In the mean time, in a food processor, make a flavor paste.
Combine tomatillos, green chilies and jalapeno and blend until thick & smooth.
May need to make 2 batches.
Add more oil if desired, add onions and garlic, saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Careful not to burn the garlic.
Add chicken back to pot.
Add cumin and coriander.
Stir.
Add the flavor paste, green chilies, chicken broth and beans to the cooked chicken pieces.
Simmer for at least 45 minutes or until desired thickness is achieved.
I prefer to simmer longer, for up to 2 hours.
Top with cilantro at serving.
Serve with warm torn flour tortillas or crispy tortilla chips.
46aa69285e.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the canola oil over medium heat. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
2. In the same pot, add the onion and garlic. Cook until the onion is softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the canned tomatillos, jalapeno, and green chilies. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.
4. Stir in the cumin, coriander, chicken broth, and beans. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
5. Add the cooked chicken back into the pot, stirring to combine.
6. If desired, top the chili with shredded cheddar cheese.
7. Serve the Chicken Tomatillo Chili hot, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

[/INST]

75ce65d04e.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
Set aside.
Combine sugar and shortening.
Cream until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg.
Stir in apple butter.
Add dry ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in raisins and nuts.
Drop dough by heaping teaspoons onto lightly greased baking sheets.
Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes.
Cool on racks.
75ce65d04e.pred:
To prepare a delicious Apple Butter Spice Cookies dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, cream the shortening and sugar until light and fluffy.
4. Add the egg and apple butter to the creamed mixture, and mix until well combined.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a soft dough forms.
6. Fold in the raisins and chopped nuts.
7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Butter Spice Cookies!

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.
b240a9e8bb.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, light brown sugar, baking powder, and egg whites. Mix until well combined.
2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the skim milk, melted margarine, and lightly beaten egg yolks.
3. Gradually pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients, stirring gently to combine. The batter should be smooth and slightly lumpy.
4. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Drop the batter by tablespoonfuls into the hot oil, spacing them apart to allow for even cooking. Cook the fritters until they are golden brown on both sides and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Remove the fritters from the pan and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
6. Serve the fritters warm, drizzled with light syrup or fresh blueberries, and enjoy!

[/INST]

6390dfd5d5.gt:
1.
Put a large soup pot on the stove.
Add all of the ingredients except the water, peanut butter, salt, and pepper into a large soup pot.
2.
Turn heat on high and add water as needed to cover all of the ingredients in liquid.
3.
Cover the pot to retain the heat and bring the mixture to a low boil.
4.
When the mixture has come to a boil, reduce the heat to medium low and boil for 1520 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are fork tender.
5.
If using an immersion blender, puree the soup until smooth.
Add the peanut butter and then puree until well incorporated.
If using a food processor or stand up blender, process/blend the mixture until smooth.
With one of the batches, process/blend until smooth, add the peanut butter, and then process/blend until well incorporated.
6.
Taste and season with salt and pepper as desired.
7.
Ladle into bowls and serve with naan, pita, or rolls.
6390dfd5d5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add the chopped sweet potatoes, onions, and garlic. Cook until the vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the vegetable broth, tomatoes, dried red pepper flakes, thyme, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 25-30 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.
4. In a small bowl, mix the smooth natural peanut butter with a little water to create a smooth, creamy sauce.
5. Carefully stir the peanut butter sauce into the soup, and continue simmering for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the soup reaches your desired consistency.
6. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the Vegan Spicy West African Peanut Soup hot, garnished with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Vegan Spicy West African Peanut Soup!

fdb9200291.gt:
start by heating a large skillet with butter, garlic & olive oil cook on med heat about 1 minute add in diced serrano chili cook another minute.
add in shrimp & chopped lobster and all seasonings along with chili paste.
Cook 6-7 minutes till shrimp are nice & pink.
This is a spicy dish Enjoy!
fdb9200291.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the precooked chopped lobster tail, chili paste, hot shot black & red seasoning, course ground black pepper, garlic salt, and serrano chili. Mix well to ensure all ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil, butter, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt.
4. Pour the olive oil and butter mixture over the lobster mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Add the shrimp to the bowl, and toss to coat the shrimp evenly with the lobster mixture.
6. Transfer the shrimp mixture to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
7. Serve the Peppered Shrimp & Lobster immediately, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of lobster, shrimp, and chili paste to create a delicious and unique dish. The use of the olive oil and butter mixture adds a rich and slightly smoky taste to the dish, while the addition of the serrano chili provides a spicy kick. The result is a flavorful and satisfying meal that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

fd78cf3ab6.gt:
Cut the tortillas into quarters.
In a large skillet, heat the oil and fry the tortilla pieces until crunchy.
Lower the heat to low.
Add the red chile sauce and mix gently through the tortilla pieces.
Top with the shredded cheese and cook until the cheese just starts to melt.
Remove from the heat and serve with your choice of eggs.
Garnish with chopped green and red onions.
For the sauce: Remove the stems, seeds and veins from the chile pods.
Rinse with cold water.
Add the chiles to a pot and add enough water just to cover them.
Bring to a boil and simmer covered for 20 minutes.
After 10 minutes turn the chiles over to cook evenly.
Drain and cool.
In a blender, mix 3 cups of water, half of the cooked chile pods, 3 Tablespoons flour, 2 cloves garlic and half the salt.
Blend until smooth.
Strain the sauce removing any seeds.
Repeat this process with the rest of the ingredients and set aside to cool.
Recipe from Muy Bueno Cook Book.
fd78cf3ab6.pred:
To prepare a delicious Chilaquiles Rojas, follow these steps:

1. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add the canola oil and allow it to heat up.
2. Add the red chile sauce to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for a few minutes until the sauce is heated through and slightly thickened.
3. Add the shredded Colby cheese to the skillet, stirring to melt the cheese and combine with the sauce. Cook until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are well-beaten.
5. Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet with the cheese sauce, stirring gently to combine. Cook until the eggs are cooked through and the sauce is slightly thickened.
6. While the eggs are cooking, prepare the garnishes by chopping the green and red onions.
7. Once the eggs are cooked, remove the skillet from the heat.
8. Serve the Chilaquiles Rojas immediately, garnished with the chopped green and red onions.

Enjoy your delicious Chilaquiles Rojas!

259241dc1b.gt:
Drain the tuna, reserving 1 tablespoon of the liquid.
Put the tuna in a serving bowl and mash with a fork until it's as mushy as you can get it.
Stir the reserved liquid, the salad dressing, honey mustard, relish, celery, carrot, sugar, and salt into the tuna.
Adjust seasoning to taste.
259241dc1b.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the canned tuna, creamy salad dressing, honey mustard, sweet pickle relish, minced celery, minced carrot, white sugar, and salt. Mix well.
2. Taste the mixture and adjust the seasoning as needed.
3. Serve the Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad on a bed of lettuce or a sandwich, or enjoy it as a side dish.

This Sweet Sweet Tuna Salad is a delicious and refreshing recipe that combines the flavors of tuna, creamy dressing, honey mustard, sweet pickle relish, and white sugar. The addition of the minced celery and carrot adds a crunchy texture and a touch of freshness to the dish. The salt balances the sweetness of the honey mustard and pickle relish, creating a well-rounded and satisfying meal.

38747a5ef7.gt:
Prepare a large ice bath.
In a large saucepan of salted boiling water, blanch the cauliflower until just starting to soften, 1 to 2 minutes.
Drain and transfer to the ice bath to cool.
Drain again.
In a large saucepan, combine the vinegar with the water, sugar, curry powder and 1 tablespoon of salt and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Remove from the heat, stir in the cauliflower and let cool completely.
Refrigerate for 1 hour.
Drain the cauliflower; reserve the brine to pickle more vegetables, if desired.
Preheat the oven to 375.
On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the cauliflower with the olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Roast for about 35 minutes, stirring once or twice, until tender and browned in spots.
Transfer the cauliflower to a platter and serve.
38747a5ef7.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the ice, water, dark brown sugar, curry powder, salt, and pepper.
3. Add the cauliflower florets to the bowl and toss to coat evenly with the marinade.
4. Spread the cauliflower on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and slightly caramelized.
5. While the cauliflower is roasting, prepare the pickling solution by combining the vinegar, water, sugar, salt, and pepper in a saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and let it cook for 5-10 minutes, or until the cauliflower is done.
6. Once the cauliflower is cooked, remove it from the oven and transfer it to a large bowl. Pour the pickling solution over the cauliflower, and toss to coat evenly.
7. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let the cauliflower pickle for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours.
8. After the pickling time is up, transfer the cauliflower to a serving bowl and serve immediately.

This recipe combines the flavors of curry, pickling, and roasting to create a delicious and unique dish. The pickled cauliflower adds a tangy, slightly sweet element to the dish, while the roasted cauliflower provides a tender, slightly caramelized texture. The curry powder adds a rich, warm, and spicy flavor to the dish, creating a harmonious and satisfying meal.

ac586b07a8.gt:
Mix all ingredients except chicken in a small bowl.
Place chicken in the bottom of the crockpot and pour sauce over it.
Cook on low for 1 1/2 hours.
(Depend of chicken breast's size)
Remove chicken and pour sauce into small sauce pot.
Heat sauce over medium to a simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve chicken with sauce on top.
I made rice with veggies as a side dish but you can pick your own side dish.
ac586b07a8.pred:
1. Preheat the crockpot on high heat.
2. Season the chicken breast with garlic powder, sea salt, and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add the chicken broth, honey, Dijon mustard, stone ground mustard, and sriracha sauce. Stir to combine.
6. Place the chicken breast back into the pan, and cook in the crockpot for 4-6 hours on high heat, or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
7. Remove the chicken from the crockpot and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
8. Serve the cooked chicken with the sauce, and enjoy your delicious Paleo spicy mustard crockpot chicken!

9dcd86738c.gt:
Mix together all of the ingredients except the shrimp.
Carefully fold in the shrimp so it doesn't break up.
Serve with potato chips or cut vegetables.
9dcd86738c.pred:
1. In a large bowl, mix the cottage cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, and ranch dressing mix until well combined.
2. Add the drained and rinsed shrimp to the mixture and stir to combine.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Serve the shrimp and vegetable dip mixture with tortilla chips.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

9a2ed3c6dc.gt:
Wisk all ingredients together until combined.
Do not overstir.
Heat lightly greased griddle or skillet over medium heat.
Pour or scoop batter onto griddle, apx 1/4 cup per pancake.
Brown on both sides.
Serve hot!
9a2ed3c6dc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, and egg.
3. Gradually add the milk, vegetable oil, and vinegar, mixing until smooth.
4. Pour the batter onto a well-greased griddle or non-stick pan.
5. Cook the pancakes until they are golden brown on both sides and cooked through.
6. Serve the pancakes warm with a dollop of whipped cream or a drizzle of maple syrup.

[/INST]

8872296451.gt:
Mix all ingredients and blend well.
Pour into a greased 2 1/2 quart casserole baking dish.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 50 minutes or until light brown on top.
Note: 1/2 cup of shredded cheddar cheese may be sprinkled on top during last 10 minutes of baking (optional).
8872296451.pred:
To prepare a delicious Emily's Cheesy Corn Casserole, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with butter.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornbread mix, sweet creamed corn, sweet whole kernel corn, and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and sour cream together.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the corn mixture and stir until well combined.
6. Add the cheddar cheese to the mixture and stir until the cheese is melted and well distributed.
7. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish and smooth the top with a spatula.
8. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
9. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Emily's Cheesy Corn Casserole!

e8a204dd36.gt:
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add oats and miso paste.
Cook for about 1 minute.
Add spinach, walnuts, and seaweed to oat mixture; cook, stirring occasionally, until oatmeal is desired consistency, about 5 minutes.
Pour oatmeal into a bowl and top with avocado.
e8a204dd36.pred:
To cook a delicious Miso Oatmeal Bowl, follow these steps:
1. In a saucepan, combine 1 cup of water and 1/2 cup of rolled oats. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes, or until the oats are tender and the water has been absorbed.
2. While the oats are cooking, prepare the miso paste by mixing 1 teaspoon of miso paste with 1/4 cup of fresh spinach, or to taste. You can also add other ingredients like chopped roasted seaweed, or to taste, and 1/2 avocado - peeled, pitted, and cubed.
3. Once the oats are cooked, remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the miso paste mixture.
4. If desired, add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve the Miso Oatmeal Bowl hot, garnished with 10 walnut halves and a sprinkle of chopped roasted seaweed, or to taste.

This Miso Oatmeal Bowl dish is a delicious and nutritious meal that combines the flavors of miso paste, spinach, and avocado. The oats provide a satisfying and filling base, while the miso paste adds a savory and slightly salty taste. The spinach and avocado contribute to the dish's vibrant color and creamy texture, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

8a45727c6f.gt:
Remove stems from mushrooms.
Make a light mushroom broth by simmering stems in 2 cups water for 15 minutes, then strain and reserve broth (discard stems).
Dice mushroom caps and set aside.
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
Cover with boiling salted water, let steep for 15 minutes, then drain.
Put oil in a wok or wide skillet over medium heat.
Add red peppers, black beans and bean paste and cook, stirring until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add garlic and ginger and let sizzle, then add mushrooms, soy sauce, sesame oil and Sichuan pepper.
Add 1 1/2 cups mushroom broth and cook mixture gently for 2 minutes.
Carefully add tofu cubes.
Shake pan to distribute sauce, using a wooden spoon to help.
Try to avoid smashing tofu.
Drizzle in cornstarch mixture, gently swirling pan to incorporate (sauce will thicken) and simmer tofu in sauce for 2 minutes more.
Thin with a little mushroom broth if necessary.
Transfer to a low bowl or platter.
Sprinkle with scallions and cilantro sprigs.
8a45727c6f.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with cold water to form a slurry. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and ginger, and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the shiitake mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and become tender, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the tofu and cook until it is golden brown and slightly crispy, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the fermented black beans, fermented spicy broad bean paste (doubanjiang), and soy sauce to the skillet. Stir to combine.
6. Add the dissolved cornstarch slurry to the skillet, stirring constantly to avoid lumps. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 2 minutes.
7. Add the water, salt, and red pepper flakes to the skillet. Stir to combine.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until the tofu is tender and the sauce has thickened.
9. Serve the Vegetarian Mapo Tofu over rice or noodles, garnished with cilantro sprigs.

[/INST]

2ae1ab4527.gt:
Over medium heat,melt 2 Tablespoons of margarine in a medium sized skillet.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Then add pork, gravy, and crushed red pepper flakes.
Stir to make sure all ingredients are well combined, and heated through.
2ae1ab4527.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter or margarine over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the breaded pork strips to the skillet and cook until they are browned on all sides, stirring occasionally.
4. Pour the jar of pork gravy over the pork and onions, stirring to combine.
5. Season the mixture with crushed red pepper flakes to taste.
6. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the gravy is bubbly and hot.
7. Serve the Breaded Pork With Onions and Gravy immediately.

[/INST]

7bf15c7482.gt:
Put the chicken in a crock pot.
Season with salt & pepper: top with remaining ingredients.
Season with more salt & pepper.
Cook on LOW 7-8 hours.
During the last 30 minutes put crock pot on High, sprinkle on the Mozzarella Cheese to melt.
7bf15c7482.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chicken thighs to the skillet and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the spaghetti sauce and cook until it thickens, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the mushrooms, bell pepper, onion, and garlic to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
7. Add the shredded fat-free mozzarella cheese to the skillet and stir until melted and combined.
8. Return the chicken thighs to the skillet and stir to combine the sauce with the chicken.
9. Cover the skillet with a lid and bake in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and hot.
10. Serve the Crock Pot Chicken Cacciatore over a bed of spaghetti or your preferred pasta.

[/INST]

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.
1c2ae05e91.pred:
[INST]To prepare Cheddar Carrot Bake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced carrots, melted butter, minced onion, and cheddar cheese soup. Mix well.
3. Add the low-fat milk, beaten egg, shredded cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, and tarragon. Mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the crushed crackers and nutmeg.
5. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheddar Carrot Bake!

6ac54b5e92.gt:
Cream butter and sugar.
Add egg and beat well.
Combine buttermilk and soda.
Combine flour and spices.
Add alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour.
Stir in apple butter and pecans.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350*F for 1 hour or until wooden pick inserted comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 5 minutes; remove to wire rack and cool completely.
6ac54b5e92.pred:
To cook a delightful Apple Butter & Pecan Quick Bread dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened butter or margarine, brown sugar, egg, and buttermilk. Whisk until smooth.
3. Add the baking soda, flour, apple butter, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, and clove to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
4. Fold in the pecans.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x5-inch loaf pan.
6. Bake the bread for about 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Butter & Pecan Quick Bread!

fe6115c71a.gt:
Cut the avocado and tuna into bite-sized chunks.
Combine the listed ingredients from the nameko mushrooms to the wasabi.
Pour the mixture on top of the avocado and tuna.
This is exactly what the dish looks like when you order it in a restaurant.
It's also great with thinly sliced cucumber.
fe6115c71a.pred:
To cook a delightful Raw Tuna & Avocado with Nameko Mushrooms and Soy Sauce dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Cut the sushi grade tuna into bite-sized chunks.
- Cut the avocado into small pieces.
- Clean and chop the Nameko mushrooms.
- Drain the Nameko mushrooms and set aside.
- In a small bowl, mix the wasabi with a little bit of water to create a paste.
- In another small bowl, mix the soy sauce with a little bit of water to create a sauce.
- In a small saucepan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.

2. Cook the dish:
- Add the tuna chunks to the saucepan and cook until they are cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
- Add the avocado pieces to the saucepan and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until they are heated through.
- Add the Nameko mushrooms to the saucepan and cook for 1-2 minutes, until they are heated through.
- Pour the wasabi paste over the tuna and avocado mixture, stirring to combine.
- Pour the soy sauce mixture over the tuna and avocado mixture, stirring to combine.

3. Serve the dish:
- Serve the cooked dish immediately, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This dish is a delicious and healthy meal option, combining the flavors of tuna, avocado, Nameko mushrooms, and soy sauce. The wasabi adds a unique and spicy kick to the dish, while the soy sauce provides a rich and savory flavor.

eb1ff69d12.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix all ingredients except Parmesan cheese and crackers until well blended.
Spoon into 9-inch pie plate; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake 15 minutes.
Serve with crackers or cut-up fresh vegetables.
eb1ff69d12.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the thawed, drained spinach, softened Neufchatel Cheese, chopped smoked almonds, minced garlic, Dijon Mustard, black pepper, and Parmesan Cheese.
2. Mix well until the ingredients are evenly combined.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
4. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. Spread the spinach dip onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the spinach dip in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the Smokey Almond-Spinach Dip with reduced-fat thin wheat snack crackers.

[/INST]

6a28e55b7e.gt:
First, grab that can of pumpkin.
I like to use Libbys, but you can use any brand you like.
Puree the pumpkin in your food processor, just to make sure that you take care of any big lumps.
We want the bisque to be nice and smooth.
Mix all the ingredients together in a sauce pan except for the evaporated milk.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium and let simmer for 6-7 minutes.
Then, reduce the heat again to low, and add in the evaporated milk.
Heat the bisque on medium heat, stirring constantly, until it gets hot.
Serve immediately.
6a28e55b7e.pred:
To prepare a delicious Pumpkin Bisque, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the pumpkin into small pieces and place them in a large mixing bowl.
3. Add the chicken broth, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, brown sugar, granulated sugar, and salt to the bowl.
4. Mix all the ingredients together until the pumpkin is well coated with the liquid.
5. Transfer the mixture to a large oven-safe pot or casserole dish.
6. Cover the pot or dish with a lid and bake in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes or until the pumpkin is tender and the mixture is heated through.
7. Remove the pot or dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Using a hand blender or an immersion blender, blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
9. If the bisque is too thick, add a little more chicken broth or water to achieve the desired consistency.
10. Stir in the evaporated milk and mix well.
11. Serve the Pumpkin Bisque hot, garnished with a sprinkle of cinnamon and nutmeg, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Bisque!

de0b779581.gt:
In 2-cup glass measuring cup, combine chicken broth and enough water to equal 2 cups.
In 2-quart saucepan, heat broth mixture, thyme, and nutmeg to boiling over high heat.
Add bulgur, reduce heat to medium-low.
Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
Garnish each serving with a thyme sprig.
de0b779581.pred:
To make a delicious Bulgur Pilaf, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, combine the chicken broth, dried thyme leaves, and nutmeg. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes.

2. While the broth is simmering, prepare the bulgur by cooking it according to the package instructions. Typically, you would need to soak the bulgur in water for about 15-20 minutes, then drain and rinse it before cooking it in a saucepan with boiling water.

3. Once the bulgur is cooked, add it to the simmering broth mixture. Stir the ingredients together, and let the mixture cook for another 5-10 minutes, or until the bulgur is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.

4. Season the pilaf with salt and pepper to taste.

5. Garnish the pilaf with fresh thyme sprigs for a touch of freshness and aroma.

6. Serve the Bulgur Pilaf hot, and enjoy the delicious, comforting meal.

[/INST]

53ee6640d1.gt:
Using an espresso machine or cappuccino maker, prepare 2 shots espresso.
Fill a large serving glass 2/3 with ice.
Do not use extract or ice cream topping in place of syrup (use types specially made for beverages).
Add vanilla syrup, sugar (if desired), and espresso to glass and top up with cold milk.
Stir or shake briskly until syrup and sugar is nicely blended in the drink.
53ee6640d1.pred:
To make a delicious Iced Cappuccino dish, follow these steps:
1. Brew a double shot of espresso using an espresso machine or a coffee maker with a double shot function.
2. In a small bowl, mix 2-3 ounces of the brewed espresso with 2-3 teaspoons of sugar, depending on your taste preference. You can add more sugar if desired.
3. In a separate bowl, mix 2 teaspoons of vanilla coffee syrup or 2 teaspoons of another flavor coffee syrup with 5 ounces of milk.
4. Combine the espresso mixture and milk mixture in a tall glass or a mug.
5. Optionally, add ice to the mixture if desired for a cold, refreshing Iced Cappuccino.
6. Stir the mixture well to combine all the ingredients.
7. Enjoy your delicious Iced Cappuccino!

The key ingredients in this recipe are espresso, milk, sugar, and flavor syrup. The espresso provides the base of the drink, while the milk and sugar contribute to the creamy texture and sweetness. The flavor syrup adds a unique flavor profile to the Iced Cappuccino, allowing you to customize it to your taste preferences.

6febef31e3.gt:
Pour the water in a saucepan and heat it until medium hot.
Mix the cocoa powder with the water.
Add in Splenda and mix until the mixture becomes creamy and thick.
Do not add too much Splenda as biscuits themselves are the major source of sweetness in the recipe.
Crush the biscuits separately in a bowl.
Make sure the pieces are neither too big nor extremely powdery.
We just need small pieces.
Add the cocoa mixture to the bowl and mix it lightly with a spoon.
Take a small plastic bag and put in the resulting mixture, roll the plastic bag in a cylinder like shape.
Put the bag in a Refrigerator and allow it to cool for 4-6 hours.
6febef31e3.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cocoa powder, sugar-free shortbread cookies, and 1 cup of water. Mix until the cookies are evenly coated.
3. Add the remaining 11 cups of water, Splenda granular, and mix until the batter reaches the desired consistency.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Enjoy your delicious Quick Chocolate Biscuit Cake (Sugar Free).

[/INST]

[/INST]

f51e8fb184.gt:
Cook dry beans according to instructions on packet.
(No need with canned beans).
Saute onions until they are soft and clear.
Add tomato paste, coconutcream and seasonings, stirring over a gentle heat until they form a smooth and creamy sauce.
Drain beans and add to sauce.
Allow to simmer gently for 15 minutes or so, stirring from time to time.
Serve on brown or white rice accompanied by a salad.
f51e8fb184.pred:
1. Rinse the dried black-eyed peas thoroughly and soak them in water for at least 8 hours or overnight.
2. Drain the soaked black-eyed peas and transfer them to a large pot.
3. Add the chopped onions, oil, and all the spices (paprika, chili powder, cumin, brown sugar, salt, and black pepper) to the pot.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 2 hours or until the black-eyed peas are tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
5. Serve the cooked African Beans hot, over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

1fda5d9400.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Beat smooth.
Stir in milk, vanilla, and almond flavoring.
In large bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in fruit, raisins, and nuts.
Add all at once to first bowl.
Stir only to moisten.
Turn into greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour in 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven until it tests done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool and wrap.
1fda5d9400.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a loaf pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Stir in the milk, vanilla extract, and almond extract.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the candied mixed fruit, raisins, and chopped almonds.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.
8. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
9. Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

This fruit and nut loaf is a delicious and nutritious treat that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of fruits, nuts, and spices creates a flavorful and satisfying dessert or snack. The use of a loaf pan ensures even baking and a neat presentation.

009d0c5350.gt:
Cook macaroni according to box, pour into colander and leave.
DO NOT RINSE>.
Turn burner to med.
Melt butter in pan, add flour and whisk together.
Add milk and whisk constantly till warm and thickened.
Remove from heat.
Whisk in Velveeta, 1 cup cheddar and mozzarella, till melted and smooth.
Add macaroni to cheese mixture.
Stir until well combined.
Heat oven to 350F Pour mac and cheese into 2 qt casserole.
Top with remaining cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes or till cheese on top is melted.
009d0c5350.pred:
To cook a delicious Three Cheese Mac and Cheese Lite (Yes Lite) dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients: In a large saucepan, melt the light margarine over medium heat. Add the flour and stir until smooth, creating a roux.
2. Gradually add the skim milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Cook the mixture until it thickens, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Add the 2% Velveeta reduced fat cheese product, stirring until melted and combined.
4. Add the 2% cheddar cheese, stirring until melted and fully combined.
5. Add the 1 cup 2% mozzarella cheese, stirring until melted and smooth.
6. Cook the macaroni according to the package instructions until al dente.
7. Drain the cooked macaroni and add it to the saucepan with the cheese mixture. Stir to combine.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Cook the dish in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and melted.

This delicious Three Cheese Mac and Cheese Lite (Yes Lite) dish is perfect for those who want a lighter version of the classic comfort food. The use of reduced fat cheese products and skim milk helps to reduce the overall calorie and fat content, while still maintaining the rich and creamy texture that we love in mac and cheese.

196e701d35.gt:
Heat about 2 inches of peanut oil on medium high.
Chop green onions, coarsely chop crab meat and combine well with cream cheese.
Lay out wonton wrappers and place about a tablespoon of the mixture in the center.
Brush egg wash along all four edges.
Heres the kicker: some places will just fold it in half (diagonally) and call it a day.
Ive found that these tend to become oily and they dont give you the nice, crispy bite that compliments the creamy filling.
So, take the tip of one edge and the tip of the edge diagonally across and pinch together.
Take the other two edges and bring them up to meet the already pinched edges so you create a little square with the edges pinched up in the air.
Drop a few at a time into the oil.
If you use a big frying pan and dump everything in at the same time, youll cause the oil temperature to come down and they wont fry nicely.
The rangoon will float to the top after a minute; flip over when its a nice golden brown.
Fry on the other side for another minute and remove, placing on some paper towels to absorb the oil.
Total cooking time is only 2-3 minutes, so stay nearby!
196e701d35.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Crab Meat, and Green Onions. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the beaten egg to the mixture and continue to mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Shape the mixture into small balls, approximately the size of a walnut.
5. In a small bowl, mix the Wontons and Peanut Oil.
6. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
7. Carefully place the shaped mixture into the hot oil, ensuring that there is enough space between each ball. Cook for approximately 2-3 minutes or until the balls are golden brown.
8. Remove the balls from the oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil.
9. Serve the Crab Rangoons immediately or refrigerate them until ready to serve.

Enjoy your delicious Crab Rangoons!

af9b2fab3d.gt:
Add your garlic powder, onion powder, pepper and celery to your cut up meat
Heat oil in a big pot (I like using my dutch oven type) add your cubed seasoned beef, start browning over med high heat
When you have some good color, add the water, and the beef bouillon and bring to a boil and cook for about 2hrs, you want it to simmer, a low boil here, cover with a lid
Add tomato sauce, baby carrots, potatoes, continue cooking at a low boil, stirring occasionally for about 1 & 1/2hrs, keep lid on
Add your geen beans ( add 1 can beans and the liquid from can , the other can of beans you need to drain and just add the beans), and the corn, let cook about 30mins longer
af9b2fab3d.pred:
[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Tinklee's Family Stew, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Add the garlic powder and onion powder, stirring constantly for a minute or until fragrant.
3. Add the beef stew meat and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the black pepper, dried celery, and beef bouillon. Stir to combine.
5. Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 1-2 hours or until the beef is tender.
7. Add the tomato sauce, stirring to combine.
8. Add the baby carrots, potatoes, and green beans, stirring to combine.
9. Add the frozen corn, stirring to combine.
10. Simmer the stew for an additional 30-45 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
11. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the Tinklee's Family Stew hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

a6a539fdd1.gt:
Season the thighs with adobo.
Heat the olive oil and cook the thighs.
Add the onion and cooked them till tender.
Add the vegetables, honey, basil, italian seasoning and tomato sauce.
And let it simmer for about 8 minutes...Enjoy
a6a539fdd1.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Season the chicken thighs with adobo, Italian seasoning, and a pinch of dry basil.
3. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
4. Add the chicken pieces to the pot, and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
5. Add the canned mixed vegetables, tomato sauce, and honey. Stir to combine.
6. Cover the pot with a lid, and place it in the preheated oven. Cook for about 1 hour, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Remove the pot from the oven, and let it sit for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Honey Veggie Chicken Stew!

120df8a501.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Put thawed potatoes in a large bowl.
Cube turkey-ham and add to potatoes.
Dice onion and add to bowl.
Add cheese to bowl.
Mix well.
In a small bowl put sour cream, soup, melted butter, salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Add to potato mixture.
Mix well, make sure everything is coated.
Put in a 9x13 pan and cover.
Cook for 30 minutes.
Uncover and cook for 15 minutes longer.
Take out and let rest 10 minutes to set.
120df8a501.pred:
To cook a delightful Potato Casserole dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the precooked turkey-ham, shredded hashbrown potatoes, and the onion.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the shredded Monterey Jack cheese and sour cream.
4. Add the cream of chicken soup to the potato mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Add the melted butter or margarine and stir to combine.
6. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Sprinkle the top with the remaining cheese mixture.
9. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the Potato Casserole hot.

Ingredients:
1 pound Shredded Hashbrown potatoes
1 pound Precooked Turkey-ham
1 whole Medium Onion
16 ounces Shredded Monterey Jack Cheese
16 ounces Sour Cream
1 can (10 Oz. Size) Cream Of Chicken Soup
1 stick Butter or Margarine
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Pepper

[/INST]

6fe5e21aec.gt:
Preheat oven to 425 F.
Wrap potatoes in aluminum foil.
Bake potatoes on a pan in the oven until done, about an hour.
Remove foil and let potatoes cool to room temperature.
Put potatoes on a plate, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight.
Grate the chilled potatoes, including skins.
You can use a large box grater or a food processor.
(I like the food processor!)
Transfer grated potatoes to a bowl and sprinkle in the shallots, 1 3/4 cup cheese, salt, and pepper.
Use your hands to gently toss together.
(I guess you could stir it too but you would miss all the fun.
Go ahead, plunge those hands down in there!)
Then fold in sour cream.
Transfer mixture to a 1 1/2 quart gratin dish, making sure that you dont compress (or squash, or moosh, or squish) it!
Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top.
Bake at 350 F until the top is golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Serves 6.
Recipe slightly adapted from williams-sonoma.com via Strip House.
6fe5e21aec.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with 3/4 cups of minced shallots, 2-1/2 cups of grated white cheddar cheese, and 1/4 teaspoon of kosher salt.
4. In a small bowl, mix 1/4 teaspoon of freshly ground pepper and 1-1/2 cups of sour cream.
5. Pour the sour cream mixture over the potatoes, tossing to coat evenly.
6. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
8. Serve the Potatoes Romanoff hot, garnished with additional chopped minced shallots, if desired.

[/INST]

e6d3f4cc2c.gt:
Cream butter and sugar together.
Mix in beaten egg yolks, cherry juice, flour and baking powder.
Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into mixture.
Grease mini muffins tins and sprinkle bottom with chopped pecans.
Place 1 teaspoon dough in each and place cherry on top.
Add another teaspoon full of dough and sprinkle top with pecans.
Bake at 350F for 10 minutes.
Remove from muffin tins and roll in powdered sugar while still warm.
Makes 24 mini muffins.
e6d3f4cc2c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, and maraschino cherry juice.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the chopped pecans and maraschino cherries.
7. Line a muffin tin with cupcake liners.
8. Divide the batter evenly among the muffin cups, filling them about 3/4 full.
9. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
10. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Mini Holiday Muffins!

e3e663cf8f.gt:
Place all in a blender and blend till smooth.
If you use fresh berries you can add ice cubes.
e3e663cf8f.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including 1 tablespoon of flax seed, 1 banana, 12 cups of frozen berries (blueberry, blackberry, raspberry, and/or strawberries), 12 cups of orange juice, and 1 tablespoon of wheat grass powder (Green Vibrance).

2. In a blender, combine the banana, frozen berries, and orange juice.

3. Add the flax seed to the blender and blend until smooth.

4. Pour the blended mixture into a glass and add the wheat grass powder (Green Vibrance) to the top.

5. Stir the mixture well to ensure that the wheat grass powder is evenly distributed.

6. Enjoy your delicious Younger Healthier You Smoothieeee dish!

This smoothie recipe is packed with essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals that can help promote overall health and well-being. The flax seed provides healthy fats, fiber, and antioxidants, while the banana offers natural sugars and potassium. The frozen berries and orange juice contribute vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and the wheat grass powder (Green Vibrance) adds a boost of nutrients and natural energy. This smoothie is not only delicious but also a nutritious and convenient way to enjoy a healthy meal or snack.

ad6361ec32.gt:
Grate apple
Chop onion and add it to apple
Add oil, soy sauce, honey, red pepper and sesame.
I add 3 drops of apple venegar to balance the taste.
Mix them all and add carrot and beef.
Put it into fridge and let it wait for 1 hour.
No bbq?
Use a flat pan with aluminum foil to cook bulgogi.
I like to serve it with an omelette and steamed rice.
ad6361ec32.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. Cut the beef into thin strips and season with salt and pepper.

3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.

4. Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.

5. In the same skillet, add the onion and carrot. Cook until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.

6. Add the apple, soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, and red pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.

7. Return the beef to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables.

8. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes or until the beef is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.

9. Serve the Bulgogi over rice or noodles and enjoy!

[/INST]

fc8c3a80e8.gt:
Put all ingredients in blender, blend until smooth.
Pour in glass and enjoy!
fc8c3a80e8.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients. In this case, we have 1 frozen banana, cut in quarters, 2 cups frozen strawberries, cut in halves, 1 fresh banana, cut in quarters, and 1 cup pineapple-mango juice.

3. Add the pineapple-mango juice to the blender.

4. Blend the ingredients until smooth and creamy.

5. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your delicious fruit smoothie!

6. You can also add other ingredients to enhance the taste, such as a splash of milk, a pinch of sugar, or a spoonful of yogurt.

17. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy your delicious fruit smoothie!

22df25b9dd.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Mix baking crumbs and butter; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and granulated sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Add chocolate and liqueur; mix well.
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 45 to 50 min.
or until centre is almost set.
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim.
Refrigerate cheesecake 4 hours.
Sprinkle icing sugar over cheesecake just before serving.
Top with berries.
22df25b9dd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a medium bowl, mix together the melted butter, softened Philadelphia Brick Cream Cheese, granulated sugar, and melted Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate.
3. Add the hazelnut-flavored liqueur to the mixture and stir until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are light and fluffy.
5. Gradually add the whisked eggs to the chocolate mixture, stirring until well combined.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the Oreo Baking Crumbs with a pinch of salt.
7. Add the crumb mixture to the chocolate mixture and stir until well combined.
8. Pour the batter into a springform pan that has been greased and lined with parchment paper.
9. Bake the cheesecake in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes or until the center is set and the edges are slightly browned.
10. Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for about 15-20 minutes.
11. Remove the cheesecake from the springform pan and place it on a serving plate.
12. Dust the top of the cheesecake with icing sugar and garnish with mixed fresh berries.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Royale Cheesecake!

4f38968f4b.gt:
In a large bowl, using a fork, mix the Gorgonzola with the yogurt, olive oil, vinegar, shallot, lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
Fold in the chicken and celery and season with salt and pepper.
To serve, fill the baguette with the chicken salad, snap peas, radishes and lettuce, then cut the baguette crosswise into 4 sandwiches.
4f38968f4b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the crumbled Gorgonzola dolce, Greek yogurt, olive oil, and minced shallot. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Add the diced rotisserie chicken to the bowl and toss to combine.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the thinly sliced celery, sugar snap peas, radishes, and lettuce or mesclun.
5. Toast the split baguette slices on a baking sheet in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until golden brown.
6. Remove the toasted baguette slices from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Spread a thin layer of the Gorgonzola cheese mixture on one side of each toasted baguette slice.
8. Add the chicken salad mixture to the other side of the toasted baguette slices.
9. Serve the Leftover Blue Cheese Chicken Salad Sandwiches immediately.

eca8b785b9.gt:
Preheat oven to 250-300 degrees celcius (or mark 6).
Peel potatoes, wash and drain well.
Slice the potatoes as finely as possible or use a slicer to make things easier.
Rub the garlic around a baking dish or skillet.
Grease the dish with butter.
I also greased it with cream cheese.
Start laying the sliced potatoes in the dish separating them only slightly, keeping them compact.
Add salt, pepper, parsley.
Add a layer of cream.
Spread the cream on the potatoes.
Add some grated cheese.
Repeat step 5 for as many layers as you have potatoes.
You might need to add cream or cheese.
On the final layer top with some parsley and a lot of cheese and bake for 45-60minutes.
eca8b785b9.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the potatoes, heavy cream, grated cheese, chopped parsley, garlic, and cream cheese.
4. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Transfer the potato mixture to a large baking dish or individual ramekins.
6. Dot the top of the potatoes with butter, then sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top.
7. Bake the potatoes in the preheated oven for 45-60 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the cheese is golden brown.
8. Remove the dish from the oven, let it rest for a few minutes, then serve the Potatoes au Gratin hot.

[/INST]

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
To cook a delicious Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread 2 tablespoons of peanut butter on one side of each slice of bread.
3. Cut the bananas into 12 equal pieces.
4. Place the banana pieces on the peanut butter-covered side of the bread slices.
5. Place the sandwiches in a baking dish or on a baking sheet.
6. Bake the sandwiches in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the peanut butter is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the sandwiches from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into halves or quarters.
8. Serve the Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwiches warm, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

This dish is not only easy to prepare but also a delightful treat for those who enjoy the combination of peanut butter and banana flavors.

e4f7383aea.gt:
Place onions in skillet with bacon grease and cook until limp.
Add chuck and stir until pink has gone from meat.
Add tomatoes, rice, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Put in casserole and top with bread crumbs.
Cook about 45 minutes at 350 degrees.
e4f7383aea.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground chuck over medium heat until it is browned and no longer pink.
3. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the canned tomatoes, cooked rice, chili powder, salt, and black pepper. Stir to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 30 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the mixture is hot and bubbly.
6. Serve the Texas Hash hot, garnished with additional chili powder, if desired.

[/INST]

f545630e3c.gt:
Combine cracker crumbs and taco seasoning, stirring well.
Roll chicken in cracker crumbs and place in a greased 13x9 baking dish.
Saute green onions in butter in a skillet until tender.
Stir in whipping cream and remaining ingredients.
Pour over chicken.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.
f545630e3c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken breasts, taco seasoning, green onions, and melted butter. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the seasoning mixture.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the chicken mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
5. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the cheese sauce by melting the butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add the whipping cream and stir until smooth. Gradually add the Monterey Jack cheese, stirring until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes. Then, slice the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
7. Pour the cheese sauce over the chicken and stir to combine.
8. Serve the Farmers Favorite Fiesta Chicken immediately, garnished with additional chopped green onions if desired.
