Enjoy your delicious Farmers Favorite Fiesta Chicken!

331c22eb1b.gt:
In a small Mason jar, or jar of choice, combine oats, chia seeds, ground flaxseeds, cinnamon, and sea salt.
Add milk and Greek yogurt.
Stir everything together and place the lid on the jar and give the mixture a good shake to combine the ingredients.
Place the lid back on the jar and refrigerate overnight.
In the morning, you can serve oats either right from the jar or in a bowl.
Simply serve with a sprinkle of sliced almonds, fresh blueberries, and some brown sugar, if desired (it is actually sweet enough if you use vanilla yogurt though!
).
331c22eb1b.pred:
1. Combine the Rolled Oats, Chia Seeds, Ground Flaxseeds, Ground Cinnamon, and Sea Salt in a bowl.
2. Add the Milk and Greek Yogurt to the bowl, and mix well to ensure the oats are evenly coated.
3. Add the Blueberries to the mixture, and gently toss to combine.
4. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a lid, and refrigerate for at least 6-8 hours or overnight.
5. After refrigeration, add the sliced almonds and brown sugar to the mixture.
6. Gently stir to combine, and serve the Blueberry Overnight Oats with Chia and Flax.

By following these key steps, you will be able to prepare a delicious and nutritious Blueberry Overnight Oats with Chia and Flax, which can be enjoyed as a healthy breakfast or snack.

c0a887dc12.gt:
1.
Combine all ingredients together and transfer to an airtight container.
2.
Can be stored up to 6 months refrigerated.
3.
Rub; let meat marinade for 24 hours refrigerated.
4.
Cook, add you favorite BBQ sauce near the end of cooking cycle if desired and enjoy.
c0a887dc12.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 225°F (107°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the salt, brown sugar, pepper, paprika, chili powder, garlic powder, and onion powder.
3. Spread the dry rub mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a small roasting pan.
4. Place the meat (such as pork, chicken, or beef) on top of the dry rub mixture.
5. Roast the meat in the preheated oven for 2-3 hours, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
6. Remove the meat from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that the cooking time may vary depending on the type of meat and its thickness. Keep an eye on the meat during the cooking process to ensure it is cooked evenly and reaches the desired level of doneness.
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

77f61a5608.gt:
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F. Position a rack in the upper third of the oven.
In a small bowl, combine the hoisin, soy sauce, wine, honey and garlic.
Line a baking sheet with foil and spray it lightly with cooking spray; set aside.
Place the salmon fillets on the baking sheet, and spoon the sauce over the fillets, trying to keep as much on each fillet as possible.
Bake for 15 to 18 minutes, depending on the thickness of your fillets, until just cooked through.
*Note: If you want extra sauce for after the fish is done baking (because the sauce in the oven sort of caramelizes), then I recommend doubling the sauce and reserving half of it for pouring over the fish after it is done baking.
Just be sure NOT to touch any utensils that touched the raw fish into the reserved sauce.
77f61a5608.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the hoisin sauce, low sodium soy sauce, dry white wine, and honey.
3. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper, then transfer them to a baking dish.
4. Pour the hoisin-soy sauce mixture over the salmon fillets, making sure to coat them evenly.
5. Bake the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
6. Remove the salmon from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
7. Enjoy your delicious Hoisin-Glazed Baked Salmon!

f01aec104c.gt:
Let the chopped tomato drain in a colander while preparing the rest of the guacamole.
Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Add the frozen lima beans and cook until tender and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Drain the beans and rinse under cold water until cool.
Pat the beans dry with a paper towels then remove the skins by pinching the beans so the skins slide off.
If using baby limas, you can skip this step.
Scoop out a quarter of the avocado flesh, then process it with the lima beans, lime juice, mayonnaise, and 1/2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until very smooth, 1-1 1/2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the bowl as needed.
Cube the remaining 3/4 of the avocado into 1/2" pieces.
Gently stir the cubed avocado, pureed lima mixture, drained tomato, cilantro, jalapeno, onion, garlic, and cumin together.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!
The guacamole can be refrigerated, wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, for up to 48 hours.
(the lima beans help keep it very green).
Make sure the plastic wrap is touching the surface of the guacamole.
Bring to room temperature and season with additional fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper before serving.
f01aec104c.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, lima beans, and avocado.
2. Add the fresh lime juice, mayonnaise, salt, and minced cilantro.
3. Squeeze the juice of the jalapeno chile over the mixture.
4. Stir the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Add the minced red onion (or shallot) and minced garlic to the mixture.
6. Stir in the cumin and pepper.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the Light Guacamole! immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/SYS]

7278a1d6dc.gt:
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Combine squash and next 5 ingredients (squash through garlic), and saute for 8 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring frequently.
Add bay leaves and 2 thyme sprigs, and stir in tomato paste.
Stir in flour and wine, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in the broth and chickpeas.
Cover and simmer 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon salt, pepper, and chopped parsley.
Discard bay leaves and thyme.Discard mushroom stems; slice caps.
Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms, and cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Serve ragout over mushrooms.
Garnish with additional thyme sprigs, if desired.
7278a1d6dc.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet or saucepan over medium heat. Add 2 tablespoons of olive oil and cook the onions, carrots, and celery until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
2. Add the garlic and cook for an additional minute, stirring constantly to avoid burning.
3. Add the butternut squash, leek, parsnip, and thyme sprigs to the skillet. Cook for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add the tomato paste, flour, and red wine to the skillet. Stir to combine, then bring the mixture to a simmer.
5. Add the chickpeas, vegetable broth, bay leaves, and salt and pepper to taste. Simmer the ragout for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Remove the bay leaves and thyme sprigs.
7. Serve the Harvest-Vegetable Ragout over rice or pasta, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.

[/INST]

1f141c8991.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F. In bowl, mix together tomatoes, onion and cilantro.
Squeeze lime into the tomato mixture and toss until blended.
Arrange a single layer of chips on heatproof platter or baking sheet.
Top with spoonfuls of chili, tomato mixture, olives and cheese.
Add jalapeno slices, if desired.
Repeat layers until all the ingredients are used.
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese is completely melted.
Serve nachos hot.
1f141c8991.pred:
To cook Chili Nachos, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chopped plum tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes, until they start to release their juices.
4. Add the chopped cilantro, lime juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, until the tomatoes are tender and the flavors are well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the corn tortilla chips, HORMEL Chili With Beans, and shredded cheese.
6. Transfer the cooked tomato mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish. Spread the tortilla chip mixture evenly over the top of the tomato mixture.
7. Bake the Chili Nachos in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. If desired, top the Chili Nachos with sliced fresh jalapeno chile for extra heat.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy!

[/INST]

d4627b79b5.gt:
Line a 4 1/2-by-8 1/2-inch loaf pan with 2 sheets of plastic wrap, leaving a 3-inch overhang on long sides.
In a blender, puree raspberries and sugar, scraping down sides as needed.
Strain through a fine-mesh sieve, pressing on solids; discard solids.
In a large bowl, whip cream until soft peaks form.
With a rubber spatula, fold in lemon curd.
Spoon 2 cups cream mixture into pan and smooth top.
Dip ladyfingers in raspberry puree and arrange in pan, parallel to long edges.
Pour remaining raspberry puree on ladyfingers.
Top with remaining cream mixture and smooth top.
Wrap pan with overhanging plastic and freeze 8 hours (or up to 2 weeks).
To serve, invert onto a serving platter, remove plastic, and slice.
Looking for more dessert ideas?
Check out our homemade chocolate chip cookie recipes, apple pie recipes, and chocolate cake recipes.
d4627b79b5.pred:
To create a delicious Lemon-Raspberry Semifreddo, follow these steps:

1. In a saucepan, combine the raspberries, sugar, and lemon juice. Cook over medium heat until the raspberries are soft and the mixture is slightly thickened.

2. Remove the mixture from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk the heavy cream until it reaches the desired consistency.

4. Add the cooled raspberry mixture to the whipped cream and gently fold them together.

5. In a separate bowl, whisk the Lemon Curd until smooth.

6. Carefully fold the Lemon Curd into the raspberry mixture.

7. Line a 9x9 inch baking dish with parchment paper or aluminum foil.

8. Pour the raspberry mixture into the prepared baking dish.

9. Place the baking dish in the refrigerator and let it chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.

10. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

11. Remove the baking dish from the refrigerator and carefully remove the parchment or foil.

12. Bake the Lemon-Raspberry Semifreddo in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wobbly.

13. Allow the Semifreddo to cool completely before cutting it into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Lemon-Raspberry Semifreddo!

7b8d2868c4.gt:
In a saucepan combine water and sugar.
Bring to boiling, stirring to dissolve sugar.
Remove from heat.
Cool about 30 minutes.
In a 2 quart square baking dish, combine sugar mixture, lemon juice and tarragon.
Cover and freeze 7 hours or till nearly firm.
Break the frozen mix into small chunks.
Move to a chilled large bowl.
Beat with electric mixer on medium speed until fluffy but not melted.
Return mix to the 2 quart dish and cover, freeze at least 3 hours or until firm.
To serve, let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes.
Using a large spoon, scrape across the surface and spoon into pretty dishes.
Makes 6 cups.
7b8d2868c4.pred:
1. In a large saucepan, combine 3 cups of water and 1 cup of sugar. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
2. While the sugar syrup is simmering, prepare the fresh tarragon by snipping the leaves from the stems.
3. After the sugar syrup has simmered for 10 minutes, add the fresh tarragon leaves to the saucepan. Stir the mixture gently to ensure the leaves are evenly distributed.
4. Allow the mixture to simmer for an additional 5 minutes or until the sugar has dissolved and the tarragon leaves are fragrant.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool for a few minutes.
6. In a separate bowl, mix 13 cups of fresh lemon juice (or lime) with 1 tablespoon of fresh tarragon.
7. Carefully pour the cooled sugar syrup mixture into the lemon juice mixture, stirring gently to combine the ingredients.
8. Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
9. Once the mixture has chilled, strain it through a fine mesh strainer to remove any solids.
10. Pour the strained mixture into a glass filled with ice, and garnish with additional tarragon leaves if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and refreshing Tarragon Ice!

874ce55813.gt:
Put all marinade ingrediantsin a large ziplock bag.
Mix well.
Add chicken breasts.
For a mild flavour, leave for 30 minutes.
For more intensity, leave up to 4 hours but no longer.
Heat up grill to medium high.
Cook breasts, with lid closed for about 7 (7 1/2) minutes per side.
874ce55813.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chopped dill, olive oil, minced garlic, crushed fennel seed, salt, and pepper.
3. Add the chicken breasts to the bowl and toss to coat them evenly with the marinade.
4. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. After marinating, remove the chicken from the bowl and shake off any excess marinade.
6. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
7. Place the chicken breasts on the prepared baking sheet, skin side down.
8. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
9. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
10. Serve the chicken with the lemon wedges, allowing the guests to squeeze the lemon over the chicken for extra flavor.

[/INST]

93479dc342.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
In a large mixing bowl, cream sugar, shortening, and salt.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Add extract and mix well.
In a separate bowl, sift flour and baking powder.
Add milk to creamed mixture.
Add flour mixture to creamed mixture.
Fold in coconut.
Bake in a greased and floured bundt pan for 1 hour.
About 10 minutes before cake is done, combine sugar, extract and water in a small saucepen.
Bring to a boil and boil one minute.
Pour over cake immediately after removing cake from the oven.
Let cake sit 30 minutes before removing from pan.
93479dc342.pred:
To prepare a delicious Coconut Pound Cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and coconut extract in a separate bowl.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
6. Stir in the coconut flakes and water.
7. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
8. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is fully cooled, you can add a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of coconut syrup for extra flavor and presentation.

Ingredients:
- 2 cups sugar
- 1 cup Butter Flavor Crisco
- 1 pinch salt
- 5 eggs
- 2 teaspoons coconut extract
- 2 cups flour
- 1 12 teaspoons baking powder
- 12 cup milk
- 1 (3 1/2 ounce) can angel flake coconut
- 1 cup sugar
- 2 teaspoons coconut extract
- 12 water

[/INST]

bf6be1f473.gt:
Drain tuna.
Combine mayonnaise & pepper relish, stir into tuna.
Place spinach & diced onion in the bowl and top with tuna, shredded cheese & crumbled bacon.
bf6be1f473.pred:
1. Begin by washing the spinach leaves thoroughly and tearing them into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the tuna, mayonnaise, hot pepper relish, and cheese. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
3. Add the baby spinach leaves to the bowl and toss gently to combine.
4. In a small bowl, mix the red onion and crumbled bacon.
5. Add the red onion mixture to the tuna mixture and toss again to combine.
6. Serve the Fresh Spinach Salad With Spicy Tuna immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

08647377e3.gt:
Soak the kiriboshi daikon in water and then squeeze it to remove the excess water.
If there is water in the canned soybeans, drain them well.
Julienne the carrots.
Cut the bacon into thin strips.
Heat the olive oil in a frying pan.
Add the ingredients and stir-fry.
Season with salt and black pepper.
All done.
My recipe for quiche, "Easy!
Kiriboshi Daikon Quiche with Homemade Crust" uses this as a filling!
08647377e3.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
2. Add the sliced bacon and cook until it is crispy and browned, about 5 minutes.
3. Remove the bacon from the skillet and set aside.
4. Add the sliced onion to the skillet and cook until it is softened, about 3 minutes.
5. Add the boiled soy beans and cook until they are heated through, about 2 minutes.
6. Add the cooked bacon back to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Add the bag of Kiriboshi daikon and cook until it is tender, about 5 minutes.
8. Season the stir-fry with black pepper and coarse salt to taste.
9. Serve the Kiriboshi Daikon & Olive Oil Stir-Fry over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

9fd2cdfff6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Toast almonds in oven for 10 minutes or until brown.
Dissolve coffee in 2 tablespoons hot water.
In a separate small mixing bowl mix flour, baking soda and salt.
Beat butter and sugar in an electric mixer at a medium speed until fluffy.
Pour coffee, vanilla and eggs into the butter mixture; mix well.
Reduce mixer's speed to low and slowly pour flour mixture into the butter mixture.
Fold chocolate chips and almonds into the dough.
Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet, 3 inches apart.
Bake for 10 minutes.
9fd2cdfff6.pred:
To cook Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the almonds and chocolate chips.
7. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit more hot water, 1 tablespoon at a time, until the dough comes together.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Coffee Chocolate Chip Cookies!

c833711642.gt:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, brown pork chops in olive oil.
In a small bowl, combine the cider, brown sugar, vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, mustard, and ginger.
Pour over the chops.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat medium or medium low heat; cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.
c833711642.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the salt, pepper, olive oil, and minced garlic.
3. Place the pork chops in a baking dish, and pour the marinade mixture over them.
4. Cover the dish with aluminum foil, and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the pork chops are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
5. Remove the foil, and brush the pork chops with the apple cider or juice.
6. Return the dish to the oven, and cook for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the pork chops are golden brown and crispy.
7. Remove the pork chops from the oven, and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
The cooking process involves several steps, including marinating the pork chops in a mixture of salt, pepper, olive oil, and minced garlic, baking them in the oven, brushing them with apple cider or juice, and finally, returning the dish to the oven for a crispy finish. The cooking time may vary depending on the thickness of the pork chops and the desired level of doneness.
<</SYS>>

83ee2dbe03.gt:
In a blender, puree the egg yolk with a pinch of salt.
With the machine on, slowly add the oil.
Scrape the mayonnaise into a bowl and whisk in the lemon juice and curry powder; refrigerate.
In a medium bowl, toss the tuna with the vegetable brunoise and chives.
Fold in 1/2 cup of the curry mayonnaise.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Brush a 4- or 6-ounce ramekin with oil.
Pack one fourth of the tartare in the ramekin and turn it out in the center of a plate.
Repeat with the remaining tartare.
Garnish the tops with the radish julienne and celery sprigs.
Decorate the plates with dots of the remaining curry mayonnaise and serve.
83ee2dbe03.pred:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the egg yolk, salt, and freshly ground pepper.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the canola oil, lemon juice, and Madras curry powder.
3. Add the sliced tuna to the bowl with the curry mixture and toss to coat the tuna evenly.
4. Add the celery and radish to the bowl and toss to combine.
5. Add the chives and toss again.
6. Season the tuna mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Preheat the oven to 200°F (93°C).
8. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
9. Transfer the tuna mixture to a pastry bag fitted with a large plain tip.
10. Pipe the tuna mixture onto the baking sheet, creating a thin layer.
11. Bake the tartare for 15-20 minutes, or until it is golden brown and cooked through.
12. Remove the tartare from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
13. Transfer the tartare to a serving plate and garnish with the julienned radish.

[/INST]

This recipe for Curried Tuna Tartare is a delicious and visually appealing dish that can be served as an appetizer or a light meal. The combination of the curry-flavored tuna, crunchy celery, and fresh chives creates a delightful contrast in textures and flavors. The presentation of the tartare on a baking sheet and the use of a pastry bag for piping the tuna mixture adds an element of elegance and sophistication to the dish.

99fb3f6889.gt:
Preheat the broiler to high.
Place the tomatillos and pepper on a baking sheet and broil for 5 minutes on each side until charred.
Add the roasted veggies with their juices into a food processor with the rest of the ingredients.
Pulse to combine then taste.
Adjust seasonings to your preference.
Serve as desired.
Enjoy!
99fb3f6889.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the rinsed tomatillos, serrano pepper, garlic, onion, and cilantro.
3. In a small bowl, mix the honey, olive oil, lime juice, and salt.
4. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a fork, mash the roasted vegetables to create a coarse salsa verde.
8. Serve the salsa verde immediately or let it cool completely before storing in an airtight container.

[/INST]

fec819225d.gt:
Bring the orange juice, soy sauce, chicken stock, and orange zest to a boil in a saucepan.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until the sauce has reduced to half of its original volume, about 30 minutes.
fec819225d.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
To make Orange-Soy Sauce Reduction, follow these steps:
1. In a small saucepan, combine the juice of 2 oranges and 1/2 cup of soy sauce.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened and reduced by half.
4. Stir in 1/2 cup of chicken broth and 1 teaspoon of grated orange zest.
5. Cook for another 5-10 minutes or until the sauce has thickened to your desired consistency.
6. Remove from heat and let the sauce cool slightly before serving.

Enjoy your Orange-Soy Sauce Reduction!

56bc2da383.gt:
Finely slice the leek, and mix with the ingredients.
Heat the sesame oil in a frying pan, and stir-fry the leek over high heat until it's wilted.
Add the combined flavoring ingredients and stir fry over low heat, being careful not to let it burn.
Add the bonito flakes, grated garlic and mix together.
Turn off the heat and add the ra-yu chili oil, and it's done!
(You may want to grind up the bonito flakes into a powder with your fingers while it's still in the packet.)
It goes so well with piping hot freshly cooked rice.
I can't stop eating!
It goes well with simmered daikon radish or pan-fried and steam-cooked daikon radish "steak" too.
It also goes well with pan fried tofu, boiled tofu, cold tofu, atsuage, dengaku (konnyaku with miso), and so many things.
It's also great as a dip for raw vegetables, and matches well with warm cooked vegetables too.
Please try this out in whatever combinations you can come up with.
Roll into tiny balls and freeze, to use as a filling for rice balls right away!
A Cookpad user called Yoshi-chan gave me this great idea!
If you don't have the green parts of the leeks, it's also delicious made with the white parts.
You may want to chop up and freeze the green parts and make this miso when you have enough.
56bc2da383.pred:
[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare All-purpose Green Leek and Miso Sauce, follow these steps:
1. Clean and chop the green parts of Japanese leeks into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a small bowl, mix the sugar, mirin, and sake.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the soy sauce, miso, sesame oil, and grated garlic to taste.
4. In a large pot or wok, heat the sesame oil over medium heat.
5. Add the chopped leeks and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
6. Pour the sugar, mirin, and sake mixture over the leeks and stir to combine.
7. Add the soy sauce, miso, and garlic mixture to the pot, stirring to combine.
8. If desired, add a small packet of Bonito flakes for added depth of flavor.
9. Cook the sauce over medium heat until it thickens slightly and reaches your desired consistency.
10. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.

The essential ingredients for this dish are 3 stalks' worth of green parts of Japanese leeks, sugar, mirin, sake, soy sauce, miso, sesame oil, grated garlic, and Bonito flakes (optional).
<</SYS>>

[/INST]

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.
625c3e8493.pred:
1. In a saucepan, combine the cherries, lemon juice, and cherry kirsch. Cook over medium heat until the cherries have softened and the mixture has thickened slightly.
2. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the vanilla extract.
3. Gradually add the unsweetened cocoa powder, stirring constantly to ensure that the cocoa does not clump.
4. Gradually add the granulated sugar, stirring to combine.
5. Return the saucepan to the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture has thickened to your desired consistency. This may take a few minutes, depending on the heat and the amount of sugar added.
6. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the butter. Allow the sauce to cool slightly before serving.

[/INST]

dfbfe8732e.gt:
Mix water and sugar in a saucepan.
Bring water to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, stirring regularly, until sugar is dissolved completely into a simple syrup, about 5 minutes.
Stir 6 tablespoons pumpkin pie filling, cinnamon sticks, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, vanilla extract, and pumpkin pie spice into the syrup.
Bring liquid again to a simmer and cook until the syrup is well-spiced, 8 to 10 minutes.
Strain the mixture through a sheet of cheesecloth.
Return liquid to the saucepan over low heat.
Stir sweetened condensed milk and remaining 2 tablespoons pumpkin pie filling into the spiced syrup and cook, stirring regularly, until the pumpkin dissolves into the liquid, about 5 minutes.
dfbfe8732e.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the water, sugar, and pumpkin pie filling. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
2. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the cinnamon sticks, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, vanilla extract, and pumpkin pie spice.
4. Gradually stir in the sweetened condensed milk, mixing until smooth.
5. Allow the syrup to cool for a few minutes, then pour it into an airtight container and refrigerate it until it reaches room temperature.
6. Once the syrup has cooled, it can be used as a topping for coffee, ice cream, or other desserts.

[/INST]

This Pumpkin Spice Coffee Syrup is a delicious and warm addition to your coffee, ice cream, or other desserts. The combination of pumpkin pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, cloves, vanilla, and sweetened condensed milk creates a rich and flavorful syrup that is perfect for the colder months. Enjoy!

3b5d73be72.gt:
Add butter and sugar into a bowl, and mix until the mixture becomes white (If it's hard to blend, add oil in small amounts).
Add egg and remaining vegetable oil, and mix some more.
Sift the ingredients.
Add milk and dry ingredients alternately in 2 batches to the bowl, and mix.
When the batter is ready, it's really smooth.
Pour the batter into muffin cups.
Bake in the oven for 25 ~ 30 minutes at 170C (340F).
It's done.
These are also great as presents.
3b5d73be72.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg, sugar, milk, and vegetable oil.
3. Add the cake flour, baking powder, and butter to the bowl, and mix until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
4. Fill the muffin cups in a muffin tin with batter, filling them about 3/4 full.
5. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
6. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Basic Plain Muffin!

e77203d622.gt:
Throw the ingredients in a blender and whizz until smooth.
Easy!
Great for a fast breakfast and packed full of fruit for a healthy start or snack
Using frozen fruit means there's no need to chill.
If you have leftovers, stir in some lemon juice to keep the colour nice.
It gives an added yogurty tang too
Makes 500mls/2 cups.
I classed it as 4 kid sized portions as I make it for Jack
e77203d622.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the slightly over ripe bananas, frozen chopped banana, and frozen fruit of your choice.
3. Add the rice or coconut milk, or fruit juice, and mix well.
4. Add the vanilla extract, agave nectar or liquid sweetener, and mix until well combined.
5. If the mixture is too thick, add a splash of water or additional fruit juice to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the bananas are tender and the mixture is slightly set.
7. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Add the slightly over ripe avocado to the mixture and stir well.
9. If the mixture is too thick, add a splash of water or additional fruit juice to achieve the desired consistency.
10. Serve the Avocado Yogurt, Gluten, Dairy, Egg & Soy-Free mixture immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours to allow the flavors to meld together.

[/INST]

This cooking procedure involves combining various ingredients to create a delicious and nutritious Avocado Yogurt, Gluten, Dairy, Egg & Soy-Free dish. The use of bananas and frozen fruit adds natural sweetness and a creamy texture, while the rice or coconut milk provides a source of carbohydrates and additional nutrients. The vanilla extract and agave nectar or liquid sweetener enhance the flavor, and the slightly over ripe avocado adds a unique taste and texture to the dish. The final product is a satisfying and healthy snack or dessert that can be enjoyed by those following a gluten-free, dairy-free, egg-free, and soy-free diet.

ffcb21a60b.gt:
In a pot combine vegetable broth and milk and bring to a boil.
turn off heat, stir in polenta and cook until thickened (abut 3-5 minutes).
Set aside to thicken further.
Clean, wash and peel the carrots.
Slice lenghtwise.
Heat butter in a skillet and add carrots.
Saute for some minutes, then add 5 tbs of water and cook covered on medium heat for another ten minutes until soft.
Season with sugar, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream or yoghurt, sage and half of the cheese to the polenta and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into a casserole dish (about 20X12 cm) and top with the carrots (I used their liquid too since it was full of flavour, but that way the casserole may get a bit soggy).
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in the preheated oven at 200C (~400F) for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes until polenta has set and can be sliced.
ffcb21a60b.pred:
To make a delicious Baked Polenta Carrot Casserole dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the vegetable broth, milk, and butter. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for about 10 minutes.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the polenta, sour cream or yoghurt, sugar, salt, and pepper.
4. Add the polenta mixture to the simmering liquid, stirring constantly to avoid lumps. Cook the mixture over medium heat for about 5 minutes, or until it thickens.
5. Add the grated cheese and sage leaves to the mixture, stirring until the cheese is melted and the sage is fragrant.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish, and smooth the top with a spatula.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the center is set.
8. Remove the casserole from the oven, let it cool for a few minutes, and then serve it warm.

This delicious Baked Polenta Carrot Casserole dish is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

c651774003.gt:
Wrap each banana slice with a piece of bacon.
Fry wrapped banana in a skillet until bacon is desired crispness, 15 to 30 minutes.
Remove wrapped bananas from skillet with a toothpick and place on a serving dish.
c651774003.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
3. Place the sliced bananas on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Place the sliced bacon on top of the bananas.
5. Drizzle the melted butter over the bacon and bananas.
6. Bake the bacon and bananas for 20-25 minutes, or until the bacon is crispy and the bananas are tender.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Carefully transfer the bacon and bananas to a serving plate.

[/SYS]

e1cc65aa99.gt:
Grease 9 x 13 inch pan.
Heat syrup, butter and morsels to boiling stirring constantly.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla.
Pour over cereal in bowl, toss until coated.
Fold in marshmallows 1 cup at a time.
Press into pan with buttered back of spoon.
Let stand 1 hour.
Cut into 2 inch squares.
Store at room temperature.
e1cc65aa99.pred:
To cook Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Golden Grahams cereal, marshmallows, and butter. Mix well until the cereal is evenly coated with the butter and marshmallows.
3. Press the mixture into a square or rectangular shape on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
4. Bake the Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the marshmallows are melted and slightly puffed.
5. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the squares cool for a few minutes. Then, use a spatula to transfer the squares to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares!

0349f80c73.gt:
Mix all ingredients (using a hand mixer will get the lumps out).
Chill.
Serve!
0349f80c73.pred:
1. Begin by preheating your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese and sour cream.
3. Add the thawed and drained spinach, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the vegetable soup mix, salt, and pepper, and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
5. If the dip is too thick, you can add a bit more sour cream or milk to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Transfer the dip to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the One More Spinach Dip! immediately, and enjoy with your favorite dipping items, such as pita chips, tortilla chips, or vegetables.

[/INST]

92f4b7b153.gt:
Combine eggs, salt, pepper, nutmeg and parsley.
Mix well Work in the flour and Chavrie by hand to form a smooth consistency Let rest for 10 minutes Meanwhile bring a large pot of salted water to a boil Using a spaetzle press drop dough in boiling water When spaetzle float they are cooked Remove spaetzle with a spider and shock them in cold water.
When chilled drain well To serve spaetzle saute in butter
Serving Suggestion: Serve spaetzle as a soup garnish heat in the microwave there is no need to saute
92f4b7b153.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, parsley leaves, nutmeg, and salt.
3. Gradually add the flour, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
4. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
5. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a knife.
6. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the spaetzle in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
8. While the spaetzle is baking, melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat.
9. Add the goat cheese Chavrie Pyramid to the melted butter and stir until the cheese is melted and the sauce is smooth.
10. Remove the spaetzle from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Add the melted goat cheese sauce to the spaetzle and toss to coat evenly.
12. Serve the spaetzle immediately, garnished with additional parsley leaves if desired.

[/INST]

723ad517a6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Mix sugar, margarine and eggs until blended.
Add water and bananas.
Beat 30 seconds.
Stir in the rest of the ingredients until just moistened.
Pour into greased 9 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 55-60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Remove from oven and let stand for 5 minutes.
Use a knife to loosen the loaf from the pan and remove loaf.
Finish cooling on a cooling rack.
723ad517a6.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, margarine, eggs, and mashed bananas.
3. Add the water, flour, baking soda, salt, and baking powder to the mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.
5. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
6. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
7. Once the bread is fully cooled, slice it and enjoy your delicious Mom's Banana Bread!

f31dd42e03.gt:
Turn crock pot on high while preparing ingredients.
In crock pot, mix together both packages of bearnaise sauce mix, wine, tarragon, turmeric and garlic powder until well blended.
Add shallots, ham, red pepper, potatoes artichokes and chicken.
Stir gently.
Cover, reduce heat setting to low and cook 6 hours.
f31dd42e03.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add shallots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes.
3. Add garlic powder, ground turmeric, and tarragon. Cook for another 1 minute, stirring constantly.
4. Add cooked ham, red bell pepper, and red potatoes. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
5. Add thawed frozen artichokes and chicken breast tenders. Cook until the chicken is cooked through and the artichokes are tender, about 15 minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the bearnaise sauce mix with the dry white wine. Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken and vegetables in the skillet.
7. Stir to combine, and cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the sauce is heated through.
8. Serve the Chicken New Orleans over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy!

a2b2813b98.gt:
Heat the olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium high heat.
Saute the onions, carrots and celery until they are softened and light golden brown, about 10 minutes.
Stir in the garlic for about 30 seconds, and then add in the ham and saute for a few minutes.
Pour in the chicken stock, beans and spices, stirring well and scraping up the browned bits off the bottom of the pot.
Before you add any salt, taste the broththe beans/ham/stock can be quite salty as it is!
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 2 hours or longer.
Remove the bay leaf and serve with lots of crusty bread!
a2b2813b98.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the chopped carrots, celery, and minced garlic. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
3. Pour in the chicken stock, and bring the mixture to a boil.
4. Add the diced ham, beans, and Cumin. Stir to combine.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 30-45 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the flavors have melded together.
6. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Chipotle Ham & Bean Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

[/INST]

3a699000d0.gt:
Cut bread into 1/2 - 3/4 inch cubes.
Rub serving dish with garlic and add bread cubes.
Mix cornstarch and brandy together.
Heat wine until it starts to boil.
The add grated cheeses, stirring constantly until the cheese has melted.
DO NOT BOIL.
Add the cornstarch mixture to the melted cheese, stirring until it is a cream consistency.
Add nutmeg and pepper.
Serve at once in fondue pot.
3a699000d0.pred:
[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Swiss Fondue, follow these steps:
1. In a saucepan, combine the grated Swiss and Gruyere cheeses, cornstarch, nutmeg, and pepper.
2. Gradually add the dry white wine, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the kirschwasser.
5. Serve the Swiss Fondue immediately, using a fondue pot or a large, heat-resistant bowl.
6. To enjoy the fondue, use a fondue fork to dip the bread into the melted cheese mixture.

The essential ingredients for Swiss Fondue are:
10 ounces Swiss cheese, grated
10 ounces Gruyere cheese, grated
15 ounces dry white wine
2 ounces kirschwasser (cherry brandy)
1 garlic clove
3 teaspoons cornstarch
14 teaspoon nutmeg
14 teaspoon pepper
French bread.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

c8dbf06636.gt:
Season chicken on both sides, pushing in seasoning.
Once seasoned get a fork or knife and tenderize by poking repeatedly.
Then cover meat place in fridge about 2 hours.
After 2 hours wash your potatoes cook in microwave 1 at a time for about 4 or 5 minutes until soft.
Set aside
Chop and wash broccoli add to boiling water steam to your liking 5 or 10 minutes.
Drain water add some butter season to your taste.
Add olive oil to pan heat on medium heat.
Once heated add 2 breast at a time cooking about 5 minutes on each side.
Once almost done cover with lid cook about 5 more minutes.
(Make sure the fire is not to high the key is to cook slow)
In a pot add some butter and seasoning and peeled potatoes to pot mash up potatoes add milk , cheese, and green onions.
Blend until cheese melts.
Lumps are ok.
Time to grub place on plate lick fingers yummm!
I only used paprika on chicken..
c8dbf06636.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breast with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder.
3. Heat the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the shredded cheddar cheese and cook until melted and bubbly.
6. Add the milk and bring to a simmer.
7. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook until tender, about 3-4 minutes.
8. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir to combine the cheese sauce and chicken.
9. Season with black pepper and garlic sea salt to taste.
10. Cut the potatoes into bite-sized pieces and toss them in a bowl with olive oil, paprika, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
11. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until golden and crispy.
12. Serve the chicken and cheesy potatoes over a bed of cooked broccoli. Enjoy!

[/INST]

[/INST]

3d70024e0a.gt:
Combine pancake mix, cinnamon and nutmeg in a bowl.
Add water and pumpkin mix and stir until smooth (add more water as necessary to make thinner pancakes).
Add raisins and stir (If you are making pumpkin faces, place raisins on moist batter as soon as you pour your batter on the griddle).
Spray griddle lightly with cooking spray.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake onto hot griddle
Turn pancakes when edges are cooked and small bubbles start to form.
Turn only once.
3d70024e0a.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pancake mix, water, and spices (cinnamon and nutmeg). Mix until well combined.
2. Add the raisins to the mixture and stir to combine.
3. Heat a nonstick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Spray the pan with nonstick cooking spray.
4. Pour a small amount of the pancake batter onto the pan, creating a circular shape. Cook for about 2-3 minutes, or until the edges start to curl and the pancake is slightly golden.
5. Flip the pancake and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the pancake is cooked through and the edges are crispy.
6. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more spray as needed to keep the pancakes from sticking.
7. Serve the pancakes warm, topped with butter and syrup, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pumpkin Pancakes!

6b1de00aa7.gt:
Boil rigatoni according to package directions.
While pasta is cooking, mix ricotta, egg, garlic powder, Italian seasoning, and red pepper for the minicotti filling.
Season with salt.
You could add minced, sauteed mushrooms or chopped spinach here if you wish.
I season the filling a bit more than I would a normal manicotti; you want this one little bite to have some punch.
When rigatoni is al dente, drain and place pasta in cool water to stay soft while you work.
Place filling in an icing bag with a small tip, or a smaller plastic bag with a tiny corner nipped off will work just fine.
Pipe filling into rigatoni.
I like to fill the pasta halfway from one side and halfway from the other.
Place filled minicotti in a baking dish lightly sprayed with cooking spray.
Top minicotti lightly with pasta sauce.
Sprinkle lightly with Parmesan.
Bake at 350 F for 15-20 minutes.
Let sit at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving.
Enjoy!
6b1de00aa7.pred:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the rigatoni pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.

2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the sauce. In a saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.

3. Add the red pepper flakes and Italian seasoning, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.

4. Pour in the jar of pasta sauce and stir to combine. Bring the sauce to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

5. While the sauce is cooking, prepare the ricotta cheese mixture. In a small bowl, mix the ricotta cheese, egg, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

6. Once the pasta sauce has cooked for 10-15 minutes, add the cooked rigatoni to the saucepan. Stir to combine, then cover the saucepan and let it cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the pasta is fully coated with the sauce and heated through.

7. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

8. Serve the Minicotti immediately, garnished with fresh parsley if desired. Enjoy your delicious Minicotti!

43ba871465.gt:
Cream margarine and sugar.
Add egg, beat thoroughly.
Add molasses and blend.
In another bowl mix dry ingredients, then add to wet ingredients.
Mix to combine.
Roll into small balls (3/4" - 1").
Coat balls in sugar, place on cookie sheet 2 inches apart, bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes.
Yield is approximate, depending on size.
Time to make about 10 minutes to prepare dough, and I estimated 10 minutes to roll into balls and coat with sugar.
43ba871465.pred:
To make Gingersnaps, first preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). In a large bowl, cream the white sugar and margarine until smooth. Add the egg and molasses, and mix well. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ground ginger, and ground cloves. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until a dough forms.

Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm). Cut the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a knife. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy your delicious Gingersnaps!

e0704be51f.gt: Add all ingredients together and blend until combined
e0704be51f.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 2 cups of cherries, pitted, 1 banana, peeled, 1 cup of yogurt, and 1 cup of ice.
2. Add 1 tablespoon of honey to the blender, and blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

[/INST]

This Cherry Banana Smoothie is a delicious and refreshing treat that combines the natural sweetness of cherries and bananas with the creaminess of yogurt and the coolness of ice. The honey adds a touch of natural sweetness and a hint of flavor to the smoothie. This recipe is perfect for a hot summer day or as a healthy snack.

f87c45ee62.gt:
Place margarine, marshmallow creme and vanilla in small bowl; beat on medium speed until well blended.
Gradually add sugar, beating after each addition until well blended.
Blend in 1 Tbsp.
of the milk.
Add remaining 1 Tbsp.
milk if necessary for desired spreading consistency.
f87c45ee62.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened margarine or butter and the vanilla extract.
3. Add the powdered sugar, and mix until smooth and creamy.
4. Gradually add the milk, one tablespoon at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. If the frosting is too thick, add a bit more milk. If it's too thin, add a bit more powdered sugar.
6. Once the frosting reaches your desired consistency, transfer it to a piping bag or a plastic bag with a small hole cut in the corner.
7. Pipe the frosting onto your desired baked goods, such as cupcakes, cookies, or cakes.
8. If desired, you can also add a sprinkle of crushed graham crackers or mini marshmallows on top for extra flavor and texture.

Enjoy your delicious Marshmallow Creme Frosting!

68fd9e5935.gt:
In a large resealable bag, toss pork meat with the taco seasoning mix until coated.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Fry the seasoned pork in the hot oil, stirring occasionally until pork is no longer pink.
Stir the beans, salsa and apricot preserves into the skillet with the pork.
Reduce heat to low, and simmer until heated through, about 10 minutes.
Spoon 1/3 cup of the pork mixture into each taco shell, and top with sliced olives.
68fd9e5935.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To prepare the Cowboy Tacos, follow these steps:
1. In a large skillet or pan, cook the pork stew meat over medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
2. Add the taco seasoning mix to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.
3. Add the vegetable oil, salsa, chili beans, and apricot preserves to the skillet. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Serve the Cowboy Tacos in the taco shells, topped with sliced ripe olives.

Enjoy your delicious Cowboy Tacos!

3da31e6530.gt:
Preheat oven to 275.
Mash bananas in a small bowl add lemon juice and set aside
Sift together flour, salt and baking soda in medium sized bowl set aside
In large bowl cream butter and sugars until completely combined
Add eggs 1 at a time beating well each time, stir in vanilla
Alternately add flour mixtire and buttermilk when combined stir in banana mixture.
Pour batter into 13x9 greased pan bake for 1 hour or until toothpick comes out clean
Cool cake completely
For the frosting cream together cream cheese and butter beat in sugar and vanilla frost cake and garnish with nuts.
3da31e6530.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To make the Delicious Banana cake:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the eggs, buttermilk, vanilla extract, and mashed bananas.
4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/INST]

[INST]To make the cream cheese frosting:
1. In a large mixing bowl, beat the softened cream cheese and butter until smooth and creamy.
2. Gradually add the powdered sugar, vanilla extract, and lemon juice, beating until well combined.
3. If the frosting is too thick, add a bit more milk or butter to achieve the desired consistency.
4. Spread the frosting over the cooled cake and garnish with chopped walnuts if desired.

[/INST]

[/INST]

[INST]This Delicious Banana cake is a moist and flavorful dessert that is perfect for special occasions or simply enjoying with family and friends. The cream cheese frosting adds a rich and tangy touch, making it a delightful treat for all to enjoy.

c813791325.gt:
In a food processor, combine the garlic and cucumber and process until finely minced.
Add the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill and salt and pepper to taste.
Process until well blended, then transfer to a bowl.
Taste to adjust the seasonings if needed.
Cover and refrigerate until needed (recipe yields 1 cup).
c813791325.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the crushed garlic, sliced cucumber, vegan yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, mint, salt, and pepper.
3. Add the eggplant slices to the bowl and toss to coat evenly.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Spread the eggplant slices evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
6. Drizzle the almond milk mixture over the eggplant slices.
7. Sprinkle the ground flaxseed mixture, bread crumbs, nutritional yeast, oregano, basil, smoked paprika, and tzatziki sauce over the eggplant slices.
8. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the eggplant slices are tender and golden brown.
9. Serve the Vegan Snacktime: Baked Eggplant Fries immediately, and enjoy!

1d78b03064.gt:
If using dried chickpeas, soak in plenty of water for 6-24 hours.
Drain, cook in plenty water for about 1 1/2 hour.
Drain and proceed as follows.
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease baking sheet with the oil.
Mix salt pepper and chili powder (or whatever spices you want to use) in a big plastic bag.
Add chickpeas and shake until coated.
Place chickpeas on baking sheet.
Bake for about 30 minutes, or until golden and crisp.
1d78b03064.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chickpeas, olive oil, salt, pepper, and chili powder. Mix well to ensure the chickpeas are evenly coated.
3. Spread the chickpeas out on a baking sheet or a roasting pan. Roast the chickpeas in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. After 20-25 minutes, remove the chickpeas from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
5. Once the chickpeas are cool enough to handle, transfer them to a serving bowl.
6. Serve the Roasted Chickpeas immediately, or store them in an airtight container for later use.

[/INST]

d7f427bc2d.gt:
Combine peanut butter, graham crackers, powdered sugar and butter.
Press into 9 x 13 inch pan.
Melt chocolate chips and spread over peanut butter mixture.
Allow to harden.
(Cut while still soft or layers will separate.)
d7f427bc2d.pred:
1. Crush the graham crackers using a rolling pin or food processor.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, peanut butter, and confectioners' sugar. Mix until smooth and creamy.
3. Add the crushed graham crackers to the mixture, and mix until well combined.
4. Spread the mixture evenly onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 30 minutes to allow it to set.
6. Melt the semisweet chocolate chips in a double boiler or in a heat-resistant bowl set over a pot of simmering water.
7. Remove the mixture from the refrigerator, and use a spatula to spread the melted chocolate evenly over the peanut butter mixture.
8. Return the mixture to the refrigerator for another 30 minutes to allow the chocolate to set.
9. Once the chocolate is set, use a sharp knife or a pizza cutter to cut the mixture into desired shapes.
10. Store the Pan Peanut Butter Cups in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.

[/INST]

9c5602c4ae.gt:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix next 3 ingredients; mix well.
Pour over salad and toss well.
Chill.
9c5602c4ae.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the broccoli and cauliflower florets into bite-sized pieces.
3. Cook the bacon in the oven until crispy, then crumble it.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked and crumbled bacon, diced tomatoes, minced onion, and hard-boiled eggs.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the mayonnaise, sugar, and cider vinegar until well combined.
6. Add the mayonnaise mixture to the bowl with the vegetables and bacon, and mix well.
7. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
9. Serve the Delicious Broccoli Cauliflower Salad chilled or at room temperature.

This flavorful Delicious Broccoli Cauliflower Salad is a delicious and nutritious side dish that can be enjoyed at any meal. The combination of crispy bacon, fresh vegetables, and tangy dressing creates a delightful balance of flavors that will surely impress your taste buds.

74d3b41960.gt:
Use both hands to massage the Honey Vinegar Miso Chicken Breasts to soften the muscle fibers.
Break it up into large pieces.
Salt the cucumber and roll on a cutting board.
Lightly wash, then use a spatula to smash while breaking it apart with your hands.
Add Step 1 (together with the miso) and Step 2 to a bowl, and mix together with Japanese mustard if you like.
74d3b41960.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and Japanese mustard.
3. In a small bowl, mix the honey vinegar miso sauce.
4. Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish and pour the honey vinegar miso sauce over them.
5. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. While the chicken is cooking, peel and slice the cucumber into bite-sized pieces.
7. In a small bowl, mix the honey vinegar miso sauce.
8. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
9. Slice the chicken into thin pieces and serve it on a plate.
10. Place the cucumber slices on a separate plate.
11. Serve the chicken on a plate alongside the cucumber slices.

[/INST]

1f380be1bd.gt:
Put chocolate in small bowl.
Microwave for 35 seconds.
The chips will still look whole, DO NOT MICROWAVE ANY LONGER!
IT WILL BURN, instead stir for 20 seconds and all lumps will be smooth.
Lay out a piece of foil.
Dip pretzels with fingers in chocolate scrape off excess and lay on foil.
Wait 30 minutes to cool (Better if not put in fridge or freezer, they melt when they come out).
1f380be1bd.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the 12 cup milk chocolate chips and 2 cups of vegetable oil.
3. Microwave the chocolate and oil mixture for 2 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds, until the chocolate is melted and smooth.
4. Dip each pretzel twist into the chocolate mixture, covering it evenly.
5. Place the chocolate-covered pretzels on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Refrigerate the chocolate-covered pretzels for 10-15 minutes to allow the chocolate to set.
7. Once the chocolate is set, remove the pretzels from the refrigerator and let them sit at room temperature for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Super Simple Chocolate Covered Pretzels!

37568c51b9.gt:
Toast the sesame seeds in a frying pan over medium heat until brown, let them cool.
Cut the beef in thin slices.
Mix all marinade ingredients together, add also the sesame seeds, and to this add the beef.
Leave to marinate at least 30 minutes, a few hours is preferred.
Thread the meat on wooden skewers, grill or barbecue a few minutes on each side, using the remaining marinade for basting.
37568c51b9.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. Cut the beef into thin strips, and marinate them in a mixture of soy sauce, dry sherry, sugar, and crushed red pepper flakes. Allow the beef to marinate for at least 30 minutes.
3. In a small bowl, mix the toasted sesame seeds and crushed garlic.
4. Thread the beef strips onto skewers, alternating with the sesame seed and garlic mixture.
5. Heat the grill or grill pan, and cook the skewers for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until the beef is cooked through and the sesame seeds are golden brown.
6. Serve the Korean Grilled Meat on Skewers (Bulgogi) immediately.

[/INST]

db15adcf9f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Cut tops off of heads of garlic in a straight line across.
Rub extra virgin olive oil all over heads; wrap loosely in foil and place on a baking sheet.
Roast garlic at 400 degrees F until caramelized and soft, approximately 30-35 minutes.
Leave oven at 400 degrees F and line large baking sheet with nonstick foil for easy cleanup.
In a large bowl, add ground turkey breast, chopped baby spinach, chopped fresh parsley, beaten egg, melted palm shortening (or olive oil), salt, pepper, and carefully squeeze roasted garlic heads to release the roasted garlic into the bowl.
With your hands, mix everything together well until all ingredients are incorporated evenly.
Roll balls by hand in uniform sizes to ensure even cooking in the batch.
Place on nonstick foil-lined (or parchment paper) baking sheet.
Bake at 400 degrees F for about 25-30 minutes or until thoroughly cooked.
db15adcf9f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground turkey breast, chopped baby spinach, and finely chopped parsley. Season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and organic palm shortening or more olive oil. Add the seasoned turkey mixture to the egg mixture, and gently mix until well combined.
4. Form the mixture into small meatballs, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are cooked through and golden brown.
6. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the roasted garlic. Peel the garlic cloves, and place them in a small bowl. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Roast the garlic in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is soft and fragrant.
7. Once the meatballs are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. To assemble the Spinach & Roasted Garlic Meatballs, place the cooked meatballs on a serving platter. Drizzle with the roasted garlic oil, and sprinkle with chopped parsley. Serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Spinach & Roasted Garlic Meatballs!

87f97ac544.gt:
Preheat oven to 350A.
Slice ham in half.
If using slices of cheese, cut in quarters.
Roll desired amount of ham and cheese up in each biscuit.
Use toothpick to hold in place.
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Feel free to stuff these with almost anything!
Little smokies sausages with cheese and a tsp of chili; slices of pepperoni with mozzarella and a tsp of pizza sauce or marinara, etc.
87f97ac544.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a bowl, mix together the biscuits, melted butter, and a pinch of salt. Press the biscuit mixture into a flat, even layer on a baking sheet.
3. Spread the mixture evenly across the baking sheet, making sure not to overcrowd it.
4. Bake the biscuit mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it is golden brown and set.
5. While the biscuits are baking, prepare the ham and cheese for the roll ups.
6. Slice the ham thinly, and place it on top of the biscuits.
7. Spread the slices of cheese on top of the ham.
8. Roll the biscuits up, starting from the long side, and place them on a baking sheet.
9. Bake the roll ups in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Remove the roll ups from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

9980565108.gt:
Wash fruit and discard any skin (from peaches or the like).
Cut fruit into pieces no larger than 1 inch each.
In a large heavy-duty saucepan add the sugar and stir over medium heat while the sugar melts and the fruit softens.
Cook, stirring constantly until the jam thickens.
this may take an hour or more.
Cool, then spoon into very clean jars, cover with clean lids and refrigerate up to 3 weeks.
9980565108.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Refrigerator Jam, follow these steps:
1. Wash and chop the fruit into small pieces.
2. Place the chopped fruit in a large pot or a large bowl.
3. Add 4 cups of sugar to the fruit.
4. Stir the fruit and sugar mixture until the sugar is fully dissolved.
5. Place the pot or bowl in the refrigerator to chill for at least 4 hours or overnight.
6. After chilling, remove the mixture from the refrigerator and stir it well.
7. Return the mixture to the refrigerator and let it chill for another 4 hours or overnight.
8. After chilling, remove the mixture from the refrigerator and stir it well.
9. If the mixture is too thick, add a bit more water or fruit juice to achieve the desired consistency.
10. Store the Refrigerator Jam in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

The required ingredients for preparing Refrigerator Jam are 4 lbs fruit and 4 cups of sugar.

c4ca98c041.gt:
In medium sized bowl, combine the cream cheese, picante sauce and pecans; blending well.
Take one slice of ham and spread a light layer of the cream cheese mixture onto the ham slice.
Beginning at one of the short ends, place a pickle and roll up tightly.
Once you get to the other end, place toothpicks in approximately 1/2 inch spaces.
I use 5 toothpicks per rollup.
Slice between toothpicks resulting in bite sized rollup.
Refrigerate until time to serve.
c4ca98c041.pred:
To prepare a delicious Pickles in a Blanket dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the rectangular sliced ham, cream cheese, and softened to room temperature. Mix well until the cream cheese is fully incorporated into the ham mixture.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the picante sauce and chopped pecans.
4. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm). Cut out circles of dough using a cookie cutter or a round object, such as a glass.
5. Place a spoonful of the ham mixture in the center of each dough circle.
6. Fold the dough over the filling, pressing the edges together to seal the dough.
7. Place the dough-filled circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the Pickles in a Blankets in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the dough is golden brown.
9. Remove the baked Pickles in a Blankets from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the Pickles in a Blankets warm, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

The Pickles in a Blanket dish is a delightful twist on traditional sandwiches, offering a unique and satisfying experience. The combination of the soft, creamy ham, tangy pickles, and crunchy pecans creates a delightful contrast of flavors and textures that make this dish a delightful treat.

e827f8e8c3.gt:
In a medium bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy and cornstarch.
Whisk to blend well, and add the chicken to the sauce.
Toss to evenly coat the chicken and set aside for 15 to 20 minutes.
In a medium bowl, combine the ketchup, stock, chili garlic sauce and sugar.
Stir to combine and set aside until ready to use.
Place a wok over high heat and add the vegetable oil to the pan.
Swirl the wok to be sure to coat well with the oil.
Add the ginger, garlic, green onions, dried chilies and jalapenos to the wok.
Cook, stirring often until the garlic is fragrant and the chilies begin to brown, about 20 to 30 seconds.
Add the chicken, bell peppers and onions to the pan and stir-fry until the chicken is no longer pink, about 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the sauce to the pan and bring to a boil, being sure to toss well in order to coat all the chicken and vegetables evenly, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Sprinkle the sesame seeds, sesame oil and cilantro into the pan and toss to combine.
Remove from the heat and serve on a platter with steamed white rice.
e827f8e8c3.pred:
To prepare Sichuan Pepper Chicken, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, dark soy sauce, cornstarch, and sugar. Mix well.
2. Add the diced chicken breasts to the bowl and toss to coat evenly with the sauce mixture. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
3. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the ginger, garlic, and green onions, and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
4. Add the chili-garlic sauce and cook for 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
5. Add the chicken and cook until it is fully cooked through and the sauce has thickened, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the ketchup, chicken broth, and red bell pepper to the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes, until the vegetables are tender.
7. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
8. In a small bowl, mix the toasted sesame seeds and sesame oil.
9. Add the toasted sesame seeds mixture to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until the sauce has thickened slightly.
10. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.
11. Serve the Sichuan Pepper Chicken over rice or noodles, garnished with fresh cilantro.

Enjoy your delicious Sichuan Pepper Chicken!

09c7610724.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with Reynolds Parchment Paper and set aside.
Whisk together flour, kosher salt, baking powder and baking soda; set aside.
Mix butter, light brown sugar and granulated sugar together with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla and beat.
Slowly add flour mixture, mixing gently until incorporated.
Fold in caramel filled chocolate candies and chocolate chips.
Roll 2 tablespoons of dough into a ball, covering any candies with dough so they are not exposed.
Place dough balls on parchment lined baking sheets.
Bake cookies for 1012 minutes.
Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes and transfer parchment paper with cookies onto wire racks to cool completely.
Drizzle cooled cookies with melted chocolate and sprinkle with sea salt.
Chill cookies until chocolate sets.
09c7610724.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and both sugars until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and baking powder.
5. Gradually add the flour mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
6. Stir in the dark chocolate chips and mini caramel filled chocolate candies.
7. Fold in the sea salt.
8. Spread the dough onto a piece of Reynolds Parchment Paper, creating a 1/4-inch thick layer.
9. Roll the dough into a log, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
10. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
11. Cut the chilled dough into 1-inch slices.
12. Place the slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
13. Bake for 12-14 minutes, or until the edges are set and the centers are still slightly soft.
14. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

These Salted Caramel Chocolate Chip Cookies are a delicious treat that combines the rich flavors of dark chocolate, caramel, and sea salt. The combination of ingredients creates a perfect balance of sweetness and saltiness, making them a popular choice for dessert or snacking.

8132be5a91.gt:
Heat 4 tablespoons of the oil in a large heavy-bottom soup pan.
Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the drained chickpeas, water, cumin and coriander.
Bring to boiling, then reduce heat and simmer for 2 1/2 hours or until tender.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a separate pan.
Add the vegetables, cover and cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes.
Stir the vegetable mixture into the chickpeas.
Transfer half the soup to a food processor or blender and process until smooth.
Return the puree to the pan, then add half the lemon juice.
Taste and adjust lemon juice.
Season with S&P.
Heat through.
Ladle into warm bowls and sprinkle with the chopped fresh cilantro and garnish with cilantro sprigs.
8132be5a91.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant but not browned.
3. Add the chickpeas, water, cumin, ground coriander, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the chickpeas are tender.
5. Add the carrots, onions, and celery to the pot, and continue to simmer for another 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
6. Remove the pot from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes.
7. Stir in the lemon juice and chopped cilantro. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with additional chopped cilantro.

[/INST]

60d7ee5f76.gt:
Cover beans with cold water, cover pot and bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 3 hours, adding water as needed.
In a skillet, slowly brown ground beef.
When crumbly, add onion and saute until limp.
Add to beans along with rest of ingredients except the salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer for three hours or until beans are tender and liquid is somewhat thickened.
Add salt and pepper and serve.
60d7ee5f76.pred:
1. Rinse the pinto beans and pick out any debris.
2. In a large pot, combine the beans, red chili sauce, vinegar, chili powder, and onions.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour or until the beans are tender.
4. Add the ground chuck and tomatoes stewed. Simmer for an additional 30 minutes or until the meat is cooked through.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the chili beans over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

3fcf600832.gt:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.
In a small bowl, add balsamic vinegar, brown sugar and chicken broth; mix well, set aside.
Rinse pork and pat dry and season with salt and pepper.
In an oven proof skillet, add olive oil and pork.
Sear pork until all sides are seared and lightly brown, about 10 minutes.
Remove pork from pan.
In the same pan over medium low heat, add the balsamic vinegar mixture and stir to loosen up all the brown bits from bottom of pan.
Stir and cook until it resembles a glaze.
Place pork back in pan and turn to coat until all sides are covered with balsamic mixture.
Place in the oven and roast for 25 minutes or until pork is no longer pink.
When pork is done, remove from pan and cover for about 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a skillet, add butter and pears and cook over medium low heat until pears are tender, about 10 minutes.
Just before you take the pears off the stove, add a splash of Stella Artois Cidre and mix well.
Cut pork into 4 equal sizes.
Place 1/2 cup of sweet mashed potatoes on each plate, place the pork over the sweet potatoes, and lay pears over pork.
Sprinkle with goat cheese.
3fcf600832.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove the pork from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the diced pears and cook until they are tender, about 5 minutes.
6. Add the sweet potatoes to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 10-12 minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, and chicken broth. Pour the mixture over the pork and pear mixture in the skillet.
8. Return the pork to the skillet and cook until the pears are tender and the pork is cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
9. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the Pork Tenderloin with Sauteed Pears and Sweet Potatoes over a bed of mashed sweet potatoes.

[/INST]

865f667783.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Mix together ground beef, chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar, onion powder, and garlic powder thoroughly in a large bowl.
Form the mixture into 2 tablespoon-sized balls, and place onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes.
