Stir together the apricot preserves and the cider vinegar, toss with meatballs in a clean bowl, then return to baking sheet, and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
865f667783.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, water chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar, onion powder, garlic powder, and apricot preserves or jam. Mix well.
3. Shape the beef mixture into small meatballs, about 1 inch in diameter.
4. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).
6. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the sauce by combining the apple cider vinegar, soy sauce, and brown sugar in a small saucepan. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
7. Once the meatballs are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes.
8. Then, carefully pour the hot sauce mixture over the meatballs, allowing the sauce to coat them evenly.
9. Serve the Hawaiian-Style Meatballs warm, garnished with fresh chopped green onions if desired.

[/INST]

13a6ba0924.gt:
In a medium-sized pot, place dessicated coconut and water.
Mix and allow to soak for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, turn heat onto low and bring to a gentle simmer.
Simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Turn off heat and leave pot on element for 1/2 an hour.
After 1/2 an hour, transfer coconut mixture to blender or processor and process for 45 seconds.
Put a large sieve over a bowl and empty coconut mixture into it.
Press down hard on coconut solids with the back of a spoon to remove as much coconut milk as possible.
This method produces approximately 2 cups of coconut milk.
Can be made up to 2 days before use in a recipe and refrigerated, covered.
The milk will separate in the fridge, forming a creamy fat layer on top, and a thinner liquid layer underneath.
Not to worry, the fat layer will melt into the liquid when heated and form a lovely milk.
13a6ba0924.pred:
To make a delicious Make Your Own Coconut Milk dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine 8 ounces of desiccated coconut and 3 cups of water.
2. Mix the coconut and water thoroughly to ensure that the coconut is evenly distributed and the water is absorbed.
3. Cover the bowl and let it sit at room temperature for about 24 hours.
4. After 24 hours, check the mixture. If the coconut is still dry, you may need to add more water to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Once the coconut is fully hydrated and the mixture is smooth, you can use the coconut milk as a base for various dishes.
6. You can add spices, herbs, or other ingredients to enhance the flavor of the coconut milk.
7. Use the coconut milk as a base for curries, soups, or other dishes that call for coconut milk.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious Make Your Own Coconut Milk dish that is both nutritious and flavorful.

42ab84ef73.gt:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Thaw pastry according to directions on box (about 40 minutes).
Cut pastry into 3 sections along perforated lines.
Lay one section of pastry on a baking sheet to assemble.
Spread 2 tablespoons of pesto onto the pastry.
Next, space 5 shrimp evenly on top of the pesto.
Sprinkle with slivers of sundried tomatoes and pine nuts.
Using your fingers, fold over the sides of the pastry so they meet in the middle, and pinch to form a seal (although it will open while baking).
Bake one roll at a time, at 450 degrees F for 5 minutes, then lower oven heat to 375 degrees F and cook an additional 5-8 minutes until pastry is brown and puffed.
Repeat assembly and baking process with remaining two pastry sheets.
Slice each roll into five pieces (one shrimp in each piece) and serve warm.
Makes 15 appetizers.
42ab84ef73.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Roll out the puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
3. Cut the puff pastry into 6 equal squares.
4. In a small bowl, mix the pesto and sun-dried tomato slivers.
5. In a separate small bowl, mix the pine nuts and a pinch of salt.
6. Place one square of puff pastry on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Spread a thin layer of pesto mixture on the pastry square, leaving a small border around the edges.
8. Top the pesto with a layer of shrimp or prawns, leaving a small border around the edges.
9. Sprinkle the pine nuts evenly over the shrimp or prawns.
10. Roll out the remaining puff pastry squares and place them on top of the shrimp or prawns.
11. Brush the edges of the pastry with water and press the edges together to seal the filling.
12. Bake the pastry for 20-25 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
13. Serve immediately.

[/INST]

This recipe provides a delicious and visually appealing dish that combines the flavors of the pesto, sun-dried tomatoes, and pine nuts with the sweetness of the shrimp or prawns. The puff pastry adds a delightful texture and a satisfying crunch to the dish.

6a0d7996ca.gt:
Pour milk into pint-size glass jar, and stir in kefir grains.
Cover jar with several layers of cheesecloth or paper towels, and secure with rubber band.
Store jar at room temperature out of direct sunlight and allow kefir to ferment until thickened.
(Healthy kefir grains will thicken milk in 24 hours, though this process may take as few as 12 hours in warmer temperatures, or as long as 48 hours in cooler temperatures.)
Check kefir periodically to gauge thickness.
When mixture reaches desired thickness, strain kefir into glass, stirring gently until only kefir grains remain in strainer.
(To keep kefir grains viable, stir into new batch of milk within 48 hours.)
Combine prepared kefir, orange juice, vanilla, and sugar in blender.
Pulse to combine.
Blend in ice cubes individually until as creamy and frothy as you like.
Taste, and blend in more sugar to sweeten as desired.
6a0d7996ca.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the milk, milk kefir grains, and sugar. Whisk until the sugar is fully dissolved.
2. Add the fresh orange juice and whisk until smooth.
3. Pour the mixture into a blender and add the ice cubes. Blend until smooth and creamy.
4. Taste the mixture and adjust the sweetness if needed.
5. Pour the Kefir Orange Julius into glasses and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Kefir Orange Julius!

3982f4b2bb.gt:
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Grill steak 5 min.
on each side or until done (160F).
Transfer to cutting board; let stand 5 min.
Meanwhile, toss lettuce with onions and croutons.
Add dressing; mix lightly.
Place on 4 serving plates.
Cut steak into thin slices; place over salads.
Sprinkle with cheese.
3982f4b2bb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the beef steak with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. Heat a skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and cook the steak for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
4. Remove the steak from the pan and let it rest for a few minutes.
5. While the steak is resting, prepare the salad. In a large bowl, combine the torn romaine lettuce, thinly sliced red onions, and croutons.
6. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Classic Caesar Dressing and KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Italian Three Cheese Blend.
7. Once the steak is rested, slice it thinly and evenly.
8. Add the steak slices to the salad, tossing gently to combine.
9. Drizzle the Caesar dressing mixture over the salad, tossing again to fully coat the ingredients.
10. Serve the Steak Caesar Salad immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

15565646e5.gt:
Sift all the ingredients together.
Wrap the lid with a kitchen towel, and start boiling water in the steamer.
Cut up the cranberries into small pieces.
In a bowl whisk the egg yolk, and add the vegetable oil, milk, sugar and strawberry sauce, in that order, and mix each time you add an ingredient.
Add the sifted dry ingredients to the bowl.
Add the cranberries and fold into the batter with a spatula.
The batter should be somewhat sticky and thick.
Place cupcake linings into silicone muffin molds and spoon in the batter 70% full.
Align the molds in the steamer and steam for 12 minutes over high heat, and the buns are done.
If you're not going to eat the buns right away, place them in a plastic bag while they are still slightly warm.
This is to prevent them from hardening.
15565646e5.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk the egg yolk, vegetable oil, milk, and sugar until well combined.
2. Add the cake flour, baking powder, and cranberries (if using) to the mixture, and stir until a smooth dough forms.
3. Preheat your steamer or a steamer basket over a pot of boiling water.
4. On a floured surface, roll out the dough into a large circle or a small bun shape, depending on your preference.
5. Place the rolled dough on a steamer or a steamer basket, and steam for approximately 15-20 minutes, or until the buns are cooked through and the dough is slightly golden.
6. Remove the buns from the steamer, and let them cool for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the buns are cooled, spread a generous amount of strawberry sauce on top of each bun.
8. Serve the Blooming Flowers Strawberry Steamed Buns immediately, and enjoy the delicious and visually appealing dessert.

[/INST]

0039c547a7.gt:
Firstly cook some rice.
Dice the onion and garlic into small pieces.
Chop all other vegetables and chicken into about 2cm cubes.
Soak the chopped eggplant in a bowl of water for a while.
Put olive oil into a pot and brown the garlic and onion.
Then add in the chicken and saute until it turns color.
Add other vegetables and saute well.
Put in the curry powder, cinnamon powder, bay leaf and salt once all food has cooked through.
Add one cup of water into the pot and cook for about 10 min on medium heat.
When it starts to boil, turn to low heat and keep cooking for about 15 min with the lid on, stirring occasionally.
Finally, pour in the coconut milk while mixing gently.
Add more seasoning if needed.
Serve the curry on the cooked rice, and add mint leaves for a nice finishing touch.
Enjoy.
0039c547a7.pred:
1. Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat.
2. Add the onion and sauté until soft and translucent.
3. Add the garlic and sauté for a few seconds until fragrant.
4. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
5. Add the eggplant and carrot to the pan, stirring to combine.
6. Add the pumpkin/kabocha squash and sauté until the vegetables are tender.
7. Add the curry powder, cinnamon powder, bay leaf, and salt to the pan. Stir to combine.
8. Pour in the coconut milk and bring the mixture to a simmer.
9. Reduce the heat to low and let the curry simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
10. Remove the bay leaf and serve the Coconut Milk Curry over rice or with your preferred side dish.

[/INST]

8a7f317318.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F. Spray a 9-inch glass pie plate with cooking spray or use a silicon pie plate.
In a 10-inch skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat.
Stir occasionally.
Drain.
Add salt, garlic powder and Cajun seasoning.
Spread in pie plate.
Sprinkle with cheese.
In a small bowl stir the Original Bisquick mix, milk, and eggs with a wire wish until blended.
Pour into pie plate.
Bake about 20-25 minutes or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean.
You can add to your slice ketchup, BBQ sauce, bacon or anything else you would normally top your cheeseburger with.
8a7f317318.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onion and cook until it is softened and translucent.
4. In a bowl, mix the shredded cheddar cheese, Original Bisquick mix, and milk. Season with salt and garlic powder.
5. Spray a 9-inch (23cm) pie dish with cooking spray.
6. Pour the cheese mixture into the pie dish, spreading it evenly.
7. Add the cooked ground beef and onion mixture on top of the cheese.
8. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs. Pour the egg mixture over the ground beef and onion mixture.
9. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
10. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheeseburger Pie!

b372aab674.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bring 3/4 cup of water to boil and add the raisins.
When the water returns to a boil turn off the heat.
Let the raisins plump for at least 10 minutes.
Drain the raisins well, then chop them coarsely.
Toast the sesame seeds by stirring them with a wooden spoon in a heavy saute pan over medium heat.
Saute until the seeds begin to crackle, pop and smell toasted; about 10 minutes.
Combine rice flour, oats, salt and toasted sesame seeds.
Stir apple juice, oil and vanilla into the flour mixture.
Form the dough into 8 large balls.
Place each ball on greased cookie sheets or parchment paper.
Moisten your fingers and flatten each ball until it is 1/2 inch thick.
Bake 25 minutes or until golden brown.
Let cool on pans before removing.
b372aab674.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the water, raisins, sesame seeds, and brown rice flour. Mix well.
3. Add the rolled oats, salt, and unsweetened apple juice. Mix until a dough forms.
4. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more water. If it's too sticky, add a bit more flour.
5. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
6. After chilling, roll the dough into small balls and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
8. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Sesame Raisin Cookies!

f040d5fa02.gt:
For the cookies: Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla and mix well.
Add buttermilk and nutmeg and mix well.
Add dry ingredients and mix until incorporated.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes.
For the glaze: Combine all glaze ingredients, stirring until smooth.
Drizzle small spoonfuls of glaze over cooled cookies.
Store cookies in an airtight container.
Recipe adapted from Buttermilk Cookies on Gourmet.com
f040d5fa02.pred:
To cook Nutmeg Buttermilk Cookies, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Add the vanilla extract and mix well.
5. In a separate bowl, combine the buttermilk, nutmeg, flour, salt, baking soda, and powdered sugar.
6. Gradually mix the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, alternating between the two and mixing until well combined.
7. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
8. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Scoop the dough into balls, about 1-1/2 inches in diameter.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges and slightly firm in the center.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Nutmeg Buttermilk Cookies!

99ac5fb3f6.gt:
Mix first 10 ingredients in a bowl.
Take a wonton wrapper and place 1 heaping teaspoon of filling in center.
Moisten edges with water, fold over and press to seal edges.
Add 3 tablespoons of Peanut Oil to a large skillet and saute until the bottoms are golden brown.
When golden brown, add 1/2 cup chicken broth, cover pan and simmer 8 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Reserve broth in a separate bowl and repeat process until all potstickers are cooked.
Keep warm on a plate covered.
99ac5fb3f6.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the ground pork, chopped green onions, soy sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, minced garlic, beaten egg, cornstarch, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine all ingredients.
2. Divide the mixture into 12 equal portions and shape each portion into a small ball.
3. In a small bowl, mix the chicken broth and 1 tablespoon of cornstarch. Set aside.
4. Heat peanut oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
5. Carefully place the shaped meatballs into the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the skillet. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the meatballs are golden brown on all sides.
6. Remove the meatballs from the skillet and set aside.
7. In the same skillet, add the reserved chicken broth mixture. Stir to combine and cook until the mixture thickens slightly.
8. Add the wonton skins to the skillet and cook for about 1 minute or until they become translucent.
9. Carefully place the cooked meatballs on top of the wonton skins.
10. Carefully pour the hot chicken broth mixture over the meatballs and wonton skins.
11. Cover the skillet and cook for about 5 minutes or until the meatballs are cooked through and the filling is heated through.
12. Serve the Pot Stickers immediately.

[/INST]

5131480fd6.gt:
Combine all ingredients.
Marinate fish from 1-2 hours depending on thickness.
Use to baste while cooking.
5131480fd6.pred:
[/INST]

To create a delicious All-Purpose Marinade for Fish, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, whisk together the sweet sherry, salad oil, soy sauce, brown sugar, minced garlic, Worcestershire sauce, and ground pepper to taste.
2. Add the desired amount of fish (Salmon, Swordfish, or Shark) to the marinade, ensuring it is evenly coated.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. After marinating, preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
5. Remove the fish from the marinade and pat it dry with a paper towel.
6. Grill the fish for 4-5 minutes per side, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
7. Serve the grilled fish immediately with the marinade as a dipping sauce, if desired.

This All-Purpose Marinade for Fish is versatile and can be used for various types of fish, providing a delicious and flavorful addition to your dish.

57a8e4271c.gt:
Pour ingredients into empty gallon container or empty gallon milk jug.
Fill the rest of the container with water.
Put into spray bottle and refill as needed.
57a8e4271c.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the rubbing alcohol, ammonia, and liquid dish soap.
2. Gradually add water to the mixture, stirring continuously until the desired consistency is reached.
3. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes to allow the ingredients to fully combine.
4. Use the cleaner immediately or store it in a clean, airtight container for later use.

This all-purpose cleaner is effective at cleaning various surfaces, including countertops, floors, and appliances. It is a powerful and eco-friendly alternative to commercial cleaning products, making it an excellent choice for maintaining a clean and healthy home.

ee28b1bd5a.gt:
Over medium high heat saute the onions stirring frequently (5min).
Add the tomato paste and keep stirring (5min).
Next add the berbere and cook for 5 minutes adding a little bit of water when the bottom of the pot starts catching.
Keep stirring.
Add the rinsed lentils and cook together for an additional 5 minutes (continue to stir adding a bit of water so that the mixture doesn't burn).
Add about 5 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Occasionally stir.
Once the water reduces and lentils have thickened add the ground coriander, garlic and salt.
Reduce heat and leave for about 5 minutes.
Serve with injera.
ee28b1bd5a.pred:
To craft Mesir Wat, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the red lentils, vegetable oil, and tomato paste. Cook over medium heat until the lentils are tender and the oil has been absorbed.

2. Add the berbere, red onion, and garlic to the pot. Cook for a few minutes until the onion is softened and fragrant.

3. Pour in the water, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for about 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are fully cooked and the liquid has been absorbed.

4. Stir in the coriander, and season with salt to taste.

5. Serve the Mesir Wat hot, garnished with injera bread if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Mesir Wat!

8b7c0b0b5a.gt:
PLACE frozen yogurt in bowl.
Top with remaining ingredients.
Serve a cookie with the sundae.
8b7c0b0b5a.pred:
1. First, prepare the ingredients by combining the low-fat frozen yogurt, fat free chocolate syrup, and warmed PLANTERS Walnut Pieces in a bowl.
2. Next, add the COOL WHIP FREE Whipped Topping and mix well.
3. Finally, crush the OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookie into crumbs and sprinkle them over the top of the mixture.
4. Serve the Hot Fudge Sundae immediately, and enjoy!

[/INST]

08c1e0e854.gt:
break the banana into small pieces.
crush the cereal into big pieces
sieve flour and salt, beat in eggs, milk, vanilla, cream cheese, cereal and banana
heat a teaspoon of oil in a nonstick frying pan on a medium heat
depending on how big you like your pancakes depends on how big a spoon you use.
drop some batter in so its about 1/4 inch thick.
when the edges dry start to work a spatula around the edges and flip.
leave for a few mins.
check by lifting on end with the spatula
repeat steps 3 and 4 until all mixture is used up.
during cooking keep the ready pancakes warm in the oven
08c1e0e854.pred:
[INST]
To make delicious banana crunch pancakes, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the flour, eggs, milk, salt, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
2. Add the over ripe banana to the batter, mashing it slightly to release its natural sweetness.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the cereal of your choice with a pinch of salt.
4. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat.
5. Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan, spreading it evenly to form a thin pancake. Cook until the edges are slightly crispy and the pancake is cooked through.
6. Flip the pancake and cook for another minute or until the other side is also crispy.
7. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more oil to the pan as needed.
8. Once all the pancakes are cooked, place them on a plate or a tray.
9. In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese and cereal mixture until well combined.
10. Spread the cream cheese mixture evenly over the pancakes.
11. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious banana crunch pancakes!

[/INST]

c99df4226f.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease the muffin tins.
Mix, in a medium bowl, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and white pepper.
Add cheese and nuts.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs.
Add milk and melted butter.
Mix the dry ingredients into the liquid mixture.
Stir until just combined.
Spoon the batter into prepared muffin tins.
Bake for ten minutes.
Let the muffins sit in the tins for a few minutes before removing.
Let cool on wire racks.
c99df4226f.pred:
[INST]To cook Corn Muffins With Cheese and Nuts, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the yellow cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, and white pepper.
3. Add the melted butter, eggs, and milk to the dry ingredients. Mix until just combined.
4. Fold in the shredded cheddar cheese and chopped nuts or walnuts.
5. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Corn Muffins With Cheese and Nuts!

0d43f262d2.gt:
Heat oil in a large pot.
Saute the onion until it starts to brown a little.
Add the chicken and cook each piece so it's browned on both sides.
Add potatoes and carrots.
Cook for a few minutes while stirring.
Add the tomatoes and cook for another few minutes while stirring.
Cover the pot and continue to cook on medium for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add in the garlic and all the spices.
Mix well with other ingredients.
Add the zucchini, tomato paste, and a little salt and mix in.
Pour in enough water to just cover everything.
Bring to a boil, turn to low and let simmer for 45-50 minutes until every thing is well cooked and the stew has thickened.
Just before serving, stir in the chopped coriander.
Enjoy with basmati rice or bread :)
0d43f262d2.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
4. In the same pot, add the carrots, potatoes, and zucchini. Cook until the vegetables are tender, about 15 minutes.
5. Add the cooked chicken back to the pot, along with the tomatoes, tomato paste, coriander leaves, cumin, turmeric, cardamom, and cinnamon. Season with salt to taste.
6. Pour in enough water to cover the ingredients, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 1 hour, or until the chicken is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
7. Serve the Spiced Chicken and Vegetable Stew hot, garnished with fresh coriander leaves if desired.

[/INST]

b0d84623b8.gt:
Toss the chicken cubes with taco seasoning.
In a heavy skillet with a tight fitting lid, heat the oil and add the chicken and cook, stirring, until it changes color.
Stir in rice and stir to mix.
Add salsa and water.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.
Cover and allow to cook about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand about 5 minutes before serving.
If you like, you may sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
b0d84623b8.pred:
To make a delicious Mexican Chicken and Rice dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the cooking oil over medium-high heat.
2. Add the chicken cubes and cook until they are browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the taco seasoning and cook for 1-2 minutes, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
5. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. Add the uncooked rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the chicken and seasoning.
7. Pour in the salsa and stir to combine.
8. Add the water and stir to combine.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the skillet.
10. Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
11. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

This delicious Mexican Chicken and Rice dish is ready to be served and enjoyed. The combination of the tender chicken, flavorful taco seasoning, and the savory salsa creates a satisfying and delicious meal.

a89ec9f9d3.gt:
* See my TastyKitchen recipe box for my Fail-Proof Pizza Dough recipe, if interested.
Preheat oven to 500 degrees F with a pizza stone inside.
If you dont have a pizza stone, use an upside down cookie sheet.
Mix butter and garlic in a small bowl and set aside.
Spread pizza dough out into a 12-inch circle on parchment paper.
(This makes it easier to transfer the dough to the pizza stone.)
Spread the butter and garlic mixture over dough and top with parmesan and mozzarella cheeses.
Top with a light sprinkling of salt and pepper, if desired.
(That step is totally optional!)
Transfer the dough to the preheated stone or pan.
Bake 9-10 minutes or until bubbly and golden.
Remove from oven and cool 1-2 minutes before cutting.
Serve hot, with marinara.
a89ec9f9d3.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the softened butter, minced garlic, and grated Parmesan cheese. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the grated mozzarella cheese to the mixture and stir until fully combined.
4. On a clean surface, roll out the pizza dough into long, thin strips.
5. Using a spoon, scoop a small amount of the cheese mixture onto the center of each dough strip.
6. Fold the dough over the cheese, creating a small, enclosed pocket.
7. Place the dough strips on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the dough strips in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
9. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the bread sticks cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheesy Garlic Bread Sticks!

feb321aa71.gt:
Rinse lobster shells and body parts with cold water to clean.
Add lobster parts to stock pot.
Add water to cover.
Add lemon juice and garlic salt.
Bring pot to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Use tongs to remove and discard lobster shells and body pieces.
Add vegetables and simmer another 30 minutes.
Use slotted spoon to remove vegetables.
Reserve and serve with cooked rice.
Line a collander with cheescloth and ladel stock to strain through cheescloth into a pot.
Discard solids.
Lobster stock can be refrigerated for 10 days or frozen for 6 months.
Use in sauces, dips, soups and stews.
feb321aa71.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including 1 lobster shells, 1 lobster body parts, 1 water, 1 tsp garlic salt, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 cup sliced celery, and 3 clove sliced garlic.

2. In a large pot or stockpot, combine the lobster shells, lobster body parts, water, garlic salt, lemon juice, and sliced vegetables. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.

3. Reduce the heat to low and let the mixture simmer for about 2 hours or until the lobster shells and vegetables are tender.

4. Remove the lobster shells and vegetables from the pot using a slotted spoon or spider strainer. Discard the shells and vegetables that are not suitable for consumption.

5. Strain the stock through a fine mesh strainer or cheesecloth to remove any remaining solids.

6. Cool the stock slightly before using it in your desired recipe.

7. Store the stock in the refrigerator for up to 3 days or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

8. Use the lobster stock in various recipes, such as soups, sauces, or stews, to add a rich, flavorful taste and a hint of seafood.

[/INST]

2c54bd25b1.gt:
Place whole chicken breasts into a casserole dish.
Sprinkle on the onion salt and the oregano.
Add onions, mushrooms, green pepper, olives.
Pour Pizza sauce over chicken and veggies.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 40-45 minutes, remove from oven and top with cheese.
Bake another 5 to 10 minutes or till the cheese is bubbly.
Serve with a green salad!
I hope you enjoy it!
2c54bd25b1.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken breasts, onion salt, onion, oregano, mushrooms, green pepper (if using), green olives (if using), and mozzarella cheese.
3. Spread the mixture evenly over a pizza crust or a baking sheet, making sure to cover the entire surface.
4. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Chicken Pizza Casserole!

4f880f7c86.gt:
Add the kinako and sugar to a bowl and combine well.
Then add the soy milk (or milk) to the bowl as well and cream everything together with a rubber spatula.
If the mixture is too dry, try adding some more milk.
Once mixed, wrap it in some cling film and squeeze and shape the mixture together with your hands so that the mixture forms a ball.
Once the mixture has reached a consistency where it can be shaped into a ball with your bare hands, shape the mixture into whatever shapes you like I usually roll mine out with a rolling pan over the cling film then slice it into pieces.
You can replace the sugar with brown sugar if you like.
Feel free to sprinkle the kinako truffles with kinako powder, cinnamon, or anything that comes to mind at the end as well.
4f880f7c86.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: 50 grams Kinako, 15 grams Sugar (or brown sugar), and 5 tbsp Soy milk (or milk).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Kinako and Sugar (or brown sugar) until well combined.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the Soy milk (or milk) until it reaches a smooth consistency.
4. Combine the Kinako mixture and the Soy milk (or milk) mixture, stirring gently to ensure the ingredients are well-incorporated.
5. If the mixture is too thick, you can add a bit more Soy milk (or milk) to achieve the desired consistency.
6. Preheat your oven to 300°F (150°C).
7. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Scoop the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, using a spoon or your hands.
9. Using a spatula, spread the mixture evenly across the baking sheet.
10. Bake the truffles for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and set.
11. Allow the truffles to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Kinako Truffles!

ea93239d44.gt:
In a 3 cup or larger bowl, whisk the 1st 8 ingredients to combine.
Gradually add olive oil in a stream & whisk to combine well.
Add salt & pepper to taste & refrigerate for 24 hrs to allow flavors to blend.
NOTE: I use a wide-mouth jar w/screw-on lid + my immersion blender to make & store this in a single step.
TO SERVE: Simplicity is the most-favored presentation - as a bruschetta-type appy where 1/2-in slices of baguette bread are spread w/cream cheese, topped w/very thinly sliced smoked salmon & then this sauce is spread over the salmon slices.
A few tiny capers can be centered as an opt garnish.
HINT: For never fail perfect slicing of smoked salmon, freeze the salmon to a near frozen state & use your sharpest knife to shave slices of desired thickness.
ea93239d44.pred:
Gravlaxsosa (The Real Deal)

Ingredients:
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 2 tablespoons brown sugar
- 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard
- 2 tablespoons prepared mustard (a sweet variety)
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1 tablespoon fresh dill (minced)
- 12 teaspoon coriander
- 2 tablespoons sour cream
- 7 ounces olive oil
- salt & pepper (to taste)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the honey, brown sugar, Dijon mustard, prepared mustard, lemon juice, fresh dill, coriander, and sour cream. Mix well.
3. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Add the olive oil to the bowl and mix well.
5. Place the mixture in a large, oven-safe dish and bake for approximately 1 hour, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
7. Serve the Gravlaxsosa (The Real Deal) hot, garnished with fresh dill and a sprinkle of coriander, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Gravlaxsosa (The Real Deal) with your family and friends!

3d81546407.gt:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour in gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, and dash of bitters.
Cover and shake rapidly.
Strain into a highball glass full of ice.
Pour in lemon and lime spritzer and stir.
Garnish with the lime slice.
Unleash the monkey.
3d81546407.pred:
To prepare a delicious Knudson's Knasty Habit dish, follow these steps:

1. In a mixing glass, combine 2 cups of ice cubes and 2 fluid ounces of gin, such as Tanqueray.
2. Add 1/2 fluid ounce of fresh lemon juice and 1/2 fluid ounce of fresh lime juice, and mix well.
3. If desired, add a splash of simple syrup to taste.
4. Stir in 1 dash of bitters.
5. Pour the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
6. Top it off with 2 fluid ounces of Knudsen's lemon-lime spritzer.
7. Garnish the drink with a lime slice.

This combination of ingredients creates a refreshing and flavorful cocktail that is perfect for enjoying on a warm day or as a treat during a gathering. The ice cubes help to chill the drink, while the gin and lemon-lime spritzer provide a balanced and delightful taste. The bitters add a touch of complexity and depth to the flavor profile, making the Knudson's Knasty Habit a delightful and satisfying cocktail.

ec8f7992cb.gt:
Cover a large flat surface with waxed paper.
In a large bowl, stir together the popcorn, cereal, corn chips, almonds, and pretzels.
Melt the confectioners' coating in a glass bowl in the microwave for 1 minute.
Continue to cook at 30 second intervals, stirring between each one, until the coating is smooth.
Pour melted coating over the cereal mixture.
It's best to use a large metal spoon, and pour 1 or 2 spoonfuls at a time then mix to ensure even distribution.
(A second person can be useful here - one to pour, one to mix.)
Once everything is coated, spread the mixture out onto waxed paper in a thin layer.
Let stand for about 1/2 hour, or until coating is dry.
Transfer to a bowl to serve, or store in an airtight container.
ec8f7992cb.pred:
To prepare a delicious Lip-Smacking Popcorn Concoction dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the popped microwave popcorn, corn cereal puffs, and corn chips.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the almonds and thin pretzel sticks.
4. In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the vanilla flavored confectioners' coating according to the package instructions.
5. Carefully pour the melted coating over the popcorn mixture, stirring gently to coat the popcorn evenly.
6. Spread the coated popcorn mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the popcorn mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the coating is evenly melted and slightly crispy.
8. Allow the popcorn mixture to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Lip-Smacking Popcorn Concoction dish is a delightful combination of crunchy popcorn, chewy corn cereal puffs, and crispy corn chips, all coated with a delicious vanilla flavored confectioners' coating. The result is a satisfying and addictive snack that is perfect for movie nights, parties, or simply enjoying at home.

f0e5ecb2aa.gt:
Mix together 1 cup sugar and 1 Tbsp cinnamon in a small bowl.
Set aside.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a muffin pan or use paper muffin cups.
Cream the butter and 1/2 cup sugar until soft, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Add in the vanilla.
Add in the eggs one at a time and mix until well incorporated.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cream of tartar and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and the sour cream alternately to the egg-butter mixture in multiple additions.
Start with the flour and end with the flour.
Scrape the bowl occasionally.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop out muffin batter one at a time and drop into the bowl filled with the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Roll the muffin around in the mixture until it is covered completely in cinnamon sugar.
Place muffin into muffin tin.
Depending on the size of your tins, you should get about 14 to 18 muffins.
Bake them for approximately 20-22 minutes or until they are golden brown.
f0e5ecb2aa.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
3. Add the melted butter to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and vanilla extract until well combined.
5. Gradually add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined.
6. In a small bowl, mix the baking soda and baking powder. Add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
7. Fold in the sour cream.
8. Fill the prepared muffin cups with the batter, filling them about 3/4 full.
9. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
10. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

ef9d927edb.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
and butter a large baking sheet.
Into a large bowl sift together flour, baking powder, and salt.
Cut butter into small bits and with your fingertips or a pastry blender blend into flour mixture until mixture resembles coarse meal.
With a fork stir in Cheddar.
Add milk and cream, stirring until just combined.
Transfer mixture to a floured surface and with floured hands knead until it forms a dough.
Roll out dough into a 12-inch round (about 1/2 inch thick).
Using a 2-inch fluted round cutter cut out scones and arrange about 1/2 inch apart on baking sheet.
Gather and gently reroll scraps.
Cut out more scones and arrange on baking sheet.
Bake scones in middle of oven until pale golden, about 12 minutes, and transfer to a rack to cool.
Scones may be made 1 day ahead and kept in an airtight container at cool room temperature.
In a small bowl stir together butter, mustard and honey.
Tear each lettuce leaf into 4 pieces.
Split scones and spread each split side with honey-mustard butter.
Make sandwiches with scones, lettuce, and folded slices of ham.
ef9d927edb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut the cold unsalted butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Using your hands or a pastry cutter, work the butter into the flour mixture until the butter is the size of small peas.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, heavy cream, and softened butter.
5. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring just until the dough comes together.
6. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it a few times to bring it together.
7. Pat the dough into a 1-inch thick disk and cut it into 8 equal pieces.
8. Place the scones on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the scones for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
10. While the scones are baking, prepare the honey-mustard butter. In a small bowl, mix the softened butter with the honey and mustard.
11. Once the scones are done, let them cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet.
12. While the scones are cooling, prepare the ham and lettuce leaves.
13. Once the scones are cool, spread a layer of honey-mustard butter on top of each scone.
14. Add a few slices of cooked ham on top of the butter.
15. Garnish the scones with a few large lettuce leaves.

Enjoy your delicious Cheddar Scones with Ham and Honey-Mustard Butter!

d8f274c0df.gt:
Chill the bowl of a stand mixer and the whisk attachment in the freezer for 10 minutes.
Place all of the ingredients in the bowl and whisk on high speed until medium peaks form, about 1 to 2 minutes.
(Alternatively, you can use a hand whisk and a large chilled bowl.
Whisk all of the ingredients until medium peaks form, about 5 to 6 minutes.)
Serve immediately.
d8f274c0df.pred:
To make a delicious Creme Fraiche Whipped Cream Recipe, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup heavy cream and 1/2 cup creme fraiche or sour cream.
2. Add 1 tablespoon granulated sugar or packed light brown sugar to the mixture.
3. Using an electric mixer or a whisk, whip the cream mixture until it reaches the desired consistency. This will typically take a few minutes.
4. Once the cream mixture is whipped to the desired consistency, you can either stop here or continue to whip it further for a more fluffy and airy texture.
5. If you choose to continue whipping, add a pinch of salt and a splash of vanilla extract to enhance the flavor.
6. Serve the whipped cream immediately or store it in the refrigerator for later use.

This simple recipe results in a delicious and creamy whipped cream that can be enjoyed on its own or used as a topping for various desserts and dishes.

62bf8025cc.gt:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium high heat.
Add the onion and saute for three minutes, then add the garlic.
Continue cooking until the onions are soft, 1-2 minutes more.
Add the water and bring to a boil.
Add the jalapenos and carrots and cook for 5 minutes, until slightly softened.
Add the cider vinegar, 1 tbsp pickling salt, oregano and bay leaves and simmer for 1 minute.
Remove from heat and allow to cool completely.
Transfer the jalapenos, carrots and onions with slotted spoon or tongs into sterilized glass quart-sized jars.
Throw away the bay leaves.
Cover the vegetables with the cooking liquid until the jars are three-quarters full.
Add 1 tbsp pickling salt to each jar and fill to the top with white vinegar.
Cap each jar tightly and store in the refrigerator for up to several months.
The pickled vegetables can be used starting one week later.
62bf8025cc.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Escabeche De Mexicana, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
2. Add the carrot slices and cook for a few more minutes, until they are slightly tender.
3. Add the water, jalapeno chiles, and pickling salt. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
4. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
5. Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl, pressing on the solids to extract as much liquid as possible.
6. Stir in the dried oregano, white vinegar, and bay leaves.
7. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean saucepan, pressing on the solids to extract as much liquid as possible.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by about half.
10. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
11. Stir in the sliced jalapeno chiles and refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight.

13. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by about half.
14. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the mixture cool slightly.
15. Stir in the vinegar and refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight.
16. Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean saucepan, pressing on the solids to extract as much liquid

eec8247b03.gt:
Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add rice and red pepper flakes.
Cover saucepan with a lid and remove from heat; let stand until water is absorbed, about 5 minutes.
Fluff rice with a fork and cool, about 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir rice until coated in oil, 15 to 20 seconds.

Melt butter and place in the pan you are using for the cobbler
In a medium Mixing bowl mix together flour, baking powder, 1 cup of sugar and milk ( do not mix while in pan)
On high heat in a medium pot, mix all other ingredients peaches, Lennon juice, Brown sugar, and 2 teaspoons of cinnamon

Serve hot or cool over vanilla ice cream

0e59f10230.gt:
Put all of the ingredients except for the ice into a blender.
These should total 1 cup of liquid.
Blend these ingredients on low a few times.
Fire up the "ice crush" (or highest speed) on the blender for about 30 seconds.
Pour into a 600ml glass and enjoy!

To craft the perfect iced coffee, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 3 teaspoons of sugar, 1 teaspoon of instant coffee, and 18-14 fluid ounce vanilla (splash). Whisk the mixture until the sugar is fully dissolved.

2. In a separate bowl, whisk together the cooking spray (4 sprays) and 13 cups of half-and-half.

3. Pour the whisked cooking spray mixture into the sugar and coffee mixture, and whisk until well combined.

4. Add the 13 cups of milk to the mixture and whisk until the ingredients are fully combined.

5. Pour the mixture into a large glass or pitcher, and stir to ensure that the ingredients are well combined.

6. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.

7. Once the mixture is chilled, pour it into a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth and creamy.

8. Pour the blended mixture into a glass, and add the crushed ice. Stir the mixture until the ice is fully incorporated and the desired consistency is achieved.

9. Serve the iced coffee immediately, and enjoy the perfect blend of flavors and textures.

[/INST]

dbf1079c1d.gt:

Lightly oil a 12-inch springform pan or 12 cups of a muffin tin.

Bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 50 minutes for the cake, 40 to 45 minutes for the cupcakes.
Serve the cake as is, or with a bit of petimezi or chocolate syrup drizzled over or around it.

Petimezopita is delicious with vanilla ice cream, too.

9545db939c.gt:

31160ca4d7.gt:
Break broccoli into florets & roughly chop any tough stems.
Set aside 2 sml florets for garnish.
Melt butter in a lrg pan & cook the onion & leek till soft, but not caramelized.
Add broccoli & potato, then pour in the stock.
Cover & simmer for 15-20 min, till tender.
Allow to cool slightly, then puree the soup in a blender or food proc.
(I will use my immersion blender for this).
Return soup to the pan.
Add milk + cream, season w/salt & pepper to taste pref & reheat gently.
At the last moment, add Stilton cheese & stir soup till the cheese just melts.
DO NOT BOIL.
Cut reserved broccoli florets into thin slices.
Ladle soup into warmed bowls & garnish w/sliced broccoli & freshly ground black pepper.
Serve immediately.
31160ca4d7.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the onion and leek, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the potato and cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Pour in the chicken stock, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the potato is tender.
5. In a blender or food processor, puree the soup until smooth.
6. Return the soup to the saucepan, and add the milk, double cream, and Stilton cheese. Stir until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
7. Season the soup with salt and black pepper to taste.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley.

[/INST]

This recipe for Broccoli and Stilton Soup is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the earthy flavors of broccoli with the rich, tangy taste of Stilton cheese. The creamy base of the soup, made from chicken stock and milk, provides a smooth and satisfying texture, while the onion and leek add a subtle sweetness and depth of flavor. The result is a hearty and flavorful soup that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with a side of crusty bread for a complete meal.

Mix all the ingredients.
