4378df82b0.gt:
Heat the oil in a skillet, then coat the steak with flour and brown in the oil.
Remove the steak from the skillet and drain.
Place the potatoes, carrots and onion in the bottom of the Crock-Pot.
Place the steak on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Pour the tomatoes and tomato sauce over the meat.
Cover; cook on Low for 10 hours or on High for 6 hours.
4378df82b0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the beef, flour, salt, pepper, and 1 cup of water. Mix well, cover, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
3. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the sliced carrots and cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Add the beef mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for about 10 minutes, or until the beef is browned and cooked through.
6. Add the diced tomatoes and tomato sauce to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for another 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened.
7. While the stew is cooking, prepare the potatoes by washing them and peeling them. Cut them into bite-sized pieces.
8. Add the potatoes to the stew, stirring to combine. Cook for another 20-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender.
9. Remove the stew from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the Crock Pot Swiss Steak hot, over a bed of mashed potatoes.

[/INST]

bf72159d6c.gt:
Follow ingredient instructions to microwave peppers.
Cut ingredients to fit in blender.
All all ingredients to blender and blend to desired consistency (add a sliver of the habenero to start).
Refrigerate leftovers.
NOTE: May need to add more salt or even cilantro if necessary.
Adjust ingredients according to taste or heat desired.
If too hot, add another tomato.
bf72159d6c.pred:
[INST]
1. First, prepare the ingredients by washing the tomatoes, onion, and cilantro leaves.
2. In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, onion, cumin, pepper, and salt.
3. Add the cilantro leaves and jalapenos (microwave for almost 2 mins for the jalapenos, 1 - 1.5 mins for the habanero, and 1 - 2 mins for the red jalapenos).
4. Mix well and taste the salsa. If it's too spicy, add more cilantro or jalapenos, or adjust the amount of pepper and salt.
5. Serve the salsa immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

e07fd8f60a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350.
Set the squash on a large rimmed baking sheet, cut sides up, and brush with the 3 tablespoons of melted butter.
Sprinkle the sugar in the cavities and season the squash with salt and pepper.
Turn the squash over on the baking sheet and roast for about 1 hour, or until tender and browned at the edges.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter in a medium skillet.
Add the chestnuts and thyme sprigs and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until the chestnuts are lightly browned and glazed with the butter, 8 to 10 minutes.
Discard the thyme sprigs.
Cut each squash half into 4 wedges and arrange on a large platter.
Sprinkle with the glazed chestnuts and the red currants.
Drizzle the squash with the pomegranate molasses and serve.
e07fd8f60a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the squash with the melted butter, sugar, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the squash in a single layer on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
4. Roast the squash in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is tender and slightly caramelized.
5. While the squash is roasting, prepare the chestnuts.
6. In a small saucepan, combine the chestnuts, thyme, and 1/2 cup of water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the chestnuts are tender.
7. Remove the chestnuts from the saucepan and let them cool slightly.
8. In a small bowl, mix the red currants or seeds from the pomegranate with the pomegranate molasses.
9. When the squash is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
10. Carefully slice the squash into half-inch pieces.
11. Return the squash to the oven and roast for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until it is slightly crispy and caramelized.
12. Serve the Roasted Squash with Chestnuts and Pomegranate immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

273d93a669.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix crushed cookies, butter,pecans, and coconut; press firmly onto bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan.
Refrigerate while preparing filling.
Beat cream cheese and sugar in a large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended.
Add eggs, one at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 40 minutes or until center is almost set.Cool.
Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight.
Place whipping cream and chocolate in saucepan.
Cook on low heat until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring occasionally.
Pour over cheesecake.
Refrigerate 15 minutes or until chocolate is firm.
Store leftover cheesecake in refrigerate.
Note: To make cheesecake extra special, Once chocolate topping is firm, place 2 additional chocolate squares in microwaveable bowl.
Microwave on medium 1 minute, stirring after 30 seconds.
Stir till chocolate is completely melted.Pour into small reusable bag; seal bag; twist bag.
Snip off one small corner from bottom of bag; twist top of bag to squeeze chocolate from bag; to pipe a special message, such as "Greetings" on top of cheesecake.
Chill time includes.
273d93a669.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Crush the Oreo cookies using a food processor or a rolling pin.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, crushed Oreo cookies, and chopped pecans. Mix well.
4. Add the flaked coconut and mix until well combined.
5. In a separate bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth.
6. Add the sugar to the cream cheese mixture and beat until well combined.
7. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
8. Add the whipping cream and mix until well combined.
9. Stir in the semi-sweet chocolate baking squares.
10. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured springform pan.
11. Bake for 45-50 minutes or until the center is set.
12. Allow the cake to cool completely in the pan.
13. Once cooled, remove the cake from the pan and transfer it to a serving plate.
14. Refrigerate the cake for at least 2 hours before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Ribbon Bar Cheesecake!

75b28019b4.gt:
Heat oil in medium skillet on medium-high heat.
Add chicken; cook 7 min.
on each side or until cooked through (170F).
Meanwhile, prepare Dinner as directed on package, substituting large skillet for the saucepan.
Add tomatoes, onions and parsley to prepared dinner; mix lightly.
Top with the chicken.
75b28019b4.pred:
To cook a delicious Chicken Mac dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the chicken thighs and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes.
3. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
4. In the same pan, add the diced tomatoes and cook until they are softened and slightly mushy.
5. Add the cooked chicken back to the pan and stir to combine.
6. In a small bowl, mix the KRAFT Deluxe Macaroni & Cheese Dinner with the undrained tomatoes.
7. Pour the mixture into the pan with the chicken and stir to combine.
8. Add the sliced green onions and chopped parsley.
9. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the macaroni is tender.
10. Serve the Chicken Mac dish hot, garnished with additional chopped parsley if desired.

This delicious Chicken Mac dish combines the tender chicken, creamy macaroni and cheese, and a touch of freshness from the green onions and parsley, resulting in a satisfying and comforting meal.

b69844d37b.gt:
Chill 4 Martini glasses in freezer 30 minutes.
Combine all liquors in cocktail shaker; add ice cubes and shake to chill.
Strain mixture into cold glasses.
Garnish each with orange peel strip.
b69844d37b.pred:
[/INST]

1. Begin by preparing the ingredients:
- Batavia arrack: pour 6 tablespoons of Batavia arrack into a mixing glass.
- Manzanilla Sherry: pour 6 tablespoons of manzanilla Sherry into the mixing glass.
- Clement Creole Shrubb: pour 6 tablespoons of Clement Creole Shrubb into the mixing glass.
- Homemade Chocolate Liqueur: pour 6 teaspoons of Homemade Chocolate Liqueur into the mixing glass.
- Ice cubes: place the ice cubes into a mixing glass.
- Orange peel strips: peel the orange and cut the peel into 4 strips.

2. Combine the ingredients:
- In a mixing glass, combine the Batavia arrack, manzanilla Sherry, Clement Creole Shrubb, and Homemade Chocolate Liqueur.
- Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes.
- Stir the ingredients until they are well-chilled and the ice has melted.

3. Garnish and serve:
- Garnish the cocktail with the orange peel strips.
- Serve the cocktail in a chilled glass.

Enjoy your savory Catch-22 Cocktail!

522f19c745.gt:
Place flat bread or shell on 14 inch pizza pan (or lightly grease a 15x10x1-inch baking pan.
Unroll the pizza dough onto the greased pan, using your hands to press the dough into a 14x 9 inch rectangle, build up the edges slightly.
Bake pizza dough in a 425F oven for 5 minutes.
remove from oven).
In a mixing bowl combine chicken and barbecue sauce, toss to coat.
Spread chicken mixture evenly over pizza crust.
Sprinkle with cheese and chopped spinach.
Bake in a 425F oven for 10 minutes or until crust edge is lightly browned.
Cut flat bread or bread shell into wedges (or cut rectangular pizza into squares.
522f19c745.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Prepare the pizza dough by rolling it out to the desired thickness and shape.
3. Spread a thin layer of barbecue sauce on the dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust.
4. Add a layer of shredded cooked chicken on top of the sauce.
5. Sprinkle the shredded monterey jack cheese evenly over the chicken.
6. Add a layer of finely chopped fresh spinach on top of the cheese.
7. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

This Barbecued Chicken Pizza recipe combines the flavors of barbecue sauce, chicken, and cheese, along with the freshness of spinach. The result is a delicious and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

5a55d2d191.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C).
Line a baking sheet with paper towels.
Fill a bowl with lightly-salted water.
Rinse the grated sweet potato in the water, and drain into a sieve.
Pat the grated sweet potato dry with a cloth or paper towels, then place into a bowl.
Squeeze excess moisture from the grated onion, and place into the bowl with the sweet potato.
Stir the eggs and pepper into the mixture until well combined.
Heat the olive oil in a nonstick skillet over medium heat until it shimmers, and spoon about 1 heaping tablespoon of the potato mixture per patty into the hot oil.
Flatten the patties with a fork, and fry until golden brown and crisp on the bottom, 5 to 8 minutes.
Flip and cook on the other side, sprinkle with salt, then set the cooked patties aside on the prepared baking sheet in the preheated oven while you finish cooking the latkes.
Stir the potato mixture before cooking each batch of patties.
Serve hot with applesauce and yogurt.
5a55d2d191.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the grated sweet potato, onion, eggs, black pepper, olive oil, and salt.
3. Add the applesauce and yogurt, and mix until well combined.
4. Using a spoon, scoop the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Flatten the mixture into patties, making sure they are evenly distributed on the baking sheet.
6. Bake the latkes for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Serve the Kerry's Sweet Potato Latkes warm, with your favorite dipping sauce or topping.

[/SYS]

9001c0cfc6.gt:
FRIED POUNDED PASTE FOR BASE
in pan with oil saute pounded paste till fragrant and lightly but not burn then drain excess oil
MAKE THAI CURRY NOODLE
in pan with 1 tbsp of oil saute thai red curry paste for half minute then add fried pounded paste with water and bring to a boil
put flat udon noodle and simmer for 13 minutes and add dash of fish sauce or light soy sauce then stir often to prevent burn bottom and sauce start thickening
add tomato and off heat
serve thai curry udon noodle with eggs
9001c0cfc6.pred:
To prepare a delicious Thai Curry Udon Noodle dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 2 bundles of flat udon noodle
- 2 eggs
- 3 tomatoes
- 2 dashes of fish sauce or light soy sauce (optional)
- 1 tbsp brown sugar
- 1 1/2 liter water
- 4 tbsp thai red curry paste
- 3 cloves of pounded garlic
- 5 small pounded shallot
- 1 cup of pounded dried prawn

2. Prepare the sauce:
- In a small bowl, mix the brown sugar and fish sauce or soy sauce. Set aside.

3. Prepare the udon noodles:
- Bring a large pot of water to a boil, then add the udon noodles and cook until they are soft and tender. Drain the noodles and rinse them with cold water to stop the cooking process.

4. Prepare the sauce:
- In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the curry paste and cook for a few minutes until fragrant.
- Add the pounded garlic and shallot, stirring constantly. Cook for another minute or until the aroma is released.
- Pour in the water and bring the mixture to a boil. Add the sugar-fish sauce mixture and stir well.
- Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until it has thickened slightly.

5. Prepare the udon noodles:
- In a large bowl, combine the cooked udon noodles with the sauce. Toss the noodles to coat them evenly with the sauce.

6. Serve the dish:
- Serve the Thai Curry Udon Noodle dish immediately, garnished with chopped green onions and a sprinkle of freshly ground black pepper.

Enjoy your delicious Thai Curry Udon Noodle dish!

b9d49b2792.gt:
Marinade lamb in lemon juice, oil, garlic and chopped rosemary for at least an hour.
Combine lemon, onion, garlic and rosemary sprigs in a baking dish and place lamb rack with marinade on top.
Bake at 180 C for 35-40 mins or until cooked to your preference.
Remove lamb to a plate & keep warm.
Discard pan ingredients but reserve pan juices.
Heat pan juices and blend in flour.
Cook for 1 minute.
Gradually blend in stock and wine until smooth.
Cook stirring until sauce boils and thickens, Season to taste.
Serve roast, sliced into cutlets with sauce and vegetables of your choice.
b9d49b2792.pred:
To cook a delightful Lemon and Garlic Lamb Rack dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. Season the lamb rack with salt and pepper.

3. In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice, olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, and salt and pepper.

4. Place the lamb rack in the mixture and toss to coat evenly.

5. Transfer the lamb to a baking dish and roast in the preheated oven for about 1 hour or until the lamb is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).

6. Remove the lamb from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into individual portions.

7. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened.

8. Add the garlic and cook for another minute or until fragrant.

9. Add the chopped rosemary and cook for another minute.

10. Pour the red wine into the skillet and bring it to a simmer.

11. Add the flour to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.

12. Add the vegetable stock and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 5 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.

13. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.

14. Serve the lamb sliced over the Lemon and Garlic Lamb Rack sauce.

Enjoy your delicious Lemon and Garlic Lamb Rack dish!

aaf069b0ba.gt:
Prepare coffee T DISC in mug or large heatproof glass.
Add brown sugar and light cream; stir.
Top with thawed whipped topping and a light sprinkling of ground cinnamon.
Add cinnamon stick.
aaf069b0ba.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
1. In a saucepan, combine the 1 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1 Tbsp. light cream, and the thawed Cool Whip Whipped Topping.
2. Heat the mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture reaches a smooth consistency.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and stir in the 2 Tbsp. thawed Cool Whip Whipped Topping.
4. Stir in the dash ground cinnamon and the 1 cinnamon stick.
5. Pour the mixture into a large mug or a serving dish.
6. Serve the Fantastic French Vanilla immediately, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

[/INST]

bfebd12211.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with foil (enough to go up the sides) then spray the foil with cooking spray.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter until smooth and creamy.
Add the sugars and salt and beat until well incorporated.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract until smooth.
With the mixer on low speed, slowly add the flour, baking powder, and baking soda, stirring until incorporated.
The mixture will be thick.
Scoop the mixture into the prepared pan and use your fingers to press it into an even layer.
Bake in the preheated oven for 22 minutes, or until golden, puffed, and slightly cracked.
Remove the cookie layer from the oven and immediately spread the chopped chocolate evenly over the top.
Return to the oven for 2-3 minutes or until chocolate begins to melt.
Remove from the oven and use a spatula to smooth the chocolate over the top.
Cover the chocolate with the chips and marshmallows (or other toppings like toasted coconut or chopped nuts, peppermints, or other candies) and gently press them into the chocolate.
Allow bars to cool, then use the foil to pull them from the pan.
Slice and serve.
Recipe adapted from Bon Appetit.
bfebd12211.pred:
To prepare a delicious Sweet and Salty Chocolate Crunch Bars dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the flour mixture to the wet ingredients, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
5. Fold in the chopped chocolate and crunchy toppings.
6. Spread the dough evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
8. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

The key to a delicious Sweet and Salty Chocolate Crunch Bars dish is to ensure that the ingredients are well-balanced and the dish is properly baked. The combination of the sweet chocolate, salty chips, and crunchy toppings creates a delightful contrast of flavors and textures that make this dish irresistible.

d3a8a169dd.gt:
For crust, preheat oven to 275F; crumble ingredients together until well mixed; Press into a greased 9x13 pan and bake in a slow oven (275F) for 8 minutes; increase temp to 375F and top with second mixture and continue baking.
For topping: Mix all ingredients well; spread mixture over the partially baked crust and continue baking in a moderate oven (375F) until well set and slightly browned, about 30 minutes; cool and cut into squares.
d3a8a169dd.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter or margarine and sugar until smooth.
3. Add the flour, brown sugar, and coconut, mixing until well combined.
4. Stir in the chopped walnuts and beaten eggs.
5. Gradually add the baking powder, mixing until the dough comes together.
6. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it until it is smooth and elastic.
7. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut the dough into squares using a sharp knife or a cookie cutter.
9. Place the squares on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the squares in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
11. Allow the squares to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Walnut Squares!

75465ac6f9.gt:
Heat grill to medium-high heat.
Toss meat with 2 Tbsp.
A.1.
; let stand 10 min.
Meanwhile, mix remaining A.1., barbecue sauce and mustard until blended.
Thread meat onto 8 skewers.
Grill 6 min.
or until meat is done, turning after 3 min.
and brushing occasionally with barbecue sauce mixture.
75465ac6f9.pred:
1. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the A.1. Original Sauce and KRAFT Original Barbecue Sauce, creating a marinade.
3. Season the beef sirloin steak with salt and pepper.
4. Place the beef in a large bowl, pour the marinade over the beef, and toss to coat evenly. Allow the beef to marinate for at least 30 minutes.
5. While the beef is marinating, prepare your skewers. You can use wooden or metal skewers, depending on your preference.
6. Once the beef has marinated, remove it from the marinade and shake off any excess.
7. Thread the beef onto the skewers, alternating between beef and vegetables if desired.
8. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
9. Grill the beef skewers for about 6-8 minutes per side, or until they reach your desired level of doneness.
10. Remove the beef skewers from the grill and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Caramelized-Beef Skewers!

4ecdf46b58.gt:
Heat frying pan and fry bacon until lightly browned
Spoon baked beans onto base of muffin halves, top with cooked bacon and squirt tomato sauce on bacon if you wish and top each muffin with cheese
Place muffins under grill and cook for a few minutes until cheese has melted
4ecdf46b58.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]
To make English Muffin Melts, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Spread a thin layer of butter on each English muffin half.
3. Place the English muffin halves on a baking sheet or a silicone mat.
4. Top each English muffin half with a layer of baked beans, preferably in ham sauce.
5. Add a few slices of shortcut rashers bacon on top of the baked beans.
6. Place the remaining English muffin halves on top of the bacon.
7. Add a slice of soft cheddar cheese on top of each English muffin half.
8. Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce on top of the cheese.
9. Bake the English Muffin Melts in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
10. Serve the English Muffin Melts warm and enjoy!

[/INST]

[/INST]

c3ac924e63.gt:
Light a grill.
Shape the meat into 4 patties and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
Wrap each hamburger with 2 slices of pancetta.
Grill the burgers over a medium-hot fire for about 4 minutes, or until nicely browned on the bottom.
Flip the burgers and top them with the Gorgonzola.
Grill for about 4 minutes longer, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, brush the cut sides of the buns with the butter and grill them, cut side down, until lightly toasted.
Set the burgers on the bun bottoms and top with the lettuce, tomato and onion.
Serve at once.
c3ac924e63.pred:
To craft Gorgonzola Cheeseburgers with Pancetta, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).

2. In a large bowl, combine the ground sirloin or chuck, salt, and freshly ground pepper. Mix well to ensure the meat is evenly seasoned.

3. In a separate bowl, combine the pancetta, minced garlic, and a pinch of salt. Mix well to combine the ingredients.

4. Divide the seasoned meat into four equal portions.

5. On a clean surface, shape each portion of meat into a patty, making sure to press down on the meat to help it hold its shape.

6. Place the patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

7. Bake the patties in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are cooked through and reach an internal temperature of 160°F (71°C).

8. While the patties are baking, prepare the toppings.

9. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter with the minced garlic.

10. Spread the garlic butter mixture evenly on the tops of the cooked patties.

11. Place the patties on the baking sheet with the cooked side down.

12. Top each patty with a slice of Gorgonzola cheese.

13. Bake the patties in the preheated oven for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

14. While the patties are baking, prepare the toppings.

15. In a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise with the minced garlic.

16. Spread the garlic mayonnaise mixture evenly on the tops of the cooked patties.

17. Place the patties on the baking sheet with the cooked side up.

18. Bake the patties in the preheated oven

68d4e3063b.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Clean wing sections, salt and pepper, I stay light on the salt because the sauce adds some also.
Spread wings out on baking sheet, place in preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
About 5 minutes before the wings are done, in a small container (I use a coffee mug) mix the sauce ingredients.
I put a little sauce in a big enough bowl to hold the wings and mix them.
Add about 1/3 wings, about 1/3 sauce, same thing twice more.
I find that just makes it easier to evenly coat the wings.
If you want to add a little chart to the coating, you can broil the wings for a minute per side, keep an eye on them do you don't over do it.
My daughter does not like it that way, so we skip this step when she is home.
Serve immediately.
68d4e3063b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground black pepper, salt, and sesame oil.
3. Add the wing sections to the bowl and toss them to coat evenly with the spices.
4. Spread the wings out on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Roast the wings in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the skin is crispy.
6. While the wings are cooking, prepare the ranch dressing by whisking together the ingredients in a small bowl.
7. Once the wings are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, ranch dressing, and BBQ sauce.
9. Toss the cooled wings in the sauce mixture, making sure they are evenly coated.
10. Serve the Heidi's Asian BBQ Ranch Wings immediately, and enjoy!

d070cb5476.gt:
In a small bowl, mix together rosemary, thyme, marjoram, salt, and pepper.
Rub herb mixture over tenderloin.
Place in a container, and pour hard cider over roast.
Add water until pork is completely submerged.
Cover, and refrigerate 6 to 8 hours, or overnight.
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place roast in a roasting pan, elevated from the bottom, and pour marinade around the meat.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated oven.
In a large bowl, mix apples and onion.
Put mixture around and on top of roast.
Spoon brown sugar over entire pan evenly.
Place roast back into oven, and continue to cook for 1 hour more, or until meat reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).
Transfer roast, apples, and onion to a serving platter.
For the gravy, brown flour in a skillet.
Pour the marinade/drippings mixture into the skillet.
Stir in syrup.
Cook and stir over high heat until liquid has thickened to desired consistency.
Slice roast, and serve with gravy.
d070cb5476.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloin with salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the dried rosemary, dried thyme, dried marjoram, brown sugar, flour, and maple syrup.
4. Place the pork tenderloin in the center of the mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
6. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the pork tenderloin and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until the pork is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 145°F (63°C).
7. Remove the pork from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
8. In a large oven-safe skillet or baking dish, heat the hard apple cider over medium heat.
9. Add the cored and cut Granny Smith apples to the skillet, and cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the apples are tender and slightly caramelized.
10. Carefully transfer the pork and apples to the prepared baking dish.
11. Drizzle the melted butter over the pork and apples.
12. Bake the pork and apples in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and the apples are tender and slightly caramelized.
13. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Rosemary Pork Tenderloin!

7384993dda.gt:
Mix gin, rum, vodka, tequila, triple sec, Midori, blue curacao and sour mix together.
Shake well and pour into Hurricane glass.
Then add a splash of 7-up to the top and serve.
7384993dda.pred:
To cook a delightful Blue Bahama dish, follow these steps:
1. In a shaker, combine the gin, rum, vodka, tequila, triple sec, Midori melon liqueur, and blue curacao.
2. Fill the shaker with ice.
3. Shake the ingredients vigorously for about 15-20 seconds.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Top the drink with 7-Up soda.
6. Garnish the drink with a lime wedge and a cherry.

This Blue Bahama cocktail is a refreshing and flavorful drink that combines various types of alcohol with a splash of color from the blue curacao and melon liqueur. It is perfect for a relaxing evening or a fun gathering with friends.

0fa7e0e5ac.gt:
In a large bowl, whip heavy whipping cream until firm peaks form.
Spoon into a separate bowl and set aside.
In the same bowl you just whipped the cream in, stir pumpkin, ricotta, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla together.
Scrape sides and whip 1 minute.
Carefully fold in whipped cream.
Spoon or pipe into sugar cones and top with chocolate chips and walnuts.
Serve.
0fa7e0e5ac.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1/2 cup of heavy whipping cream, 3/4 cups of pureed pumpkin, and 3/4 cups of ricotta cheese. Mix well until smooth.
3. Add the 13 cups of granulated sugar, 1/4 teaspoon of cinnamon, 18 teaspoons of nutmeg, and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
4. Fill the sugar cones with the pumpkin mixture, leaving a small amount of space at the top.
5. Bake the filled sugar cones in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the filling is set and the edges are slightly crispy.
6. Remove the baked cones from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. While the cones are cooling, melt the 2 tablespoons of chocolate chips and 2 tablespoons of chopped walnuts in a microwave or on the stovetop.
8. Once the cones are cool, drizzle the melted chocolate and walnut mixture over the tops of the cones.
9. Serve the Pumpkin Filled Cannoli Cones immediately, as they are best enjoyed fresh.

[/INST]

c78e924f69.gt:
Whisk mayonnaise, yogurt, vinegar and crushed red pepper to taste in a medium bowl.
Add pineapple and coleslaw mix and stir to combine.
Place cornmeal in a shallow dish.
Sprinkle both sides of fish with Cajun seasoning and salt.
Dredge the fish in the cornmeal.
Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add half the fish and cook until golden, about 2 minutes per side.
Transfer to a plate and repeat with the remaining 2 teaspoons oil and fish, adjusting heat as needed to prevent burning.
Top toasted bread with the fish and pineapple slaw to make sandwiches.
Serve immediately.
c78e924f69.pred:
To prepare a tasty Healthy Crispy Fish Sandwich With Pineapple Slaw dish, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the low-fat mayonnaise, nonfat plain yogurt, rice vinegar, and crushed red pepper flakes. Set aside.

2. In a large bowl, combine the canned pineapple chunks, drained and coarsely chopped, with the coleslaw mix.

3. In a separate bowl, mix the cajun seasoning, salt, and canola oil.

4. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.

5. Season the haddock or cod with the cajun seasoning mixture, and then cook it in the hot skillet or griddle until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.

6. While the fish is cooking, toast the whole wheat bread or whole grain buns.

7. Once the fish is cooked, remove it from the skillet or griddle and let it rest for a few minutes.

8. Place the cooked fish on the toasted bread or buns, and then spread the pineapple-coleslaw mixture over the fish.

9. Serve the Healthy Crispy Fish Sandwich With Pineapple Slaw immediately.

This dish offers a delicious and healthy meal option, as it includes a variety of nutrients from the fish, pineapple, and coleslaw. The crispy fish sandwich is also a satisfying and crunchy addition to the dish.

35d5f29f3c.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, saute onion in the olive oil, along with the dried basil.
Saute over medium heat and stir frequently so the basil does not burn.
Cook until onions are tender and translucent.
Add salt to taste.
When pasta is done, drain and add onion basil mixture.
Add cheese and toss to coat.
Serve warm.
Add salt to taste if needed.
35d5f29f3c.pred:
1. Begin by cooking the pasta according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to combine with the onion and garlic mixture.
6. Add the dried basil, salt, and grated mozzarella cheese to the skillet. Stir to combine.
7. Cook for a few minutes, until the cheese is melted and the pasta is heated through.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Whole Wheat Basil Pasta!

3af2ae11f5.gt:
Combine salt, pepper, chili powder and bay leaves.
Rub meat completely with liquid Smoke.
Place meat, fat side up, in a large roasting pan.
Sprinkle dry seasoning mixture on top.
Cover tightly.
Bake for 3 1/2 to 4 hours at 325 degrees.
Scrape seasoning off meat and cut in very thin slices across the grain.
Serve with barbecue sauce.
To make sauce, combine all ingredients.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Cook for 10 minutes.
Serve with sliced brisket.
3af2ae11f5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the beef brisket with the salt, pepper, chili powder, crushed bay leaf, and liquid smoke.
3. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, cook the brisket on medium-high heat until browned on all sides. Remove the brisket from the pot and set aside.
4. In the same pot, add the brown sugar, catsup, water, and liquid smoke. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 2 hours or until the brisket is tender.
5. While the brisket is cooking, prepare the sauce by combining the Worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, celery seeds, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl.
6. After the brisket is cooked, return it to the pot and pour the sauce over it. Stir to combine, then let the brisket rest in the sauce for about 15 minutes.
7. Meanwhile, melt the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the Worcestershire sauce mixture and stir to combine.
8. Once the brisket is rested, remove it from the pot and slice it into thin pieces.
9. Pour the sauce over the sliced brisket and serve immediately.

This recipe for Rocky Mountain Brisket with Barbecue Sauce combines the flavors of a classic barbecue sauce with the tender, juicy texture of beef brisket. The result is a delicious and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by both meat lovers and those who prefer a vegetarian option.

f44011121d.gt:
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the oil until shimmering.
Add the onion, garlic, ginger and chiles and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the curry powder and turmeric and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the broth and coconut milk and season with salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the potatoes and cook over moderate heat until barely tender, 5 minutes.
Add the cauliflower and squash, cover partially and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 15 minutes.
Add the chicken to the casserole, season with salt and pepper and cook just until white throughout, about 5 minutes.
Serve over rice, with lemon wedges.
f44011121d.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the ginger, chiles, curry powder, turmeric, and salt, and cook for 1 minute.
3. Pour in the chicken broth, coconut milk, and bring to a simmer.
4. Add the potatoes, cauliflower, and squash to the saucepan, and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 20-25 minutes.
5. Add the chicken pieces, and cook until the chicken is cooked through, about 10-15 minutes.
6. Serve the Chicken Curry with Squash over rice, and garnish with lemon wedges.

[/INST]

8afb34ca7c.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Quarter the large strawberries and halve the smaller ones.
Place the strawberries in a 9-inch pie plate or 8x8 baking dish.
Sprinkle the sugar over the strawberries and toss several times.
Roast the strawberries for 15-20 minutes, stirring once during the baking time.
The strawberries are done when they have softened and the juices are thick and bubbly.
Cool completely and store in the fridge.
8afb34ca7c.pred:
1. Wash the strawberries thoroughly.
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
4. Place the washed strawberries on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Drizzle the strawberries with the sugar, making sure to coat them evenly.
6. Roast the strawberries in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the strawberries cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Roasted Strawberries as a delicious and healthy dessert or snack.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

c33ce732c6.gt:
Add a pinch of salt to a pot of boiling water.
Cut the broccoli into small florets and boil for 40 seconds to a minute!
* Do not over boil and drain in a sieve.
Finely chop the bacon and garlic.
Pour a generous amount of oil into a pan and fry the bacon until it is brown and crispy.
Add the garlic.
When the garlic is fragrant, add the broccoli.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.
Allow the flavours to blend and it's done!
c33ce732c6.pred:
1. Wash the broccoli and trim the ends.
2. Cut the broccoli into bite-sized florets.
3. Cut the bacon into thin strips.
4. Peel and chop the garlic.
5. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
6. Add the olive oil (or vegetable oil) to the skillet.
7. Add the chopped garlic and cook for about 1 minute, stirring occasionally, until fragrant.
8. Add the broccoli florets to the skillet and cook for about 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the broccoli is tender but still slightly crisp.
9. Add the bacon strips to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the bacon is crispy.
10. Season the stir fry with salt and pepper to taste.
11. Serve the Broccoli and Garlic Stir Fry hot.

This recipe is a simple and healthy way to enjoy broccoli and garlic, while incorporating the flavors of bacon for a delicious and satisfying meal.

92214874b7.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Cook lasagna in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.
Drain.
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat; stir cream cheese into hot butter until it begins to melt, about 5 minutes.
Season with salt, onion powder, and black pepper.
Whisk warm milk gradually into cream cheese until smooth; stir in 1 1/2 cup Swiss cheese.
Bring sauce to a simmer, stirring constantly, until cheese has melted and sauce has thickened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Spread 3/4 cup of cheese sauce into bottom of a 9x9-inch baking dish.
Arrange 1/3 of the lasagna noodles over the sauce and spread half the cooked chicken and half the ham over the noodles.
Pour 1 cup sauce over chicken and ham.
Repeat layers starting with half the remaining lasagna noodles, remaining chicken, remaining ham, and 1 more cup of cheese sauce.
Finish by layering remaining lasagna noodles, remaining sauce, 1/2 cup Swiss cheese, and bread crumbs; sprinkle top with Italian seasoning.
Cover dish with aluminum foil.
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling, about 25 minutes.
Remove foil and continue to bake until crumbs are browned, about 10 more minutes.
Let casserole stand 5 to 10 minutes before serving.
92214874b7.pred:
To make a delicious Chicken Cordon Bleu Lasagna dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the cream cheese and cook until smooth and melted.

3. Add the cooked chicken, ham, and Swiss cheese to the skillet. Cook until the chicken is fully cooked through and the cheese is melted. Season with salt, onion powder, and black pepper to taste.

4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken mixture, warm milk, and Italian seasoning. Mix well.

5. Spread a thin layer of the chicken and cheese mixture over the bottom of a 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.

6. Layer the lasagna noodles on top of the chicken mixture, breaking them into smaller pieces if necessary.

7. Repeat the chicken and cheese layering process, alternating between the chicken and cheese mixtures.

8. Sprinkle the bread crumbs on top of the final layer of cheese.

9. Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the lasagna is bubbly and the bread crumbs are golden brown.

10. Remove the lasagna from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before cutting and serving. Enjoy your delicious Chicken Cordon Bleu Lasagna!

24452e5a07.gt:
Stir the cream cheese, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, salsa verde, red salsa, onion, lime juice, and chili powder seasoning together in a bowl until well blended.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
24452e5a07.pred:
To prepare a delicious TJ's Creamy Salsa, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the softened cream cheese and sour cream until smooth.
2. In a separate bowl, combine the minced jalapeno pepper, red and green salsas, minced onion, and fresh lime juice.
3. Add the cream cheese and sour cream mixture to the salsa mixture and stir until well combined.
4. Season the salsa with Mexican-style chili powder and Tajin fruit seasoning, if desired.
5. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.

Once the salsa is prepared, it can be served as a dip or topping for various dishes, such as chips, tacos, or as a topping for grilled meats or vegetables. Enjoy your delicious TJ's Creamy Salsa!

a0e261ef2d.gt:
Stir liquid soap into baking soda.
Add the water, and stir to be as smooth as possible.
Add the vinegar and stir again.
Pour into a squeeze bottle.
(A clean, empty ketchup or syrup bottle works well.)
Shake well before using, and keep tightly closed between uses.
a0e261ef2d.pred:
[/INST]

To prepare Earth Scrub all-purpose cleaner, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup baking soda, 1 cup liquid soap, and 1 cup water. Mix well until the baking soda is fully incorporated.
2. Add 2 tablespoons white vinegar to the mixture. Mix well to ensure that the baking soda is evenly distributed throughout the mixture.
3. Store the mixture in an airtight container or a glass jar.

Earth Scrub all-purpose cleaner is a versatile and eco-friendly cleaning solution that can be used for various tasks, such as cleaning countertops, sinks, and other surfaces. It is gentle on surfaces and is effective in removing dirt, grime, and stains. The essential ingredients in Earth Scrub are baking soda, liquid soap, water, and white vinegar. These ingredients work together to create a powerful and effective cleaning solution that is both gentle on surfaces and environmentally friendly.

43d8c95718.gt:
Brew coffee using a ratio of about 1 1/2 tablespoons coffee per cup of water.
(We used a single brew coffee maker and used the espresso strength setting that uses less water and brews a stronger coffee.)
Set the coffee aside to reach room temperature or place it in the refrigerator for 10-15 minutes to cool quickly.
Add the room temperature coffee, creamer, raspberry and hazelnut syrups, and the ice into a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the drink into a tall glass and enjoy!
Optional garnishes: top with whipped cream, shaved chocolate, mint leaves and a raspberry.
43d8c95718.pred:
To cook a delicious Raspberry Hazelnut Frappe dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large glass, combine 4 ounces of fluid strongly brewed coffee and 2 tablespoons of hazelnut flavored creamer (or half-and-half). Stir well to ensure the creamer is fully incorporated.
2. Add 2 teaspoons of raspberry syrup and 2 teaspoons of hazelnut syrup to the coffee mixture. Stir again to combine the flavors.
3. Pour the coffee mixture into a blender.
4. Add 1 cup of crushed ice to the blender.
5. Blend the mixture until it reaches a smooth, creamy consistency.
6. Pour the frappe into a glass and enjoy!

The Raspberry Hazelnut Frappe dish is a delightful combination of flavors, with the strong coffee providing a rich base, the hazelnut syrup adding a warm, nutty taste, the raspberry syrup providing a sweet and tangy contrast, and the crushed ice adding a refreshing, icy texture. This dish is perfect for a morning pick-me-up or a delicious treat during any time of the day.

a87b593bc7.gt:
Set oven to 325 degrees.
Prepare an ungreased 10-inch tube pan.
In a large bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt, then sift one more time, then beat in oil, egg YOLKS, 1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons lemon juice, water and lemon peel with an electric mixer at low speed for about 3 minutes.
In a large dry copper or stainless steel bowl beat the room temperature egg whites with cream of tartar until stiff but not dry.
Fold in about 1/4 of the whites into the batter to lighten, the gently fold in the remaining whites.
Pour the batter into the ungreased tube pan.
Tap on the counter to release any air pockets.
Bake for about 1-1/4 hours, or until the cake is springy to the touch.
Immediately invert cake in pan over neck of a bottle (I use an empty beer bottle for this).
Cool the cake completely while inverted.
Remove the cake from the bottle and place on the counter.
Run a knife around the edges of the pan to loosen cake.
Transfer the cake to a serving plate.
Dust with powdered sugar.
a87b593bc7.pred:
To craft a delicious Heavenly Lemon Chiffon Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Whisk until well combined.

3. Add the vegetable oil and eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.

4. In a separate bowl, whisk the fresh lemon juice, grated lemon peel, cream of tartar, and powdered sugar until smooth.

5. Gradually pour the lemon mixture into the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.

6. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.

7. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

9. Once the cake is fully cooled, you can dust it with powdered sugar or serve it with a dollop of whipped cream or freshly squeezed lemon juice.

Enjoy your Heavenly Lemon Chiffon Cake!

96679eee56.gt:
Blend four, 1 cup sugar, 3 tbsp melted butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into greased 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Pour fruit on top of batter.
Sprinkle remaining sugar on top.
Dot with remaining butter.
Bake on 375 for 45 min or until golden brown on top.
NOTE: If using fresh fruit, boil fruit with 1/4 cup water and 1 tbsp sugar until water is reduced to a syrup.
96679eee56.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 1 cup of self-rising flour, 1 cup of granulated sugar, and the 34 cup of sugar.
3. Add the melted butter and mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches a smooth consistency.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Arrange the peaches in the batter, distributing them evenly.
7. Dot the top of the batter with the remaining tablespoon of melted butter.
8. Bake the cobbler in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the cobbler is golden brown and the peaches are tender.
9. Remove the cobbler from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Old Fashioned Southern Peach Cobbler recipe is a delicious dessert that combines the sweetness of the peaches with the richness of the cobbler batter. The use of self-rising flour and granulated sugar adds a classic touch, while the melted butter and milk create a smooth and moist texture. The result is a delightful dessert that is perfect for sharing with family and friends.

b4e6dfe29e.gt:
Place all shake ingredients in a blender in the order listed.
Blend until it's as smooth as you like it.
Pour into a large parfait glass.
Top with whipped cream, sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles, green colored sugar, then place the cherry on top.
Insert a long-handled (parfait) spoon, two straws, and a candy cane.
Serve cuddled by the fireside listening to your favorite Christmas carols and watching your holiday tree glisten.
Just like two turtle doves.
Enjoy!
b4e6dfe29e.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 6 peppermint candies (or 2 candy canes broken up) and 12 cups of 2% low-fat milk. If using liquor, add 1/4 cup of additional milk.
2. Add 2 large scoops of vanilla ice cream and 2 tablespoons of chocolate chips.
3. Crush 4 Oreo cookies into pieces and add them to the blender.
4. If desired, add 14 cups of Baileys Irish Cream to the blender.
5. Add 2 tablespoons of whipped cream to the blender.
6. In a small bowl, mix 12 teaspoons of sugar (green colored) and 12 teaspoons of chocolate sprinkles.
7. Add the maraschino cherry and the green colored sugar mixture to the blender.
8. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
9. Pour the milkshake into a glass and garnish with a candy cane.

This Holiday Merry-Mint Milkshake is a delicious and festive treat that combines the flavors of peppermint, chocolate, and mint, along with the creaminess of ice cream and the warmth of Baileys Irish Cream. The green colored sugar and chocolate sprinkles add a touch of holiday cheer, making it a perfect drink to enjoy during the holiday season.

024ad1d04e.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large bowl, whisk all dry ingredients together to combine.
Form a well in the middle of the dry ingredients.
Measure and pour the remaining wet ingredients into the well.
Slowly and gently mix the wet into the dry until just combined.
Scoop into 12 greased or paper-lined muffin tins.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean when inserted.
024ad1d04e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Whole Wheat Flour, Baking Powder, Baking Soda, Salt, Cinnamon, Ground Cloves, and Nutmeg.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the Brown Sugar, Canola Oil, and Applesauce until smooth.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the grated carrot and chopped nuts (optional).
6. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until lightly beaten.
7. Gently fold the eggs into the batter until just combined.
8. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter, and fill each cup about 3/4 full.
9. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
10. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Whole Wheat Carrot Muffins!

bc714d6f9c.gt:
Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add onion; cook 2 to 3 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add rice; cook 1 to 2 minutes more or until rice is browned lightly, stirring frequently.
Add broth, drained tomatoes, chili powder and cumin to saucepan; stir to combine.
Bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until liquid is absorbed.
bc714d6f9c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, heat the Pure Wesson Canola Oil over medium heat. Add the chopped yellow onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the uncooked rice and stir to combine. Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
4. Pour in the reduced-sodium chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
5. Add the drained Ro*Tel Original Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, chili powder, and ground cumin. Stir to combine.
6. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the flavors are well-mixed.
7. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Spanish Rice hot, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

[/INST]

7e8b44a915.gt:
Mix chicken, carrots, broth, ginger root, brown sugar, soy sauce, allspice and pepper sauce in a 4-5 quart crock pot, slow cooker Cover and cook on low heat setting 7-9 hours or until veggies are tender and chicken is no longer pink in centre.
Mix cornstarch and reserved pineapple juice, gradually stir into chicken mixture.
Stir in pineapple and bell pepper.
Cover and cook on high heat setting about 15 minutes longer or until slightly thickened and bubbly.
7e8b44a915.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken pieces, carrots, chicken broth, gingerroot, brown sugar, soy sauce, ground allspice, red pepper sauce, and cornstarch. Mix well.
3. Transfer the mixture to a 4-quart (4L) crock pot. Cook on low heat for 6-8 hours, or until the chicken is cooked through and the carrots are tender.
4. Add the pineapple chunks and juice to the crock pot. Cook for an additional 30 minutes, or until the pineapple is tender and the sauce has thickened.
5. Remove the crock pot from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully transfer the cooked chicken and vegetables to a serving dish.
7. Serve the Chicken With Pepper and Pineapple - Crock Pot hot, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

[/INST]

27f4409414.gt:
In a large bowl, combine chicken broth with 3 cups ice.
Add chicken; chill 1 hour.
Meanwhile, in a resealable bag, combine bread crumbs, flour, salt, cayenne, oregano, garlic, parsley, and pepper; shake.
Preheat oven to 400F Coat a large baking sheet with vegetable or olive oil spray; set aside.
Place yogurt in a medium bowl.
Remove chicken from broth.
One piece at a time, dip chicken into yogurt, then place in bread crumb mixture and shake.
Place breaded chicken on baking sheet.
Spray tops of chicken with vegetable spray.
Bake 45 to 50 minutes, until golden brown.
Serve hot or at room temperature.
27f4409414.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the chicken broth, panko breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, salt, cayenne pepper, oregano, garlic, and nonfat yogurt.
3. Add the skinless chicken breast halves to the bowl, tossing to coat evenly with the breading mixture.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the breaded chicken pieces evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the breading is golden brown.
6. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces.
7. Serve the You're Gonna Love This Oven-Fried Chicken hot, garnished with chopped fresh parsley.

[/INST]

1156557bd2.gt:
To make vinaigrette, whisk together mustard, vinegar, and 1 tablespoon oil in a medium bowl.
Season with salt and pepper.
Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add asparagus, and season with salt and pepper.
Reduce heat to medium-low.
Cook, stirring frequently, until asparagus are just tender, 10-12 minutes.
(If the spears begin to brown, reduce heat to low.
).
Transfer aspargus to serving dish.
Drizzle with the vinaigrette, toss, and serve immediately.
1156557bd2.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the asparagus under cold water and pat it dry with a paper towel.
- In a small bowl, mix the Dijon mustard, sherry wine or red wine vinegar, and extra-virgin olive oil. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.

2. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add the olive oil and allow it to heat for a few seconds.

3. Add the asparagus to the skillet, making sure not to overcrowd it. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender but still slightly crisp.

4. Pour the Dijon mustard mixture over the asparagus, stirring to coat evenly. Cook for another 2-3 minutes, or until the vinaigrette has thickened slightly.

5. Serve the sauteed asparagus immediately, garnished with freshly ground black pepper and a sprinkle of coarse salt, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Sauteed Asparagus With Dijon Vinaigrette dish!

af2aa1a2fd.gt:
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Cook sausages in hot skillet, turning regularly, until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
Transfer to a cutting board and slice.
Heat olive oil in a separate skillet over medium heat.
Cook and stir onion, bell pepper, and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes; season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper and cook 1 minute more.
Add sliced sausage, crushed tomatoes, and sliced zucchini; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and continue cooking until the zucchini is tender, about 10 minutes.
af2aa1a2fd.pred:
To cook a delicious Evelyn's Spicy Italian Sausage and Zucchini dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or oven-safe pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the sliced green bell pepper and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until softened.
5. Add the crushed tomatoes, red pepper flakes, salt, and ground black pepper to taste. Stir to combine.
6. Add the sliced zucchini to the pan, and cook for another 5-7 minutes, until the zucchini is tender and the sauce has thickened.
7. Remove the pan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Meanwhile, cook the sausage according to the package instructions. Typically, this involves browning the sausage in a skillet or oven, then removing it from the pan and allowing it to cool.
9. Once the sausage is cooked, slice it into bite-sized pieces.
10. Add the cooked sausage to the pan with the zucchini mixture. Stir to combine.
11. Transfer the sausage and zucchini mixture to a large baking dish or oven-safe casserole dish.
12. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sausage is cooked through and the zucchini is tender.
13. Serve the dish hot, garnished with fresh parsley or basil, if desired. Enjoy your delicious Evelyn's Spicy Italian Sausage and Zucchini dish!

dcc524d157.gt:
Brown hamburger and onions in the oil.
Combine all other ingredients in the crockpot (Except for the cheese)
Cover and cook 1 hour on high then turn your crockpot to low and cook for an additional 4 hours.
When finished cooking sprinkle the cheese on top and let sit in the cooker for about 5-10 more minutes until its all melted through.
dcc524d157.pred:
[/INST]

[INST] <<SYS>>
To create a delicious Macaroni & Hamburger One Dish Crock Pot Casserole, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onion to the skillet and cook until it is softened.
4. Stir in the spaghetti sauce, elbow macaroni, whole corn, beef broth, salt, pepper, chili powder, brown sugar, and sharp cheddar cheese.
5. Transfer the mixture to a large, oven-safe casserole dish.
6. Cover the casserole dish with aluminum foil and bake for 1 hour. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 30 minutes, or until the casserole is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the Macaroni & Hamburger One Dish Crock Pot Casserole immediately.

Enjoy your delicious homemade meal!
<</SYS>>

b305dd0b36.gt:
Combine and store in an air-tight container.
Notes: To make taco meat, brown 1 lb ground beef in skillet; drain.
Add seasoning mix and 3/4 cup of water.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat.
Simmer uncovered, 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
b305dd0b36.pred:
To prepare Taco Bell Taco Seasoning Clone/Copycat, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix the all-purpose flour, cornstarch, and dried onion flakes.
2. In a separate bowl, combine the beef bouillon granules, garlic salt, ground cumin, paprika, chili powder, onion salt, cayenne pepper, and granulated sugar.
3. Gradually add the liquid mixture to the dry mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Store the seasoning mixture in an airtight container or a sealed plastic bag.

This Taco Bell Taco Seasoning Clone/Copycat recipe will allow you to recreate the flavor of Taco Bell's seasoning mix at home, making it easy to enjoy your favorite Taco Bell tacos without having to visit the restaurant.

d0702f3d7d.gt:
Put cole slaw mix into bowl.
Mix together the oil, vinegar, sugar, salt & pepper.
Pour over cole slaw mix.
Toast almonds on cookie sheet at 350 degrees for 5 minutes.
Put almonds and craisins into slaw mix and toss.
d0702f3d7d.pred:
To prepare a tasty Craisin Cole Slaw dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the shredded coleslaw mix, oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Mix well to ensure the ingredients are evenly distributed.
2. Add the toasted slivered almonds and dried cranberries (craisins) to the bowl, stirring gently to combine.
3. Allow the mixture to sit for about 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve the Craisin Cole Slaw as a side dish or a salad, garnished with additional toasted slivered almonds if desired.

This dish is a delicious and healthy alternative to traditional coleslaw, as it combines the crunchy texture of the coleslaw mix with the sweetness of the cranberries and the added nutty flavor of the almonds. The dressing provides a tangy contrast to the overall taste, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

449991b9b4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix first 9 ingredients in large bowl until well blended.
Fill pepper halves with sausage mixture, dividing equally and mounding slightly.
Arrange in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover; chill.)
Bake peppers uncovered until tops are browned and thermometer inserted into filling registers 165F, about 1 hour.
Transfer peppers to platter.
Garnish with rosemary sprigs and serve.
449991b9b4.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sweet Italian sausages, grated zucchini, red onion, parsley, breadcrumbs, egg, black pepper, salt, and rosemary. Mix well to combine the ingredients.
3. Stuff each bell pepper half with the sausage and vegetable mixture, leaving a little room for expansion.
4. Place the stuffed peppers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
5. Drizzle some olive oil over the stuffed peppers and sprinkle with more rosemary.
6. Bake the stuffed peppers in the preheated oven for about 45-50 minutes, or until the peppers are tender and the filling is cooked through.
7. Remove the peppers from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

This cooking procedure involves several steps, including preparing the filling, stuffing the peppers, and baking them in the oven. The result is a delicious and satisfying stuffed pepper dish that can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish.

52ceec4747.gt:
Combine all ingredients except tomatoes, in mixing bowl and whisk till combined.
Place tomatoes in zip top bag.
Pour mixture over tomatoes.
Seal and refrigerate for 6 hours.
Lay lettuce on serving platter.
Drain tomatoes and reserve marinade.
Place tomatoes on lettuce and serve marinade on the side for dipping.
52ceec4747.pred:
1. First, wash the tomatoes thoroughly to remove any dirt or bacteria.
2. In a large bowl, mix the chopped tomatoes with the salad oil, vinegar, salt, dried basil, dried tarragon, and black pepper.
3. Allow the mixture to sit for at least 30 minutes to marinate and allow the flavors to meld together.
4. After the marinating period, drain the mixture and discard the excess liquid.
5. Add the chopped lettuce to the bowl and toss gently to combine the ingredients.
6. Serve the marinated tomatoes and lettuce mixture as a side dish or a salad, garnished with additional fresh basil or tarragon if desired.

This recipe for Marinated Tomatoes with the accompanying ingredients creates a delicious and refreshing dish that can be enjoyed as a side or a salad. The combination of flavors from the tomatoes, oil, vinegar, salt, basil, tarragon, and pepper creates a well-balanced and satisfying taste experience.

5b23053aa4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Combine flours, Splenda, cocoa, and baking soda.
Add bananas, yogurt, egg whites, vanilla, and 1/2 cup walnuts.
Stir.
Coat a 9" x 13" cake pan with cooking spray.
Pour batter into pan, spreading evenly.
Bake about 35 minutes.
Cool.
Raise oven to 375F.
Toast remaining 1/4 cup walnuts 6 minutes.
To make frosting, pour 1/4 cup milk into a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Stir in Splenda, cocoa, and cornstarch.
Slowly add remaining 3/4 cup milk and bring to a low boil, stirring continuously until thick.
Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla.
Cool and spread over cake.
Sprinkle walnuts over cake.
5b23053aa4.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole-wheat flour, unbleached all-purpose flour, Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking, baking soda, and cocoa powder.
3. In a separate bowl, mash the overly ripe bananas.
4. Add the mashed bananas, yogurt, egg whites, vanilla extract, and chopped walnuts to the dry ingredients.
5. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch and butter until smooth.
6. Add the cornstarch mixture to the wet ingredients and mix until well combined.
7. Spray a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan with vegetable-oil cooking spray.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
9. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

This delightful Chocolate-Banana Cake with Walnuts dish is a delicious and nutritious treat that combines the natural sweetness of bananas, the rich flavor of chocolate, and the crunchiness of walnuts. The use of whole-wheat flour and Splenda Sugar Blend for Baking makes it a healthier option, while the addition of lowfat milk and cornstarch helps to achieve the right consistency. The result is a moist, flavorful cake that is perfect for sharing with friends and family.

7106d13160.gt:
preheat oven to 350
cream together brown sugar, butter, milk and eggs
mix in bisquick
in pieces add bananas 1 at a time until incorporated
pour batter into greased bread pan or baking dish of choice (i use an 8x10 casserole because i dont have a bread pan)
bake at 350 for 45-55 minutes
remove from oven, cool for 5 minutes for easier removal from pan
7106d13160.pred:
To create a delicious Major's banana bread dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brown sugar, melted butter, and milk. Whisk until smooth.

3. Add the eggs one at a time, whisking well after each addition.

4. Stir in the dry ingredients: 2 cups of bisquick, and 2 ripe bananas.

5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured loaf pan.

6. Bake the banana bread for 1 hour and 10 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

7. Allow the banana bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove it from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

8. Once cooled, slice the banana bread and serve it warm or at room temperature.

This Major's banana bread dish is a delicious and moist treat, perfect for breakfast or a snack. The combination of brown sugar, melted butter, milk, eggs, and bananas creates a rich and flavorful loaf. The bisquick provides the necessary leavening and structure, while the ripe bananas add natural sweetness and a tender texture.

3182df418c.pred:
1. Wash and chop the ingredients: Start by washing the watermelon, cucumbers, red onions, and cilantro. Then, chop the watermelon, cucumbers, and red onions into small, even pieces. Chop the cilantro leaves and set aside.

2. Combine the ingredients: In a large bowl, combine the chopped watermelon, cucumbers, red onions, and cilantro leaves.

3. Add the dressing: Pour the Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing over the ingredients and mix well.

4. Add the serrano chiles and salt: Add the minced serrano chiles and salt to the bowl, and mix well.

5. Serve: Serve the Fresh Watermelon Spring Salsa immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving. Enjoy the delicious and refreshing salsa!

894be65c73.gt:
Heat oven to 425 degrees F.
Combine spices and brown sugar; rub on chicken.
Add chicken, onions and garlic to roasting pan sprayed with cooking spray.
Squeeze juice from lemon halves and combine with dressing; pour over chicken.
Add lemon halves to pan.
Bake chicken 30 min.
or until done (165 degrees F).
894be65c73.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken leg quarters with the paprika, curry powder, brown sugar, and salt.
3. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onion and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the lemon halves to the skillet and cook for 1 minute.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. In a separate bowl, mix the vinaigrette dressing with the lemon juice.
8. Add the chicken and onion mixture to the bowl with the vinaigrette dressing and toss to coat evenly.
9. Transfer the chicken and onion mixture to a baking dish.
10. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
11. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.
12. Serve the roast chicken with onions and lemon slices on the side. Enjoy your delicious homemade roast chicken with onions and lemon!

f37cddfed9.gt:
I've listed 1 rice cooker cup worth (before cooking) of rice, but use as much as you need depending on how much you need.
Incidentally, I filled a 880 ml and 500 ml capacity bento box (excluding the spaces for the sides) with 650 g of rice!
To prevent the rice from getting greasy, stir fry the ingredients with just a little oil (use anything you like).
Add the ketchup.
Stir fry while making sure you don't scorch it.
I think you will need about 2 tablespoons of ketchup per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice (350 g when cooked).
Throw in the rice!
!
The rice will turn ketchup-colored.
Add the chicken soup stock granules to finish.
Add 1 tablespoon per 1 rice cooker cup worth of rice.
If you add too much ketchup, the rice will be soggy.
The ketchup will just lightly color the rice.
The chicken stock granules will flavor the rice.
Other dishes you could pack in your bento along with the rice is this mentsuyu katsudon (pork cutlets on rice with sauce).
The rice won't become soggy.
Make omurice with scrambled eggs.
f37cddfed9.pred:
[INST]
1. In a small saucepan, combine the ketchup and chicken soup stock granules. Heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the ketchup is melted and the mixture is smooth.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the hot cooked rice and sausages. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the rice is heated through and the sausages are cooked through.
3. In a separate saucepan, heat the mixed frozen vegetables according to the package instructions.
4. Combine the cooked rice, sausages, and frozen vegetables in a large bowl.
5. Serve the Easy Ketchup Rice for Bento and Omurice immediately.

[/INST]

bbff2a5297.gt:
Clean the shrimp and pat dry.
Slice and toast the baguette.
Peel all the garlic and mince finely.
Add to a pan over medium low heat with the olive oil.
We have a clay pot from Spain, but any pan will work.
Keep stirring, allowing the garlic to sizzle lightly (you want to make sure not to burn the garlic) for a few minutes.
Add the paprika, salt and pepper, and stir.
Bring the heat up to medium and add the shrimp to the pan.
Let the shrimp cook for 90 seconds, flip, and add the white wine.
Let everything cook together for another 2 minutes, or until the shrimp is just cooked through.
Place shrimp on toasted bread, drizzle with garlic oil, and garnish with parsley.
bbff2a5297.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, paprika, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper.
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, mix the white wine, chopped parsley, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
7. Place the shrimp on the sliced baguette, and then pour the white wine mixture over the shrimp.
8. Place the baguette on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 5-7 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the shrimp is cooked through.
9. Serve the Garlic Shrimp Tapas immediately.

[/INST]

ae1b5ff73e.gt:
FOR SALSA: Place all the ingrediens in medium bowl and stir gently to combine.
Cover and set aside.
FOR SWEETCORN CAKES: Combine 2 cups of the corn, onion, eggs, cilantro, flour, baking powder, salt and pepper in a food processor.
Process until well mixed.
Add the remaining 1/2 cup corn into the mixture and mix well.
Heat a large skillet at medium heat and brush with oil.
Spoon 2 heaping tablespoons of the mixture for each corn cake onto griddle.
Cook each side for 1 to 2 minutes.
Cook in batches.
Keep the cooked corn cakes warm in a 200F preheated oven.
Serve with salsa.
Makes 15 cakes.
ae1b5ff73e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn kernels, red onions, and eggs. Season with salt, pepper, and hot sauce to taste.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, and cilantro leaves. Add the mixture to the corn and onion mixture, stirring until well combined.
4. Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet and cook the corn and onion mixture until the corn is tender and the onions are slightly caramelized.
5. Remove the mixture from the skillet and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the avocado, lime juice, and green onions.
7. Add the cooled corn and onion mixture to the avocado mixture, stirring to combine.
8. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
9. Bake the cake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before removing it from the pan and transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. Serve the Corn Cakes With Avocado Salsa as a main course or a side dish. Enjoy!

e8b69ecf30.gt:
Combine flour, salt and ricotta; mix thoroughly.
Knead dough on lightly floured board until dough is smooth.
Set dough aside on corned of floured board.
Cut small pieces from dough and quickly roll dough into a "finger thin" roll, and cut into pieces about 1/2 inch long.
Flatten each piece gently with thumb and bring long sides together to form a hollow tube or shell shape.
Arrange the gnocchi on a lightly floured cloth or board, dust them lightly with flour.
After shaping all the dough, gently drop the gnocchi into a large pot of boiling, salted water.
Cook them about 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
When they rise to the surface, remove them from the pot with a strainer.
Place in a heated bowl.
Serve with your favorite pasta sauce and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
e8b69ecf30.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour and salt. Make a well in the center of the mixture.
2. Pour the ricotta cheese into the well, and slowly incorporate the flour mixture, using a fork or your hands, until the dough comes together.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for 30 minutes.
5. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
6. On a floured surface, roll out the dough into a long rope, then cut it into 1-inch pieces.
7. Place the gnocchi on a lightly floured surface and roll them over your thumb to create the desired shape.
8. In a large pot, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
9. Carefully drop the gnocchi into the boiling water, and cook for about 2 minutes or until they float to the surface.
10. Using a slotted spoon, carefully remove the gnocchi from the water and transfer them to a colander to drain.
11. Serve the Nana's Ricotta Gnocchi immediately, or let them cool and refrigerate for later use.

[/INST]
