a3f1abf485.gt:
Mix the Italian seasoning with 1 tsp olive oil and rub over chicken.
Refrigerate for 4-24 hours.
In a saucepan over medium-low heat add the tomatoes, 2 tsp olive oil, 2 tsp balsamic vinegar, and seasoning as desired.
In a large pan bring 6 cups of water to a boil and cook the pasta according the package directions.
Allow the tomatoes to simmer for 20 minutes, then add the mixed veggies and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes (I used a frozen blend).
Grill the chicken until an internal temp of 165 F is reached (approx.
7 minutes per side).
Pour the tomatoes over the pasta and top with a chicken breast.
a3f1abf485.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast halves and cook until they are browned on both sides and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the diced tomatoes and cook until they are softened and slightly mushy, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Add the mixed vegetables to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the cooked chicken back to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Add the pasta to the skillet and toss to combine with the chicken and vegetables.
8. Season the pasta with the Italian seasoning and stir to combine.
9. Transfer the pasta mixture to a large baking dish.
10. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the pasta mixture and stir to combine.
11. Bake the pasta in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the pasta is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
12. Serve the Chicken and Italian Tomatoes over the pasta and enjoy your delicious meal!

66d695cd65.gt:
For the butter: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Slice the head of garlic in half crosswise and place it on a sheet of aluminum foil.
Drizzle with the olive oil and wrap the foil around the garlic tightly to seal.
Roast for about 1 hour, until the garlic is soft and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly.
Squeeze the garlic cloves into the bowl of a food processor with the butter and salt and blend until smooth.
For the steaks: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Stir together the pepper and salt in a shallow dish and press both sides of each steak into the mixture to coat.
Add the steaks to the pan and cook for 4 to 5 minutes per side, or until cooked to your liking.
Transfer to a cutting board and let steaks rest for 10 minutes.
Slice the steaks into thin slices and spoon the garlic butter over the top.
66d695cd65.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the garlic head into cloves and remove the papery skin.
3. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, butter, and kosher salt.
4. Spread the garlic cloves on a baking sheet, and roast them in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
5. In a small bowl, mix the black peppercorns, kosher salt, and vegetable oil.
6. Season the steaks with the peppercorn mixture, and then season them with kosher salt and pepper.
7. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat, and add a small amount of oil. Once the skillet is hot, add the steaks and cook for 4-5 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.
8. Serve the steaks with the roasted garlic butter on top.

[/INST]

1666f024c2.gt:
Toss pasta with mixed vegetables, chickpeas, artichokes, onions, parsley and olives in large bowl.
Whisk pasta sauce with oil, vinegar, mustard and garlic until blended.
Add to pasta mixture; toss until evenly coated.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Spoon pasta mixture onto large platter; surround with tomatoes, cheese and salami.
1666f024c2.pred:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.
2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the vegetables by washing, peeling, and chopping them.
3. Drain the pasta and let it cool.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, chickpeas, artichoke hearts, green onions, parsley, black olives, tomatoes, and red wine vinegar.
5. In a small bowl, mix the Dijon mustard, olive oil, and minced garlic.
6. Pour the mustard mixture over the pasta mixture and toss to combine.
7. Add the provolone cheese and salami to the pasta mixture and toss to combine.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Antipasto Salad Amalfi immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

107091523c.gt:
Put a large heavy baking sheet in middle of oven and preheat oven to 425F.
Bring piloncillo, water, zest, spices, and 1/8 teaspoon salt to a boil in a small heavy saucepan, covered, stirring occasionally until piloncillo has dissolved.
Remove lid and boil over medium-low heat until syrup is thickened and reduced to about 3/4 cup, 6 to 10 minutes.
Discard zest and cool syrup slightly.
Meanwhile, peel and core apples, then cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Toss apples with flour, then with syrup.
Roll out 1 piece of dough (keeping remaining piece chilled) on a lightly floured surface with a lightly floured rolling pin into a 13-inch round, then fit into a 9-inch pie plate.
Trim edge, leaving a 1/2-inch overhang, and chill shell.
Roll out remaining piece of dough on a lightly floured surface with a lightly floured rolling pin into a 16-by 11-inch rectangle.
Cut dough crosswise into 11 (1 1/4-inch-wide) strips.
Stir apple mixture, then spoon evenly into pie shell.
Weave a tight lattice pattern over pie with pastry strips.
Trim all strips flush with edge of pie plate.
Fold bottom crust up over edge of lattice and crimp.
Brush lattice (but not edge) with milk and sprinkle with sugar.
Bake pie on hot baking sheet 20 minutes.
Reduce oven temperature to 375F and bake until crust is golden and filling is bubbling, 50 to 60 minutes more.
Cool pie to warm or room temperature, about 1 1/2 hours.
107091523c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small saucepan, combine the piloncillo, water, and orange zest. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly. Remove from heat and let cool.
3. In a large bowl, toss the apples with the flour, cinnamon, allspice, and a pinch of salt.
4. Roll out the pastry dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch. Line a 9-inch (23 cm) pie dish with the dough, leaving a 1-inch (2.5 cm) border around the edges.
5. Fill the pie dish with the apple mixture, leaving a 1-inch (2.5 cm) border around the edges.
6. Roll out the remaining dough on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch. Cut out decorative shapes or strips using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife. Place the dough strips over the apple filling, creating a lattice pattern.
7. Brush the edges of the pie crust with milk, then sprinkle with sugar.
8. Bake the pie in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
9. Allow the pie to cool for about 30 minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

[/INST]

[/SYS]

42aebc99ee.gt:
Chop strawberries.
Divide 260g (1 cup) vanilla yoghurt among four serving glasses.
Divide one-third of the strawberries among the glasses.
Sprinkle 2 tsp Milo over the strawberries in each glass.
Continue layering with 520g (2 cups) vanilla yoghurt, the remaining strawberries and 40g (1/3 cup) Milo.
Serve.
42aebc99ee.pred:
1. First, wash and hull the strawberries.
2. In a large bowl, mix the yogurt and milo until well combined.
3. Spread the yogurt mixture onto the strawberries, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Place the strawberry-yogurt mixture onto a plate or individual serving dishes.
5. Dust the top of the strawberry-yogurt mixture with a sprinkle of milo.
6. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Milo & Strawberry Sundaes!

26e693a67f.gt:
Heat oven to 425F.
Spray pie pan with cooking spray.
Place crust in pan and crimp edges.
Toss apples with lemon juice.
Stir in sugars and flour.
Pour into prepared crust.
Mix sugar into oatmeal.
Cut margarine into oatmeal, I do this with my fingers, you can use two forks or pastry blender.
Sprinkle oatmeal mixture on apples.
Place in oven for about 25 minutes Then take out and place foil around edges and put back in oven for about 20 minutes more.
Allow to cool before serving at least 15 minutes.
26e693a67f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the pie crust, oatmeal, sugar (spiced and Old English Spiced and Fruited Sugar for Apple Pies Etc!), flour, and lemon juice. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the thinly sliced apples and light margarine to the mixture. Mix until the apples are coated evenly with the mixture.
4. Pour the mixture into a pie crust and smooth the top with a spatula.
5. Bake the pie for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly and set.
6. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your Spiced Sugar Apple Pie Light!

df541b69a3.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Coat baking sheet once with cooking spray.
Set aside.
Coat large skillet with cooking spray and place over low heat.
Add onion; cook, stirring often, until just softened, about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and stir 30 seconds.
Add soy meat, breaking it up with a wooden spoon.
Stir in tomatoes, roasted jalapeno, chili powder and cumin.
Mix well.
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, 8 minutes.
Meanwhile, stack tortillas, wrap in foil and bake until warm and pliable, 8 to 10 minutes.
(Alternatively, using tongs, heat each tortilla over an open flame.)
Place tortillas on work surface and spoon about 3/4 cup meat filling in center of each.
Fold in sides and roll up, jelly-roll style.
Place on prepared baking sheet, seam side down.
Bake until chimichangas are lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
Serve hot with salsa.
df541b69a3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
3. Add the ground soy "meat" to the skillet, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Cook until the meat is browned and cooked through.
4. Add the canned diced tomatoes, chopped roasted jalapeno pepper, chili powder, and ground cumin to the skillet. Stir to combine.
5. Place the cooked meat and tomato mixture into a large mixing bowl.
6. Add the flour tortillas to the bowl, and toss them until they are evenly coated with the meat and tomato mixture.
7. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the tortilla mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
8. Bake the tortilla mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the tortillas are crispy and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Chimichangas with Fresh Tomato Salsa on the side.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

856a830dc7.gt:
Soak cucumber in cold salted (1 tsp) water for 5 minutes.
Drain and squeeze well.
Bring the water to a boil, add beanstarch vermicelli and cook according to the directions on the package.
Cut into bite sized pieces.
Mix all ingredients and marinate.
856a830dc7.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the marinade ingredients (mixed in advance) until well combined.
2. In a separate bowl, combine the beanstarch vermicelli and cucumber.
3. Pour the marinade over the vermicelli and cucumber mixture, and stir to coat evenly.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. After 30 minutes, remove the bowl from the refrigerator and stir the marinated vermicelli and cucumber mixture to ensure that the ingredients are evenly coated.
6. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
7. Grill the marinated vermicelli and cucumber mixture for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vermicelli is cooked through and the cucumber is slightly charred and tender.
8. Serve the grilled vermicelli and cucumber mixture immediately.

[/INST]

b65ea7e6a7.gt:
Boil the pasta according to the instructions on the package.
In a large frying pan, heat the oil and over a medium heat, soften the garlic.
After a couple of minutes, add the tomatoes, tomato puree and sugar, and leave to stew over medium-low heat for 10 minutes.
Add the mascarpone and stir until it has melted into the sauce.
Add the parsley or basil and season to taste with salt and pepper.
When it is ready, drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the sauce.
Mix well and then serve.
b65ea7e6a7.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, usually boiling for 8-10 minutes.
3. In a large skillet, heat the sunflower oil over medium heat.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
5. Add the diced tomatoes and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the tomato puree, sugar, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook for another 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Add the mascarpone cheese and cook until the sauce is smooth and creamy.
8. Drain the cooked pasta and add it to the skillet with the sauce. Toss to combine.
9. Add the fresh parsley or basil and toss again.
10. Serve the pasta immediately, garnished with additional parsley or basil, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Tagliatelle with Simple Tomato and Mascarpone Sauce!

0ac257a346.gt:
In large plastic bag, mix flour and salt.
Add flounder fillets and shake to coat with flour mixture.
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot salad oil, cook 2 flounder fillets 6 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork, turning fillets once with pancake turner.
Remove fillets to platter.
Repeat with remaining fillets.
Meanwhile, in small saucepan, heat sweet and sour cabbage.
To serve, with slotted spoon, spoon half of cabbage over fillets; top with diced cucumber.
Serve with remaining cabbage.
0ac257a346.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the flour, salt, and a pinch of black pepper.
3. Dip the flounder fillets in the beaten eggs, then coat them with the flour mixture.
4. Heat the salad oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the flounder fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
5. In a small bowl, mix the sweet and sour red cabbage, cucumber, and a splash of water. Season with a pinch of salt and pepper.
6. Serve the cooked flounder fillets on a plate, and garnish with the sweet and sour cabbage and cucumber mixture.

[/SYS]

2cf467b3f7.gt:
Season all sides of the beef with a fair amount of salt and pepper.
In a large Dutch oven, or other heavy pot that has a tight cover, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over moderately high heat.
Add the garlic and the beef to the pot, browning the meat on all sides, taking the time to get a nice crust on the outside.
Add the onion and allow to lightly brown, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Add the crushed tomatoes, plus 1 tomato can of water, spices, season with salt and pepper, to taste, and add enough water to cover the meat.
Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer with a lid for 3 hours, or until the meat is fork tender.
Let meat cool some in the liquid.
Shred meat and place in store bought taco shells, make your own taco shells, or even roll up in warm flour tortillas.
Garnish with lettuce, cheese and chopped tomatoes--if desired.
2cf467b3f7.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the beef shoulder with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, then place it in a large, heavy-bottomed pot.
3. Heat the extra virgin olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the smashed garlic cloves and sliced onion, and cook until the onion is translucent and the beef is browned on all sides.
4. Add the canned tomatoes, dried ancho chile powder, cayenne pepper, ground cumin, and bay leaves to the pot. Pour in enough water to cover the beef, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 2-3 hours or until the beef is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Remove the beef from the pot, let it rest for a few minutes, then shred it using two forks.
7. Return the shredded beef to the pot, and stir to combine with the sauce.
8. Serve the Mexican Pot Roast on tacos with your choice of toppings, such as avocado, sour cream, cheese, or fresh cilantro.

This delicious Mexican Pot Roast for Tacos recipe is a great way to enjoy the flavors of traditional Mexican cuisine in a comforting and familiar taco format. The combination of tender beef, rich sauce, and aromatic spices creates a satisfying and flavorful dish that can be enjoyed with friends and family.

bf025fd805.gt:
Break up the chocolate bars into small pieces with your hands and put in a heat resistant bowl.
Microwave for 3-4 minutes to melt.
Add the vegetable oil.
Put the eggs and sugar in a food processor, then process for 2 to 3 minutes on full strength.
Add the yogurt to Step 2 and blend for 2 minutes.
Pour the mixture from Step 3 into a rice cooker bowl, sift in the combined ingredients.
Fold in with a rubber spatula, while turning the bowl.
When the batter is no more floury, place in the rice cooker and turn the switch!
Press "Cook" 2-3 times and let the batter bake through a couple cycles until a bamboo skewer inserted into the middle comes out clean.
When it's done, remove the cake from the rice cooker bowl and cool on a cooling rack.
The cake comes right out of the bowl if you run a rubber spatula between the cake and bowl to loosen it.
You can eat it straight a way, but it tastes even better the next day.
It's also delicious decorated!
bf025fd805.pred:
To make a delicious Butter-Free Rice Cooker Chocolate Cake dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your rice cooker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 2 chocolate bars, 20 grams of vegetable oil, and 2 eggs. Mix well.
3. Add 30 grams of plain yogurt, 20 grams of sugar, and 80 grams of cake flour. Mix until well combined.
4. Stir in 1 tbsp of unsweetened cocoa powder and 5 grams of baking powder.
5. Pour the batter into a rice cooker-safe cake pan or a lined baking sheet.
6. Cook the cake in the preheated rice cooker for approximately 30-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes before removing it from the pan or baking sheet.
8. Once the cake has cooled, you can serve it as is or dust it with powdered sugar or cocoa powder, if desired.

This delicious Butter-Free Rice Cooker Chocolate Cake dish is a perfect dessert option for those who prefer a chocolate cake without the added fat and calories of butter.

51cc9f173e.gt:
Mix the egg, sugar and shiro-dashi in a small bowl.
Place some oil in a heated frying pan and pour in the egg.
When it is half-cooked, move it over to one side of the frying pan, and shape it into a log.
Turn the heat to low.
When it is browned, flip it over and cook the other side.
Place the cooked egg onto cling film.
Wrap it up and fold over the edges.
Remove it from the cling film after about 2 minutes and slice.
51cc9f173e.pred:
1. In a small non-stick pan, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat.
2. Crack the egg into the pan, and gently scramble it until it is cooked through.
3. Add the Shiro-dashi and sugar to the egg, stirring gently to combine.
4. Cook the egg mixture for about 1-2 minutes, or until the sauce is slightly thickened and the egg is cooked through.
5. Carefully pour the egg mixture onto a hot griddle or frying pan, spreading it evenly.
6. Cook the tamagoyaki on medium heat for about 2-3 minutes, or until the edges are slightly crispy and the center is set.
7. Carefully flip the tamagoyaki, and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until the other side is slightly crispy.
8. Use a spatula to lift the tamagoyaki onto a plate, and serve immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

495600903f.gt:
Heat oven to 300 degrees F.
Place 2-L casserole dish in oven to warm.
Melt butter in large skillet on medium heat.
Add onions and garlic; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until crisp-tender, stirring frequently.
Add rice; cook and stir 2 min.
Stir in wine; cook and stir 1 min.
or until absorbed.
Add chicken and broth; stir.
Bring just to boil.
Spoon into warmed casserole dish; cover.
Bake 30 min.
or until rice is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
Add spinach; stir just until wilted.
Add cheese; stir until melted.
495600903f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the 2 Tbsp. butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
4. Add the uncooked Arborio rice to the skillet and stir to combine with the onion and garlic mixture. Cook for a few minutes, until the rice is slightly toasted.
5. Pour in the dry white wine and stir to combine with the rice. Cook until the wine has been absorbed by the rice.
6. Add the 1 lb. (450 g) boneless skinless chicken breasts to the skillet and cook until they are browned and cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
7. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
8. In a large saucepan, bring the 25%-less-sodium chicken broth to a boil.
9. Add the baby spinach leaves to the saucepan and cook until they are wilted, about 2-3 minutes.
10. Remove the spinach from the saucepan and set aside.
11. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, chicken, and wilted spinach.
12. In a small bowl, mix the Kraft 100% Parmesan Shredded Cheese with a little bit of olive oil.
13. Pour the Parmesan cheese mixture over the rice mixture and stir to combine.
14. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the rice is cooked through.
15. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Oven-Baked Chicken and Spinach Risotto!

19f9c7d91d.gt:
Note for quick method of cooking sweet potatoes -- I put the sweet potatoes in a baking dish and add 1/4 cup of water.
Put a lid on and microwave for approximately 20 minutes.
After they have cooled, peel and mash.
Mix all 8 ingredients for sweet potato mixture.
Pour into a greased casserole dish.
Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 minutes and see below for crunchy topping.
Mix all 4 ingredients for topping and sprinkle over potatoes.
Bake for an additional 8 minutes and remove from oven.
Enjoy!
19f9c7d91d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with butter.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, milk, egg, and melted butter. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla extract to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
6. Sprinkle the crushed corn flakes and chopped nuts evenly over the top of the sweet potato mixture.
7. Dot the top with the melted butter.
8. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Southern Sweet Potato Casserole is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the natural sweetness of sweet potatoes with the warmth of cinnamon and nutmeg, and the crunch of corn flakes and chopped nuts. The melted butter adds a rich, creamy texture, and the vanilla extract enhances the overall flavor.

9181bac2c8.gt:
Place the onion, parsley, vinegar, mustard, mayonnaise, honey, salt, pepper, and lime zest in the bowl of a small food processor or blender.
Process until thoroughly blended.
Serve immediately, or place in a covered container and refrigerate until needed.
9181bac2c8.pred:
To prepare a delicious Dennis' Honey-Mustard Salad Dressing, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, chop the onion and parsley finely.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the apple cider vinegar, Dijon mustard, and mayonnaise.
3. Add the honey to the mixture, and stir to combine.
4. Squeeze in the lime juice, and add the lime zest for extra flavor.
5. Season the dressing with sea salt and ground black pepper to taste.
6. Combine the ingredients in a small bowl, and mix well to ensure that the flavors are evenly distributed.
7. Use the dressing to coat the salad ingredients of your choice, such as lettuce, cucumbers, or other vegetables.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and refreshing Dennis' Honey-Mustard Salad Dressing that will enhance the taste of your salad.

b4fd5e004b.gt:
Drain the yogurt to 1 1/2 cups: Line a strainer w/a coffee filter, add yogurt & set aside about 1 hour.
Cut off all but 1 inch of the beet stalks and leave the roots intact.
Rinse the beets well but do not peel.
Cook the beets in boiling salted water until tender, 25 to 35 minutes.
Drain, slip off the skins under cold running water, and cut away the root ends and stalks.
Coarsely grate the beets, using the shredding disk of a food processor or the large holes of a hand grater (latex gloves are recommended for the latter or you'll look like an axe murderer!
).
Combine the garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a medium bowl.
Add the beets and yogurt and blend well.
Taste and add a pinch of sugar if desired.
Transfer to a serving dish, cover and refrigerate until well chilled, about 1 hour.
Garnish with sprigs of fresh mint just before serving.
b4fd5e004b.pred:
To prepare a delicious Shredded Beets With Thick Yogurt dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the beets, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the beets, crushed garlic, salt, fresh ground pepper, and a pinch of sugar (optional). Toss the ingredients to coat evenly.
4. Spread the beets evenly on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
5. While the beets are cooking, prepare the yogurt dressing by combining the remaining ingredients in a small bowl: 2 cups plain low-fat yogurt, 1 large garlic clove, crushed, 1 pinch salt, 2 tablespoons fresh strained lemon juice, and a pinch of sugar (optional).
6. Once the beets are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Using a fork or your hands, gently shred the beets into bite-sized pieces.
8. Drizzle the yogurt dressing over the shredded beets and toss to coat evenly.
9. Serve the Shredded Beets With Thick Yogurt dish immediately, garnished with a sprig of fresh mint for added flavor and presentation.

Enjoy your delicious Shredded Beets With Thick Yogurt dish!

aab95edcba.gt:
Pre heat oven to 160*C.
Peal and grated spuds.
Drain by pressing paper towel- as much water out as you can.
Add egg yolks, onion powder, paprika, garlic salt, oregano and pepper.
Mix and scoop onto cutlets to coat.
Shallow fry on med heat until golden brown both sides (2 or 3 mins a side) and finish in oven for 5 minutes.
Sea salt to taste- serve with lemon wedge, spicy sour cream and salad.
For cream, use some sour cream with horseradish - or Dijon.
Maybe some fresh chopped chives or parsley.. Whatever you like.
Bloody ripper of a dish.
Little bit of prep (I suggest you buy your lamb pre-frenched!)
but absolutely delicious.
Enjoy!
aab95edcba.pred:
[INST] <<SYS>>
To prepare Frenched Lamb Cutlets with Rosti Crust, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the Desiree potatoes, egg yolk, onion powder, sweet paprika, dried oregano, garlic salt, and cracked black pepper. Season with a pinch of sea salt flakes.
3. Cut the Frenched lamb cutlets into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the sunflower oil and lemon wedges together.
5. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the lamb pieces and cook until browned on all sides, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the pan and set aside.
6. Add the whisked sunflower oil and lemon wedges to the bowl of seasoned potatoes. Mix well to combine.
7. Form the lamb pieces into patties and place them on a baking sheet. Spread the seasoned potato mixture over the lamb patties.
8. Bake the lamb patties in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until cooked through and the potato mixture is golden brown.
9. Serve the Frenched Lamb Cutlets with Rosti Crust with a dollop of spicy sour cream on the side.

[/INST]

f4a5f6209b.gt:
preheat oven to 450F
mix together dry ingredients.
in a seperate bowl, mix wet.
slowly add the wet to the dry, and combine until just mixed.
roll out on a lightly floured surface, and use a cutter of choice to create shapes (i used the top of a drinking glass).
bake for about 15 minutes.
f4a5f6209b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the teff flour, amaranth flour, tapioca starch, cornstarch, baking powder, xanthan gum, and salt. Whisk to combine.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the soymilk, sunflower oil, and vanilla extract.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until a dough forms. If the dough is too dry, you can add a bit more soymilk. If it's too wet, you can add a bit more flour.
5. Turn the dough onto a floured surface and knead it until it comes together and forms a smooth, elastic dough.
6. Roll the dough out to your desired thickness (around 1/2 inch or 1 cm). Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a knife.
7. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the biscuits for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and firm to the touch.
9. Allow the biscuits to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. While the biscuits are cooling, prepare the strawberry-pineapple jam by heating the jam in a saucepan over medium heat until it reaches the desired consistency.
11. Once the biscuits are cooled, spread a layer of jam on top of each biscuit.
12. Serve the Gluten-Free Teff Biscuits With Strawberry-Pineapple Jam immediately, as they are best enjoyed fresh.

Enjoy your delicious Gluten-Free Teff Biscuits With Strawberry-Pineapple Jam!

d255a02fb6.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Grease 24 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners.
Whisk 3 cups flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl.
Stir white sugar, applesauce, and eggs together in another bowl.
Add sugar mixture to flour mixture and stir until batter is just combined.
Fold peaches and cranberries into batter.
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups.
Stir brown sugar and 2 tablespoons flour together in a small bowl.
Sprinkle brown sugar mixture over the tops of the muffins.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, about 25 minutes.
Cool for 10 minutes before transferring muffins to a wire rack to cool completely.
d255a02fb6.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the applesauce, eggs, sugar, and brown sugar.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped peaches and cranberries.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

[/INST]

ce99fab83f.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Cream together butter, sugar, egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt to mixture.
Fold in puffed rice cereal gently so as not to break up the puffs.
Incorporate chocolate chips.
Bake for 10 15 minutes.
ce99fab83f.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.

3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix well.

4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.

5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until well combined.

6. Fold in the Rice Krispies or Cocoa Krispies and chocolate chips.

7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet.

8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.

9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Chip Rice Krispie Cookies!

c1e7a519f3.gt:
Place graham squares, side by side, in single layer in ungreased 15x10x1-inch baking pan.
Microwave caramels and water in microwavable bowl on HIGH 2 to 3 minutes or until caramels are completely melted, stirring after each minute.
Pour over grahams; spread to evenly cover graham squares.
Sprinkle immediately with marshmallows, chocolate and peanuts; press gently into caramel mixture with back of spoon to secure.
Cool completely.
Cut into 24 squares to serve.
c1e7a519f3.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
3. In a small saucepan, melt the chocolate over low heat, stirring occasionally.
4. Once the chocolate is melted, remove it from the heat and stir in the chopped peanuts.
5. Spread the melted chocolate mixture evenly over the prepared baking sheet.
6. Arrange the broken graham crackers, caramels, and marshmallows on top of the chocolate mixture in a single layer.
7. Drizzle the melted chocolate over the marshmallows, creating a marbled effect.
8. Bake the treats in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the chocolate is set and the marshmallows are puffed and golden brown.
9. Remove the treats from the oven and let them cool completely on the baking sheet.
10. Once the treats are cool, break them into bite-sized pieces and serve.

[/INST]

These Winner's Circle Treats are a delicious and fun dessert that combines the crunchy texture of graham crackers, the sweetness of caramels, the fluffiness of marshmallows, and the richness of chocolate. They are perfect for parties, gatherings, or simply enjoying as a treat for yourself.

9141916c8a.gt:
Cream butter and flour together, add to hot juice.
Stir quickly or use egg beater to smooth.
Cook until it thickens.
Heat milk until slight scum forms, lower heat, add tomato mixture slowly, stirring constantly.
Salt to taste.
Serve hot with buttered popcorn or crackers.
9141916c8a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan, combine the strained tomato juice, butter, and flour. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens.
3. Gradually add the milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps from forming.
4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 15 minutes, or until it thickens to your desired consistency.
5. Season the soup with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
6. Serve the Easy Cream Tomato Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream or a sprinkle of grated cheese, if desired.

This recipe for Easy Cream Tomato Soup is a delicious and comforting dish that can be enjoyed on its own or as a side dish. The combination of the rich tomato flavor, creamy milk, and buttery flour creates a satisfying and warm meal. The soup can be easily customized with additional ingredients, such as vegetables, herbs, or spices, to suit individual tastes.

4b78e53c53.gt:
In a bowl beat eggs and mix in all ingredients except beef.
Mix in beef and shape into six 1/2-inch patties.
Cook over medium heat, about 5 minutes per side.
Add cheese during the last 3 minutes of cooking.
4b78e53c53.pred:
To cook a delightful Salsa Cheeseburgers dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the egg, Italian style breadcrumbs, salsa, green onions, red pepper, garlic, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and hot pepper sauce (if using).
3. Form the mixture into small patties, about the size of a small hamburger.
4. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and cook the patties until they are golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Transfer the cooked patties to a baking sheet, and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Serve the Salsa Cheeseburgers hot, garnished with additional salsa, if desired.

This delicious dish combines the flavors of salsa, cheese, and ground beef to create a satisfying and unique burger experience. The addition of the Italian style breadcrumbs and green onions adds texture and enhances the overall taste.

91e966c057.gt:
Wash, scrape and slice carrots into 1/4 inch thick rounds.
Bring water to a boil in a heavy saucepan.
Add carrots and garlic, cover, and cook about 15 minutes, or until tender (but still firm).
Drain carrots and place in serving bowl.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over the carrots.
Toss, then cover with plastic wrap and set aside for about 30 minutes before serving at room temperature.
91e966c057.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To prepare the Cooked Carrot Salad, follow these steps:
1. Wash and peel the 8 carrots.
2. In a large pot, bring the 1 cup of water to a boil.
3. Add the 1 garlic clove and cook for 1 minute.
4. Add the 12 teaspoons of paprika and 12 teaspoons of ground cumin. Cook for an additional 1 minute.
5. Remove the garlic clove and discard it.
6. Add the 2 tablespoons of olive oil to the pot.
7. Add the 2 tablespoons of red wine vinegar.
8. Add the 1 tablespoon of parsley, minced (flat leafed variety).
9. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Allow the mixture to cool slightly.
11. Cut the 8 carrots into bite-sized pieces.
12. In a large bowl, combine the cooked carrots, paprika-cumin mixture, and olive oil mixture.
13. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
14. Serve the Cooked Carrot Salad immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/INST]

[/INST]

608984ae45.gt:
Melt butter in 1-quart saucepan until sizzling; add onion.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, 2-3 minutes or until softened.
Stir in flour, thyme and pepper.
Reduce heat to medium; stir in chicken broth and half & half.
Cook, stirring occasionally, 2-4 minutes or until smooth and bubbly.
Serve gravy over chicken, biscuits and/or potatoes.
608984ae45.pred:
[TUTORIAL]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small saucepan, melt the 1/4 cup of Land O Lakes Butter over medium heat.
3. Add the 1/2 cup chopped onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the 3 tablespoons of all-purpose flour with the 1 teaspoon of dried thyme leaves and 1/2 teaspoon of pepper.
5. Gradually pour the chicken broth into the saucepan with the melted butter and onions, stirring constantly.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
7. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the 2/3 cup of Land O Lakes Half & Half and 2 tablespoons of water.
8. Gradually pour the whisked Half & Half mixture into the saucepan with the onion and butter mixture, stirring constantly.
9. Cook the mixture for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until it reaches your desired consistency.
10. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Stir in the 2/3 cup of Land O Lakes Half & Half mixture, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
12. Serve the cream gravy over your choice of dish, such as mashed potatoes, biscuits, or even as a topping for your favorite meal.

[/TUTORIAL]

[/INST]

b188749dcd.gt:
Combine fennel seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, cracked wheat, butter or margarine, molasses or barley malt, and orange zest in 1 1/3 cup of boiling water.
Soak for 1 hour.
(This pre-soaks the cracked wheat and pre-releases the other flavors.)
Add seed mixture along with baking soda, whole wheat or rye flour, high-gluten bread flour, dry yeast, gluten, and buttermilk powder into the pan of a bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select the cycle for White Bread and the Light Crust setting.
Start.
b188749dcd.pred:
[/SYS]

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the boiling water, fennel seed, cumin seeds, caraway seed, cracked wheat, and butter. Allow the mixture to cool to lukewarm.
2. In a separate bowl, combine the molasses, orange zest, baking soda, rye flour, bread flour, active dry yeast, gluten flour, and powdered buttermilk.
3. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until a smooth dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 10-15 minutes.
5. Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover it with a cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
6. Punch down the dough and knead it again briefly.
7. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
8. Shape the dough into a loaf and place it on a greased baking sheet.
9. Bake the loaf in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
10. Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for about 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

[/SYS]

By following these steps and using the appropriate ingredients, you can successfully prepare and cook Limpa Bread.

2989cc6886.gt:
Dredge the well drained oysters in some starch and toss them very gently in a bowl till the liquid turns dark.
Wash out the darkened liquid with cold water until the water becomes clear.
Drain well.
Place the oysters between paper towels and dry.
Coat the oysters lightly with some flour (not listed in the ingredients above).
Heat some salad oil in a non-stick frying pan, add garlic, stir fry till they become golden over medium heat.
Add oysters cook until golden.
Turn over, add the Sake and cover.
Cook for 2 to 3 minutes over low heat.
Add and melt the butter.
Add soy sauce and green onion and stir to coat the oysters with sauce.
Serve hot.
Washing oysters with starch to purify the taste is a method I learned from Chinese recipe while traditionalist Japanese chefs use graded Daikon radish juice.
Buttered ride recipe is available in my blog.
http://kcocoangela.blog132.fc2.com/blog-entry-6.html
2989cc6886.pred:
To create a delicious Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the oysters and pat them dry with paper towels.
- Chop the green onion finely.
- Mince the garlic clove.
- Heat the cooking oil in a pan over medium heat.
- Add the minced garlic and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
- Add the chopped green onion and cook until softened.
- Add the starch to the pan and stir to combine with the green onion mixture.
- Gradually pour in the sake or white wine, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
- Add the soy sauce and continue stirring until the sauce thickens.
- Season with salt and pepper to taste.

2. Prepare the oysters:
- Preheat a non-stick pan or skillet over medium heat.
- Add a small amount of cooking oil to the pan.
- Carefully place the oysters in the pan, being careful not to break them.
- Cook the oysters for about 2-3 minutes or until they open and their shells are slightly curled.
- Remove the oysters from the pan and place them on a plate.

3. Assemble the dish:
- Place the cooked oysters on a serving plate.
- Pour the green onion sauce over the oysters.
- Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Pan fried Oyster with Green Onion Sauce.

50ae7ae60c.gt:
For this soup, I use 1/2 lb button, 1/4 lb cremini and 1/4 lb shitake mushrooms.
In a large pot, sautee mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic and sautee until tender.
Add flour and thyme and cook for 3-4 mins until flour is cooked into the vegetables.
Add stock, bay leaf and rice and bring to a boil.
Simmer soup covered for 45-60 mins until rice is tender.
Add salt and pepper to taste and balsamic vinegar if desired.
50ae7ae60c.pred:
1. In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, stirring constantly.
3. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the diced carrots and celery, and cook for another 5 minutes.
5. Add the dried thyme, flour, and bay leaf to the pot. Stir to combine.
6. Pour in the vegetable stock, and bring the mixture to a boil.
7. Add the wild rice and brown rice to the pot, and stir to combine.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 45 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the soup is heated through.
9. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Remove the bay leaf and serve the Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup hot.

[/INST]

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the melted butter, bread crumbs, and shredded cheese.
3. Season the pork chops with salt and pepper, to taste.
4. Dip each pork chop into the butter mixture, coating it evenly.
5. Place the breaded pork chops on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the pork chops in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
7. Remove the pork chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into individual portions.
8. Serve the Sweet Apple and Onion Stuffed Pork Chops with a side of your choice, such as mashed potatoes or a vegetable medley.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients: 2 cups peaches finely chopped, ripe, 1 1/4 cups sugar, 1/2 each lemon juice and vanilla extract, 2 large eggs, 2 cups heavy whipping cream, and 1 cup milk.

2. In a large bowl, mix the peaches, sugar, lemon juice, and vanilla extract until well combined.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and heavy whipping cream until well combined.

4. Gradually add the egg mixture to the peach mixture, stirring gently to combine.

5. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.

6. Once the ice cream is fully churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to chill for at least 2 hours or overnight.

7. After chilling, scoop the ice cream into a bowl and serve immediately or store in the freezer for later use.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream!

91eb1e20fb.gt:
Put the rice in a small sauce pan.
I like to rinse my rice by placing in a sieve and running under cold water.
This rids the rice of excess starch powder and broken rice which makes the cooked rice mushy and sticky.
Add just enough water to cover the top of the rice by 1/2 inch (approx.
3 cups) Cover the pot with the lid.
Place over medium to medium high heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, for at least another 10 minutes, until the water is completely absorbed.
Turn off burner and allow rice to sit, covered, for at least another 5 minutes.
Sprinkle with half of the salt and pepper and stir to fluff.
IN THE MEANTIME, sprinkle the fish with the rest of the salt and pepper, and dredge in flour.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add fish to pan; cook 2 1/2 minutes on each side (less for thinner filets) or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Add wine, juice, and capers to the pan; cook one minute.
Add butter to pan, stirring until butter melts.
Remove fish and sauce from pan; keep warm.
Wipe pan clean with paper towel, add spinach and saute one minute or until wilted.
Place 1/4 of the rice on each of 4 plates.
Top each serving with 1/4 of the spinach, one fish filet, and 1/4 of the sauce.
91eb1e20fb.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the coconut oil over medium-high heat. Add the halibut fillets and cook until they are golden brown on both sides and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove the halibut from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add the white wine, stirring to combine. Cook until the liquid has reduced by half, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Add the fresh lemon juice or lime juice, capers, and butter to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Add the cooked halibut fillets back to the skillet and stir to combine.
6. In a large saucepan, cook the jasmine rice according to the package instructions.
7. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked rice, halibut mixture, and spinach. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Transfer the rice mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the top is golden brown.
9. Serve the Halibut Piccata With Spinach dish immediately. Enjoy!

89a10ab4d0.gt:
Soak chiles in hot water 15 min.
or until softened.
Drain chiles, reserving 1/4 cup of the soaking water; place chiles and reserved water in blender container.
Cover.
Blend on medium speed until smooth; set aside.
Heat dressing in large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add pork; cook and stir 5 min.
or until evenly browned.
Remove pork from skillet; set aside.
Add alcaparrado condiment, cloves and chile puree to skillet; cook 2 min.
Return pork to skillet.
Stir in broth; bring to boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cover.
Simmer 30 min.
Add potatoes and peanuts; cover.
Cook 45 min.
until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally.
Top each serving with egg slices.
89a10ab4d0.pred:
To make a delicious Peruvian Pork and Potato Stew, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the dried guajillo chiles, hot water, and KRAFT Zesty Italian Dressing. Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the chiles are tender.

2. Add the pork loin cubes to the pot, and cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the pork is fully cooked through.

3. Stir in the alcaparrado condiment, ground cloves, and beef broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the pork is tender and the sauce has thickened.

4. While the stew is simmering, peel and chop the potatoes into bite-sized pieces.

5. Add the potatoes to the stew, and cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and cooked through.

6. Stir in the ground Rite Aid Buy 1 Get 1 Free thru 02/06 and peeled hard-cooked eggs. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked through.

7. Serve the stew hot, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

[/INST]

7bf3659a3a.gt:
Place tomatoes, onions, celery, parsley and bay leaves in a large pot and cook, covered, on low heat for 1 to 2 hours, until quite soft and fragrant.
Remove bay leaves and blend tomato mixture in batches in a food processor or blender, then run through a sieve and return juice to pot.
Stir in salt, sugar, seasoning salt, pepper and garlic salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and cook, uncovered, 1 to 2 hours, until thickened.
7bf3659a3a.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot, combine the chopped tomatoes, onions, celery, and parsley. Add the bay leaves and seasoning salt, white sugar, and garlic salt.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 1 hour.
4. Remove the bay leaves from the pot.
5. Add the salt and pepper to taste.
6. Using a hand blender or immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth.
7. If the soup is too thick, you can add more water or broth to achieve the desired consistency.
8. Serve the Tomato Soup II hot.

Please note that these are general instructions and may vary depending on the specific recipe or individual preferences.

25cf1f8952.gt:
Add the oil to the pan and put heat on to medium high.
Add the rice and saute until golden brown approximately 10 - 15 minutes.
Add the onion and bell pepper and saute another 5 - 10 minutes.
The important thing is to make sure the rice is toasted to a nice golden brown.
Using a garlic press, add the minced fresh garlic by squeezing the press and cutting off
the garlic as it comes out, with a knife.
Continue to saute for an additional 3 minutes.
You will notice a wonderful garlic aroma.
Add the tomato puree, chicken broth and salt.
Stir and turn heat up to high.
Bring to a full boil while stirring.
Continue to boil for 2 minutes.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
When it's done, turn off the heat, remove the lid and stir in the peas.
wait 5 minutes before serving.
25cf1f8952.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat.
3. Add the onion and bell pepper, and cook until they are softened and slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
5. Pour in the tomato puree, and stir to combine.
6. Add the rice, stirring to coat the rice evenly with the tomato mixture.
7. Add the chicken broth, stirring to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.

10. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the peas are heated through.
11. Remove the saucepan from the heat, and let it sit, covered, for a few minutes.
12. Fluff the rice with a fork, and serve immediately.

[/INST]

f2251c8a98.gt:
Mix together ground pork, kosher salt, black pepper, sage, thyme, rosemary, nutmeg, cayenne pepper, and red pepper flakes in a bowl.
Knead with hands until thoroughly incorporated.
Form into 8 patties.
Place patties into a skillet over medium heat; cook until browned, 8 to 10 minutes.
Flip patties and continue to cook until fully cooked through, 5 to 8 more minutes.
f2251c8a98.pred:
To prepare a delicious Homemade Paleo-Style Breakfast Sausage, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, mix together the ground pork, kosher salt, black pepper, sage, thyme, rosemary, nutmeg, cayenne pepper, and red pepper flakes.

2. Add the chopped onion and mix until well combined.

3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight. This allows the flavors to meld together and the sausage to develop its texture.

4. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

5. Form the sausage mixture into small, evenly-sized patties. Place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

6. Bake the sausage patties in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (70°C).

7. Remove the sausage patties from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into desired portions.

8. Serve the Homemade Paleo-Style Breakfast Sausage alongside your favorite breakfast items, such as eggs, toast, or fruit, for a delicious and satisfying meal.

[/INST]

7112e492e4.gt:
Heat oil and slowly cook onion, carrot and celery over medium heat for approx 8 min until soft.
Add zest of lemon and rice.
Stir.
Add chicken broth and boil on low for approx 20 min until vegetables are tender.
Add peas, chicken, lemon juice and parsley 5 minutes before serving.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
7112e492e4.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened, about 5 minutes.

3. Add the chicken broth, peas, and lemon zest. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
4. Add the diced chicken, carrots, and celery to the pot. Cook for an additional 10 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked and the vegetables are tender.
5. Stir in the lemon juice and parsley. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Chicken Lemon Soup W/Rice and Vegetables hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh parsley, if desired.

[/INST]

eb0fd599e7.gt:
Mix together all dry ingredients, then add the wet ingredients gradually and stir in until the consistency is like that of smooth thick cream
Heat a lightly oiled frying pan and spoon the batter in ladlefulls
Cook until bubbles form then start to pop then flip over and lightly brown the other side
You can change the vanilla for any other flavouring you like such as strawberry, add some cocoa powder and some orange essence for chocolate orange, add blueberries or chocolate chips to the batter, the possibilities are endless!
eb0fd599e7.pred:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, bicarb, cream of tartar, and sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the milk, rice, or almond milk, and potato or corn starch mixture.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until a smooth batter forms.
5. Heat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium heat.

7. Flip the pancake and cook for another minute or until the other side is cooked through.
8. Repeat with the remaining batter, stacking the cooked pancakes on a plate or serving them immediately.
9. Place the cooked pancakes in the preheated oven to keep warm and slightly crisp the edges.
10. Serve the Vickys Vegan Scotch Pancakes with your favorite toppings, such as fruit, whipped cream, or a drizzle of maple syrup.

[/INST]

5e36bf8c5c.gt:
Preheat a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat.
In a bowl whisk together the eggs, cream and powdered sugar.
Set aside.
Take 2 slices of the Texas toast and spread 1 tablespoon of Nutella on each one.
Sandwich them together and dip both sides of the sandwich in the custard mixture.
Grill on each side until brown, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove from heat and serve immediately with maple syrup while you repeat with the other ingredients.

1. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, heavy cream, and powdered sugar until smooth.
2. Dip each slice of Texas toast into the batter, ensuring it is evenly coated.
3. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat. Cook the coated toast slices until golden brown on both sides, flipping them halfway through the cooking process.

This recipe for Nutella-Stuffed French Toast requires the following steps: whisking the ingredients together, dipping the Texas toast slices, cooking the toast slices, allowing them to cool, spreading Nutella on the toast slices, assembling the French toast, and serving it immediately. The result is a delicious and indulgent breakfast or brunch dish that is both visually appealing and flavorful.

93fa251248.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease an 8-inch square baking dish.
Whisk eggs, oil, and brown sugar together in a bowl until brown sugar is dissolved.
Combine oats, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a separate bowl; stir into egg mixture just until moistened.
Spoon oat mixture into prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes.
93fa251248.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, vegetable oil, brown sugar, and baking powder until well combined.
3. Add the oats, cinnamon, and salt to the bowl and stir until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting into squares.
7. Enjoy your Crispy Baked Oatmeal!

[/INST]

59d1144ae9.gt:
Pour 1 quart of hot water into a large saucepan, and dissolve the gelatin.
Allow to cool.
Pour the cooled gelatin into a large punch bowl.
Stir in: pineapple juice, orange juice concentrate, sugar, and 4 1/2 cups of cold water.
Just before serving, pour in the Ginger Ale.
59d1144ae9.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the lime gelatin and hot water. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, and sugar (if using) to the bowl. Stir until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. Add the cold water and ginger ale to the bowl, stirring to combine all the ingredients.
4. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or overnight, allowing the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the Green Punch in a large pitcher or punch bowl, garnished with a sprig of fresh mint or a green garnish of your choice.

Enjoy your delicious Green Punch at your St. Patrick's Day Party!

9c55f0ed34.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Toss first 4 ingredients in large baking dish.
Mix remaining ingredients; pour over vegetables.
Bake 50 min.
or until vegetables are tender.
9c55f0ed34.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato wedges, parsnips, fennel, and red onion with the KRAFT Classic CATALINA Dressing.
3. Spread the vegetables out in a single layer on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
4. Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
5. While the vegetables are roasting, heat the cranberry juice and maple-flavored or pancake syrup in a small saucepan over medium heat.
6. Once the vegetables are cooked, remove them from the oven and pour the cranberry juice and syrup mixture over them.
7. Toss the vegetables to coat them evenly with the sauce.
8. Serve the Angie's Roasted Harvest Vegetables immediately, as they are perfect for a delicious and healthy side dish.

fc1f93e1ef.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F.
Crumble the ginger snaps in a food processor and add the melted butter.
Use this mixture to line a deep pie plate or spring form pan.
Bake this at 325F for 19 minutes.
Beat the egg yolks well, and add the sugar.
Soak the gelatin in the cold water and heat gently over low flame until fully dissolved.
Pour over sugar and egg mixture, stirring briskly.
Whip the cream until stiff.
Fold in the egg mixture and flavor with the rum.
Cool in the refrigerator until mixture begins to set and pour into the pie shell.
Chill until firm and garnish with chocolate curls and chopped nuts.
fc1f93e1ef.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg yolks one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks form.
5. Fold the whipped egg whites into the butter mixture.
6. In a small saucepan, heat the water and unflavored gelatin until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
7. Slowly pour the hot water mixture into the butter mixture, stirring constantly.
8. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
9. Bake the pie for 35-40 minutes or until the filling is set.
10. Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool completely.
11. In a small saucepan, heat the rum and sugar over medium heat until the sugar is dissolved.
12. Pour the rum mixture over the cooled pie.
13. Chill the pie in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight.
14. Remove the pie from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for 30 minutes before serving.
15. Garnish the pie with chocolate curls and chopped nuts.

[/INST]

This Rum Cream Pie is a delicious and creative dessert that combines the rich flavors of rum, dark rum, and chocolate. The ginger snaps provide a delightful crunch, while the melted butter and sugar create a smooth and creamy filling. The egg yolks and gelatin contribute to the pie's smooth texture, and the chocolate curls and chopped nuts add a touch of elegance and contrasting flavors. The pie is best served chilled, allowing the flavors to meld together and the rum to mellow.

97692d5fc3.gt:
Spread tortilla with dressing and mustard; top with remaining ingredients.
Fold in opposite sides of tortilla, then roll up from one end, leaving top end open.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 1 min.
or until heated through.
97692d5fc3.pred:
[/SYS]

2. In a small bowl, mix the MIRACLE WHIP Dressing and GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard.

Enjoy your delicious Ham 'n Stuff Wrap dish!

8dfa9a04cc.gt:
In shallow bowl, mix flour, egg, vanilla, milk, and lemon jce.
Dip rings to cover.
In deep skillet heat oil to about 375*.
Fry rings, in batches of 3 or 4 for 2 1/2 minutes or until golden brown.
Place on paper towels and dust with sugar on both sides.
8dfa9a04cc.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, beaten egg, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
3. Gradually add the milk, lemon juice, and melted butter, stirring until a smooth batter forms.
4. Dip the apple rings into the batter, ensuring they are evenly coated.
5. Heat oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Carefully place the apple rings into the hot oil, being cautious not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
