6e11affa2e.gt:
In a small bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a 1 quart glass container (a mason jar works great!
), layer the flour mixture, sugar, brown sugar, oats, walnuts, cereal and cranberries.
Cover and store in a cool dry place for up to 6 months.
Write this note to go with your gift mix: To Prepare Cookies ~ In a large bowl, beat the softened butter, egg, water and vanilla until blended.
Add cookie mix and mix well.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool 1 minute before removing to wire racks to cool completely.
6e11affa2e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the oats, walnuts, and dried cranberries.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Oatmeal Cranberry Cookie Mix!

86511b0045.gt:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F.
Brown meat with onions in large ovenproof skillet; drain.
Return to skillet.
Whisk eggs and milk until blended.
Add to meat mixture along with the VELVEETA and relish; mix well.
Bake 20 to 25 min.
or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Top with tomatoes and lettuce.
86511b0045.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the lean ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through. Drain any excess fat.
3. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, and VELVEETA together.
5. Add the cooked ground beef and onions to the egg mixture, stirring to combine.
6. Pour the mixture into a greased 9-inch (23cm) round baking dish.
7. Bake the frittata in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is fully cooked.
8. While the frittata is baking, prepare the toppings.
9. In a small bowl, mix the Claussen Sweet Pickle Relish, chopped tomatoes, and shredded lettuce.
10. Once the frittata is fully cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
11. Using a spatula, carefully transfer the frittata to a serving plate.
12. Spoon the topping mixture over the frittata, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious VELVEETA Cheeseburger Frittata!

df9193a49e.gt:
In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoons of the oil on high heat.
When hot, add the pork cubes and cook until soft.
Stir in the garlic, curry powder, coriander, cumin, and crushed red pepper.
Cook 1 minute.
Add ginger, cinnamon, bay leaf, salt, chicken broth, and tomato paste.
Bring liquid to a boil, cover and simmer on low for 45 minutes.
Add peanut butter and blend well.
Cook stew another 3 minutes, uncovered to blend.
Stir in chopped tomato and bell pepper.
Simmer 2-3 minutes, just until the vegetables soften but still retain shape.
Before serving, taste to correct seasonings; You may wish to add a final splash of lemon juice to refresh the flavors.
df9193a49e.pred:
1. In a large, heavy-bottomed pot or Dutch oven, heat the 2 tablespoons of peanut oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.

2. Add the pork and cook until browned on all sides, about 10 minutes. Remove the pork from the pot and set aside.

3. In the same pot, add the curry powder, coriander, cumin, crushed red pepper flakes, ginger, cinnamon, and bay leaf. Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly, to release the aroma of the spices.

4. Add the chicken broth, tomato paste, and peanut butter to the pot. Stir to combine.

5. Return the pork to the pot, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the pork is tender and the sauce has thickened.

6. Add the plum tomatoes, green bell pepper, and cilantro to the pot. Simmer for an additional 15 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.

7. Remove the bay leaf and season with salt to taste.

8. Serve the African Pork and Peanut Stew hot, garnished with chopped peanuts if desired.

[/INST]

093fcaf5a6.gt:
Start by heating a medium-sized pot (you will cook everything in this pot) on medium heat, then add the oil.
Once oil comes to temperature, add cubed pork belly.
Cook pork belly, turning as it cooks, until all sides are browned.
Once pork is browned, add onions, garlic, and ginger.
Give a good stir, and continue to cook for about 3 minutes or so.
Add the shrimp paste.
Turn on your vent on high as this stuff has some funk (good funk), and continue to stir.
Toss in chilies, stir again, then add coconut milk.
Bring to a simmer and cook for about 1 hour, on low, stirring along the way.
Before serving, taste and season with salt or pepper.
Now you are ready to dig in.
I like to serve with a small bowl of rice to the side, along with a soup bowl of the Bicol Express.
This dish is rich, creamy, spicy, funky, and overall totally comforting and right up my alley.
093fcaf5a6.pred:
1. Heat the canola oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
2. Add the pork belly and cook until browned, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is softened.
4. Add the ginger and cook for a few seconds.
5. Add the shrimp paste and cook for a few seconds, stirring to combine.
6. Add the coconut milk, salt, pepper, and cooked jasmine rice (if using).
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the pork is tender and the sauce has thickened.
8. Serve the dish over the cooked jasmine rice, and enjoy your delicious Bicol Express!

[/INST]

d1d3e72257.gt:
Dice the tomato into 2-3 cm cubes.
Thinly slice the garlic.
Salt and pepper the cod.
Prep the shrimp.
Put the olive oil, red chili pepper, and garlic into a frying pan and saute over low heat.
Add the cod and cook both sides over medium heat.
Add the shrimp.
Quickly cook both sides, and add the water and tomatoes.
When it comes to a boil, simmer for 4 minutes over medium to high heat as you pour the broth over the fish.
Add the olive oil, and season with herb salt once the acqua pazza comes to a boil.
Dish it up, and scatter parsley on top.
d1d3e72257.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
3. Add the red chili pepper and cook for an additional 30 seconds.
4. Add the shrimp heads and cook until they are pink, about 2-3 minutes.
5. Add the tomatoes, cook until they are softened, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Add the water, herb salt, and olives to the skillet. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
7. Add the cod fillets to the skillet and cook until they are cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
8. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes.
9. Stir in the parsley or Italian parsley.
10. Serve the Acqua Pazza over the cooked pasta of your choice.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Acqua Pazza with Cod and Shrimp Heads!

7d493176df.gt:
In a large saucepot, combine the potatoes, coleslaw, carrots, and chicken stock.
Add 4 cups water; the liquid should barely cover the vegetables.
Bring to a boil, then cover halfway and reduce the heat to simmer until tender, about 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, whisk the beer and mustard.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to simmer and add the bratwurst.
Simmer gently until cooked through, about 20 minutes.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer the bratwurst to the vegetable mixture; discard the beer mixture.
Divide the stew among dishes and serve with mustard.
7d493176df.pred:
Beer Brat Stew

Ingredients:
- 24 ounces mini gold potatoes, peeled and diced
- 1 (1 lb) bag Coleslaw
- 1 (1 lb) bag carrot chips
- 1 quart reduced-sodium chicken broth
- 4 cups beer
- 14 cup Archer Farms Brew Masters Mustard
- 2 (1 lb) packages Archer Farms Beer Bratwurst
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: additional beer, for serving

Instructions:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and cook until they are tender, about 10-15 minutes.
2. Add the Coleslaw and carrot chips to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
3. Pour in the reduced-sodium chicken broth, and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the vegetables are cooked through.
4. Add the beer to the pot, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced slightly and the flavors have melded together.
5. Stir in the Archer Farms Brew Masters Mustard, and season with salt and pepper, to taste.
6. If desired, add additional beer to the stew for a richer, more flavorful broth.
7. Serve the Beer Brat Stew hot, garnished with additional beer, if desired. Enjoy!

6a4602be69.gt:
Mix all ingredients until smooth.
With a teaspoon, make little heaps (walnut-sized) on a floured and greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 300 degrees for 6-8 minutes.
You can also place 1/2 of a pecan on each cookie while still warm.
6a4602be69.pred:

6ae95ca0b8.gt:
Knead on a lightly floured surface, as little as possible.
Roll to 1/2 inch thickness.
Cut into desired shapes.
You can also drop by spoonful onto a cookie sheet and flatten slightly.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 450.
Note: Dried fruits or nuts can be added to batter if desired.
6ae95ca0b8.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, cream of tartar, and salt.
3. Cut the butter into small pieces and add it to the dry ingredients. Using your hands or a pastry cutter, mix the butter into the dry ingredients until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the milk and egg together.
5. Pour the milk mixture into the dry ingredients and mix until a dough forms.

8. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
9. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the biscuits for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown on the edges and slightly puffed.
11. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

These Classic Biscuits are a simple and delicious treat that can be enjoyed with a cup of coffee or tea. The essential ingredients, including flour, baking powder, sugar, cream of tartar, salt, butter, and milk, work together to create a tender, flaky biscuit that is perfect for any occasion.

cbda115173.gt:
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir ground beef and onion in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Mix chili sauce, ketchup, water, pickle relish, brown sugar, and mustard into the ground beef mixture; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until flavors are blended, about 15 minutes.
cbda115173.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including 1 pound ground beef, 1 small onion, diced, 1/2 cup chili sauce, 1/2 cup ketchup, 1/2 cup water, 1/3 cup sweet pickle relish, 1/4 cup brown sugar, and 1 tablespoon yellow mustard.

2. In a large skillet or pot, heat the ground beef over medium heat until it is browned and cooked through.

3. Add the diced onion to the skillet or pot and cook until it is softened and translucent.

4. Pour in the chili sauce and ketchup, stirring to combine.

5. Add the water, sweet pickle relish, brown sugar, and yellow mustard to the skillet or pot. Stir to combine.

6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors have melded together.

7. Serve the Silvia's Sloppy Joes over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious homemade meal!

[/INST]

70b786a095.gt:
Preheat the oven to gas 4 / 180C / 350F with and line 2 baking trays with foil and have 2 spare baking trays handy
Peel the beets and slice very thinly, 1/16 inch thick with a mandolin but be careful of your fingers.
In a large bowl, toss the sliced beets with the extra virgin olive oil
Arrange the beets in a single layer on each tray and sprinkle with a small amount of the salt.
You can use plain sea salt or any flavoured salt of preferrence.
Stack an extra baking tray on top of each layer of beetroot.
This keeps the crisps flat.
Put one tray on the oven top shelf and the other on the bottom
Bake until the edges of the beets begin to dry out, about 20 minutes.
Peek around 17 minutes to check!
Remove the extra trays that are on top of the beets and rotate the trays so the top one now goes in the bottom and the bottom one goes to the top
Bake a further 17 - 20 minutes.
Remove the crisps as they become lighter in color.
Transfer to a wire rack, they will crisp up as they cool
Keep in a lidded container for up to a week
70b786a095.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the beets, then cut them into small, evenly sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, toss the beets with the extra virgin olive oil, garlic, rosemary, and sea salt.
4. Spread the beet pieces evenly on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet.
5. Roast the beets in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the beets from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Once the beets are cool enough to handle, use a fork to mash them into a coarse puree.
8. Transfer the mashed beets to a large mixing bowl and add the remaining ingredients: gluten-free all-purpose flour, tapioca flour, baking powder, and salt.
9. Mix the ingredients together until a smooth dough forms.
10. Using your hands, shape the dough into small patties, approximately 1/2 inch thick.
11. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and then carefully place the patties in the pan. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until the patties are golden brown and cooked through.
12. Serve the crispy beet patties immediately, garnished with fresh herbs or a drizzle of your favorite sauce.

[/INST]

6f1343402a.gt:
Heat cumin seeds and mustard seed in hot dry skillet over high heat, swirling pan, until seeds start to pop.
Reduce heat to medium; add onions, chilies, and add a small amount of water; cook until onion is tender, adding more water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Add potatoes, ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt (to taste), and cayenne pepper, stirring to mix well.
Add 2/3 cup water, cover, reduce heat and cook for 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until spices are absorbed and potatoes are tender.
Add a small amount of water at a time if all liquid evaporates.
Fold in cilantro just before serving.
6f1343402a.pred:
1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
2. Add the cumin seeds and brown mustard seeds, and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
3. Add the finely chopped onion and cook until it turns golden brown.
4. Add the serrano chilies, split lengthwise, and cook for a few seconds.
5. Add the peeled and cut potatoes to the pan, stirring to coat them evenly with the spices.
6. Add the ground cumin, ground coriander, turmeric, salt, cayenne pepper, and chopped fresh cilantro.
7. Cook the potatoes until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
8. Serve the Sookhi Bhaji hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

[/INST]

91d53e8b2a.gt:
I would use my own brownie recipe but you can use a box mix.
Prepare the brownie mix as directed on package.
Pour into greased 13x9 baking pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer on med.
speed until smooth.
Add sugar, mixing until blended.
Add egg and vanilla; mix just until blended.
Pour cream cheese mixture over brownie mixture; cut through batter with knife several times for marble effect.
Bake at 350F for 35 to 40 minutes or until cream cheese mixture is lightly browned.
Cool; cut into squares.
Note: Do not use brownie mixes that include syrup pouch.
91d53e8b2a.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened Philadelphia Cream Cheese and sugar until smooth.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the fudge brownie mix, mixing until the batter is smooth and well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
7. Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan before cutting into squares.

Enjoy your delicious Philly Cheesecake Brownies!

7a6c6f2959.gt:
Dressing:.
Place the almonds and water into a blender or food proccesor and turn on high speed to puree.
Add remaining ingredients, except for oil, and run to blend and whip thoroughly.
With the motor running, slowly pour in oil and run until the dressing is thick and creamy.
(dressing can be prepared and refrigerated for up to 1 week.
).
As stated in the description, you may use 3/4 cup oil and 1/4 cup water or apple juice(or liquid of choice) and get a little thinner dressing.
Let sit for a few minutes to thicken up.
Salad:.
Put 1/2 cup of the dressing in the bottom of your salad bowl.
Add all ingredients, except lettuce, and toss to coat.
Serve:.
Put several lettuce leaves on each plate and add dressed salad.
Serve extra dressing on the side.
Enjoy!
7a6c6f2959.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the chopped almonds, water, and lemon juice. Allow the mixture to sit for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
2. After the mixture has sat for 30 minutes, add the honey, salt, fresh basil, dill, and lemon zest to the bowl. Stir to combine.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the canola oil, kosher salt, and freshly cracked black pepper.
4. Add the canola oil mixture to the almond mixture, stirring to combine.
5. Add the broccoli florets, mushrooms, red onions, avocado, and grape tomatoes to the bowl. Stir to combine.
6. Add the romaine lettuce or butter lettuce to the bowl, tossing to combine.
7. Taste the salad and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the Super Veggie Salad With Creamy Almond Dressing immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

e6bf3951b6.gt:
Cook meat and onion and green pepper until meat is browned and vegetables under tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients and cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove Bay leaf when finished.

To prepare a delicious Faith58's Chili dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
2. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the chopped green pepper and cook until softened, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the stewed tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, and tomato sauce to the pot. Stir to combine.
5. Add the salt, chili powder, and bay leaf to the pot. Stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 30 minutes, or until the chili has thickened and the flavors have melded together.
7. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.

This Faith58's Chili dish is a delicious and hearty meal, perfect for a cold winter day. The combination of ground beef, onions, green peppers, tomatoes, and beans creates a rich and flavorful stew that will warm you up and satisfy your hunger.

064cb6c3cf.gt:
In a large Dutch oven, cook green beans and ham on medium heat with water up just over the beans.
Cook for 20-30 minutes.
Add potatoes and salt, cover and turn heat down to low, cook another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are done when pierced with a fork.
Note: Amount of ham and salt can be adjusted to your taste.
064cb6c3cf.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the diced bacon, ham, or salt pork, and the diced onion.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the 3 pounds of fresh green beans with 1 tablespoon of salt.
4. Add the green beans to the bowl with the bacon, ham, or salt pork, and onion mixture.
5. Toss the ingredients together until they are evenly coated.
6. Spread the green beans and onion mixture onto a baking sheet or roasting pan.
7. Roast the green beans and onions in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the green beans are tender and the onions are golden brown.
8. Remove the green beans and onions from the oven and set aside to cool slightly.
9. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
10. Add the 10 whole medium new potatoes to the boiling water and cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender but still firm.
11. Drain the potatoes and return them to the pot.
12. Add the green beans and onions to the pot with the potatoes.
13. Season the pot with salt and pepper to taste.

5e144fbd37.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spread a thin layer of sauce on the bottom of a 9"x13" casserole.
Cover with a layer of noodles (3 or 4 noodles should be enough).
Place ricotta in a bowl and add about 1/4 cup of water, stirring until blended.
Spread 1/3 of this mixture over the pasta (you can use a cake spatula).
Spread 1/3 of the remaining pasta sauce over the cheese.
Spread 1/3 of the vegetables over the sauce.
Sprinkle 1/3 of the mozzarella over the veggies.

Cover and bake until the noodles are tender (35 to 40 minutes).
Remove cover and bake 5 minutes until cheese starts to become golden.
Remove from oven and allow to stand for 5 minutes before cutting into squares.

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, vegetables, and mozzarella cheese. Season with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs and spices.
4. Spread a thin layer of pasta sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Layer the cooked pasta on top of the sauce, followed by the ricotta cheese mixture.
6. Pour the remaining pasta sauce over the top of the mixture, making sure to cover it evenly.
7. Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting into squares and serving.

[/INST]

9168e15a37.gt:
Heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil in a heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onions.
Cook, stirring, until very tender, about eight minutes.
Add a pinch of salt and the garlic, and stir for another minute or so until fragrant.
Stir in the tomatoes, with their liquid, and bring to a simmer.
Simmer about eight minutes until cooked down and fragrant, and add the cauliflower to the pot.
Stir together, and add the bay leaf, rosemary, pepper, dissolved tomato paste and wine.
Bring to a simmer, and add salt to taste.
Cover, reduce the heat and simmer 30 to 40 minutes until the cauliflower is very tender.
Stir in the olives and vinegar if using, and adjust salt and pepper.
Remove from the heat, and stir in the remaining olive oil.

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large oven-safe pot or Dutch oven, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the sliced red onions and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes, cauliflower florets, bay leaf, rosemary sprig, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.
5. Pour in the dissolved tomato paste and water, and stir to combine.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then cover the pot and transfer it to the preheated oven. Cook for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until the cauliflower is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.

8. Stir in the kalamata olives and sherry vinegar or balsamic vinegar, if using. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
9. Serve the stewed cauliflower over rice or pasta, and enjoy!

feb5ca6df3.gt:
Brown sausage in a medium skillet over medium high heat, stirring to break apart.
Drain, and place in a bowl.
Stir in softened cream cheese, drained sauerkraut, and mustard until thoroughly combined.
Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place beaten eggs and crushed crackers in separate bowls.
Roll sausage mixture into small balls and dip first into egg, then roll in cracker crumbs to coat.
Arrange on a sheet pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, turning once for even browning.
Serve warm.
feb5ca6df3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground pork sausage, cream cheese, and sauerkraut until well combined.
3. Add the Dijon mustard, eggs, and crushed buttery round crackers to the mixture. Mix until the ingredients are well combined.
4. Form the mixture into small balls, approximately 1 inch in diameter.

6. Bake the Kraut Balls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the Kraut Balls cool for a few minutes before serving.

ffd5e1942a.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F. Spray an 8x8 baking pan with cooking spray and set aside.
In a large bowl, cream together cream cheese and butter until light and fluffy with a electric hand mixer.
Add in egg and cake mix and beat until combined.
Fold in white chocolate chips and sprinkles.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until bars turn golden brown.
Remove from oven and let them cool completely.
Cut into bars and serve.
Enjoy!
Note: Funfetti cake batter bars will keep covered for about five days.

c089da7346.gt:
In a food processor or blender, blend berries and sugar until completely pureed, about 5 minutes.

ed226be03e.gt:
Heat oil in a small frying pan over low heat until hot, about 1 minute.
Add chile flakes and remove from heat.
Let cool to room temperature.
Strain through a fine mesh strainer if desired, then transfer to a container and cover until ready to use.
Heat half of a gas or charcoal grill to high (about 400 degrees F) and the other half to low (about 300 degrees F).
Divide dough in 1/2 and roll into 2 rounds about 1/4 inch thick and 10 inches in diameter.
Brush the top of 1 round with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Lay dough oiled side down on the hotter half of the grill and brush the top with oil and sprinkle with salt.
Grill without moving until grill marks form on the bottom of the dough, about 2 minutes.
Flip dough with a spatula or tongs to the cooler half of grill.
Spread 1/2 of the sauce evenly over the dough, sprinkle 1 tablespoon of the Parmesan cheese over the sauce, then top with 1/2 of the peppers, 1/2 of the sausage, and 1/2 of the mozzarella.
Cover and grill, rotating if necessary to avoid any hot spots, until dough is lightly charred and cheese is melted, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Transfer pizza to a cutting board, sprinkle 1 tablespoon more of the Parmesan over top, drizzle with desired amount of chile oil, slice, and serve.
Repeat with second round of dough and remaining toppings.
ed226be03e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the red chile flakes, olive oil, and salt. Set aside.
3. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
4. Spread a thin layer of olive oil over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
5. Sprinkle the dough with a pinch of salt.
6. Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
7. Sprinkle the shredded Parmesan cheese over the sauce.
8. Arrange the cooked and crumbled spicy Italian sausage and diced roasted bell peppers evenly over the pizza.
9. Drizzle the red chile oil mixture over the pizza, making sure to cover the toppings evenly.
10. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

4ff0a3ff39.gt:
In a large bowl, combine flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt.
Make a well in the center of flour mixture.
In medium bowl, combine egg, buttermilk, orange juice concentrate and melted butter; add all at once to flour mixture.
Stir just until moistened (batter should be lumpy).
Fold in walnuts.
Line twelve 2-1/2-inch muffin cups with paper bake cups.
Fill the cups 3/4 full with batter.
Bake in a 400 degree F. oven for 18 to 20 minutes or until muffins are golden.
Remove the muffins from the pans.
In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar, orange peel and enough orange juice (2 to 3 teaspoons) to make a drizzling consistency.
Drizzle over warm muffins.
4ff0a3ff39.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and buttermilk.
4. Add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients, and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped walnuts and sifted powdered sugar.
6. If desired, add the finely shredded orange peel for a citrusy flavor.
7. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
8. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your Orange-Nut Muffins!

84fd3c9208.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees, cut top off of squash and remove pulp and seeds, place upside down on cookie sheet and fill pan 1/2 way up with water, cover with foil and bake 45 minutes, remove and make sure it is fork tender, if not continue cooking in 10 minute intervals, leave on pan to cool.
While it is baking, in rice cooker cook rice with 2 cups vegetable broth, diced zucchini, 1 diced carrot, chopped parsley, and about 1/2 cup water.
When rice is done cooking, stir it well and add the raw tomato, pepper and 1/2 of the onion diced.
In a Large skillet add olive oil and brown 1/2 of the diced onion, when brown add the ground turkey, sage, garlic and mushrooms -- continue cooking until meat is done -- add the rice mixture to the meat mixture and stir well, use the remaining vegetable broth to deglaze pan and get moisture level up for oven baking.
Remove about 3/4 of the squash meat and puree for pie or freeze for later use.
Fill squash with the rice/meat mixture about 1/2 full then add 1/2 the cheese, then layer remaining rice mixture on top and top it all with the remaining 1/2 cup of cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes just to get the cheese melted and the flavors melded.
Makes a great presentation to the table with the squash full of the meal!
84fd3c9208.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the squash in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds and pulp.
3. In a large bowl, mix the ground turkey, mushrooms, onion, garlic, and spices (pepper, sage, and ground sage).
4. Stuff the squash with the turkey and mushroom mixture, dividing it evenly between the two halves.
5. Place the stuffed squash halves on a baking sheet and bake for 45-50 minutes or until the squash is tender and the filling is cooked through.
6. While the squash is baking, prepare the rice by cooking it according to the package instructions.
7. Once the squash is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
8. Serve the stuffed squash with a side of rice and enjoy your delicious meal.

d069fb1925.gt:
Cut off the stem of the shiitake mushrooms and cut into bite size pieces.
Put water and the seasoning ingredients in a pot and let it boil.
Then, add the shiitake mushrooms, cover with a drop lid, and cook it for about 10 minutes on low heat.
Stir the pot sometimes.
Take off the drop lid when the liquid boils down and remove from the heat when the liquid has almost gone.
When it has cooled down a little, it is done.
You can keep it in the fridge for about 3 days so make some and keep it for bento lunch box.
It will be an extra dish for dinner if you keep some in the fridge.

5. Remove the mushrooms from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a separate bowl, whisk the water and sugar together until the sugar is fully dissolved.
7. Pour the water mixture into the skillet with the mushrooms, and stir to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-12 minutes, or until the liquid has reduced by half.
9. Add the soy sauce mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine.
10. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
11. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
12. Serve the Salted and Sweetened Shiitake Mushrooms hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This recipe provides a delicious and flavorful dish that combines the earthy taste of shiitake mushrooms with the sweetness of the soy sauce mixture and the tanginess of the mirin and sake. The result is a satisfying and well-balanced dish that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course.

d859113e86.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Grease and flour a loaf pan and set aside.
Combine the eggs, oil, pumpkin and water in a large bowl.
Sift the dry ingredients together and stir into the pumpkin mixture.
Stir in walnuts.
Pour into the prepared loaf pan and bake for one hour or until a tester inserted near the center comes out clean.
d859113e86.pred:
To make a delicious Black Walnut Pumpkin Bread, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, oil, and sugar until well combined.
3. Add the canned pumpkin, water, and spices (nutmeg, cinnamon, and baking soda) to the bowl and mix until smooth.

dafbe725ac.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Mix ingredients well in the order given.
Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Under bake for a chewy cookie.

2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar until smooth.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the flour, baking soda, and salt until well combined.

c7ae046d51.gt:
Place buttermilk, butter or margarine, sugar, salt, flour, whole wheat flour, and yeast into pan of bread machine.
Bake on White Bread setting.
Cool on wire racks before slicing.
c7ae046d51.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the buttermilk, margarine, sugar, and salt. Whisk the ingredients together until the sugar is fully dissolved.
3. Add the bread flour, whole wheat flour, and yeast to the bowl. Mix the ingredients together until a smooth dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
5. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a clean cloth, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
6. Punch the dough down to release the air bubbles, and then transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
7. Roll the dough out into a rectangle, about 1/2 inch thick.
8. Spread the softened butter evenly over the dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
9. Sprinkle the sugar evenly over the butter.
10. Sprinkle the salt evenly over the sugar.
11. Roll the dough up from the long side, starting from the bottom, and pinch the edges to seal.
12. Place the rolled dough in a greased 9x5 inch loaf pan, seam side down.
13. Cover the pan with a clean cloth and let the dough rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
14. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
15. Bake the bread for 30-35 minutes, or until it is golden brown and the internal temperature reaches 190°F (88°C).
16. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes.
17. Then, remove the bread from the pan and let it cool on a wire rack.

[/INST]

491516b698.gt:
peel banana and cut off ends.
slice banana diagonally so u get oval shaped pieces.
u need 12 slices.
thickness to ur liking.
arange 4 banana slices on a plate.
two on two.
top two pointing upwards and bottom two pointing downward.
they should touch in the middle( it should resemble butterfly wings or a four leaf clover)
arrange 4 dried cranberries in the middle of the wings going up and down.
this is the body.
arrange 3 raisins on top wins and 2 raisins on bottom wings.
take the icing or gel and make 2 long feelers coming out of the top half of the dried cranberry.
repeat with rest of ingredients.
feel free to exsperiment wih different fruits.
good ones to work with are (strawberries, kiwi for the wings) pieces pineapple, chocolate chips, for decorating the wings (pretzel sticks or almond slivers for the feelers) get creative with the kids and have fun!
enjoy!
:)
makes 3 butterflies

To prepare a delicious Fruity Butterflies dish, follow these steps:

1. Choose a suitable container, such as a small bowl or a cup, to hold the dish.
2. Peel and slice the banana into small pieces.
3. Remove the cranberries from their packaging and rinse them thoroughly.
4. Drain the cranberries and pat them dry with a paper towel.
5. Rinse the raisins and pat them dry as well.
6. Open the writing icing or writing gel and squeeze a small amount onto the banana slices.
7. Place the banana slices on top of the cranberries and raisins in the container.
8. Use a spoon or a small brush to gently spread the writing icing or writing gel over the banana slices, creating a visually appealing design.
9. Serve the Fruity Butterflies dish immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for later consumption.

This dish is not only visually appealing but also provides a delicious combination of flavors and textures. The banana adds natural sweetness, the cranberries add a tangy taste, and the raisins provide a chewy texture. The writing icing or writing gel adds a fun and creative touch to the dish, making it a delightful treat for both children and adults alike.

c2277ff083.gt:
In a large pot, bring the water and salt to a boil; add the lentils, reduce the heat to medium-low and cook for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender but not overcooked; drain.
In a colander, rinse the cooked lentils under cold water until slightly cool, then place them in a bowl.
Whisk together the remaining ingredients; pour over the lentils and combine well.
Chill for 1 to 2 hours and serve cold.

1. Rinse the lentils and pick out any debris or stones.

3. Drain the lentils and rinse them with cold water to stop the cooking process.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked lentils, olive oil, white wine vinegar, and spices (cumin, coriander, cayenne, and salt).
5. Mix well to ensure the lentils are evenly coated with the dressing.

3ac2a22c5f.gt:
Throughly mix together all ingredients.
Spoon sauce over meatloaf.
Bake for one hour at 350F.
For vegan, omit the Worcestershire sauce and use vegan alternative.
3ac2a22c5f.pred:
To make Meatloaf Sauce (or Stuffed Peppers), you will need the following ingredients:
1 12 cups tomato sauce
12 cup water
3 tablespoons vinegar
3 tablespoons brown sugar
2 tablespoons prepared mustard
2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce or 2 teaspoons vegan Worcestershire sauce or 2 teaspoons A.1. Original Sauce
14 teaspoon oregano
14 teaspoon parsley flakes
14 teaspoon basil
14 teaspoon garlic powder
14 teaspoon salt
14 teaspoon ground pepper
14 cup mushroom, sliced thinly (optional)

To prepare the sauce, combine the tomato sauce, water, vinegar, brown sugar, and mustard in a large saucepan. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Add the Worcestershire sauce, oregano, parsley flakes, basil, garlic powder, salt, and ground pepper to the saucepan. Stir to combine, then continue to simmer for an additional 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened to your desired consistency.

If you are making Meatloaf Sauce, you can add the mushrooms and any additional ingredients you prefer. Simmer the mixture for a few more minutes, until the mushrooms are tender.

If you are making Stuffed Peppers, you can use the same sauce recipe, but instead of adding mushrooms, you can stuff the peppers with a mixture of cooked ground beef, rice, and any additional seasonings you prefer.

Once the sauce is cooked to your liking, you can serve it over your choice of pasta, rice, or as a side dish. Enjoy!

1ebd581dca.gt:
In a large mixing bowl combine rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch and the pinch of salt, stirring together well.
Spoon mixture into an 8x8 in (20x20 cm) glass baking dish.
In a second bowl, combine brown sugar, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg and butter, and stir with a fork until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle this mixture over the fruit mixture.
If using oven, place in a 325F preheated oven, and bake uncovered for 20-25 minutes until golden brown on top and fruit is tender.
If using an outdoor grill, position the pan on a cool side of the grill (that means for a gas grill no heat directly underneath).
Maintain the heat to a medium-low temperature (around 300F).
Close lid of grill and cook 25-30 minutes.
Make sure to rotate the baking dish on the grill about every 8 minutes for even cooking.
Either way, the fruit should be tender and the juices bubbling when finished cooking.
I love serving with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or frozen yogurt.
1ebd581dca.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sliced rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, lemon juice, cornstarch, and salt. Mix well.
3. Spread the mixture evenly in a 9x9 inch baking dish.
4. In a small bowl, combine the oats, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
5. Drizzle the melted butter over the fruit mixture.
6. Sprinkle the oat mixture evenly over the butter.
7. Bake the crisp for 35-40 minutes, or until the fruit is tender and the crisp is golden brown.
8. Let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

!

trim away middle of bun

6f4d1ffc76.gt:
In la deep pot, bring water, a pinch of salt and oil to a boil.
Rinse rice a couple of times.
Add to boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until water evaporates (1520 minutes).
Fluff with fork, let it cool to room temperature or refrigerate until ready to use.
When ready to serve, add chopped cilantro and lime juice.
Season with salt.

This recipe provides a simple and delicious way to enjoy Cilantro Lime Rice, using a combination of rice, cilantro, lime, and salt to create a flavorful and satisfying dish.

c7e9cae7ae.pred:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the linguine according to the package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large saucepan, heat the cream over medium heat until hot. Add the dry onion flakes and stir to combine.
3. Add the asparagus to the saucepan and cook for 3-4 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender but still slightly crisp.
4. Add the smoked salmon flakes or slivered salmon to the saucepan and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the salmon is heated through.
5. Add the cooked linguine to the saucepan and stir to combine.
6. Add the grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Linguine With Smoked Salmon Creamy Sauce immediately, garnished with chopped parsley, if desired. Enjoy!

1690800ec2.gt:
Peel and quarter the potatoes, then wash them thoroughly.
Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough cold, salted water to cover them and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20 min, or until cooked through, and drain.
Meanwhile put butter, lemon and garlic in a saucepan over very, very low.
Let it simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Discard lemon and garlic.
When potatoes are done, drain and mashed to your liking.
Fold in avocado and butter.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
If you like creamer mashed potatoes, you can add some milk.
1690800ec2.pred:
To create a delicious Avocado Mashed Potatoes dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 12 lbs of potatoes, salt, and pepper. Toss well to ensure even distribution of the ingredients.
3. In a separate bowl, mash the avocados using a fork or a potato masher.
4. In a small saucepan, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic cloves and lemon quarters, and cook for about 2 minutes or until the garlic is fragrant.
5. Carefully pour the melted butter over the potatoes, ensuring that the garlic and lemon are evenly distributed.
6. Using a fork, mash the potatoes and avocado mixture until it reaches the desired consistency. This may take a few minutes of gentle stirring.
7. Transfer the mashed potatoes and avocado mixture to a baking dish or a casserole dish.
8. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and the top is golden brown.
9. Remove the dish from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This Avocado Mashed Potatoes dish combines the creamy texture of mashed potatoes with the rich, nutty flavor of avocado, resulting in a delicious and satisfying meal. The addition of lemon and garlic adds a burst of freshness and a hint of warmth to the dish, making it a delightful and satisfying choice for any meal.

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!
4a46bab1e9.pred:
To make a delicious Greek Yogurt Bread, follow these steps:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the whole wheat flour, white bread flour, organic honey, and salt.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the yeast, Greek yogurt, and 1 cup of water. Allow the mixture to sit for about 10 minutes, or until the yeast is foamy.
3. Add the foamy yeast mixture to the dry ingredients, and mix until a smooth dough forms.
4. Gradually add the remaining water, mixing until the dough comes together and forms a cohesive ball.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic, about 5-10 minutes.
6. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and allow it to rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
7. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
8. Punch down the risen dough, and then transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
9. Shape the dough into a round loaf, and place it on a greased baking sheet.
10. Bake the bread for about 30-40 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
11. Remove the bread from the oven, and let it cool on a wire rack for about 10 minutes.
12. Slice the bread and serve it warm, with your favorite spreads or toppings, such as honey, butter, or jam.

This delicious Greek Yogurt Bread recipe combines the tangy flavor of Greek yogurt with the warm, comforting texture of whole wheat and spelt flours. The result is a delightful, wholesome bread that can be enjoyed with a variety of toppings and spreads.

3ffc1f8ead.gt:
Follow instructions on pizza crust package
After flattening the mix on round cookie sheet, add the pasta sauce in circular motions starting from middle with spoon (leaving 2 inches on the outer ring for crust)
Add the cheese evenly across sauce
Add the pepperoni
Cook for 10-14 minutes or until crust is golden brown
3ffc1f8ead.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese, and Italian seasoning. Mix well to ensure the cheese is evenly distributed.
3. Roll out the pizza crust mix on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
4. Spread the pasta sauce mixture evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust.
5. Add the sliced pepperoni evenly over the sauce.
6. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your homemade pizza!

cab917403f.gt:
Mix all ingredients together and place in a clean jar with a tight lid.
Use 2 T.
per pound of meat.
cab917403f.pred:
[TUTORIAL]
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the 14 cup instant minced onion, 3 tablespoons chili powder, 2 tablespoons cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, and 12 teaspoons garlic powder.
2. Mix the ingredients well to ensure even distribution.
3. Add 2 teaspoons of oregano to the mixture, and stir to combine.
4. Store the taco seasoning mix in an airtight container or a sealed plastic bag.
5. To use the taco seasoning mix, simply sprinkle it over your favorite taco filling or any dish that calls for a spicy, savory seasoning.

[/TUTORIAL]

[/INST]

fefd0facd1.gt:
Trim the bottoms of the asparagus and place in a shallow dish.
Pour the olive oil, salt, pepper and lime juice over the asparagus and toss well to coat thoroughly.
Grill over hot coals for 2 to 3 minutes, or until tender.
Serve immediately.
fefd0facd1.pred:
1. Wash the asparagus thoroughly and pat it dry with a paper towel.
2. In a large bowl, toss the asparagus with olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
3. Preheat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
4. Grill the asparagus for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are tender and slightly charred.
5. Remove the asparagus from the grill and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the lime juice with a pinch of salt and pepper.
7. Drizzle the lime mixture over the grilled asparagus and toss to coat evenly.
8. Serve immediately.

[/INST]

b4611b4385.gt:
Heat should be medium-high and rack about 4 inches from fire.
Put shrimp and garlic in a food processor and pulse until just chopped; remove to a large bowl.
Working in batches, grind pork fat until just chopped (be careful not to overprocess).
Add to bowl.
Then grind meat until just chopped, again being careful not to overprocess; add to bowl.
Mix shrimp, pork fat and meat with soy sauce, scallions, cilantro, chili and ginger; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Shape into 8 patties.
Grill about 4 minutes, then turn and cook for a total of 8 to 10 minutes, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro, cabbage and pickled pepper, to taste.
b4611b4385.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the shrimp, garlic, pork shoulder, soy sauce, scallions, cilantro, chili, ginger, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine.

2. Form the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.

3. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (71°C).

4. Serve the Shu Mai-Style Burgers on buns, garnished with additional chopped cilantro and pickled pepper, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Shu Mai-Style Burgers!

0787add592.gt:
Fry the egg and season with salt and pepper.
Add all other ingredients to a bowl and top with warm egg.
Drizzle with balsamic syrup.
0787add592.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, cook the quinoa according to package instructions. Typically, this involves bringing the quinoa and water to a boil, then reducing the heat to low and simmering for about 15-20 minutes, or until the quinoa is tender and the water has been absorbed.

2. While the quinoa is cooking, prepare the other ingredients. Wash and chop the basil, slice the avocado, and fry the egg.

3. Once the quinoa is cooked, remove it from the heat and let it sit for a few minutes. This will allow the quinoa to cool slightly and absorb any excess moisture.

4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, sliced avocado, fried egg, and sliced tomatoes.

5. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the top of the bowl, and mix everything together gently.

6. Serve the Quinoa Breakfast Bowl immediately, and enjoy your delicious and nutritious meal!

a777a9be09.gt:
In a wide mouth 1 quart jar, layer the barley, peas, rice and lentils.
Then layer around the edges the onion, parsley, salt, lemon pepper, bouillon and the alphabet pasta.
Fill the rest of the jar with the twist macaroni.
Seal and attach a gift card.
The gift card should read: Add contents of jar to 3 quarts of water, 2 stalks of chopped celery, 2 sliced carrots, 1 cup of shredded cabbage (optional) and 2 cups diced tomatoes.
Over medium low heat, cover and simmer about 1 hour, or until vegetables are tender.
a777a9be09.pred:
To create a delicious Country Soup in a Jar, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, combine the barley, split peas, rice, lentils, dried minced onion, dried parsley, salt, lemon pepper, and beef bouillon granules.
2. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
3. Add the uncooked alphabet pasta and twist macaroni to the pot, stirring to combine.
4. Cook the pasta and macaroni mixture for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the pasta is tender and the soup is well-blended.
5. Carefully transfer the soup to a large, clean jar, leaving enough room at the top for the soup to expand as it cools.
6. Allow the soup to cool completely before storing in the refrigerator.
7. To reheat, simply place the jar in a pot of simmering water for a few minutes, or use a microwave-safe container and heat the soup in the microwave for a few minutes.

Enjoy your homemade Country Soup in a Jar!

f7ca0c32fa.gt:
Place greens on serving plate.
Top with chicken and corn.
Drizzle with salsa, then dressing.
f7ca0c32fa.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the loosely packed torn salad greens, chicken strips, corn, and salsa.
2. In a separate small bowl, mix the KRAFT Lite Ranch Dressing and TACO BELL Thick & Chunky Salsa.
3. Pour the dressing mixture over the salad ingredients and toss to combine.
4. Serve the Santa Fe Chicken Salad immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

This delicious Santa Fe Chicken Salad can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish, providing a flavorful and satisfying meal.

4aec361465.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F. Put the chickpeas into a bowl.
Coat the chickpeas with the olive oil, garlic powder and whichever spice you prefer.
Place on a sheet pan that youve lined with parchment paper and roast at 400 F for approximately 20 minutes.
Toss in the fresh chives, adjust the seasoning as needed and serve.
If you choose to saute them on the stovetop, use a cast iron or aluminum pan on medium heat and stir frequently for approximately 15-20 minutes.
4aec361465.pred:
To cook a delightful A Trio of Spiced Chickpeas dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, garlic powder, spice of choice, and salt and pepper to taste.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chickpeas, chives, and the spice mixture.
4. Spread the chickpea mixture onto a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet, ensuring that it is evenly distributed.
5. Roast the chickpea mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the chickpeas are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
6. Remove the chickpea mixture from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the A Trio of Spiced Chickpeas as a side dish or snack, garnished with additional chives if desired.

This dish is a delicious and healthy option, as chickpeas are a good source of protein, fiber, and other essential nutrients. The spices used in the recipe add a rich and flavorful taste, making it a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

524529d38b.gt:
Add ingredients (except for cornmeal) to machine bread pan in order as per manufacturer's instructions.
Set to "Dough" cycle.
Lightly grease one 9 x 13-inch pan and sprinkle with cornmeal.
When the dough cycle is complete, roll out dough and place in pan.
Let rest in pans for 10-15 minutes.
Add toppings of your choice.
Bake at 350F until done (approximately 20 minutes, depending on the thickness of toppings).
I make the pizza in 9x13 rectangular pans rather than the round pizza pans, because the squares pieces are easier to reheat and pack in school lunches.
524529d38b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the water, sugar, salt, and olive oil.
3. Add the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, garlic powder, onion powder, and msg. Mix until well combined.
4. Add the bread machine yeast and mix until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead until it is smooth and elastic, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth or plastic wrap, and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
7. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
8. Roll out the dough into a circle or your desired shape.
9. Place the rolled out dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
11. Bake the pizza dough for 10-12 minutes, or until it is golden brown.
12. Remove the pizza dough from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before adding your desired toppings.
13. Add your toppings, such as pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, and any other desired ingredients.
14. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for an additional 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
15. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

3ba549830f.gt:
Mix sauce, peppers and walnuts in saucepan; cook on medium heat until heated through, stirring occasionally.
Pour over hot ravioli in large serving bowl; toss to coat.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley, if desired.
3ba549830f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large skillet or saucepan, heat the Alfredo sauce over medium heat.
3. Add the sliced roasted red peppers to the saucepan and stir to combine. Cook for about 5 minutes, or until the peppers are heated through.
4. In a small bowl, mix the toasted walnut pieces with a drizzle of olive oil.
5. Add the toasted walnut mixture to the saucepan with the Alfredo and roasted red peppers. Stir to combine.
6. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Meanwhile, cook the Four Cheese Ravioli according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
8. In a large bowl, combine the cooked ravioli and the Alfredo sauce mixture. Stir to combine.
9. Serve the Alfredo with Roasted Red Peppers over cooked pasta or rice, and enjoy your delicious meal!

05096fc3ad.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Coat a standard (12 cup) muffin tin with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, whisk egg whites, sugar, cocoa and salt until combined.
Add coconut; mix until well coated.
***I would add the sliced almonds in at this point with the coconut.
They didn't want to stick to the tops of the cookies!
***.
Dividing evenly, spoon mixture into muffin tin and pat in gently with moistened fingers.
Sprinkle with almonds and pat on gently.
***See note above***.
Bake until almonds are golden, 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool in tin for 5-10 minutes.
Run a thin metal spatula around the edges to loosen from pan.
Turn out onto rack to cool completely.
Cookies keep in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 days.
05096fc3ad.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the egg whites, sugar, and cocoa powder until well combined.
3. Fold in the sliced almonds and sweetened flaked coconut.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Using a small cookie scoop or spoon, scoop out small mounds of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
6. Bake the macaroon cups for about 15-20 minutes, or until they are set and slightly golden around the edges.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the macaroon cups cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Coconut Macaroon Cups!

d75096ee18.gt:
place a small pot on medium heat and add heavy cream.
Bring to a low boil.
Pour over chocolate chips and mix until thoroughly melted.
Add in butter and vanilla extract.
d75096ee18.pred:
1. In a medium saucepan, combine the chocolate chips and heavy cream over medium heat.
2. Stir the mixture continuously until the chocolate chips have melted and the mixture is smooth and well combined.
3. Add the butter and vanilla extract to the mixture, stirring until the butter is melted and the ingredients are well combined.
4. Cook the ganache over low heat for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches the desired consistency.
5. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the ganache cool for a few minutes.
6. Pour the ganache onto a serving dish or individual portions, and let it cool completely before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

61afcadcb1.gt:
1.
In a small bowl, combine almonds and brown sugar; set aside.
2.
In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in the almond extract.
3.
Combine flour, baking soda and baking powder.
Add this to the creamed mixture alternately with bananas and sour cream.
Fold in the vanilla or white chips.
4.
Spread into a greased 13x9x2 inch baking pan.
Sprinkle with reserved almond and brown sugar mixture.
5.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool on a wire rack.
61afcadcb1.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the dry ingredients (flour, baking soda, baking powder, and almond extract).
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the bananas and sour cream, mixing until just combined.
6. Stir in the slivered almonds.
7. Spread the batter evenly in a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares.

[/SYS]

Enjoy your delicious Banana Crumb Snack Cake!

5045cde8e5.gt:
Desand the clams.
Boil the water and add the dashi.
Add the clams.
Once the shells have opened up, add the ingredients.
Garnish with mitsuba or thin green onion and it's done!
5045cde8e5.pred:
[INST]
To prepare Hamaguri Clam Clear Broth, follow these steps:
1. Rinse the clams thoroughly under cold running water to remove any dirt or sand.
2. In a large pot or saucepan, bring the water to a boil.
3. Add the clams, Mentsuyu, salt, and dashi stock granules to the pot.
4. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the clams simmer for about 5-7 minutes or until they open.
5. Remove the clams from the pot using a slotted spoon or spider, and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Remove the clams from their shells, reserving the shells for later use.
7. In a small bowl, mix the Mitsuba and small green onion.
8. Strain the broth through a fine mesh strainer into a clean pot.
9. Return the broth to the pot and add the Mitsuba and green onion mixture.
10. Bring the broth back to a simmer and let it cook for a few more minutes.
11. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.
12. Serve the Hamaguri Clam Clear Broth hot, garnished with the reserved clam shells if desired.

[/INST]

07f2c36b9b.gt:
Heat bacon for 30 seconds in the microwave between two pieces of paper towel to soak up excess grease
Spread honey mustard on tortilla then lay cheese on top of honey mustard, then add chicken, then add the bacon.
Spread the guacamole on top of the bacon then lay lettuce leaves on top of guacamole
Roll up and devour!
07f2c36b9b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.
3. Place the chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
4. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the other ingredients.
5. Cut the chicken into thin strips.
6. Cut the Swiss cheese into thin slices.
7. Cut the bacon into thin strips.
8. Cut the avocado into small pieces.
9. Prepare the guacamole by mashing the avocado with a fork or a blender.
10. Prepare the lettuce by washing and drying it.
11. Prepare the honey mustard by mixing it with a small amount of water to achieve the desired consistency.
12. Prepare the tortilla by warming it in the oven or using a microwave.

1. Assemble the wrap by spreading a thin layer of honey mustard on one side of the tortilla.
2. Add the cooked chicken, Swiss cheese, bacon, avocado, and a sprinkle of salt and pepper on top of the honey mustard.
3. Roll the tortilla over the ingredients, ensuring that the filling is evenly distributed.
4. Cut the wrap into 4 equal portions and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Chicken, Bacon, Avocado and Swiss wrap!

a5230cef43.gt:
With and Electric mixer, beat butter & Icing sugar until it stands up like egg whites.
In a seperate medium bowl, combine flour and corn starch.
Add slowly to butter and icing sugar mixture.
(I find when your mixer starts to power out, then use a wooden spoon to take over, but please try to use the mixer as long as possible).
Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.
Top cookies with jub-jubs, bar cherries, or anything really.
My oldest son loves smarties on his.
Imagination is up to you.
Bake at 300 for approx 30 minutes until bottom edges turn a light brown.
(Because all ovens vary please start checking them at about 20-25 minutes).
a5230cef43.pred:
[INST]
1. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and icing sugar until light and fluffy.
2. Gradually add the flour and cornstarch, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
3. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight.
4. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut out desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 12-15 minutes, or until they are lightly golden brown around the edges.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

02b1542927.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C/160C fan forced.
line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place thighs on a work surface, open out and generously spread tapenade inside each.
Fold fillets back into shape.
Cut pastry sheets in half.
Place chicken at one end of the sheet fold edges in, fold pastry over chicken and roll to make a neat parcel.
Pinch sides to seal.
Place, seam-side down, on a prepared tray.
Brush with egg to glaze.
Sprinkle with basil.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and pastry is golden brown.
Serve with vegetables.
02b1542927.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the basil and parmesan tapenade.
3. Season the chicken thigh fillets with salt and pepper.
4. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and cook the chicken until browned on both sides and cooked through.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and a pinch of salt.
7. Roll out the frozen butter puff pastry on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/8 inch (3 mm).
8. Cut the pastry into 4 equal squares.
9. Place a chicken thigh fillet in the center of each pastry square.
10. Brush the edges of the pastry with the beaten egg.
11. Fold the pastry over the chicken, pressing the edges to seal the filling.
12. Place the filled pastries on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
13. Bake the Wellingtons in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown.
14. Remove from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes.
15. Meanwhile, steam the green and yellow vegetables until tender.
16. Carefully cut the Wellingtons in half and serve them with the steamed vegetables.

Enjoy your delicious Chicken Wellingtons!

b067e71075.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle.
Place a baking sheet upside down in the oven while its heating.
Remove chorizo from its casing and place in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until browned, about 7 minutes.
Remove to a plate and set aside.
Add 2 tablespoons of the olive oil to the pan.
Add mushrooms and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Cook, stirring rarely, until beginning to brown, about 10 minutes.
Roll out pizza dough to a 10-inch round, remove the hot baking sheet from the oven, drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil, and carefully place dough on the upside-down baking sheet.
Scatter chorizo, mushrooms, Jack cheese, and Parmesan cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake until cheese is melted and crust is crisp and browned, about 15 minutes.
b067e71075.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the Mexican chorizo and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the cremini mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. While the chorizo and mushrooms cook, roll out the pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to your desired thickness. Transfer the dough to a pizza stone or a baking sheet.
5. Spread a thin layer of olive oil on the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
6. Add the cooked chorizo and mushrooms to the pizza dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
7. Sprinkle the shredded Jack cheese evenly over the pizza.
8. Drizzle the grated Parmesan cheese over the pizza, making sure to cover the entire surface.
9. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and melted.
10. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Mushroom and Chorizo Pizza Recipe!

1432c540ac.gt:
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. In a bowl, whisk the canola oil, vinegar, miso, ginger, sesame oil, honey, lime zest, and lime juice until smooth.
Season with salt.
On a rimmed baking sheet, toss the tomatoes with 3 tablespoons of the miso dressing and season with salt.
Roast for 20 minutes, stirring, until the tomatoes are charred in spots.
Scrape into a large bowl.
Cook the soba noodles in boiling water just until al dente, 4 minutes.
Drain and cool the noodles under cold running water.
Add the soba noodles, scallions, and half of the remaining dressing to the tomatoes and toss well.
Season with salt, transfer to a platter, and garnish with the sesame seeds.
Serve with the remaining dressing.Looking for vegetable recipes?
Try our best asparagus recipes, eggplant recipes, or zucchini recipes.
1432c540ac.pred:
1. In a large saucepan or wok, heat the canola oil over medium heat.
2. Add the minced ginger and toasted sesame oil, and stir-fry for about 1 minute.
3. Add the unseasoned rice vinegar, light yellow miso, and honey, and stir-fry for another minute.
4. Add the lime zest and juice, and stir-fry for a few more seconds.
5. Add the cherry tomatoes and scallions, and cook for a few more minutes until the vegetables are tender.
6. Add the soba noodles and cook until they are tender but still slightly chewy.
7. Season the noodles with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the Soba Noodles with Miso-Roasted Tomatoes in a bowl, garnished with toasted sesame seeds.

[/INST]

aa904a4678.gt:
Place your jello shot cups on a cookie sheet (that you know will fit in your fridge).
This will make for easy transport.
Place 2 cups VERY hot water (but not boiling) in a pitcher.
Slowly pour in contents of jello packages while stirring constantly.
Stir until completely mixed (about 2 minutes).
Add in the remaining ingredients and stir well.
Pour into plastic jello shot cups or you can use a 9x13 pan if you don't have the cups.
Chill 4 hours or more until set.
If you are using a cake pan, simply cut the set jello into squares and place on individual cupcake cups for serving.
If you want to get silly, top each one with a small dollop of whip cream just before serving!
aa904a4678.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the two boxes of blue Jello gelatin and the very hot water. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
2. Add the coconut rum and blue schnapps to the bowl, and stir until the mixture is well combined.
3. Pour the mixture into a large, oven-safe dish or baking pan.
4. Cover the dish or pan with plastic wrap or aluminum foil, and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
5. Once the mixture has set, carefully remove it from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for about 15-20 minutes.
6. Carefully pour the mixture into the prepared shot glasses.
7. Refrigerate the shot glasses for at least 1 hour before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Baja Blue Jello Shots!

32d7fb7310.gt:
To roast vegetables: Preheat oven to 400.
Wrap peeled garlic cloves together in foil with a few drops of olive oil and put in oven for the same time you will be roasting the peppers and potatoes, around 35 minutes.
Cut potatoes in half and cut red peppers into half inch pieces.
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, bell peppers and 3 TBS olive oil, along with salt and pepper to taste.
Arrange potatoes and bell peppers in one layer, divided amongst 2 shallow baking pans.
Roast in the middle and lower third of the oven, switching positions of the pans halfway through the roasting time, for a total of 35 minutes, or until potatoes are golden brown and tender.
To make salad: After potatoes are done,remove pans from oven and immediately toss roasted potatoes and peppers with 2 TBS balsamic vinegar.
Cool and remove garlic from foil.
Squeeze cloves into a small bowl and mash with a fork with remaining 1/2 TBS olive oil and 1 TBS balsamic vinegar.
Toss together with potatoes and peppers.
Just before serving, add fresh basil.
Serve at room temperature.
Optional items you could add for a main dish meal: goat cheese, toasted pine nuts, grilled chicken, grilled tuna, etc.
32d7fb7310.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Place the garlic cloves on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 30-45 minutes, or until they are golden brown and fragrant. Remove from the oven and let them cool.
3. In a large bowl, combine the roasted garlic cloves, small boiling potatoes, red bell peppers, and 12 tablespoons of olive oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. In a small bowl, mix the remaining 12 tablespoon of olive oil with the balsamic vinegar.
5. Pour the dressing over the potato mixture and toss to coat evenly.
6. Add the fresh basil leaves and toss again.
7. Serve the Roasted Potato Salad immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

This Roasted Potato Salad recipe combines the natural flavors of garlic, potatoes, and red bell peppers, enhanced by the roasting process, and balanced with the tangy balsamic vinegar dressing. The fresh basil adds a touch of freshness and aroma to the dish, making it a delicious and satisfying side dish or main course.

e2b5a77d87.gt:
Heat oil in pan on low to medium heat, then throw in onion and sugar.
Cook for a couple of minutes, stirring from time to time.
Throw in mustard, stir to combine, and cook until onion is done to your liking, stirring as necessary.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cream cheese - don't worry if the cheese doesn't incorporate, it will once it's heated - and throw into pan, stirring everything together.
If mixture is too thick, add a little milk.
Add tomatoes, stirring and cooking until eggs are almost done, then add grated cheese and stir to melt and heat through.
Add extra salt & pepper if desired.
e2b5a77d87.pred:
1. In a large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
2. Add the grated cheddar cheese and cook until melted and bubbly, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the chopped tomatoes, cook until they start to release their juices, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the light cream cheese and stir until melted and combined with the other ingredients.
5. Crack the eggs into the skillet and stir gently to scramble them with the other ingredients. Cook until the eggs are cooked through and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Tomato & Onion Scrambled Eggs immediately, garnished with fresh chopped parsley if desired.

[/INST]

0213dcf418.gt:
Heat non stick skillet.
Tear a circle out of the center of bread.
Spread a very, very thin layer of mayo to both sides of bread.
Place the bread in the skillet; add a very small amount of butter in the hole.
Crack the egg into the hole in the bread.
Cook egg till set and bread is browned turn over and brown the other side and egg is done to your desire.
Salt and pepper to taste and enjoy!
J.R. liked to put a little maple syrup on his.
You can also toast the holes you tear out of the bread in the pan while egg is cooking and serve on the side.
0213dcf418.pred:

To prepare Hole in the Wall, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread the mayonnaise evenly on one side of the bread slice.
3. Crack the egg into a bowl, and then pour the egg over the mayonnaise-covered side of the bread slice.
4. Place the bread slice with the egg and mayonnaise mixture on a baking sheet or a greased pan.
5. Bake the sandwich for 12-15 minutes, or until the egg is cooked through and the bread is golden brown.
6. Carefully remove the sandwich from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it in half.
7. Serve the Hole in the Wall immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Hole in the Wall!

ea0c63b401.gt:
In a medium saute pan, bring the stock to a boil.
Add the orzo and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until liquid is almost absorbed and orzo is tender.
Turn off heat.
Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
Enjoy!
ea0c63b401.pred:

To prepare Big Daddy's Lemon Pepper Orzo, follow these steps:
