2. Add the orzo pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
3. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the sauce by combining the cream, lemon juice, grated parmesan cheese, cream cheese (or mascarpone), butter, and chives in a small saucepan.
4. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and return it to the pot.
5. Pour the cream sauce over the pasta and stir to combine.
6. Season the dish with cracked black pepper and lemon zest.
7. Serve the Big Daddy's Lemon Pepper Orzo immediately.

The essential ingredients for this dish are orzo pasta, vegetable stock (or chicken stock), cream, grated parmesan cheese, cream cheese (or mascarpone), butter, chives, lemon juice, lemon zest, and cracked black pepper. These ingredients will create a delicious and flavorful dish that is perfect for a cozy meal or a special occasion.

8a8c406a8c.gt:
Cook pasta as directed, adding vegetables to the boiling water for the last 2 minutes of the pasta cooking time.
Meanwhile, Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.
Add meat; cook 4 minutes or until browned on all sides, stirring occasionally.
Stir in dressing and teriyaki sauce; cook 2 minutes or until sauce is thickened, stirring occasionally.
Drain pasta mixture; Place in a large serving bowl.
Add meat mixture; toss to coat.

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.
6970e8f99b.pred:
[INST]

2. In a large mixing bowl, melt the unsweetened baking chocolate and butter together over low heat, stirring constantly.

9a2f1c9bd7.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Grease 9x13 pan.
Saute onion in butter til tender, don't brown.
Mix all ingredients together in bowl including onions and butter.
Pour potato mixture in pan and cover,bake aprox.
1 hour.
uncover last 10 minute.

f69122a346.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Melt the butter or margarine in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add the garlic, bay leaves, onion and green bell pepper and saute for about 5 minutes.
Add the meat and saute until slightly browned on all sides.
Transfer mixture to a 2 quart casserole dish and pour the tomatoes over the mixture.
Cover and bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for about 2 hours.
(Note: Also can be done in a slow cooker on low setting for 6 to 8 hours.)
f69122a346.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.

a7c636c1f0.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large pot over medium-high heat, melt butter.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft, about 10 minutes.
Add celery and onions, and cook until soft, about 10 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Add 2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, and remaining ingredients; toss to combine.
Transfer to a buttered 3-quart casserole dish, cover with a piece of aluminum foil, and bake for 45 minutes.
Remove foil and bake until hot and browned on top, about 20 minutes more.
a7c636c1f0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sourdough bread, mushrooms, celery, onions, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the low-sodium chicken broth, chopped fresh herbs (parsley, thyme, sage, and rosemary), and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Pour the broth mixture over the bread mixture and toss to combine.
5. Transfer the mixture to a greased baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the stuffing is cooked through.
6. Serve the Sourdough and Mushroom Stuffing hot, as a side dish or as a filling for sandwiches.

acfdff90be.gt:
Cut the meat into strips along the grain.
Put the chicken and all the ingredients up to the soy sauce and honey in a bowl and rub in well with your hands.
Leave to marinate for 30 minutes.
After 30 minutes, wipe the excess moisture off the chicken pieces and add 1 tablespoon of cake flour.
That way the batter will stick well to the chicken.
To make the batter: Put the panko in a resealable bag and crush into a fine powder by rolling a rolling pin over the bag.
You can also do this in a food mill or food processor.
Put the crushed panko and the remaining ingredients marked with in a bowl and mix to combine.
Add 250 ml of beer and mix until blended.
The batter should be about the consistency of heavy cream.
If it's too thick add a little more beer, mixing between additions.
Pour cooking oil in a frying pan and heat over medium to about 170C.
Coat each piece of chicken in batter and deep fry.
To avoid the batter from cracking and falling off, turn the pieces over gently after about 30 seconds even if the surface has not hardened.
When the pieces are golden brown, take them out and drain off the oil very well to finish.
acfdff90be.pred:
To make delicious Crispy Chicken Nuggets (Just Like KFC's!), follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).

2. In a large bowl, combine the chicken breast, salt, pepper, sake, grated onion, garlic, grated ginger, soy sauce, honey, cake flour, bread flour, cornstarch, salt, baking powder, and pepper. Mix well.

3. Add the beer and mix until the chicken is evenly coated.

4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Shape the chicken mixture into small, evenly-sized balls.

5. Place the chicken balls on the prepared baking sheet.

6. Bake the chicken balls in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the breading is golden and crispy.

7. Remove the chicken balls from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.

8. Serve the Crispy Chicken Nuggets (Just Like KFC's!) with your favorite dipping sauce, such as KFC's Original Recipe or Honey Mustard.

[/INST]

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and crispy version of KFC's famous Chicken Nuggets at home.

e10d62e4d9.gt:
To make the crust, preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Crust cookies in a food processor (or smash in a Ziploc bag with a rolling pin).
Stir in melted butter until all combined.
Pour into a regular pie pan and press crumbs all over the pan and up the sides.
Bake for 3 to 4 minutesjust long enough for it to set.
Cool crust completely.
Place raspberries on a plate or in an empty pan.
Smash them with a fork, then sprinkle on 3 tablespoons of sugar.
Stir together and allow to sit for 15 minutes.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, combine raspberry yogurt with the instant vanilla pudding mix (just the powder itself.)
Beat on low until combined, about 1 minute.
Pour in heavy cream and whip on low for 30 seconds.
Stop the mixer and scrape down the bowl with a rubber spatula.
Turn mixer on medium-high speed and beat for two minutes, or until mixture is thick.
Turn off mixer, then fold in raspberries until just combined.
Pour into cooled pie pan and spread evenly.
Freeze for two hours, or until very firm.
Cut into slices and top each slice with cookie crumbs, dollops of whipped cream, and extra raspberries.
Keep in freezer, allowing time to thaw before serving.
e10d62e4d9.pred:
To create a delicious Raspberry Cream Pie, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Crush the Oreo cookies using a food processor or a rolling pin until they are fine crumbs.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed cookies, melted butter, and sugar. Mix until well combined.
4. Press the cookie mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
5. Bake the crust for 10-12 minutes, or until it is set and slightly golden.
6. Allow the crust to cool completely.
7. In a separate mixing bowl, combine the raspberries, sugar, and vanilla pudding mix. Mix until well combined.
8. Pour the raspberry mixture over the cooled crust.
9. Refrigerate the pie for at least 2 hours or until the filling is set.
10. Before serving, top the pie with whipped cream and extra raspberries for garnish.

This delightful Raspberry Cream Pie dish is perfect for a special occasion or a treat for yourself and your loved ones. The combination of the crunchy cookie crust, creamy filling, and tangy raspberries creates a delicious and satisfying dessert that everyone will enjoy.

55412fa6ca.gt:
Combine butter, sugar, corn syrup and spices in a saucepan.
Over low-medium heat, stir ingredients constantly until ingredients look like they are about to boil.
Remove from heat and transfer to a mixing bowl.
Allow sugar mixture to cool to room temperature.
Stirring occasionally might help speed up this process.
Stir eggs into cooled sugar mixture.
Sift flour and baking soda together and add to sugar mixture.
Mix well.
Roll dough into a ball.
Cover and chill in the refrigerator for 8-12 hours or overnight.
Split dough into 2 parts; Roll dough about 1/4-inch thick on a clean, floured surface.
Cut into desired shapes.
Bake in preheated oven at 350F for about 10-15 minutes, or until firm to the touch.
Cookies can be left plain, or decorated with pipped icing.
NOTE: This makes a crisp cookie, if a softer cookie is desired you may substitute brown sugar for the granulated sugar.
55412fa6ca.pred:
[INSTR]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the dark corn syrup, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, and allspice. Mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs slightly.
5. Gradually add the eggs to the butter mixture, mixing well.
6. Sift the baking soda and flour together, then add to the mixture. Mix until well combined.
7. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. On a floured surface, roll the dough out to your desired thickness.
9. Cut out your desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
10. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

613e75a520.gt:
In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, sugar and salt until combined.
Add cabbage mix, apples, celery and raisins to bowl with dressing, toss well.
Cover and refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow cabbage to soften.
To serve, sprinkle with walnuts.
Garnish with radishes.

1. In a large bowl, whisk together the 14 cups of light mayonnaise, 14 cups of low-fat sour cream, and 1 tablespoon of fresh lemon juice.
2. Add 1 teaspoon of sugar, 12 teaspoons of salt, and the 1 (16 ounce) bag of packaged coleslaw mix to the bowl.

8. Add the radish, with tops, to the bowl and toss everything together.
9. Serve the Waldorf Salad Slaw as a side dish or a salad.

This recipe combines the creaminess of the sour cream and mayonnaise with the crunch of the coleslaw mix, apples, and walnuts. The addition of the radish adds a touch of freshness and contrasting texture. The result is a delicious and satisfying Waldorf Salad Slaw that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a salad.

96d86ade02.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Spray baking dish with cooking spray.
Add chicken pieces and season with garlic powder and onion powder.
Cover with foil and bake for 45 minutes.
In a bowl, mix barbecue sauce, honey, ginger, and Worcestershire sauce.
Pour evenly over chicken and bake uncovered for 20-25 additional minutes or until sauce thickens and internal temperature is 180F.

9f341bf6c9.gt:

Set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, beat eggs until foamy.
Gradually add the sugar and vanilla, mixing constantly.
Drizzle in the melted white chocolate mixture.

Fold in chocolate chips.

Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

4.
Serve heated.

5af1409bc9.gt:
Pick over the lentils, discarding any misshapen lentils or stones.
Rinse the lentils until the water runs clear, then drain.
In a saucepan over high heat, combine the lentils, water, turmeric and the 1 teaspoon ghee.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce the heat to medium, cover and simmer until the lentils are soft and tender, about 30 minutes.
In a frying pan over medium-high heat, warm the remaining 2 tablespoons ghee.
When hot, add the mustard seeds and fry until they turn gray, spatter, and pop, about 2 minutes.
Add the chillies, onion, garlic, ginger and curry leaves and saute until the onion is soft and golden, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garam masala and tomatoes ad cook for 1 minute.
Pour the onion mixture into the pan of cooked lentils, add the salt and simmer for 5 minutes to blend the flavours.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve.
5af1409bc9.pred:
1. Rinse the lentils and place them in a large pot with the water. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for about 20-25 minutes or until the lentils are tender but still slightly firm.

2. In a small bowl, mix the turmeric, ghee, and black mustard seeds.

3. While the lentils are cooking, heat a small skillet or a frying pan over medium heat. Add the ghee and mustard seeds mixture, and cook for about 30 seconds or until the mustard seeds start to pop.

4. Add the sliced onions, minced garlic, and ginger to the skillet. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the onions are softened.

5. Add the curry leaves, garam masala, and tomatoes to the skillet. Cook for about 5 minutes or until the tomatoes are slightly softened.

6. Add the cooked lentils to the skillet, stirring to combine all the ingredients. Cook for another 5-10 minutes or until the lentils are heated through and the flavors are well-mixed.

7. Season the Dal with salt or to taste, and serve hot.

[/INST]

53797b9666.gt:
Mix together the egg, milk, and sugar in a deep bowl or tupperware container.
If you mix up the egg whites to break them up thoroughly, and it'll turn out better.
Cut the frozen bread into 4 pieces.
Use a skewer to poke holes into it.
It's hard for the egg mixture to get absorbed near the crusts, so be sure to poke holes there!
Soak the bread in the egg mixture.
After about two minutes, flip the bread over.
The bread is soft, so if you're worried about breaking it, use a spatula to flip.
Once both sides have completely soaked, fry it up and enjoy!
This is a version made without cutting up the bread.
It might look a bit unappealing with all those holes, but you won't be able to tell at all after it's been fried!
If it's too soft, it can break, but you can use a spatula to safely flip it over.
You can make more french toast with the remaining egg mixture if you like, but I like to pour it over the bread to fill in the holes!
!
53797b9666.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Slice the frozen bread into 4 equal pieces.
3. In a small bowl, whisk the egg and sugar together until well combined.
4. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
5. Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
6. Place the bread slices onto the hot skillet, cooking for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
7. Place the cooked bread slices onto a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the bread is fully cooked through.
8. Serve the Fluffy French Toast Made With Frozen Bread hot, garnished with a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of syrup.

Enjoy your delicious Fluffy French Toast Made With Frozen Bread!

20f8403190.gt:
Plunge the tomatoes into boiling water and then into iced water to remove their skins.
Chop the tomatoes and set aside.
In a stockpot, saute the onions and celery in the oil over medium heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic, zucchini, corn and saute for another 2 minutes.
Add the broth and bring to a boil.
Add the tomatoes, salt and basil.
Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the pasta, cover and simmer for 30 minutes (Seems rather a long time to me!
).
Sprinkle with the pepper & serve hot.

4. Add the diced tomatoes, red onion, celery, and zucchini. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.

9. Season with black pepper to taste.
10. Serve the Fresh Tomato-Vegetable Soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh basil, if desired.

ce8b9b020c.gt:
Preheat oven to Grill/Broil.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium high heat.
Add chicken and garlic and saute until chicken juices run clear, about 7 to 10 minutes.
Drain fat from skillet and stir in sauce.
Place chicken mixture on a cookie sheet and broil in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes, or until browned.
Let sit about 5 minutes to allow sauce to thicken.
ce8b9b020c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the cubed chicken breast halves, minced garlic, and 1 teaspoon of oil. Mix well to ensure the chicken is evenly coated with the garlic and oil.
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Spread the chicken mixture evenly on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the stir-fry sauce by pouring it into a small bowl.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. In a large skillet or wok, heat the remaining oil over medium-high heat. Add the cooked chicken to the skillet and stir-fry for a few minutes, until the chicken is heated through and the sauce is well combined.
8. Serve the Crazy Chicken immediately, garnished with your favorite toppings, such as chopped green onions, sesame seeds, or crushed red pepper flakes.

Enjoy your delicious Crazy Chicken!

6a59d0004a.gt:
Combine potato cubes, carrot pieces, chopped onions and cilantro in large bowl.
In a small bowl whisk together dressing ingredients and pour over salad ingredients.
Gently combine tomato chunks with the rest of the salad.
Chill and allow flavors to blend.
6a59d0004a.pred:
To make a delicious Colombian Potato Salad, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the red potatoes, and cut them into 1-inch cubes when cool.
3. Steam the carrots until they are crisp-tender, then let them cool.
4. In a large bowl, mix the red potatoes, carrots, red onion, and cilantro.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the wine vinegar, oil, seasoning salt, sugar, and pepper.
6. Pour the dressing over the salad mixture, and toss to combine.
7. Serve the salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This Colombian Potato Salad is a delicious and refreshing dish, perfect for a picnic, potluck, or as a side dish to accompany a main course. The combination of red potatoes, carrots, red onion, and cilantro creates a vibrant and flavorful salad that is both satisfying and healthy.

bf7afbd2d2.gt:
In a large mixing bowl combine lettuce, carrots, cilantro, olive oil, lime juice, and salt and pepper to taste.
Lay out tortillas and divide mixture among tortillas; top with turkey breast strips.
Fold in half and enjoy.
Serves 2.
bf7afbd2d2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the turkey breast slices with salt and pepper.
3. Place the turkey breast slices on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes or until cooked through.
4. While the turkey is cooking, prepare the other ingredients.
5. In a small bowl, mix the extra virgin olive oil, lime juice, cilantro, and salt and pepper to create the dressing.
6. Once the turkey is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Place the cooked turkey breast slices on a plate and drizzle the dressing over them.
8. To assemble the tacos, place a few shredded lettuce leaves on the tortilla, followed by a few turkey breast slices, carrot matchsticks, and a drizzle of dressing.
9. Serve immediately and enjoy your Soft Turkey Tacos.

4eef71a937.gt:
Pare and cut eggplant into 1/2 inch slices.
Set oven control at broil and/or 550 degrees.
Place eggplant slices on rack in broiler pan.
Brush butter on slices; season with salt and pepper.
Broil with tops about 3 inches from heat until eggplant is hot and tender.
about 6 minutes.
In a small saucepan, heat tomato sauce and garlic powder, stirring occasionally.
Serve on eggplant slices.

2. Cut the eggplant into evenly sized pieces, about 1/2 inch thick.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the butter or margarine, garlic powder, pepper, and salt.
4. Add the eggplant pieces to the bowl and toss to coat evenly with the marinade.
5. Spread the eggplant pieces on a baking sheet or a large, oven-safe plate.
6. Broil the eggplant in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and slightly charred.
7. While the eggplant is cooking, heat the canned tomato sauce in a saucepan over medium heat.
8. Once the eggplant is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Add the cooked eggplant to the saucepan with the tomato sauce and stir to combine.
10. Serve the Broiled Eggplant With Tomato Sauce immediately, over rice or pasta. Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

daa0bc21ff.gt:
Preheat oven to 350
Mix cake mix as directed on box.grease and flour pan.
Pour batter into pan.13 x 9 " cake pan.
Mix other 3 ing.
Creme well.swirl cheese in cake.
Top with rest of chips
Bake 350 for about 25 to 35 min.

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9x9 inch baking pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, granulated sugar, and chocolate chips.
4. Add the egg and creme cheese, and mix until well combined.

These steps will help you create delicious Creme cheese brownies using the provided ingredients. Remember to follow the cooking instructions and use the appropriate tools to ensure a successful and enjoyable baking experience.

16241b3374.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and move a rack to the middle of the oven.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper, set aside.
Combine the peanut butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, vanilla extract and egg in a large bowl and stir until fully combined.
Form 24 balls, 1-inch in diameter, and set evenly spaced apart on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake until lightly browned and crisp on the edges, 15 minutes.
Remove the cookies from the oven, and cool for 5 minutes.
Use your thumb or the back of a spoon to press into the middle of each cookie to create an indent about 1/4-inch deep.
Spoon 1/2 teaspoon of the chocolate-hazelnut spread into each cookie indent, refrigerate until the chocolate-hazelnut filling is no longer runny, 10 to 15 minutes.
Cook's Notes: These tasty cookies last for up to 2 weeks.
16241b3374.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the peanut butter, granulated sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth.
3. Add the egg and mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a dough forms.
5. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).
6. Using a cookie cutter or the rim of a glass, cut out circles of dough.
7. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are set and slightly golden around the edges.
9. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Essential ingredients:
1 cup crunchy peanut butter
12 cup firmly packed light brown sugar
12 cup granulated sugar
12 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 large egg
14 cup chocolate hazelnut spread.

82cd89c4d9.gt:
To steam the chicken tenders: Arrange the chicken on a plate and sprinkle on the ingredients marked with in order.
Place the rosemary (or other herb) on top, wrap it with plastic wrap and cook it at 700W for 1 minute and 30 seconds.
Turn the chicken over and cook it for another 1 minute.
The cooking time depends on the size of the chicken.
Check the chicken when you turn it over, and adjust the cooking time if necessary.
Leave the chicken, with the plastic on, until they are cool.
Shred the chicken from Step 2 with your hand.
Onions: Thinly slice the onion and soak it in water for about 10 minutes.
Drain in a colander and pat dry with paper towels.
Daikon sprout: Cut in half lengths.
In a bowl, mix the ingredients marked with to make the dressing.
Mix the chicken from Step 3 and onion from Step 4 with the dressing.
Add the daikon sprout and toss them evenly.
Serve it on a plate and garnish with the bonito flakes.
I used Cinzano Dry Vermouth; a blend of white wine with essences of herbs and spices, instead of white wine.
This flavorful drink is good for cooking and drinking.
82cd89c4d9.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Shio-koji (or salt) and black pepper.
3. Season the chicken tenders with the Shio-koji mixture.
4. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chicken tenders and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken tenders from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add the white wine and cook until it has reduced by half.
7. Add the rosemary twig and cook for another minute.
8. Add the daikon sprouts and cook until they are tender but still crisp.
9. Season the daikon sprouts with salt and pepper.
10. In a small bowl, mix the Ponzu, sugar, and olive oil.
11. Add the chicken tenders back to the skillet and toss them in the Ponzu mixture. Cook for another minute or until the chicken is cooked through.
12. Serve the Salad with Microwave-Steamed Chicken Tenders & Daikon Sprouts immediately.

[/INST]

6a73994e58.gt:
Grease 13x9 inch pan.
Mix butter or margarine, sugar, vanilla, egg in medium bowl with hand mixer.
Dont over mix.
Stir in flour and baking powder until dough forms.
Pat evenly into pan.
Spread jam or jelly on top of dough.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes at 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
Top with powder sugar glaze.

8237def972.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375.2.

Place brown sugar and 5 tablespoons butter in a large bowl; beat with a mixer at medium speed until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add sour cream, rind, and vanilla; beat until well combined.4.
Lightly spoon 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour and whole wheat flour into dry measuring cups; level with a knife.

10. In a small bowl, combine the chopped walnuts, melted butter, and chilled butter pieces.
11. Spread the streusel mixture evenly over the cake slices.
12. Serve and enjoy your delicious Rhubarb-Sour Cream Snack Cake with Walnut Streusel.

ff146bd853.gt:
NOTES: You MUST use butter or oil; margarine will not work.
A large cast-iron skillet works best for this, but any large non-stick skillet will work.
This recipe will work with nearly any type of boneless fish fillets, but catfish seems to be one of the tastiest.
This recipe produces a LOT of smoke, so make sure you have a good vent above your stove, or open some doors and/or windows.
Mix all dry ingredients together.
Coat fillets evenly with mixture.
Heat small amount of butter or oil in skillet until hot.
Place fillets in skillet.
Cook 3-5 minutes on each side.
Change butter or oil if it gets too black.

2. Season the catfish fillet with black pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, parsley flakes, ground red pepper, salt, and oregano.
3. Heat butter or oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the seasoned catfish fillet and cook until it is golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Transfer the catfish to a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Serve the Cajun Style Blackened Catfish with a side of your choice, such as rice, potatoes, or a green salad. Enjoy your delicious meal!

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.

Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.

b9f129d26e.gt:
Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add ham, green chiles, and mushrooms; saute 5 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Wipe pan clean.Place 1 tortilla in pan.
Sprinkle 2 tablespoons cheese over half of tortilla; arrange 1/2 cup ham mixture over cheese.

10. Fold the tortilla over the filling, pressing down gently to help the cheese melt and the filling to adhere.
11. Place the quesadillas on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

295fa6c307.gt:
Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture.
Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms.

ea6256f97c.gt:
Beat margarine or butter and granulated sugar in a medium mixing bowl with an electric mixer on medium high speed until light and fluffy.

add all morsels to milk and mix until smooth, about 10 minutes.

Stir in Boiling water.

3f59ab0d36.gt:
Combine flour, salt, pepper in a ziplock bag .
Add chicken, shake to coat.
Heat oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until browned on all sides (about 5 mins).
Place in crockpot.
After removing chicken, put stock in the skillet and heat for 5 mins.
Pour into crockpot.
Add lemon juice, mushrooms and garlic to crockpot.
Cook on low for 2 hours.
Mix cornstarch and water, then add to crockpot.
Add remaining seasonings and capers.
Increase to high heat and cook for 30 mins.
Serve over rice and broccoli.
Top with parsley if desired.

bd5e6fafa2.gt:
Stir the eggs and Parmesan cheese together in a bowl; set aside.

ecab1caf21.gt:
Heat a 12 inch skillet over high heat for 4 minutes.
Toss shrimp with 1/2 of the red pepper flakes, 2T oil, 3/4 t salt.
Add shrimp to hot skillet quickly arrange in single layer sear until bottom of shrimp forms small spots of crust about 30 seconds.
Remove from heat and turn shrimp over and add cognac pause until cognac has warmed up slightly about 5 seconds,return to high heat ignite cognac shaking pan when flames are out about 15-30 seconds later pour shrimp into bowl set aside.
Allow skillet to cool return to burner over low heat add 3T oil, 3T garlic; saute until sticky about 7-10 minutes.
Add the rest of the red pepper flakes, 3/4t salt, sugar, tomatoes, and wine; heat on medium high and then simmer until thickened, about 8 minutes.
