3. Add the salt and pepper to the saucepan, stirring to combine.
4. Cook the mixture for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is heated through and the peas are tender.
5. Serve the rice and peas hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This recipe is a simple and delicious way to enjoy a classic combination of rice and peas. The cooked rice provides a starchy base, while the peas add a tender, slightly sweet flavor and a touch of natural sweetness. The crumbled bacon adds a savory, smoky element to the dish, and the butter contributes a rich, creamy taste. The combination of these ingredients results in a comforting and satisfying meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

e3d298ee57.gt:
Put the chopped pepper in a silicone steamer and microwave for 30 seconds at 700w.
Add the sugar, sesame and soy sauce.
Mix it all and you are done!
e3d298ee57.pred:
[<INST>]
1. First, wash the green pepper thoroughly and remove the stem and seeds.
2. In a small bowl, mix the ground sesame seeds, sugar, and soy sauce.
3. Place the green pepper in a steamer basket and steam it over boiling water for about 5-7 minutes, or until it is tender but still crisp.
4. Remove the pepper from the steamer and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. Drizzle the sesame dressing over the pepper and toss it gently to coat evenly.
6. Serve the Bell Pepper with Sesame Dressing immediately.

<</SYS>>

[/<INST>]

10dc73989c.gt:
Cook pasta as directed on package, omitting salt.
Meanwhile, heat large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add shrimp, tomatoes and cream cheese spread; cook and stir 3 to 4 min.
or until cream cheese is melted and shrimp are done.
Drain pasta; place in large bowl.
Add spinach and shrimp mixture; mix lightly.
10dc73989c.pred:
1. Cook the linguine according to package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they are softened and slightly caramelized.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked linguine, shrimp, and cooked tomatoes.
4. Add the PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese Spread and torn fresh spinach to the bowl. Mix everything together until well combined.
5. Season the pasta mixture with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
6. Serve the Shrimp In Love Pasta immediately, garnished with additional chopped tomatoes, if desired.

[/INST]

74728bdde9.gt:
1.
Prepare rice according to package.2.
Combine hoisin and next 5 ingredients in a bowl.
Reserve 4 teaspoons.3.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Add 1 tablespoon canola oil.
Sprinkle fillets with salt.
Add two fillets to pan; cook 4 minutes.
Turn; brush each with 1 teaspoon hoisin mixture.
Cook 2 minutes.
Remove fish from pan.
Repeat with 1 tablespoon canola oil, 2 fillets, and 2 teaspoons hoisin mixture.4.
Heat a skillet over high heat.
Add 1 tablespoon canola oil.
Add peas and onions; saute 1 minute.
Add mushrooms; saute 2 minutes.
Place 1/2 cup rice onto each of 4 plates.
Top each with 1 fillet and 1/2 cup vegetables; drizzle with 1 teaspoon hoisin mixture.
74728bdde9.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the boil-in-bag brown rice, hoisin sauce, water, lower-sodium soy sauce, minced fresh ginger, dark sesame oil, and black pepper. Set aside.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of the canola oil over medium-high heat. Add the flounder fillets and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are cooked through and flake easily with a fork. Remove the fillets from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet or wok, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of canola oil over medium heat. Add the snow peas, green onions, and shiitake mushroom caps, and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
4. Add the rice mixture to the skillet or wok, stirring to combine with the vegetables. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the rice is heated through and the flavors are well-mixed.
5. Return the cooked flounder fillets to the skillet or wok, and stir to combine with the rice mixture. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the flounder is heated through and the flavors are well-mixed.
6. Serve the Hoisin Flounder immediately, garnished with additional green onions if desired.

[/INST]

49ba66ed9e.gt:
In a large saucepan, heat the butter or margarine and oil over medium heat.
Add the chicken and brown lightly on each side.
Once the chicken breasts are cooked (the juices should run clear) remove them from the pan and set aside.
Add the shallots and the chicken stock to the pan.
Simmer for 3 minutes.
Add the raspberry vinegar.
Bring all to a boil and simmer, stirring, until the mixture thickens.
Stir in the cream and return the chicken to the pan.
Heat for 1 minute to warm the chicken, turning the chicken pieces to coat with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
49ba66ed9e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the chicken stock, raspberry vinegar, and heavy whipping cream. Set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat the butter and vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until they are soft and slightly browned.
4. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken breasts in the skillet and cook until they are cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken breasts from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet. Pour the raspberry vinegar mixture over the chicken breasts.
6. Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
7. Serve the Raspberry Vinegar Chicken Breasts over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

4bf00ac974.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
For crust, add enough milk to egg yolk to measure 2/3 cup; set aside.
In medium bowl, combine flour and salt.
Cut in butter until crumbly.
With fork, stir in milk mixture until dough forms a ball.
You may need to add a few teaspoons more of milk if dough is still too dry.
Divide into halves.
Roll out half of the dough, on lightly floured surface, into a 15x10-inch rectangle.
Place on bottom of ungreased 15x10x1-inch jelly-roll pan.
For Filling, sprinkle cereal over top of crust; layer apples over cereal.
In small bowl, combine 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and nutmeg.
Sprinkle over apples.
Roll remaining half of dough into a 15 1/2-10 1/2-inch rectangle; place over apples.
In small bowl, beat egg white with fork until foamy; brush over top crust.
In another small bowl, stir together 2 tablespoons granulated sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon; sprinkle over top crust.
Bake for 45 to 60 minutes or until lightly browned.
For Glaze, in small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients.
Drizzle over top crust while still warm.
Cut into bars.
4bf00ac974.pred:
To cook a delicious Apple Pie Bars dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the reserved egg white, cold butter, and granulated sugar. Whisk until smooth and fluffy.
3. Add the milk, flour, salt, and ground cinnamon and nutmeg to the bowl, and mix until well combined.
4. Add the sliced apples to the mixture and stir to combine.
5. Spread the mixture evenly into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. In a small bowl, mix the granulated sugar, ground cinnamon, and ground nutmeg. Sprinkle the mixture evenly over the apples.
7. Bake the Apple Pie Bars in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden brown and the center is set.
8. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the powdered sugar, milk, and vanilla. Drizzle the mixture over the cooled Apple Pie Bars.
10. Serve the Apple Pie Bars warm or at room temperature.

[/INST]

03e6762fab.gt:
Combine the potatoes, spinach, carrots, turnips, garlic, and lentils in a slow cooker.
Pour enough water over the mixture to cover.
In a bowl, stir the fresh basil, chili powder, cinnamon, dried basil, paprika, turmeric, cayenne pepper, ground ginger, sea salt, and black pepper; stir into the slow cooker.
Cover the cooker, and cook on High for 8 hours.
03e6762fab.pred:
[INST]To cook a delightful Cindy's Snappy Sensational Superfood Soup dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, sauté the minced garlic and chopped onions until softened.
2. Add the cubed yellow potatoes, chopped carrots, and diced turnips to the pot. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
3. Pour in the water or broth, and add the frozen chopped spinach. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the spinach is tender.
4. While the soup is cooking, prepare the Cindy's Magical Motorvatin' Spice Mix by combining the spices and herbs in a small bowl.
5. After the soup has cooked for 20 minutes, add the prepared spice mix to the pot. Stir to combine.
6. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the flavors are well-blended.
7. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Serve the soup hot, garnished with chopped fresh basil and a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Cindy's Snappy Sensational Superfood Soup!

78d578c5e4.gt:
heat oven to 400, using a oven safe bowl, it can be a casserole dish to bake ur dip in.
it just needs to bake for 13 minutes
in a bowl put all ingredients, except 1 tablespoon of almonds, reserved till later.
mix well together, put in oven safe dish.
now sprinkle the reserved almonds on top.bake and use crackers to serve.enjoy
78d578c5e4.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, which include lobster, green onion, green bell pepper, celery, cream cheese, mayonnaise, milk, lemon juice, crushed red pepper, black pepper, and sliced almonds.

2. In a large bowl, mix the lobster, green onion, green bell pepper, and celery.

3. Add the cream cheese to the bowl and mix until well combined.

4. Gradually add the mayonnaise, milk, lemon juice, crushed red pepper, and black pepper to the bowl, mixing until the desired consistency is reached.

5. If the dip is too thick, you can add a bit more milk to achieve the desired consistency.

6. Once the dip is mixed, divide it into two portions.

7. In a small bowl, mix the sliced almonds with a pinch of salt.

8. Drizzle the almond mixture over the dip, creating a layer of crushed almonds on top.

9. Serve the sunshine's spicy and tangy lobster dip immediately, as it will start to lose its flavor and texture over time.

Enjoy your delicious lobster dip with friends and family!

d46cb1cc0e.gt:
Preheat oven to 375.
In a medium bowl, stir together the flour and baking powder; set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs until they are light and fluffy.
Gradually add sugar and beat for about 3 minutes.
Stir in the oil and anise extract.
Fold in the dry ingredients and blend well.
Spread the mixture into a 9x13 inch pan and bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the oven.
When the pan cools slightly, cut the cookie down the middle, lengthwise.
Cut each half into 1/2 inch slices.
Place slices onto a cookie sheet and return to the oven long enough to brown on each side, like toast.
Watch so you don't burn them!
:).
Store in a tightly covered container.
d46cb1cc0e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Gradually add the sugar, mixing until well combined.
5. In a small bowl, mix the anise extract with a little bit of vegetable oil.
6. Add the anise extract mixture to the flour mixture, stirring until a dough forms.
7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough to your desired thickness.
8. Cut out the dough into desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the cookies for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown around the edges.
11. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Mary Mazzie's Anise Cookies!

ce64c17852.gt:
In blender, combine soymilk and orange juice; add papaya, strawberries, and, if desired, protein powder and honey.
Cover and blend until smooth.
ce64c17852.pred:
1. Begin by pouring the vanilla-flavored soymilk into a blender or food processor.
2. Add the chilled orange juice, chopped papaya, and frozen unsweetened strawberries to the blender or food processor.
3. If desired, add the powdered soy protein concentrate for added protein and nutritional benefits.
4. Blend the ingredients until smooth and creamy, or until the desired consistency is achieved.
5. Taste the smoothie and add honey if desired for a touch of sweetness.
6. Pour the smoothie into a glass and enjoy!

This step-by-step guide provides a simple and delicious recipe for Papaya Strawberry Soymilk Smoothies, which can be easily customized to suit individual preferences.

6e7daaa7a7.gt:
In large bowl, mix ground beef, bread crumbs, and onion soup mix.
Form into meatballs.
Place in 9x13" pan.
In saucepan, combine chili sauce, cranberry sauce, sauerkraut, brown sugar and water.
Simmer over low heat till mixed.
Pour over meatballs.
Bake at 325 for 2 hours.
6e7daaa7a7.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, breadcrumbs, onion soup mix, and chili sauce. Mix well.
3. Shape the beef mixture into small meatballs.
4. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the meatballs and cook until they are browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
5. In a separate skillet, heat the cranberry sauce over medium heat.
6. Add the sauerkraut to the meatballs and toss to coat them evenly.
7. Pour the brown sugar over the meatballs and sauerkraut mixture, stirring to coat the meatballs evenly.
8. Pour the water into the skillet with the cranberry sauce, stirring to combine.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the meatballs are cooked through.
10. Serve the Crazy Meatballs over a bed of rice or noodles, and enjoy your delicious meal!

ff131d2047.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Trim tips from asparagus, and chop stalks into 1/4-inch pieces.
Stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in large bowl.
Cut butter into small pieces.
Using fingers, rub butter into flour mixture until mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in 3/4 cup buttermilk.
Fold in cheese, asparagus pieces (but not tips), cayenne and pepper.
Turn dough onto floured work surface, and knead 6 or 7 times.
Shape dough into 1/2-inch-thick rectangle.
Using sharp knife, cut rectangle lengthwise into three strips.
Cut each strip into triangles.
Place triangles on greased baking sheet.
Brush scones with remaining buttermilk, then press 2 or 3 asparagus tips into tops.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes, or until tops are golden brown.
ff131d2047.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the steamed asparagus, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cayenne pepper.
3. Add the butter, margarine, or shortening and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Gradually add the buttermilk or soymilk, mixing until the dough is smooth and slightly sticky.
5. Fold in the grated cheddar cheese or soy cheddar cheese.
6. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead for a few minutes until it comes together.
7. Pat the dough into a 1/2-inch thick disk and cut it into 8 equal wedges.
8. Place the wedges on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the scones are cooked through.
10. Remove from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

555c73c04a.gt:
Thoroughly combine seasoning mix ingredients in a small bowl and set aside.
Cook pasta according to package directions and set aside.
Heat a skillet over high heat until it is hot, about 4 minutes.
Meanwhile, stir chicken pieces into seasoning.
Mix well.
Add 2 oz butter to pan.
Add chicken pieces and brown them.
Add the green onions, parsley, garlic and stock.
Cook two minutes or until the sauce is at a rolling boil.
Add the remaining butter (cut into pats) stirring to incorporate.
Cook for 3 minutes and add the cooked pasta.
Mix well.
Serve immediately.
I like to add parmesan on top.
555c73c04a.pred:
[INST]
1. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
2. Add the chicken strips and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
3. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add the onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
5. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
6. Add the green onion, minced parsley, and minced thyme. Cook for 1 minute.
7. Add the chicken stock, salt, onion powder, black pepper, sage, white pepper, and thyme. Bring to a boil.
8. Reduce the heat to low, cover the skillet, and simmer for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
9. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.
10. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
11. Serve the Elvie's Chicken Diane over the cooked pasta.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

7ea397998a.gt:
Place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, 8 to 10 minutes.
Drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two.
Place potatoes in a large bowl.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat; grease with cooking spray.
Cook and stir the green beans and onion until tender, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the garlic; cook and stir until garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute more.
Transfer the green bean mixture into the large bowl with the potatoes.
Add the balsamic vinaigrette, roasted red peppers, and basil; toss lightly.
Stir in the goat cheese.
7ea397998a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the red potatoes with the olive oil cooking spray. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy on the outside.
3. While the potatoes are cooking, heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the green beans and cook for about 5 minutes, or until they are tender but still crisp.
4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked potatoes, green beans, red onion, minced garlic, and the reduced-fat balsamic vinaigrette dressing. Mix well.
5. Add the drained and chopped roasted red peppers, chopped fresh basil, and crumbled goat cheese to the bowl. Mix everything together until well combined.
6. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Warm Green Bean and Potato Salad with Goat Cheese immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

7a39ad4f0a.gt:
In a large pot, combine the stock with the carrots, celery, onion, leek, potato, ginger, cumin, coriander, and cayenne, and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over low heat until the vegetables are tender, 20-25 minutes.
Working in batches, puree the soup in a food processor(or blender), then return to the pot.
Stir in buttermilk and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Reheat gently.
Ladle into bowls, and sprinkle with the parsley and serve.
Enjoy!
7a39ad4f0a.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine the vegetable broth (or chicken broth), carrots, celery, onion, leek, sweet potato, and spices (ground cumin, coriander, and cayenne pepper). Bring to a boil over medium heat, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.

2. In a small bowl, whisk together the buttermilk, lemon juice, and salt. Pour the buttermilk mixture into the pot, stirring constantly. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the soup reaches your desired consistency.

3. Remove the pot from the heat, and stir in the flat leaf parsley. Allow the soup to cool slightly before serving.

4. Serve the Silky Spicy Carrot Soup hot, garnished with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and comforting Silky Spicy Carrot Soup!

fd91c2f3e6.gt:
Sift maizena and flour together
Add castor sugar
Rub butter into the dry ingredients and knead until a stiff dough its formed
Press dough into a 20 x 29cm greased baking tray
Mark the slices lightly and prick with a fork
Bake at 150C for 50 minutes
Once baked, drench the shortbread with castor sugar
Cut the shortbread into squares
Allow to cool and then enjoy
fd91c2f3e6.pred:
To prepare a delicious Kerry's Shortbread dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 150°C (300°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the soft butter and castor sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the flour and mix until the dough comes together.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1cm (1/2 inch).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the cookies in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and allow them to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Kerry's Shortbread cookies!

243f0c78f6.gt:
In a small bowl, combine dressing ingredients, whisk and set aside.
In a really large salad bowl, combine cabbage, lettuce, cilantro and green onions and toss gently.
Sprinkle in the sesame seeds and peanuts.
Add the chicken.
Pour in the dressing and toss.
Enjoy!
243f0c78f6.pred:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together the hoisin sauce, peanut butter, brown sugar, and asian chili paste.
2. Add the grated ginger, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and minced garlic. Whisk to combine.
3. Add the cooked chicken chunks, sesame seeds, and chopped cabbage to the bowl. Toss to coat the chicken and cabbage evenly with the sauce.
4. Add the chopped romaine lettuce, cilantro, and carrots to the bowl. Toss to combine.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the peanuts and scallions.
6. Add the peanut mixture to the bowl with the chicken salad. Toss to combine.
7. Serve the Kinda Like California Pizza Kitchen Chinese Chicken Salad immediately or refrigerate for a few hours before serving.

[/INST]

8198c69331.gt:
Place all ingredients in your bread machine in the order given.
Set bread machine to dough cycle.
IMPORTANT!
CHECK YOUR MACHINE WHILE IT IS KNEADING and ADD MORE WATER IF NEEDED 1 TABLESPOON AT A TIME.
The dough should not be too dry - it should look smooth and satiny after kneading for a few minutes.
When dough cycle is complete, remove dough from machine and shape into long loaf (like french bread).
Place on a cookie sheet and let loaf rise for about 45 minutes or until doubled in size.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 30 minutes or until nicely browned.
You can also just cook this in your bread machine on the regular bread cycle if you want.
It still tastes great, you just don't get the cuban shaped loaf.
8198c69331.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the water, sugar, and salt.
2. Add the bread flour and bread machine yeast to the bowl.
3. Mix the ingredients until they are well combined.
4. Place the bowl in the bread machine, and set the machine to the "dough" setting.
5. Press the "start" button, and let the bread machine do its work.
6. Once the dough has risen, punch it down and shape it into a ball.
7. Place the shaped dough in a lightly greased loaf pan.
8. Allow the dough to rise for another 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
9. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
10. Bake the bread for 30-35 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
11. Remove the bread from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

3d413a0413.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. 2.
Wash potatoes well.
3.
Lay each potato on a cutting board.
4.
With a sharp knife, thinly slice each potato, being careful to NOT CUT all the way through.
(TIP: I lay a chopstick on each side of the potato so I dont accidentally cut too far.)
5.
Season each potato.
This is where you can get creative slide a sliver of garlic between the layers, or experiment with different herbs, butter, whatever sounds good to you!.
6.
Place potatoes in a baking dish that has been drizzled with olive oil.
7.
Drizzle potatoes with olive oil.
8.
Bake at 425 degrees for 40 minutes, or until the inside is tender.
9.
Enjoy!
3d413a0413.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into equal-sized wedges.
3. In a large bowl, mix the potatoes with olive oil, salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
4. Spread the potatoes out on a baking sheet or a large roasting pan.
5. Dot the potatoes with butter, then sprinkle with any desired spices.
6. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
7. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Hasselback Potatoes dish!

c6b05c501b.gt:
Spread 1 bread slice with peanut butter, then spread other bread slice with jam; close to make sandwich.
Cook in skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 3 min.
on each side or until sandwich is golden brown on both sides.
Let stand 1 min.
; cut into quarters.
c6b05c501b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Spread one side of each slice of bread with seedless raspberry jam.
3. Spread the other side of each slice of bread with the PLANTERS Cherry Chocolate Peanut Butter with Semi-Sweet Chocolate, Cherries & Cranberries.
4. Place the two slices of bread with the peanut butter spread on top of each other, with the jam-covered side facing up.
5. Place the slices of bread in a baking dish, and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the peanut butter is melted and bubbly.
6. Carefully remove the baking dish from the oven, and let the sandwich cool for a few minutes.
7. Place the cooled sandwich on a cutting board, and cut it into halves or quarters, depending on your preference.
8. Serve the Toasted Cherry Chocolate Sandwich immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

b7aac475a1.gt:
Place haddock and water in a dutch oven and heat to boiling.
Cover and reduce heat to low and simmer approximately 10-15 minutes or until the fish is white and flakes easily.
Remove the halibut, reserving (set aside) the 'broth' (liquid); cut the haddock into bite size pieces.
Return 1 CUP of the reserved broth to the dutch oven.
Add the potatoes, onion and green pepper and simmer 15 minutes or just until the potatoes are tender.
Add the remaining broth, the haddock, tomato, milk, salt and pepper.
Heat until hot, but do not boil; sprinkle with cheese before serving.
b7aac475a1.pred:
1. In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine the 2 lbs of haddock fillets, 3 cups of water, and 4 cups of potatoes. Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for about 20-25 minutes or until the fish is cooked through and the potatoes are tender.

2. While the fish and potatoes are cooking, chop the 1 medium yellow onion and 12 medium green bell pepper into 1/2 inch chunks.

3. Add the chopped onion and bell pepper to the pot, stirring occasionally, and cook for about 5-7 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.

4. Add the 1 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped, to the pot. Stir to combine, and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes or until the tomatoes are tender.

5. In a small bowl, mix the 1 cup of 1% low-fat milk and 1 teaspoon of salt (optional). If you prefer, you can add a pinch of pepper as well.

6. Pour the milk mixture into the pot with the fish and vegetables, stirring to combine.

7. Add the 12 cups of low-fat cheddar cheese, shredded, to the pot. Stir until the cheese is melted and fully combined with the other ingredients.

8. Cook the chowder for an additional 5-7 minutes or until the cheese is melted and the chowder is heated through.

9. Serve the Easy Fish Chowder hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

[/INST]

4efef5709b.gt:
Preheat a heavy bottomed skille tover medium-high heat.
Pour in the oil and add the zucchini and jalapeno, sprinkle with the salt.
Saute for about 7 minutes, or until the zucchini is lightly browned.
Add the garlic, olives, cumin, and coriander, and saute for 2 minutes more.
Add the salsa verde and black beans and cook for 5 minutes.
The salsa should reduce a bit so its not soupy.
Mix the ingredients for the Garlic-Lemon Yogurt if your using.
Warm the tortillas in a skillet or wrap in a moist towel & nuke for a minute.
Assembly the tacos by adding the filling, yogurt, and topping with scallions.
Enjoy!
4efef5709b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, minced garlic, and ground cumin. Mix well.
3. Add the diced zucchini to the bowl and toss to coat the vegetables evenly with the oil mixture.
4. Spread the zucchini mixture onto a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until the zucchini is tender and slightly caramelized.
5. While the zucchini is roasting, heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the sliced jalapenos and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until they are slightly softened.
6. In a small bowl, mix the salsa verde, black beans, and lemon juice.
7. Once the zucchini is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it cool slightly.
8. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked zucchini, black bean mixture, and chopped scallions.
9. In a small bowl, mix the soy yogurt, lemon zest, and light agave nectar.
10. Add the soy yogurt mixture to the large mixing bowl with the zucchini and black bean mixture.
11. Fold the ingredients together until well combined.
12. To assemble the tacos, place a corn tortilla on a plate or a taco holder.
13. Spread a generous amount of the zucchini mixture on top of the tortilla.
14. Add a dollop of soy yogurt mixture on top of the zucchini mixture.
15. Garnish with additional chopped scallions and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Black Bean, Zucchini, & Olive Tacos!

7d71040d61.gt:
In a skillet, cook the spinach, stirring, until wilted; transfer to a colander and squeeze dry.
Finely chop the spinach.
In a bowl, combine 1 1/2 teaspoons of the soy sauce, the sesame oil, sherry, salt, sugar and white pepper.
Mix in the pork, scallion, ginger and spinach.
Chill for 10 minutes.
Dust a large baking sheet with cornstarch.
Arrange 4 wonton wrappers on a work surface, keeping the other wrappers covered with plastic wrap.
Brush the edges of the wrappers with water and spoon 1 teaspoon of filling in the center of each.
Fold the wrappers diagonally over the filling to form triangles; seal.
Bring the two opposite corners of the triangle together; press to seal.
Transfer to the baking sheet and cover.
Repeat.
In a large saucepan of boiling water, simmer the wontons over moderate heat, stirring occasionally.
When they float, cook for 3 minutes longer.
Drain the wontons well.
In a large bowl, combine the remaining soy sauce with the chile oil, peanut oil and garlic.
Add the wontons and toss.
Sprinkle with the cilantro and serve.
7d71040d61.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the baby spinach, soy sauce, Asian sesame oil, dry sherry, salt, sugar, and pepper. Mix well.
2. Add the ground pork and minced scallion to the bowl. Mix until the pork is evenly coated with the sauce.
3. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch with a little water to form a slurry.
4. Add the cornstarch slurry to the pork mixture, stirring until the pork is fully coated.
5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the wonton wrappers by dipping them in the chile oil, then the peanut oil. Place them on a plate or a tray to dry.
7. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
8. On a clean work surface, roll out the wonton wrappers to form thin circles.
9. Place a spoonful of the pork mixture in the center of each wrapper. Fold the wrapper over the filling, pressing the edges to seal.
10. Place the filled wrappers on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
11. Bake the wontons in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
12. Serve the Spinach-and-Pork Wontons hot. Enjoy!

9d9d29f6e8.gt:
Slice the strawberries in about 1/2-inch size pieces.
Add about 1/3 of the strawberries to the bottom of the serving dish.
Next, add 1/2 of the whipped cream on top of the berries.
Then add 1/2 of the corn flakes on top of the whipped cream.
Add another layer of the strawberries (add about 3/4 of the remaining strawberries, leaving the rest of them for garnish).
Next add the remaining whipped cream, top with the corn flakes, and garnish with the remaining strawberries.
9d9d29f6e8.pred:
1. Wash and hull the strawberries, then slice them into halves or thirds, depending on the size.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced strawberries, whipped cream or whipped topping, and corn flakes.
3. Gently toss the ingredients to ensure the corn flakes are evenly distributed.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the dish immediately or chill it in the refrigerator for a few hours before serving.

This delightful Strawberries And Whipped Cream With A Crunch dish is a simple yet delicious dessert that combines the natural sweetness of the strawberries with the creaminess of the whipped topping and the crunchiness of the corn flakes. The combination of these ingredients creates a delightful and refreshing treat that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

4ab9695b51.gt:
Mix flour and cheese in a big bowl.
Using your fingers work in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add the egg yolk and work into a smooth dough.
Wrap with cling film and chill for 30 minutes.
Roll out dough on a lightly floured surface and cut out cookies of desired shape (I used a clover cookie cutter, but rounds or animal shapes would be great, too).
Brush with egg white and sprinkle with seeds or desired topping.
Bake in the preheated oven at 200C/400F for 15-18 minutes (the thinner you make your cookies, the faster they are ready--so start checking on them early).
4ab9695b51.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, grated cheese, and butter. Mix well until the dough comes together.
3. Add the egg and mix until the dough forms a smooth, elastic ball.
4. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more water. If it is too sticky, add a bit more flour.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it is smooth and elastic.
6. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch.
7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the crackers in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Remove the crackers from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes.
11. Sprinkle the crackers with sesame and poppy seeds while they are still warm.
12. Enjoy your Cheese Crackers!

[/INST]

b500700d75.gt:
Pre-heat oven
In a bowl, grate the carrots and apple
Mix flour, baking soda, baking powerd , sugar , salt ,cinnamon and walnuts
Add the eggs, oil , milk ,vanilla extract
Add the carrots and apple
Spoon equal amount into the muffin tray
Bake for 20-30 min
b500700d75.pred:
To craft Carrots muffin, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, salt, and sugar. Whisk until well combined.
3. Add the ground cinnamon, chopped walnuts, grated carrots, and grated apple to the bowl. Mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the all-purpose flour, baking powder, and baking soda.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
6. Fill muffin cups with the batter, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Carrots muffin!

96de2fb2f9.gt:
Cut broccoli florets into small bite-sized pieces.
Combine with grapes, celery, raisins, and sunflower seed kernels.
Mix mayonnaise with remaining ingredients, stirring with a whisk.
Pour dressing over the broccoli mix, and toss well.
Chill for 1 hour minimum.
96de2fb2f9.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the broccoli florets, grapes, celery, raisins, and sunflower seed kernels.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the light mayonnaise, plain fat-free yogurt, sugar, and white wine vinegar.
4. Pour the dressing over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the salad to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the dressing is slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the salad from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This Broccoli Salad (Lite) recipe combines the nutritious and crunchy broccoli florets with the sweetness of grapes, the crunch of celery, the chewy raisins, and the crunchy sunflower seed kernels. The light mayonnaise and plain fat-free yogurt provide a creamy and slightly tangy dressing, while the white wine vinegar adds a touch of acidity. The result is a delicious and healthy salad that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course.

789488866b.gt:
Mix all wet ingredients and beat until everything is well incorporated.
Mix all dry ingredients.
Then add them to wet mixture a little at a time until everything is completely mix.
Divide mixture equally and pour in two loaf pans.
Bake between 55-60 minutes for 350F.
789488866b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded carrots, shredded coconut, golden raisins, and canola oil. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the plain yogurt, eggs, vanilla extract, brown sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, baking soda, and nutmeg.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Bake the bread for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.
7. Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once the bread is fully cooled, slice it and enjoy!

[/INST]

bf91ac4066.gt:
Saute onion in vegetable oil until clear.
Add all other ingredients and simmer for 10mins
Puree with hand mixer until smooth
bf91ac4066.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. In a saucepan, combine 2/3 cup ketchup, 1/3 cup beer, 2/3 cup Worcestershire sauce, 1 cup minced yellow onion, 1/3 cup lime juice, 1/8 cup malt vinegar, 1 tablespoon kosher salt, 1 each chipotle pepper in adobe sauce, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 bay leaf, 1/8 cup yellow mustard, 1 tablespoon liquid smoke, 1/2 tablespoon Creole spice, and 1/3 cup molasses.
2. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
3. Reduce the heat to low and let the sauce simmer for about 30 minutes, or until it reaches your desired thickness.
4. Remove the sauce from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
5. Strain the sauce through a fine mesh sieve to remove any solids.
6. Taste the sauce and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the Marion-berry BBQ Sauce over your choice of meat or use it as a marinade for your favorite protein.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

78e1fe788f.gt:
Stir together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until almost cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Add half of romaine and stir-fry until it begins to wilt, then add remaining romaine and stir-fry until just wilted and shrimp are just cooked through, about 1 minute.
Stir sauce, then add to stir-fry and simmer, stirring, 2 minutes.
78e1fe788f.pred:
1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
2. Add the garlic and ginger, stir-frying for about 1 minute until fragrant.
3. Add the shrimp, cooking until they are pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Add the reduced-sodium chicken broth, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, and cornstarch. Stir to combine.
5. Increase the heat to high, and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover the skillet, and simmer for about 3-5 minutes or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Remove the skillet from the heat, and stir in the romaine hearts.
8. Serve the Shrimp and Romaine Stir-Fry over a bed of white rice.

[/INST]

b653472a7b.gt:
In soup pot dissolve curry paste with water , add cherry tomato ,bring to the boil on medium heat
Prepare banana blossom while soup is boiling ,cut half on runny water or in water bowl
Cut into 4 pieces ,now select only white leaves,take off small young banana inside
Cut to small pieces, this always soak in water to prevent from color change
Add to soup pot,increase to high heat ,stir to let all sink in hot boil soup ,let it simmer about 15 mins
Add fishsauce,add green leaves ,stir to mix,heat off ,serve hot with sticky rice by northern thai way or with steamed jasmine rice
b653472a7b.pred:
1. Preheat a large skillet or wok over medium heat.
2. Remove the stem and any remaining leaves from the banana blossom and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a small bowl, mix the red curry paste with a little bit of water to create a smooth paste.
4. Add the chicken stock or water to the skillet and bring it to a simmer.
5. Add the banana blossom pieces to the skillet and cook for about 5-7 minutes or until they are tender but still slightly crunchy.
6. Add the cherry tomatoes to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes or until they are slightly softened.
7. Add the chopped chicken pieces to the skillet and cook for about 5-7 minutes or until they are fully cooked through.
8. Add the local green vegetables to the skillet and cook for another 3-5 minutes or until they are tender.
9. Stir in the fish sauce and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes or until the flavors are well combined.
10. Serve the Banana Blossom Curry over rice or with your choice of side dish.

[/INST]

73a84e1f5e.gt:
Wash and peel the zucchini and cut into long strips.
Season with salt and pepper.
Mix the eggs, milk and salt, dip the zucchini strips into the mixture and then roll in the breadcrumbs.
Saute until crisp on the outside but not overcooked, about 2-3 minutes.
Serve.
73a84e1f5e.pred:
To make a delicious "gilded" Zucchini dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Clean and trim the zucchini, then cut them into small, even pieces.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the breadcrumbs and a small amount of oil or butter until well combined.
5. Dip each piece of zucchini into the egg mixture, then coat them with the breadcrumb mixture.
6. Place the breaded zucchini pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake the zucchini pieces for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.

This delicious "gilded" Zucchini dish is a simple yet flavorful way to enjoy the vegetable. The breadcrumbs add a crispy texture, while the egg and milk mixture provide a moist and tender interior. The combination of these elements results in a delightful and satisfying dish.

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
1. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks. Season with salt, pepper, and chili powder.
3. Pour in the tomato puree, ketchup, water, hot pepper sauce, and brown sugar. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook, stirring occasionally, for about 30 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the beef is tender.
5. Serve the Sloppy Joes in the buns. Enjoy!

708886aaca.gt:
Heat oil in a five to six quart pot over moderately high heat.
Add garlic and pepper flake, saute until golden.
Be careful not to burn the garlic.
Stir in tomatoes and salt.
Simmer uncovered for 35 minutes.
Serve with pasta.
708886aaca.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add the minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Add the red pepper flakes and stir to combine.
4. Pour in the canned diced tomatoes with juice, and stir to combine.
5. Add the salt and stir to combine.
6. Bring the sauce to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Taste the sauce and adjust the seasoning as needed.
8. Serve the Spicy Red Pasta Sauce over your favorite pasta.

[/INST]

3ca1d4e9d8.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Place onion, celery, and carrot in a large, shallow roasting pan.
Place turkey, breast side up, on top of the vegetables in the roasting pan.
Pat the outside and inside of the turkey dry with paper towels.
Combine salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper in a small bowl.
Season the inside of the turkey with about 1/3 of the salt mixture.
Fold wing tips under the bird.
Melt butter in small saucepan over medium heat until the edges begin to turn golden, about 2 minutes.
Cook and stir rosemary and sage for 1 minute.
Place rosemary and sage inside the cavity of the turkey; reserve melted butter.
Tie the legs together with twine.
Brush outside of the turkey completely with the melted butter.
Season with remaining 2/3 of the salt mixture.
Bake turkey, uncovered, in the preheated oven until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 3 hours.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of the thigh, near the bone should read 180 degrees F (82 degrees C).
Remove the turkey from the oven and allow to rest in a warm area 10 to 15 minutes before slicing.
3ca1d4e9d8.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large roasting pan or Dutch oven, combine the onion, celery, carrot, and rosemary. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper.
3. Place the turkey, neck and giblets, in the roasting pan or Dutch oven. Pour the melted butter over the turkey.
4. Roast the turkey in the preheated oven for about 3-4 hours or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. Remove the turkey from the oven and let it rest for about 20 minutes before carving.
6. While the turkey is resting, use a slotted spoon to remove the vegetables from the pan and set aside.
7. Strain the pan juices and discard the solids.
8. Return the vegetables to the pan and stir in the sage.
9. Serve the turkey with the vegetables and pan juices.

[/INST]

This delicious How to Cook a Turkey dish is achieved by following a simple yet effective process. First, preheat the oven to the correct temperature, which is 325°F (163°C) for this recipe. Next, prepare the ingredients by chopping the onion, celery, and carrot coarsely, and removing the neck and giblets from the turkey. Combine these ingredients in a roasting pan or Dutch oven, seasoning them with salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper. Place the turkey in the pan, pouring melted butter over it. Roast the turkey in the oven for approximately 3-4 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C). Remove the turkey from the oven and let it rest for 20 minutes before carving. While the turkey is resting, use a slotted spoon to remove the vegetables from the pan and set them aside. Strain the pan juices and discard the solids. Return the vegetables to the pan and stir in sage. Finally,

0121dfda05.gt:
Heat oil in large pot over medium-high heat.
Add shallots, ginger, and garlic and let cook until soft, about 5 minutes.
Stir in peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, and curry paste and let cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
Whisk in water, coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar, and salt until combined.
Add tofu, sweet potato, and kale, and bring to a boil.
Let simmer, covered, for 30 minutes, or until sweet potatoes are fork tender.
Stir in lime juice and adjust seasoning to taste.
Garnish with cashews and serve over rice or quinoa.
0121dfda05.pred:
[INST]
1. Heat the oil in a large saucepan or wok over medium heat. Add the shallot and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
2. Add the ginger and garlic, and cook for another 2 minutes, until fragrant.
3. Add the peanut butter, turmeric, cumin, red curry paste, and water. Stir to combine.
4. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the coconut milk, lime zest, brown sugar or maple syrup, sea salt, and tofu. Stir to combine.
6. Simmer the curry for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the tofu is tender and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Stir in the sweet potato and kale. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
8. Remove the curry from the heat and stir in the roasted cashews.
9. Serve the Vegetarian Panang Curry over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

10935178ed.gt:
1.
Bring stock to a simmer in a saucepan (do not boil).
Keep warm over low heat.2.
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add olive oil; swirl to coat.
Add pancetta; saute 6 minutes or until crisp.
Using a slotted spoon, remove pancetta from pan; drain on a paper towel.
Add shallots to drippings in pan; cook 2 minutes (do not brown), stirring frequently.
Stir in rice, rosemary, and garlic; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add wine; cook 2 minutes or until liquid is absorbed, stirring frequently.
Stir in 1 1/2 cups stock; cook 4 minutes or until liquid is nearly absorbed, stirring constantly.
Add remaining stock, 3/4 cup at a time, stirring nearly constantly until each portion of stock is absorbed before adding the next (about 22 minutes total); reserve 1/3 cup stock at the last addition.
Stir in pepper, truffle oil, and salt.
Remove pan from heat; stir in reserved 1/3 cup broth.
Top with pancetta.
10935178ed.pred:
[INST]
To make the Pancetta Risotto with Truffle Oil, follow these steps:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced shallots and cook until they are softened, about 2 minutes.
2. Add the rice to the saucepan and stir to coat the rice with the oil. Cook for about 1 minute, or until the rice is slightly toasted.
3. Add the chicken stock, one cup at a time, stirring constantly to ensure the rice absorbs the liquid evenly. Cook until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed.
4. Add the pancetta, minced garlic, rosemary, and white truffle oil. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
5. Season the risotto with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the Pancetta Risotto immediately, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh rosemary and a drizzle of truffle oil, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Pancetta Risotto with Truffle Oil!

a67add462f.gt:
Place diced carrots, onion, peppers, and garlic (not the peas yet) in a kettle with a small amount of water and curry powder.
Simmer about 5 minutes until tender.
Add zucchini, cover, and simmer 5 more minutes.
Blend all the remaining ingredients, except the peas and garboanzos or lentils, in a blender until smooth.
Add the blended ingredients, the peas, and the garbanzos or lentils to the rest of the vegetables.
Heat and serve over rice.
a67add462f.pred:
1. Heat a large skillet or wok over medium heat. Add the diced carrots, onion, and green and red bell peppers. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender.

2. Add the garlic cloves and cook for another minute, until fragrant.

3. Pour in the tomato sauce, peanut butter, Braggs liquid aminos, and curry powder. Stir to combine.

4. Add the cooked garbanzo beans (chickpeas) or lentils, salt, and cooked rice. Stir to combine.

5. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is heated through and the curry is well-coated with the sauce.

6. Optionally, add a splash of water if the sauce seems too thick.

7. Serve the Thai Style Curry over cooked rice, garnished with fresh cilantro, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Thai Style Curry dish!

b5234384e0.gt:
Heat oven to 325
Sautee onion and celery
Cook noodles as directed.
Mix tuna with mayo and soup.
Once noodles are cooked mix into tuna and mayo mix.
Spoon into casserole dish.
Sprinkle crumbled potato chips on top.
Bake for 30 mins or until potato chips are browned.
b5234384e0.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the tuna, mushroom soup, mayonnaise, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, combine the noodles, celery, onion, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Spread the tuna mixture evenly over the noodle mixture.
5. Sprinkle the crushed potato chips evenly over the top of the tuna mixture.
6. Pour the mixture into a small casserole dish.
7. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the noodles are cooked through and the casserole is hot and bubbly.
8. Serve the Tuna Noodle Casserole hot.

This Tuna Noodle Casserole dish is a delicious and comforting meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of tuna, mushroom soup, and mayonnaise creates a rich and savory flavor, while the noodles and vegetables provide a satisfying and filling texture. The crushed potato chips on top add a delightful crunch and a touch of extra flavor.

01eb818f49.gt:
Cook the chicken breast pieces in the water in a large pot over high heat until done (170 degrees).
Remove the chicken pieces to plate and cover with plastic wrap; set aside.
Pour the dried pasta in to the same boiling water and cook until tender, about 6 minutes.
Drain in a colander; set aside.
Place the Greek yogurt, the Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning Mix, the reserved marinating juice from the artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, the zest and juice of the lemon, white pepper, curry and cayenne powders in a small sized bowl and whisk until well blended and smooth.
Add in the 2 diced chives, carrots, celery, parsley, shallots and pimento and gently stir.
Pour this mixture over the cooked pasta in a larger bowl and add the cooked chicken breast pieces that have been diced into small cubes.
Mix until all is evenly coated.
To serve, plate a serving of the pasta mixture and garnish with (optional) parsley, several grape tomatoes, 1 purple cabbage leaf, chives pieces and several quarters of artichoke hearts.
01eb818f49.pred:
To prepare Chicken Pasta Salad in the Hidden Valley of Good Eats, follow these steps:

1. Cook the chicken breast in boiling water for about 10 minutes or until it is fully cooked through. Remove the chicken from the water and let it cool.

2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, using the water you have reserved. Drain the pasta and set it aside.

3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, pasta, Greek yogurt, Hidden Valley Ranch Seasoning Mix, and freshly grated parmesan cheese.

4. In a small bowl, mix the lemon juice, zest, white pepper, curry powder, and cayenne pepper. Pour the mixture over the chicken and pasta mixture.

5. Add the sliced carrots, chopped celery, and minced shallots to the bowl. Stir to combine.

6. Add the marinated artichoke hearts, reserving 2 Tablespoons of juice, and pimientos. Stir to combine.

7. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

8. Serve the Chicken Pasta Salad in a large bowl, garnished with the reserved 2 Tablespoons of marinated artichoke hearts, red cabbage leaves, and grape tomatoes (optional).

[/INST]

e3cdb21cdf.gt:
In a large pot with boiling salted water cook spaghetti pasta until al dente.
Drain.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, basil, sliced mushrooms, and chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Stir in California-style vegetables, salt, and ground black pepper.
Cook for approximately 10 minutes, stirring often, until vegetables are tender and crisp.
Pour vegetable mixture over cooked and drained pasta.
Toss well.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese and serve.
e3cdb21cdf.pred:
1. Begin by cooking the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and sauté for about 1 minute, or until fragrant.
3. Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for about 5 minutes, or until they are tender.
4. Add the sliced onion to the skillet and cook for an additional 2 minutes, or until softened.
5. Pour in the stewed tomatoes and the frozen mixed vegetables, and stir to combine.
6. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and a pinch of red pepper flakes, if desired. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the vegetables are heated through.
7. Drain the cooked spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the vegetable mixture. Stir to combine.
8. Add the chopped fresh basil and Parmesan cheese, and stir to combine.
9. Serve the California Primavera immediately, garnished with additional fresh basil, if desired.

[/INST]

143f7e5182.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix bread dough following the directions on the box (or use your favorite recipe).
Wrap the dough around the smokies, one at a time.
Place on a greased cookie sheet, or use Silpat or parchment paper.
Bake for 15 minutes.
143f7e5182.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the white bread mix and the ground beef. Mix until the beef is evenly distributed throughout the bread mix.
3. Shape the mixture into small meatballs, about the size of a walnut.
4. Place the meatballs on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for about 12-15 minutes, or until they are cooked through and no longer pink inside.
6. While the meatballs are baking, prepare the Lil' Smokies by heating them in the microwave for about 1 minute, or until they are warm and pliable.
7. Once the meatballs are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Carefully slice the cooked meatballs in half, creating small bite-sized pieces.
9. Place the cooked meatballs and Lil' Smokies in a bowl and mix them together.
10. Serve the Snausages for People immediately, or refrigerate them for later use.

Enjoy your delicious Snausages for People!

039acee1c2.gt:
Pour peach juice into a champagne flute.
Slowly pour sparkling wine over peach juice; let sit until liquids have blended, about 1 minute.
Pour raspberry juice over champagne mixture.
039acee1c2.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: peach juice, chilled sparkling wine, raspberry juice (optional), and a cocktail shaker.
2. In the cocktail shaker, combine 2 fluid ounces of peach juice, 4 fluid ounces of chilled sparkling wine, and a splash of raspberry juice (optional).
3. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to combine the ingredients and chill them.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Garnish the cocktail with a raspberry or a peach slice, if desired.
6. Serve the Classic Bellini Cocktail immediately.

Enjoy your delicious and refreshing Bellini Cocktail!

b12f641798.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F with rack in middle.
Pat beef dry and season with 2 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Heat oil in pot over medium-high heat until it shimmers, then brown meat, without crowding, in 3 batches, turning, about 8 minutes per batch.
Transfer to a platter.
Reduce heat to medium, then add carrots, celery, onions, and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until well browned, about 12 minutes.
Push vegetables to one side of pot.
Add tomato paste to cleared area and cook paste, stirring, 2 minutes, then stir into vegetables.
Add vinegar and cook, stirring, 2 minutes.
Stir in wine, bay leaves, and thyme and boil until wine is reduced by about two thirds, 10 to 12 minutes.
Add broth to pot along with water, beef, and any juices from platter and bring to a simmer.
Cover and braise in oven until meat is very tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
Set a large colander in a large bowl.
Pour stew into colander.
Return pieces of meat to pot, then discard remaining solids.
Let cooking liquid stand 10 minutes.
While beef braises, peel potatoes and cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Slice carrots diagonally (1-inch).
Add potatoes and carrots to stew (make sure they are submerged) and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until potatoes and carrots are tender, about 40 minutes.
b12f641798.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large, heavy pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the beef and cook until browned, breaking it into smaller pieces as it cooks. Remove the beef from the pot and set aside.
3. In the same pot, add the onions, celery, and garlic. Cook until the onions are translucent, about 5 minutes.
4. Add the tomato paste and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
5. Pour in the dry red wine, and stir to deglaze the pot. Cook until the wine has almost completely evaporated.
6. Add the beef back into the pot, along with the bay leaves, thyme, and beef broth. Stir to combine.
7. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the liquid has thickened.
8. Add the potatoes and carrots to the pot, and continue to simmer for an additional 30 to 45 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
9. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the stew in bowls, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh thyme or parsley.

Enjoy your delicious Beef Stew with Potatoes and Carrots!

03321392c1.gt:
Spread cut sides of roll with dressing and mustard.
Fill with remaining ingredients.
03321392c1.pred:
To make a delicious California Turkey & Vegetable Sandwich dish, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: whole wheat kaiser roll, partially split; MIRACLE WHIP Light Dressing; GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard; KRAFT 2% Milk Sharp Cheddar Singles; OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Turkey Breast; tomato; mixed green pepper strips; shredded carrots.

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Place the kaiser roll on a baking sheet and lightly toast it in the preheated oven for about 5 minutes, or until it is golden brown.

4. While the roll is toasting, spread a thin layer of MIRACLE WHIP Light Dressing on the bottom half of the roll.

5. Add a layer of sliced tomato on top of the dressing.

6. Spread a thin layer of GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard on the top half of the roll.

7. Add a layer of sliced turkey breast on top of the mustard.

8. Top the turkey with a layer of mixed green pepper strips and shredded carrots.

9. Place the top half of the roll on top of the vegetables, forming a sandwich.

10. Serve the California Turkey & Vegetable Sandwich warm, and enjoy!

24b368b73d.gt:
To make Salad: Toast pine nuts in skillet over medium heat 5 minutes, or until golden brown.
Transfer to plate to cool.
Combine radicchio, radishes, fennel, and cucumber in large bowl.
To make Lemon-Mint Dressing: Puree mint, lemon juice, oil, maple syrup, and mustard in blender until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add dressing to salad; toss to coat, and garnish with toasted pine nuts.
24b368b73d.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the sliced radicchio, red radishes, and fennel with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
3. Spread the vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. While the vegetables are roasting, prepare the dressing by combining the lemon juice, maple syrup, Dijon mustard, and a pinch of salt and pepper in a small bowl.
5. Once the vegetables are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool slightly.
6. In a large bowl, combine the cooled vegetables, pine nuts, and the dressing. Toss everything together until the vegetables are well-coated.
7. Serve the Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.

This Radicchio, Radish, and Fennel Salad dish is a delicious and healthy option that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a main course. The combination of the roasted vegetables, the tangy dressing, and the crunchy pine nuts creates a delightful and satisfying meal.

9bde591cc5.gt:
In a large skillet, brown the ground meat and drain off any grease.
Add the chopped onion and cook for about 3 minutes, until the onions are softened.
Add the cabbage and water and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt.
Add the tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, caraway seed and garlic.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and cover.
Simmer until the cabbage is cooked to the desired tenderness, about 30 minutes.
Serve with white rice.
9bde591cc5.pred:
To make a delicious Unstuffed Cabbage Roll Casserole dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large skillet, cook the ground chuck over medium heat until it is no longer pink. Drain any excess fat.
2. Add the chopped onion to the skillet and cook until softened.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked ground chuck, chopped cabbage, and the water. Mix well.
4. Add the crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, white vinegar, salt, caraway seeds, and garlic powder to the bowl. Mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour.
7. Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the cabbage is tender and the filling is hot and bubbly.

This delicious Unstuffed Cabbage Roll Casserole dish is a hearty and flavorful meal that combines ground chuck, cabbage, and a tangy tomato-based sauce. The addition of caraway seeds and garlic powder enhances the dish's taste, while the crushed tomatoes and brown sugar contribute to a rich, savory flavor.

68a1ebd22c.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, sugar, cardamom and salt in a large bowl.
Whisk egg and water together in a small bowl.
Make a well in center of dry ingredients and add egg mixture.
Mix together gradually with a fork until mixture forms a soft dough.
If it's too sticky, add 1 or 2 tablespoons of flour (one at a time).
Cover dough with a wet towel or plastic wrap and leave 30 minutes or longer.
Heat 4 cups of oil in a deep, heavy pot (cast iron is preferable) until is reaches 360F
While oil is heating, roll dough out on a floured surface into a rectangle 1/2 inch thick.
Use a sharp knife to cut into 20 equal rectangles.
Fry maandazi in batches of 5, for about 5 minutes per batch, turning to brown both sides.
Hint: Turn the mandaazi before it gets too puffy, or the air bubbles will prevent you from turning it at all.
Remove from oil when both sides are golden brown.
Serve warm, dipped in powdered sugar if desired.
68a1ebd22c.pred:
1. First, prepare the ingredients by measuring out the required amounts of white flour, baking powder, sugar, cardamom, salt, and egg.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the dry ingredients (white flour, baking powder, sugar, and cardamom).
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg and add the water.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
7. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out circles of dough using a cookie cutter or a round object, such as a glass or a bowl.
9. Place the circles of dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake the Maandazi for 10-12 minutes or until they are golden brown.
11. Allow the Maandazi to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the baking sheet.
12. Serve the Maandazi warm, with a cup of tea or coffee.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

159b22acbe.gt:
In 1 1/2- to 2-quart container with cover, mix all ingredients; cover tightly.
Store at room temperature.
Kitchen Tip:.
For cute gift bags, buy some small snack-sized bags and black pipe cleaners at the party or craft store.
Cut 5 pipe cleaners in half (makes ten 6-inch pieces).
Cut 14 pipe cleaners into 4-inch lengths (3-lengths per pipe cleaner).
To make each spider hold four 4-inch lengths together and twist a 6-inch length around the middle of the bundle to secure.
Bend 4-inch pieces to resemble spider legs.
Use 6-inch piece to seal gift bag.
Two 4-inch pieces will be left over.
159b22acbe.pred:
Goblin Good Gorp:

Ingredients:
- 2 cups peanuts
- 1 cup miniature cream-filled chocolate sandwich cookies
- 1 cup candy corn
- 12 cup cheese-flavored tiny goldfish crackers
- 12 cup raisins

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, combine the peanuts, miniature chocolate sandwich cookies, candy corn, and tiny goldfish crackers.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the raisins with a small amount of water to rehydrate them.
3. Add the rehydrated raisins to the peanut mixture and stir to combine.
4. Serve the Goblin Good Gorp immediately or store it in an airtight container for later consumption.

This recipe creates a unique and delicious snack that combines the crunchiness of the peanuts and cookies with the sweetness of the chocolate and candy corn, while the tiny goldfish crackers add a salty and crunchy element. The raisins add a touch of natural sweetness and moisture to the mix, making it a delightful and satisfying treat for any occasion.

3c81571916.gt:
Preheat oven to 375, in a large bowl combine all ingredients mix well.
lightly spray your 8x8 baking dish and add meat mixture to form an loaf.
bake uncovered about an hour or until thermometer reaches 170.
3c81571916.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground turkey, egg, meatloaf seasoning mix, and chopped onion.
3. Add the canned tomatoes and green chilies, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, mix the dry breadcrumbs.
5. Shape the turkey mixture into small square-shaped patties.
6. Dip each patty into the breadcrumb mixture, coating both sides evenly.
7. Place the breaded patties on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Bake the meatloaf squares in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the breading is golden brown.
9. Remove the meatloaf squares from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Meatloaf Squared!

f87ab5a162.gt:
In a large pot, heat the oil.
Add the onion and cook over moderate heat, stirring, until golden brown, 7 minutes.
Add the bacon and cook, stirring, until the fat has rendered, 10 minutes.
Add the collards and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, until it begins to wilt, 4 minutes.
Add the vinegar and boil for 1 minute.
Add the sorghum syrup, stock, water, crushed red pepper and a large pinch of salt.
Cover and cook, stirring a few times, until the collards are very tender, 1 1/2 hours.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, simmer the cream over moderate heat until reduced by one-third, 10 minutes.
Add the kimchi and remove from the heat.
When the collards are done, stir in the kimchi cream.
Season with salt and serve.
f87ab5a162.pred:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the bacon and cook until it is crispy, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the collard greens and cook until they are tender, about 10 minutes.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the sherry vinegar, sorghum syrup or maple syrup, chicken stock, water, and crushed red pepper. Pour the mixture over the collard greens in the saucepan.
5. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
6. Add the heavy cream and cook until the sauce thickens, about 5 minutes.
7. Stir in the kimchi and cook until it is heated through.
8. Season the sauce with salt to taste.
9. Serve the creamed collard greens over rice or noodles.

[/INST]

217d8f645b.gt:
Preheat oven to 375F degrees.
Put a sheet of tinfoil on a cookie sheet.
Spray cookie sheet with lite olive oil or other veggie oil.
In a small bowl combine; onion flakes,oregano, garlic, paprika, salt& pepper, mix well.
Brush cut sides of the potato wedges with olive oil and sprinkle with the spice mixture.
Place potato pieces cut side down on the prepared cookie sheet.
Bake until underside are golden brown, about 30 minutes.
Gently turn the wedges so the other side is on the cookie sheet.
Bake for another 15-20 minutes or until the potatoes are tender and golden.
Serve while they ar piping hot.
217d8f645b.pred:
To create a delicious and healthier version of Fried Potatoes Without the Fry, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the potatoes, onion flakes, oregano, minced garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the olive oil and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. Pour the olive oil mixture over the potato mixture, and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the potato mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Remove from the oven, and let the potatoes cool for a few minutes before serving.

This healthier version of Fried Potatoes Without the Fry uses the oven instead of frying, which helps to retain the nutrients in the potatoes and reduces the amount of oil used. The result is a delicious and satisfying side dish that is both healthier and easier to prepare than traditional fried potatoes.

fcb625ec64.gt:
Cut the carrot into thin strips.
Rehydrate the kanpyo in water.
Place the pork into the kombu, and then place the carrots on top.
Roll it up from the front with the carrot, and tie in two places with the kanpyo.
Add the A condiments and Step 2 to a pot, cover with a drop lid, and boil for at least 40 minutes until the kombu softens.
Stick with a toothpick, and cook until it pierces straight through.
After it has softened, turn off the heat, let cool, cut into half, and arrange on a plate.
fcb625ec64.pred:

4368d128b9.gt:
Brown the ground beef using the seasonings i have listed to flavor the meat.
(I usually add these seasonings to taste since i rarely measure them, so the measurements i have listed are a guideline) Add 1/4 cup of water and let meat and seasonings simmer until liquid is mostly cooked off.
You don't want it soupy.
Drain on paper toweling.
Clean lettuce, tear into bite sized pieces.
Toss with all of the rest of the ingredients adding about 1/2 cup of the dressing and tossing again well.
Serve with salsa and sour cream on the side if desired.
I list Doritos here because, let's face it, they're good!
But when I have time, i like to cut up corn tortillas into wedges, fry in a bit of oil, and season with Mexican style spices.
4368d128b9.pred:
[INST]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
3. Add the chili powder, cumin, Mexican oregano, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika. Cook for a few more minutes until the beef is fully cooked through.
4. Add the tomatoes, lettuce, and onion to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
5. Add the shredded cheese and Dorito Nacho Chips to the skillet. Stir to combine.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish.
7. Bake the taco salad in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the Leah's Taco Salad hot.
