6. While the pancakes are cooking, prepare the blueberry sauce. In a small saucepan, combine the fresh blueberries, sugar, and cinnamon. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the blueberries are soft and the sauce has thickened slightly.
7. Serve the pancakes with a dollop of blueberry sauce on top.

[/INST]

This recipe for Vegan Pancakes with Fresh Blueberry Sauce is a delicious and nutritious breakfast option. The pancakes are made with a combination of almond breeze, coconut oil, and vanilla extract, which give them a rich and creamy texture. The blueberry sauce adds a sweet and tangy flavor, making the dish even more enjoyable. The combination of these ingredients creates a satisfying and flavorful meal that is both vegan and gluten-free.

34e60e4215.gt:
Whisk first 5 ingredients in bowl to blend.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Chill.
Bring to room temperature and rewhisk before using.)
Cut off peel and white pith from oranges.
Cut oranges into 1/4- to 1/2-inch-thick rounds.
Cut each round into quarters.
Transfer orange pieces to large bowl.
Add remaining ingredients and toss to combine.
Toss salad with enough dressing to coat and serve.
34e60e4215.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients: Wash and peel the oranges, and remove the seeds from the pomegranate. Rinse the arugula and remove any leaves that are wilted or damaged.

2. In a large bowl, combine the arugula, pomegranate seeds, and red onion.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together the extra-virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, thawed frozen orange juice concentrate, coarse salt, and ground black pepper.

4. Pour the dressing over the arugula mixture and toss to coat evenly.

5. Add the crumbled goat cheese to the salad and toss again to combine.

6. Serve the Arugula Salad With Oranges, Pomegranate Seeds, and Goat Cheese immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

[/SYS]

0dddf99191.gt:
Trim pork tenderloin removing fat and sinew, slice thinly across the grain (1/4" thickness), place in a bowl.
Add marinade ingredients (soy sauce, white wine, sriracha sauce, honey and ginger), mix to distribute sauce evenly and set aside.
Chop veggies.
Heat wok on high heat for a few minutes, add sesame oil, when oil just starts to smoke, add pork slices, turning frequently.
Stir-fry until pork is mostly cooked and opaque, about 5 - 8 minutes.
Remove pork from wok into a clean bowl/plate, set aside.
In the juices left in the wok, stir in chopped garlic, then add broccoli & carrots.
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, adding more sesame oil if desired.
Add baby corn and stir-fry for another 1-2 minutes.
Return pork to wok and stir into veggies, add more soy sauce, sriracha, and honey if needed to create a liquid gravy of about 1/2 cup in volume.
Push food to the outer edges so liquid is settled in the bottom of wok.
In a seperate bowl combine cool water & corn starch.
Add mixture to liquid gravy in the wok and stir until thickened.
Mix everything together and voila!
Serve immediately with cooked rice.
(Basmati/wild blend cooked in chicken stock and nutmeg is nice!)
0dddf99191.pred:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
2. Add pork tenderloin to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes. Remove pork from the skillet and set aside.
3. Add broccoli florets, baby carrots, and baby corn to the skillet. Cook until the vegetables are tender but still crisp, about 5 minutes.
4. Add cornstarch mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly, about 2 minutes.
5. Add pork back to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix honey and sriracha sauce. Pour the sauce mixture over the pork and vegetables in the skillet.
7. Add dry white wine and soy sauce to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook until the sauce has thickened slightly, about 2 minutes.
8. Season with ground black pepper to taste.
9. Serve the Honey Ginger Sriracha Pork Stir-fry over rice or noodles, garnished with chopped green onions if desired.

[/INST]

f6c8102a5b.gt: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and process until desired texture is achieved.
f6c8102a5b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the onion, and chop it into small pieces.
3. Heat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. In a large bowl, mix the chopped onion, minced garlic, sugar, salt, pepper, and celery seed.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, vinegar, and oil.
6. Add the whisked mixture to the onion mixture, and mix well.
7. Transfer the mixture to a clean jar or container, and store it in the refrigerator.
8. Shake the dressing well before using it to ensure that the ingredients are well-combined.

[/INST]

These steps will result in a delicious Red Onion Salad Dressing that can be used as a base for various salads or as a marinade for meats. The dressing can be stored in the refrigerator for up to a week, making it a convenient and versatile addition to your culinary repertoire.

3fff1d1389.gt:
Preheat oven to 375.
Cut a 2-inch pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast.
In a small bowl combine the Feta and the chopped olives, then stuff 1/2 of mixture into each pocket.
In a nonstick skillet, heat 2 Tbs.
olive oil on medium to high heat.
Season the chicken with pepper and add it to the skillet, cooking 2 minutes on each side or until brown.
Transfer to an oven safe baking dish, drizzled with 1 Tbs.
olive oil and bake for 18 minutes.
In a bowl mix tomato, kosher salt, onion, garlic, basil and parley.
When chicken is 5 minutes from being finished, put the remaining olive oil in the skillet, add tomato mix and heat through.
Serve chicken with tomato mix on top.
3fff1d1389.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and a pinch of crushed red pepper flakes.
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic, and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until they start to release their juices, about 5-6 minutes.
5. Add the crumbled herbed feta cheese and cook until it melts and becomes creamy, about 2-3 minutes.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Place the chicken breasts in the skillet, and pour the tomato mixture over the top. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Cover the skillet with a lid, and place it in the preheated oven. Cook for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
9. Remove the skillet from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing the chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces.
10. Serve the Mediterranean Chicken for Two over a bed of rice or pasta, and enjoy your delicious meal!

13ce606661.gt:
May ajust these seasonings to your own taste !
Grind porkfat and mix with lean pork.
Combine well.
Combine all seasonings and mix with pork.
Mix in well with hands and make a small patty and fry until done, Taste your product and ajust seasonings if needed.
Shape into patties and freeze on cookie sheets until hard.
Store in freezer containers until needed.
I use a slider mold to make patties.
Cook time is time in freezer.
13ce606661.pred:
To make a delicious Real Down Home Pork Sausage dish, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the pork: Grind the 7 lbs of ground lean pork through a coarse grinder plate.
2. Prepare the pork fat: Grind the 3 lbs of pork fat through a coarse grinder plate.
3. Combine the ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, combine the ground pork, ground pork fat, salt, white pepper, sage, thyme, cloves, minced garlic, and msg. Mix well.
4. Add the spices: Add the cayenne pepper, if using, and mix well.
5. Add the liquid: Gradually add the water to the mixture, stirring to combine.
6. Knead the dough: Knead the mixture until it forms a smooth, elastic dough.
7. Shape the sausages: Divide the dough into 12 equal portions. Shape each portion into a sausage, tying them with string to keep them together.
8. Cook the sausages: Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook the sausages, turning occasionally, until they are browned on all sides and cooked through.

This dish is a classic, hearty, and flavorful pork sausage dish that can be enjoyed with a variety of side dishes or as a main course. The combination of ground lean pork, pork fat, and a variety of spices and herbs creates a rich and savory taste that is perfect for a delicious meal.

73d8122a4e.gt:
In food processor, mix all ingredients until you have a lumpy paste.
Put in a saucepan (I used a small saucepan and it was perfect).
Bring to boil and let simmer slowly about 15 minutes.
Add salt to taste.
Pour in a jar and let cool.
It's good up to one month in the fridge.
73d8122a4e.pred:
To cook a delightful Hot Pepper Paste Like Sambal Oelek dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large bowl, combine the diced red bell pepper, sliced long hot red pepper, and minced garlic cloves.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the white vinegar, sugar, and salt.
3. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables and garlic, and stir to combine.
4. Cover the bowl and let the mixture sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. After 30 minutes, taste the mixture and adjust the seasoning if needed.
6. Transfer the mixture to a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth.
7. Store the hot pepper paste in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.

This Hot Pepper Paste Like Sambal Oelek dish is a versatile condiment that can be used as a topping for various dishes, such as stir-fries, noodle dishes, or as a base for sauces. The combination of red bell pepper, long hot red pepper, and garlic creates a spicy, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor profile that is perfect for adding depth and complexity to your favorite recipes.

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
To cook Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, browned, and 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons packed light brown sugar until smooth.
3. Add the 1/4 cup granulated cane sugar and whisk until combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the 3 large eggs, 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup ground hazelnuts, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
5. Gradually add the wet ingredients (butter and sugar mixture) to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
6. Fold in the raspberries and gently mix until incorporated.
7. Grease a muffin tin with cooking spray or butter, and fill each muffin cup with the batter.
8. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Lightly crack the hazelnuts and sprinkle them on top of the muffins as garnish.

Enjoy your delicious Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries!

f12ad1f38c.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
2.
Make the cheese mixture: mix the cottage cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, basil, oregano, and lemon pepper seasoning together.
3.
Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create a pocket.
4.
Fill the chicken with the cheese mixture and place into a greased baking dish.
5.
Brush the tops of the chicken breasts with oil and sprinkle with a bit of salt and pepper.
6.
Bake the chicken for 45-55 minutes, or until cooked through and no longer pink.
7.
The cheese mixture will likely have melted a bit from inside the chicken, but just scoop it up and place on a serving plate.
8.
Top the chicken with pasta sauce of your choice.
I usually make my own sauce, but any favorite sauce will work!
f12ad1f38c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices of your choice.
3. In a large bowl, combine the Cottage Cheese, Shredded Mozzarella, and Grated Parmesan. Mix well to ensure the cheese is evenly distributed.
4. Season the chicken breasts with the Triple Cheese Stuffing mixture, ensuring they are evenly coated.
5. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium heat. Cook the chicken breasts until they are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove the chicken from the skillet or pan and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. Cut the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces and serve it over your choice of pasta or as a main course.

By following these key steps, you can create a delicious and satisfying Triple Cheese Stuffed Chicken dish.

3d07a1a906.gt:
Halve avocados and remove pit.
Roll limes or heat in microwave for 10 seconds to get juices flowing.
Halve the limes.
Rub the avocado halves gently with 1/2 lime to retard the browning.
Juice limes into small bowl and mix with sugar, chili powder and salt using a fork or small whisk.
Add extra-virgin olive oil in a slow stream while mixing dressing.
Pour dressing into the cavities of avocados, distributing it equally and serve.
Garnish with chives or cilantro as an optional garnish.
3d07a1a906.pred:
To cook Chili Lime Avocados, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit.
3. Place the avocado halves on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
4. Drizzle the avocado halves with 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
5. Season the avocado halves with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Squeeze the lime juice over the avocado halves, ensuring that the lime juice covers the avocado evenly.
7. Sprinkle the chili powder over the avocado halves.
8. Bake the avocado halves in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the avocado is soft and the chili powder is slightly toasted.
9. Remove the avocado halves from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
10. Serve the Chili Lime Avocados as a side dish or a snack.

To garnish the Chili Lime Avocados with chopped chives or cilantro, simply sprinkle the herbs over the avocado halves before serving. This will add a burst of fresh flavor and color to the dish.

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the butternut pumpkin into bite-sized pieces and place them on a baking sheet.
3. Drizzle the olive oil over the pumpkin pieces and sprinkle them with the ground cumin.
4. Roast the pumpkin pieces in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
5. In a large bowl, mix the crunchy peanut butter, chili sauce, and the roasted pumpkin pieces.
6. Stir the mixture until well combined, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Roast Pumpkin Dip as a dip for raw vegetables, crackers, or bread. Enjoy!

d99c985b0e.gt:
Combine all ingredients.
except the sesame seeds.
Cover and refrigerate mixture for 15 to 20 minutes.
Add sesame seeds.
(If desired).
mix well.
Serve over salad.
d99c985b0e.pred:
To prepare a delicious Fancy Lady Salad Dressing, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, whisk together the vegetable oil, white wine vinegar, sesame oil, and lemon juice.
2. Add the seasoned pepper and sugar to the mixture, and whisk until well combined.
3. If desired, add a pinch of sesame seeds to the mixture for extra flavor.
4. Taste the dressing and adjust the seasoning as needed.
5. Pour the dressing over the salad greens, and toss to coat evenly.
6. Serve the Fancy Lady Salad Dressing immediately, and enjoy the delicious combination of flavors and textures.

[/INST]

e40bcadd25.gt:
(Cake) Preheat oven to 180C.
Grease and line a 20cm round cake tin.
Place butter, chocolate and sugar in a medium sized saucepan.
Cook over low heat, until butter melts and sugar has dissolved.
Sift the plain flour, self raising flour and bicarb into the saucepan.
Add almond meal, sour cream, eggs and vanilla essence.
Mix well and pour into prepared pan and bake for 40-45 minutes.
Cool slightly in the tin before turning onto a cooling rack.
Let the cake cool then ice and decorate it.
Icing: Place chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl over simmering water.
Cook until chocolate melts.
Remove from heat and continue stirring until mixture thickens to an icing consistency.
Really easy- I didn't even sift the flour and still turns out great.
If I can cook it.... Also a great one to get the kids involved in helping.
e40bcadd25.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease and flour a 20cm (8 inch) round cake pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and dark cooking chocolate until smooth.
3. Add the brown sugar and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the self-raising flour, bi-carbonate soda, and almond meal.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating between the flour mixture and sour cream, until fully incorporated.
6. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
7. Stir in the vanilla essence and mix until well combined.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
9. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
11. Once the cake is completely cooled, you can add the chopped milk chocolate and melted butter to the top.
12. If desired, you can also add a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of chocolate sauce.

[/INST]

This recipe for Basic Chocolate Cake is a simple yet delicious dessert that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of dark cooking chocolate, brown sugar, and sour cream creates a rich and moist cake, while the addition of almond meal and bi-carbonate soda adds a touch of lightness and fluffiness. The vanilla essence and melted butter enhance the overall flavor, making it a delightful treat for any occasion.

3f5aca8d35.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 F.
Beat eggs lightly in med bowl with wire whisk or hand beater.
Beat in flour, milk, and salt just until mixed.
Melt butter in 9 inch pie plate (use a pyrex to maximize puffiness) in oven.
Brush around pie plate to distribute evenly.
Sprinkle brown sugar and ground cinnamon evenly over the melted butter.
Arrange sliced apples over the sugar.
Pour batter over apple.
Bake 30-35 minutes.
Quickly loosen the edge of pancake and turn upside down onto a serving plate.
Serve with powdered sugar and lemon juice on the side.
3f5aca8d35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the margarine or butter, eggs, flour, milk, salt, brown sugar, and cinnamon. Mix until smooth and well combined.
3. Add the sliced apple and lemon juice to the batter. Mix until the apple is evenly distributed throughout the batter.
4. Pour the batter into a greased oven-safe pan or a baking sheet.
5. Bake the pancake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the pancake from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. If desired, dust the pancake with powdered sugar and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Apple Oven Pancake Recipe!

167bcf0a2a.gt:
FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside
SAUTE SPINACH
with oiled pan quick saute spinach for 1 minute with a dash of salt then set aside
FRIED GARLIC AND SHALLOT
fry garlic and shallot till fragrant then add light soy sauce and off heat then add fried eggs and bacon mix well
top on cooked spinach and serve immediately
167bcf0a2a.pred:
To cook a delightful LG CRISPY BACON AND EGGS ON SPINACH dish, follow these steps:

1. In a small bowl, mix together 1/2 tbsp light soy sauce, 4 cloves of diced garlic, and 1 dash of salt. Set aside.

2. In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of oil over medium heat. Add 2 large eggs, breaking them up as they cook. Cook until the whites are set and the yolks are still runny.

3. Add 3 slices of bacon to the skillet. Cook until the bacon is crispy, then remove from the skillet and set aside.

4. Add 6 cups of spinach to the skillet. Cook until the spinach is wilted, then remove from the skillet and set aside.

5. In the same skillet, add the soy sauce mixture. Cook until the sauce has thickened slightly.

6. Add the cooked bacon and spinach back to the skillet. Stir to combine.

7. Serve the LG CRISPY BACON AND EGGS ON SPINACH dish immediately.

The dish is delightful because it combines the rich flavors of bacon, the tender texture of eggs, and the fresh taste of spinach. The light soy sauce adds a touch of savory flavor, while the garlic and shallot provide a warm, aromatic kick. The combination of these ingredients creates a delicious and satisfying meal.

fbb3258d67.gt:
In a very large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil.
Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, add to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat until lightly browned, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
Transfer to a plate.
In the same skillet, heat the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the garlic and chiles and cook over moderately low heat, stirring, until softened, about 1 minute.
Add the clam juice and bring to a boil, then simmer over moderate heat until the broth has reduced by one-fourth, about 3 minutes.
Whisk in the butter a few cubes at a time until incorporated.
Add the shrimp and cherry tomatoes, season with salt and pepper and simmer until the shrimp are just cooked through, about 2 minutes longer.
Stir in the lemon juice, cilantro and chives and serve.
fbb3258d67.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the shrimp and cook until they are pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add the garlic and chile peppers. Cook until the garlic is fragrant, about 1 minute.
4. Add the clam juice or stock, and bring to a simmer. Reduce the heat to low, cover, and let the sauce cook for about 5 minutes.
5. Add the butter to the skillet, stirring to melt it. Add the shrimp back to the skillet, and cook until the butter has melted and the sauce has thickened, about 2 minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the cherry tomatoes, lemon juice, and cilantro.
7. Add the cherry tomato mixture to the skillet with the shrimp and butter, stirring to combine.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven, and bake for about 5-7 minutes, or until the shrimp is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
10. Serve the Jumbo Shrimp with Garlic and Chile Butter dish immediately.

[/INST]

e4e4b2152e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Add 3/4 can water to soup.
Heat.
Mix 3/4 can water with flour.
Stir into soup.
Cook, stirring until it thickens.
Add tuna.
Pour into a baking dish.
Mix Bisquick with milk.
Roll into an 8x10 rectangle.
Spread with cheese and pimiento.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Cut into 12 slices.
Place on the tuna mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes.
e4e4b2152e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Vegetarian Vegetable Soup, Flour, and Milk. Mix until smooth.
3. Add the Tuna, Grated Cheddar Cheese, Pimiento, and mix until well combined.
4. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish with cooking spray or butter.
5. Pour the Tuna mixture into the prepared baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the top is golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
7. Serve the Tuna Bake immediately.

This Tuna Bake recipe combines the flavors of the Vegetarian Vegetable Soup, Flour, Milk, Tuna, Grated Cheddar Cheese, and Pimiento to create a delicious and satisfying meal. The soup adds moisture and a rich flavor to the dish, while the Flour and Milk provide a tender and slightly crispy texture. The Tuna adds a savory and slightly flaky element, and the Grated Cheddar Cheese and Pimiento add a creamy and spicy kick to the dish. The result is a comforting and flavorful meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
[INSTR]
1. Bring the water to a boil in a large pot, then add the mung bean noodles and cook until they are tender but still slightly chewy, about 5-7 minutes.
2. In a large skillet or wok, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until it is soft and translucent, about 3-4 minutes.
3. Add the broccoli to the skillet and cook until it is tender but still crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the cooked mung bean noodles to the skillet and stir to combine.
5. In a small bowl, whisk together the celtic sea salt, sesame oil, agave nectar, ume vinegar, arrowroot, and water. Pour the sauce over the noodles and stir to coat evenly.
6. Add the scallions and cilantro to the skillet and stir to combine.
7. Serve the Vegetarian Pad Thai immediately, garnished with the roasted peanuts.

[/INSTR]

[/SYS]

c1a30da967.gt:
Mix all ingredients except oil and dressing until well blended.
Shape into 8 patties.
Cook patties in hot oil in large frying pan on medium heat 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with dressing, if desired.
c1a30da967.pred:
To prepare a delicious Turkey and Stuffing Cakes dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the prepared Stove Top Stuffing Mix, turkey, celery, and chopped chipotle pepper.
3. Add the Mayo, flour, Dijon mustard, egg, and oil to the bowl, mixing until well combined.
4. If desired, add the optional Kraft Rancher's Choice Dressing to the mixture.
5. Pour the mixture onto a greased baking sheet or a silicone mat, spreading it evenly to form a thick layer.
6. Bake the cakes in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Allow the cakes to cool for a few minutes before slicing them into desired portions.

Enjoy your delicious Turkey and Stuffing Cakes dish, served with your preferred side dishes and a glass of wine.

934deaadde.gt:
Boil chicken, salt& poultry in approximately 2 quarts of water.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add 3 cups milk (more for a richer flavor), bouillon cubes, and butter to broth.
Bring to almost a boil.
Add water to the flour to make a thin solution and pour in broth.
Stir well, reduce heat, and let simmer to thicken.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Pinch each biscuit to small pieces and put in broth.
Stir often so dumplings won't stick together.
When dumplings begin to sink, they are almost ready.
Pick chicken to small pieces and add to broth.
When dumplings are not gummy to taste, it is ready to eat.
934deaadde.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and poultry seasoning.
3. In a large pot, combine the chicken bouillon cubes, real butter, and milk. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat.
4. Reduce the heat to low and simmer the mixture for about 15 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
5. Meanwhile, in a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt. Add the milk and stir until smooth.
6. Roll the chicken breasts in the flour mixture, then dip them in the milk mixture, and finally coat them in the flour mixture again.
7. Add the chicken breasts to the pot with the sauce, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
8. Remove the chicken from the pot and set aside.
9. In a small bowl, combine the biscuit mix and milk. Drop the biscuit mixture by spoonfuls onto the chicken in the pot.
10. Return the chicken to the pot, and cook for about 10 minutes or until the biscuits are golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
11. Serve the chicken and dumplings hot, garnished with chopped parsley if desired.

[/INST]

48d0d21f53.gt:
Stir in a mixing glass with ice.
Strain into a cocktail glass.
48d0d21f53.pred:
To cook a delightful Red Hook Cocktail dish, follow these steps:
1. In a mixing glass, combine 2 ounces of fluid Rye Whiskey, 1/2 ounces of fluid Punt Y Mes, and 1/2 ounces of fluid Maraschino Liqueur (We Used Luxardo).
2. Fill the mixing glass with ice and stir the ingredients until well-chilled.
3. Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass.
4. Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist, if desired.

This Red Hook Cocktail recipe is a classic cocktail that combines the flavors of rye whiskey, Punt Y Mes, and Maraschino Liqueur. The combination of these ingredients results in a smooth, slightly sweet, and slightly bitter cocktail that is perfect for sipping or serving at a party.

b8a3ed253e.gt:
Mince the carrot, onion, garlic.
I make it with a food processor to save time.
Heat olive oil in a pot.
Add minced carrot, onion and garlic.
Add the ground beef and stir.
After meat is cooked, add the ingredients marked and stir frequently.
Otherwise the sauce may splatter.
Serve the sauce generously over the boiled pasta.
It's best to eat it immediately, but you can freeze it up to a month and enjoy later.
You can also use the sauce to make amazing toast the next morning!
Put the sauce and sliced cheese on bread and toast.
b8a3ed253e.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
2. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add the ground beef and cook until it is browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the onion and carrot to the pan and cook until they are softened.
5. Add the garlic and cook for a few more seconds, until fragrant.
6. Pour in the canned whole tomatoes and their juice, and stir to combine.
7. Add the tomato ketchup, Japanese Worcestershire-style sauce, sugar, and soup stock cubes to the pan. Stir to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally.
9. Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan and stir to combine. Cook for a few more minutes, until the sauce is well-coated and the spaghetti is heated through.
10. Serve the Easy! Tasty! Basic Meat Sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

[/INST]

4d0b6bbf93.gt:
Mix the cut vegetables together in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk the dressing ingredients together until well blended.
Pour the dressing over the salad and stir well.
Allow to sit covered, in your fridge, for 30-60 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Garnish with roasted peanuts and serve.
4d0b6bbf93.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, toss the broccoli florets, carrot, celery, and minced ginger together.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the fresh lemon juice, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, agave nectar, salt, and peanut butter (or almond butter or tahini).
4. Pour the dressing mixture over the vegetables and toss to coat evenly.
5. Spread the vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized.
6. Remove the vegetables from the oven and let them cool slightly.
7. Once cooled, transfer the vegetables to a large mixing bowl and add the peanuts for garnish.
8. Serve the Raw Broccoli Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving to allow the flavors to meld together.

[/INST]

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.

3d317eada1.gt:
Prepare berry blue jello according to directions on box.
Pour into 13x9 baking dish and place in the refrigerator.
Allow to chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare lemon flavored gelatin using 1 cup of boiling water.
Beat cream cheese slightly and then add the lemon gelatin mixture.
Beat gelatin and cream cheese until smooth.
Set aside and allow to cool to room temperature.
Once the cream cheese mixture has cooled, fold in the whipped topping until mixed thoroughly.
Pour this mixture over the firmly set bottom layer.
Return to the refrigerator and chill until firm, about 1 hour.
Prepare raspberry jello according to directions on box.
Cool this mixture until room temperature and then pour over the middle cream cheese layer.
Return the 3 layers to the refrigerator and chill until top layer is firm.
Cut into squares to serve.
Top with a little whipped topping and a couple of blueberries, if desired.
3d317eada1.pred:
To prepare Red, White, and Blue Jello, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the berry blue gelatin mix and lemon Jell-O gelatin.
2. Stir until the gelatin is fully dissolved.
3. Add the cream cheese and whipped topping to the mixture.
4. Stir until the cream cheese is fully incorporated.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
6. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 4 hours or until it sets.
7. Once set, cut the mixture into desired shapes or sizes.

The essential ingredients for this recipe are the berry blue gelatin mix, lemon Jell-O gelatin, cream cheese, whipped topping, and a 9x13 inch baking dish. These ingredients will provide the necessary components to create a delicious and visually appealing Red, White, and Blue Jello dessert.

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.
b379bad205.pred:
To cook a delicious Caramelized Onion Frittata with these ingredients, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the diced baking potato and cook until they are tender, stirring occasionally.
3. Add the sliced onion and cook until it becomes soft and caramelized. This may take around 15-20 minutes.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the water, sage, salt, and pepper.
5. Pour the liquid mixture into the skillet with the onions, stirring to combine.
6. Add the grated parmesan cheese and cook until it melts and becomes incorporated into the mixture.
7. In a separate bowl, whisk together the skim milk, egg whites, and egg.
8. Pour the egg mixture over the onion and cheese mixture in the skillet.
9. Cook the frittata in the preheated oven for about 30-35 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is still slightly wobbly.
10. Remove the frittata from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it into wedges and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Caramelized Onion Frittata!

199261e80a.gt:
Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter and cream cheese until well blended.
Add sugar, and beat until light and fluffy.
Blend in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the coconut extract.
Mix in flour and baking powder until just moistened, then stir in coconut.
Spoon batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until a knife inserted into the cake comes out clean.
Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before inverting onto a cooling rack.
199261e80a.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and cream cheese until smooth.
3. Add the sugar and beat until fluffy.
4. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
5. Add the coconut extract and mix well.
6. Gradually add the flour mixture to the butter mixture, alternating with the milk, beginning and ending with the flour mixture. Mix until just combined.
7. Fold in the flaked coconut.
8. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
9. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
10. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

c4c9825372.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Oil up the pan.
Chop up some lemons and onions put them in the pan.
You can add foil paper to the pan if you dont want it to stick.
If your shrimp doesnt come deveind do that and add that to the pan.
Now get some salt and pepper add a bit over the shrimp.
(garlic and parsley can be added) Now the cayenne pepper is optional i like my shrimp spicy (:
Stick the shrimp in the oven let cook.
I let cook for 20 mins took it out mixed it added more cayenne pepper squeezed some lemon juice over it then put it back in the oven for about 10 mins.
You can make some pasta and garlic bread as a good side.
While its cooking.
Now take the shrimp out :D
c4c9825372.pred:
To cook a delightful Spicy Or Non Spicy Shrimp dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil or butter over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onion and sauté until it becomes soft and translucent.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they are pink and fully cooked through.
5. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
6. In a small bowl, mix the chopped lemons, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.
7. Pour the lemon mixture over the shrimp in the skillet and stir to combine.
8. Place the skillet in the preheated oven and cook for 5-7 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the sauce is slightly thickened.
9. Serve the Spicy Or Non Spicy Shrimp dish over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

This dish can be customized to suit your taste preferences by adjusting the amount of spiciness, adding additional ingredients, or using different types of sauces.

1282ffb964.gt:
Cook onion rings as directed on package.
When onions are almost done, grill franks 7 to 9 min.
or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.
Insert each frank through 3 onion rings; place in bun.
Top with cheese.
1282ffb964.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the onion rings, beef franks, and barbecue sauce. Mix well to ensure the onion rings are evenly coated.
3. Place the onion ring mixture on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
4. Bake the onion ring mixture in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the onion rings are golden brown and cooked through.
5. While the onion rings are baking, split the hot dog sandwich rolls in half.
6. Once the onion rings are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. In a small bowl, mix the shredded cheddar cheese with a spoonful of milk to create a smooth and creamy cheese sauce.
8. Assemble the Angus Ring Toss by placing the cooked onion rings on the bottom half of the hot dog sandwich rolls.
9. Add a spoonful of the cheese sauce to the top half of the rolls, and then place the top half on top of the onion rings.
10. Serve the Angus Ring Toss immediately, and enjoy!

f3d6579000.gt:
Combine milk and mustard in bowl; add cheese.
Microwave, stirring every minute, 2-4 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Serve with desired dippers.
f3d6579000.pred:
1. In a small bowl, mix the milk, Dijon mustard, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
2. In a larger bowl, combine the Land O Lakes Deli White American cheese, and mix until smooth.
3. Add the cheese mixture to the small bowl with the milk mixture, and stir until well combined.
4. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
6. Spread the cheese dip onto the prepared baking sheet, and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the dip is melted and bubbly.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven, and let the dip cool for a few minutes.
8. Serve the Easy Cheesy Dijon Dip with your choice of dipping items, such as pretzel rods, bagel chips, breadsticks, soft pretzels, or vegetable sticks.

[/INST]

d6c22c19dd.gt:
Cut your brownies up into square bite size pieces and put a single layer of the brownies in the container you want to use.
It can be single serving or in a big truffle dish.
Whip your cream to stiff peaks and then fold in powder sugar.
Making sure it's combined.
Spoon or put in the whipped cream in pastry bag and put the whipped cream top of the brownies.
Then, drizzle the caramel on top and drizzle the chocolate fudge in a pastry bag or zip lock bag and cutting a end on it and top the brownie sundae with cherry.
Enjoy.
d6c22c19dd.pred:
1. First, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Line a 9x9 inch baking pan with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the brownie mix, melted butter, and eggs. Mix until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the brownies to cool completely in the pan.
7. Once cooled, cut the brownies into equal squares.
8. In a small mixing bowl, whip the whipping cream until stiff peaks form.
9. In a small saucepan, heat the powder sugar over low heat, stirring constantly, until it reaches a smooth, caramel-like consistency.
10. In a small bowl, mix the cherries and caramel sauce.
11. To assemble the sundae, place a square of brownie on the bottom of a bowl or a glass.
12. Add a scoop of caramel ice cream to the brownie.
13. Drizzle the caramel sauce over the ice cream.
14. Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream on top of the caramel sauce.
15. Garnish with the cherries and a sprinkle of powdered sugar.

Enjoy your delicious Brownie sundae!

b3eb381c7e.gt:
Finely grind almond paste in processor.
Add softened butter, flour, and egg; blend until smooth.
Preheat oven to 400F.
Roll out puff pastry on floured surface to 13x11-inch rectangle.
Fold 3/4 inch of edges over; press to adhere to make 11 1/2x9 1/2-inch rectangle.
Transfer to rimmed baking sheet.
Pierce surface evenly with fork, avoiding folded edges.
Spread almond paste mixture evenly over crust within folded edges.
Arrange pear slices atop filling, overlapping slightly.
Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon sugar.
Bake until crust is deep golden and pears are tender, about 38 minutes.
Cool slightly.
Meanwhile, stir vinegar and remaining 1/4 cup sugar in heavy small saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves.
Increase heat; boil until syrup is reduced to 1/4 cup, about 6 minutes.
Place tart on platter.
Drizzle syrup over.
Sprinkle lightly with peppercorns and serve warm.
b3eb381c7e.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the almond paste, crumbled, and butter until well combined.
3. In a large bowl, whisk the egg until it is light and fluffy.
4. Add the flour, sugar, and almond paste mixture to the egg, stirring until well combined.
5. Press the pastry dough into a disk, wrap it in plastic, and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
6. Meanwhile, prepare the pear slices by tossing them in a small amount of sugar, then transfer them to a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the pears in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the pears from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
9. In a small saucepan, heat the black raspberry vinegar or raspberry vinegar over low heat, stirring occasionally, until it thickens slightly.
10. In a small bowl, mix the crushed pink peppercorns with a pinch of salt.
11. Carefully spoon the almond paste mixture onto the center of the pastry dough, leaving a 1-inch border around the edges.
12. Arrange the pear slices on top of the almond paste, creating a decorative pattern.
13. Brush the edges of the pastry with the raspberry vinegar glaze, then sprinkle the crushed pink peppercorn mixture over the top.
14. Bake the crostata in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly and set.
15. Allow the crostata to cool for a few minutes before slicing it into wedges and serving.

[/INST]

[/INST]

This delicious Pear and Frangipane Crostata with Raspberry Vinegar Glaze is a perfect combination of sweet and tangy flav

dde6859b7c.gt:
1.
Brown turkey in a nonstick skillet over medium high heat.
After about 7 minutes, drain the liquid off and return the meat to the pan.
Cook another 3 to 5 minutes or until browned.
Drain and set aside.
2.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion to the skillet and cook about 3 minutes.
The onions and/or mushrooms should be softened.
Add the garlic and cumin; cook another minute.
3.
Add the turkey back to the veggies, then stir in the BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
Cook, stirring often, until heated through (about 5 minutes).
4.
Spoon mixture into hollowed out rolls (makes it a bit less messy) and serve with your favorite baked chips!
dde6859b7c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the ground turkey, green bell pepper, mushrooms, onion, garlic, ground cumin, BBQ sauce, ketchup, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Place the mixture in a large, oven-safe skillet or baking dish.
4. Bake the turkey mixture in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until the meat is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly thickened.
5. While the turkey mixture is baking, split the hard rolls in half and hollow out the centers.
6. Once the turkey mixture is cooked, remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. Stuff each hollowed-out roll with the cooked turkey mixture.
8. Return the stuffed rolls to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the rolls are golden brown and the filling is hot and bubbly.
9. Serve the Spicy BBQ Turkey Joes immediately.

[/INST]

7b189a7aea.gt:
Grind cookies in a food processor into fine crumbs; transfer to a large mixing bowl.
Grind pecans in the food processor; add to cookie crumbs.
Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, and corn syrup with the cookies and pecans until the mixture holds together; roll into 3/4-inch balls.
Spread coconut onto a plate and 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar onto a separate plate.
Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.
Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.
7b189a7aea.pred:
To make a delicious Meemaw's Bourbon Balls dish, follow these steps:
1. Crush the vanilla wafer cookies into fine crumbs using a food processor or a rolling pin.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the crushed cookies, pecans, confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, and cocoa powder. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the coconut, if using, and mix until well combined.
4. Roll the mixture into small balls using your hands or a cookie scoop.
5. Roll the balls in the remaining confectioners' sugar, if desired.
6. Store the balls in an airtight container or a plastic bag in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

This recipe is a delicious and easy way to enjoy Meemaw's famous Bourbon Balls, perfect for holiday gatherings or as a sweet treat.

2e199b153f.gt:
Place strawberries and sugar in a blender and pulse until pureed; steep for 10 minutes.
Pour cream, milk, vanilla extract, and salt into strawberry mixture; blend until smooth and slightly thickened, 10 to 15 seconds.
Whisk red food color into cream mixture.
Pour strawberry mixture into the container of an ice cream maker and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer ice cream to a sealable container, cover the ice cream with plastic wrap, seal the container, and freeze, 2 hours to overnight.
Process in an ice cream maker until thick.
Immediately transfer to a sealable container, cover with plastic wrap, cover the bowl with a lid and freeze for 2 hours to overnight.
2e199b153f.pred:
To create Chef John's Strawberry Ice Cream, follow these steps:

1. Wash and hull the fresh strawberries, and place them in a blender or food processor.
2. Add the white sugar, heavy whipping cream, milk, and vanilla extract to the blender or food processor.
3. Blend the mixture until smooth and creamy.
4. If desired, add a tiny pinch of salt to enhance the flavor.
5. If you want to add a pop of color, add 2 drops of red food coloring to the mixture.
6. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions.
7. Once the ice cream is fully churned, transfer it to an airtight container and place it in the freezer to harden for at least 2 hours or overnight.
8. Once the ice cream is fully hardened, scoop it into bowls and enjoy!

This recipe will yield approximately 4 servings of delicious Strawberry Ice Cream.

7f9c7a1b1f.gt:
About one hour before smoking, coat both sides of ribs with a little vegetable oil and sprinkle with Chinese 5 spice.
Set aside at room temperature for 1 hour.
Heat charcoal or gas grill for indirect cooking at 230 to 250 degrees F. Add drained wood chips, if using.
Place the ribs, meaty side down, over a drip pan and cook for 2 hours.
Add about 12 coals to a charcoal grill every 45 minutes or so to maintain the heat.
Remove ribs from grill.
Double-wrap each rack in heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Return wrapped ribs to the grill and cook for 1 1/2 to 2 hours more over indirect heat, until very tender.
Add more coals as needed to maintain temperature for a charcoal grill.
Meanwhile, make the glaze.
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat; reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes, stirring frequently.
Remove ribs from grill and unwrap.
Place ribs over direct heat on grill and brush with honey red pepper glaze.
Cook for about 5 minutes until the glaze is set.
Turn ribs and repeat with more glaze.
7f9c7a1b1f.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the Chinese 5-spice powder, hickory or apple wood chips, and soaked and drained hickory or apple wood chips (optional).
3. Season the pork back ribs with salt and pepper, then coat them with the spice mixture.
4. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil and sear the ribs for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are browned and slightly caramelized.
5. Transfer the ribs to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 1-1.5 hours, or until the meat is tender and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
6. While the ribs are cooking, prepare the glaze by combining the lite soy sauce, clover honey, red jalapeno jelly, apple cider vinegar, onion powder, and minced garlic in a small bowl.
7. Once the ribs are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes. Then, brush the glaze evenly over the ribs.
8. Return the ribs to the oven and continue baking for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the glaze is bubbly and caramelized.
9. Remove the ribs from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Honey Red Pepper Glazed Back Ribs!

0524637e4d.gt:
Don't peel the potatoes.
Just wash if needed.
Then cut in to medium dice.
Put in pan with enough water to cover.
Add the amount of salt for your taste.
Bring to the boil.
Cook until tender, but not mushy.
Cool a little.
While the potatoes are cooking mix all the other ingredients for the dressing together in a bowl or jug.
You may want to add more or less milk to the dressing, depending how thick or thin you want to coat the potatoes.
0524637e4d.pred:
To prepare a delicious Whole Grain Honey Mustard Potato Salad, follow these steps:

2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
3. Place the potatoes in a large mixing bowl.

9. Serve the Whole Grain Honey Mustard Potato Salad immediately, and enjoy your delicious and healthy meal.

This Whole Grain Honey Mustard Potato Salad is a nutritious and flavorful side dish that can be enjoyed at any meal. The combination of whole grains, honey mustard, and the tangy taste of the yogurt and mustard make it a delightful and satisfying choice.

904095d715.gt:
In a 10-inch heavy saute pan, heat 1 ounce of clarified butter over high heat.
Add sliced mushrooms one handful at a time to saute pan.
As mushrooms begin to develop rich, brown color, push them to the outside of the saute pan.
Turn the mushrooms over as they begin to color.
When pan becomes dry, add remaining clarified butter to the pan.
Add another handful of mushrooms to the pan and continue until all mushrooms have been added.
Season with salt and pepper after the last addition to the pan has been made.
Make a hole in the middle of the pan and add the shallots.
Deglaze pan with cognac, scraping up any browned mushroom bits.
Add the chives.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
904095d715.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat the clarified butter over medium heat. Add the sliced cremini mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Add the minced shallots to the skillet and cook for another 2-3 minutes, until they are softened.
4. Pour the cognac into the skillet and stir to combine with the mushrooms and shallots. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, until the cognac has evaporated.
5. Add the chives and stir to combine.
6. Transfer the mushroom mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and the mixture is heated through.
7. Serve the Fungal Saute hot, garnished with additional chives if desired.

[/INST]

e3bc640873.gt:
In a mixing bowl beat eggs, sugar, corn syrup and vanilla.
Add butter and mix well.
Stir in pecans and chocolate chips.
Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 350 F for 50-55 minutes or until set.
It is important for it to be set *before* you remove it from the oven.
It will not set afterward if you haven't baked it long enough.
Serve with ice cream if desired.

[INST]

35bc02319c.gt:
To make doughnuts: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Mix the flours, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon in a mixing bowl.
Set aside.
In another bowl, combine the melted butter, milk, vanilla and maple syrup.
Then add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until combined.
Put the mixture into a piping bag or a Ziplock bag with the tip cut off, and pour into a pre-sprayed doughnut pan.
Bake doughnuts for 20-25 minutes or until browned and slightly firm to the touch.
Once done, let stand to cool for 20 minutes.
To make glaze: stir together 1/2 cup confectioners sugar, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, and 1 tablespoon milk.
Once mixed well, distribute the glaze generously onto doughnuts.
35bc02319c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, whole wheat pastry flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. Add the melted butter and mix until the dough comes together.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, vanilla extract, maple syrup, and powdered sugar.
5. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, and mix until a smooth dough forms.
6. If the dough is too dry, add a bit more milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
7. If the dough is too sticky, add a bit more flour, 1 tablespoon at a time, until it reaches the desired consistency.
8. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
9. After the dough has chilled, roll it out on a floured surface to your desired thickness.
10. Use a doughnut cutter or a cookie cutter to cut out doughnut shapes.
11. Place the doughnut shapes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
12. Bake the doughnuts in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes or until they are golden brown.
13. Allow the doughnuts to cool on a wire rack for a few minutes before removing them from the baking sheet.
14. Once the doughnuts are completely cooled, you can add a variety of toppings, such as glazes, frostings, or sprinkles, to suit your preference.

Enjoy your delicious Cake Batter Doughnuts!

8b0f1ee273.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large saucepan combine broth, undrained tomatoes and orzo.
Bring to boiling.
Stir in Grilled & Ready Southwestern Chicken Strips.
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart baking dish.
Bake, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese during last 5 minutes of baking.
Let stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving.
8b0f1ee273.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken strips, diced tomatoes, green chile peppers, orzo, and shredded Cheddar cheese.

5. Serve the Zesty Chicken Orzo Casserole hot, and enjoy!

cb7e6bedc8.gt:
Preheat oven to 180C.
Melt the butter in the microwave.
Mix all the ingredients together.
Pour the mixture into a baking dish and cook for 45 minutes.
cb7e6bedc8.pred:
To make a delicious Pineapple pudding dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).

3. Add the baking powder and mix until well combined.

60a456e88d.gt:
In a medium saucepan of boiling water, cook the bulgur until al dente, about 10 minutes.
Drain well and cool.
In a large bowl, combine the bulgur with all of the remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper and mix well.

8d838c9253.gt:
Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray.
Add celery, carrot, and onion to pan; cook 12 minutes or until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add garlic; cook 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Add broth and next 4 ingredients (through pepper); bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, and simmer 12 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Add chicken to pan; cook 3 minutes or until chicken is done.
Sprinkle with cheese.

2. In a large oven-safe skillet or Dutch oven, heat 2 tablespoons of cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the thinly sliced celery, carrot, and onion, and cook until the vegetables are tender but not browned, about 5 minutes.

6. Season the stew with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the stew to a large oven-safe casserole dish.
8. Sprinkle the shaved Parmesan cheese over the top of the stew.

10. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh parsley, if desired.

This savory Chicken, Pasta, and Chickpea Stew dish is a delicious and comforting meal that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. The combination of tender chicken, hearty pasta, and the nutty flavor of chickpeas creates a satisfying and balanced meal. 0eeb43444a.gt:
Steam the cauliflower florets for 10 minutes or until tender.
In a small skillet over medium heat, saute garlic in hazelnut oil or coconut oil, just until fragrant.
Add all of the ingredients into a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve over gluten-free noodles, spaghetti squash, veggie sticks, spuds, kale chips or Vegan Shepherds Pie On The Fly.
0eeb43444a.pred:
To make a delicious Cauliflower Cheese Sauce (Dairy-Free) dish, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Rinse the cauliflower and pat it dry with paper towels.
3. Core the cauliflower and cut it into florets, reserving the core for another use.
4. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat.
5. Add the minced garlic and sauté for a few seconds, until fragrant.
6. Add the cauliflower florets to the skillet and sauté for 5-7 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly browned.
7. In a small bowl, mix the marinated artichoke hearts, honey mustard, salt, and pepper to taste.
8. Add the artichoke mixture to the cauliflower in the skillet and stir to combine.
9. Pour the mixture into a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the cauliflower is tender and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
10. Serve the Cauliflower Cheese Sauce (Dairy-Free) hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower, cored and cut into florets
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon hazelnut oil, coconut oil, or avocado oil
- 1/2 teaspoon pepper
- 3 tablespoons chopped marinated artichoke hearts
- 1-1/2 tablespoons Annie's Honey Mustard
- 1/2 teaspoon salt

[/INST]

643060cd52.gt:
Throw all ingredients into a bowl and combine!
(You can add 3tsp of Cacao powder for a slight chocolatey flavour)
643060cd52.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the peanut butter, casein protein powder, and honey. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the cubed small dates and water to the mixture, and stir until the dough comes together.
4. Using a small cookie scoop, form the dough into balls. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.

3d9830c9de.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine all the ingredients except for the artichoke bottoms and the beef broth.
Divide and mound the meat mixture on the artichoke bottoms, about 4 tablespoons each.
In a well greased baking pan, place the filled artichokes, filled side up, in one layer.
Pour the broth over the whole thing.
Bake, lightly covered with foil, for 1 1/2 hours.
Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes, until browned.
Serve hot.
3d9830c9de.pred:
To prepare a delicious Stuffed Artichokes, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the lean ground beef, mushrooms, onion, and eggs. Season the mixture with salt, pepper, and thyme to taste.
3. Add the celery, tomato puree, water, and minced garlic to the bowl. Mix everything together until well combined.
4. Place the mixture in a large baking dish and bake for about 45 minutes, or until the filling is cooked through and the edges are slightly browned.
5. While the filling is cooking, prepare the artichoke bottoms. If using fresh artichoke bottoms, trim the ends and remove the tough outer leaves. If using frozen artichoke bottoms, follow the package instructions for preparation.
6. After the filling is cooked, carefully remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
7. Carefully stuff the cooked filling into the artichoke bottoms, dividing the mixture evenly among the artichokes.
8. Pour the beef broth over the stuffed artichokes, making sure to cover them completely.
9. Return the baking dish to the oven and bake for another 25-30 minutes, or until the artichokes are tender and the filling is hot and bubbly.

Enjoy your delicious Stuffed Artichokes!

5baa4c01a1.gt:
Mix coffee and syrups together in a mug.
Fill with steamed milk.
Add a bit of foamed milk on top.
5baa4c01a1.pred:
To make a delicious Milky Way Cappuccino, follow these steps:

1. In a saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until it reaches a temperature of 160°F (71°C).
2. While the milk is heating, combine the espresso, chocolate syrup, and caramel syrup in a separate saucepan. Whisk the mixture until smooth.
3. Once the milk has reached the desired temperature, slowly pour it into the espresso mixture while whisking continuously.

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.

3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and mix well.
5. Gradually add the flour, baking powder, and salt, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the mashed bananas and butter, then the strawberry preserves.
7. Divide the batter evenly among the prepared cupcake liners.
8. Bake the cupcakes for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cupcakes to cool completely in the pan before frosting.
10. To make the frosting, beat the softened butter and confectioners sugar until smooth and creamy.
11. Add the vanilla extract and milk, and continue to beat until the desired consistency is reached.
12. Spread the frosting evenly over the cooled cupcakes.
13. Garnish with fresh strawberries, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Banana Cupcakes with Strawberry Frosting!

c5f32e3595.gt:
Rinse a Collins glass by swirling absinthe inside it, just enough to coat the sides; discard excess.
Combine gin, jam, fennel syrup, lemon juice and bitters in a shaker with ice, and shake.
Add ice to the prepared glass, and into that strain the contents of the shaker.

364e4fdc52.gt:
Melt butter, add flour, salt, and pepper, wisk until smooth.
Add milk slowly, whisking to blend.
Cook until thick and smooth, add cheese and stir until melted.
Cook elbow noodles as directed on package.
Drain and pour into a baking dish.
Pour cheese sauce over cooked elbows.
Bake at 350F for 15 minutes or until lightly browned.

1. In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat.

4. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

6. Add the cooked elbow macaroni to the saucepan, stirring to combine.
7. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Cook the macaroni and cheese mixture for about 5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the pasta is heated through.
9. Serve the Mom's Macaroni & Cheese immediately, and enjoy!

887374647e.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Lightly grease one 9x13 inch pan.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, flour, baking soda, vanilla, butter or margarine, honey and brown sugar.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Lightly press mixture into the prepared pan.

Let cool for 10 minutes then cut into bars.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the oats, flour, baking soda, and vanilla.
3. In a separate bowl, melt the butter and honey together.
4. Add the melted butter and honey mixture to the dry ingredients, stirring until well combined.
5. Fold in the mini chocolate chips.
6. Press the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.

8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into bars.
9. Enjoy your delicious Chewy Granola Bars!

[/INST]

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter with the graham cracker crumbs. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom and up the sides of a springform pan.

a79407fd69.gt:

Stir in almond extract, sweeten to taste and serve.

Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.

bake at 400* for 20 minutes or golden.
remove from pan to wire rack immediately.

Soften cream cheese and mix well with sour cream, cheese and salsa.

Saute onions and celery
Add chicken powder & 4 cups of water add chicken pieces (wingdings) & cook on med high for 45mins

Cook rice as it states on the box

mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.

c799c55881.gt:
Combine the sun-dried tomatoes, parsley, butter, and Tabasco in a medium bowl and mix into a uniform paste.

Place 8 slices of the toasted bread on a work surface.

Set the remaining 4 unbuttered bread slices aside.
Place 2 pieces of bacon each on the buttered sides of 4 of the bread slices.
Top the bacon with 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich.
Top the arugula with a slice of the unbuttered bread.
Place a quarter of the sardines on top of each unbuttered piece of bread and season with pepper.
Top the sardines with another 1/4 cup of the arugula per sandwich, and finish with a slice of buttered bread, buttered-side down.
Slice each sandwich in half and serve.

5. In a large bowl, mix the sardines, bacon, arugula, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.

Boom.

f89bbed17a.gt:
Bring sweet potatoes and beets to a boil.
Slice sweet peppers lengthways.
Finely chop parsley.
Grate carrots and put aside in a bowl.

Chop up kale as finely as you can.

Add sweet corn and cream style corn to bowl and mix.
In greased dish add approximately half of mixture.
Then add a layer of cheddar cheese and add all of the feta cheese.
Add remainder of mixture and layer top with cheddar cheese.
Bake at 190C for 30-45minutes.
Enjoy!
:)

To prepare Corn pie a la carte, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Prepare the vegetables by washing and peeling them, if necessary.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the beets, sweet potatoes, sweet peppers, carrots, kale, parsley, salt, and pepper.

The essential ingredients for Corn pie a la carte include 5 beets, 6 sweet potatoes, 4 medium sweet peppers of varying color, 2 sprigs parsley, 4 stick carrots, 1 stick kale, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp ground black pepper, 1 can sweet corn (Green giant), 1 can cream style corn, 1 box evaporated milk, 3 tbsp soft table margarine/butter (low fat), 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese, and 2 cup grated cheddar cheese.

df3852f109.gt:
preheat the oven to 350F.

Add the lemon zest, lemon juice, 1/2 sugar, and 1/4 flour.
Toss well.
Gently mix in the blueberries.

Spoon mixture in a 8x11 baking dish.
For the crumble: combine 2 cups four, 2/3 cup sugar, 1/2 cup light brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, and 2 sticks of salted butter in a bowl.
Mix the ingredients with an electric mixer.
Mix until the butter is the size of a peas.
Rub the mixture with your fingertips until it's in big crumbles, then sprinkle evenly over the fruit mixture.
bake for 45 to 60 minutes, until the tips are brown and crisp and the juices are bubbly.
Serve warm or room temperature.

a562032555.gt:
Mix the flour and salt in a large mixing bowl with a wooden spoon.
In another large bowl, empty the yeast package, then slowly add the warm water, mixing with a fork to fully dissolve the yeast.
When the yeast mixture forms some bubbles, add the mixture to the flour/salt, then add the three eggs.
Mix the batter, then set the bowl on top of your refrigerator (or other warm place), cover with damp dish towel.
After 20 minutes, check the dough for rising, mix again and let rise for another 20 minutes.
In a saucepan, heat the oil to medium heat.
Add the dough by the spoonful (about the size of 2 golf balls) Experiment with the first batch to make sure the oil is not too hot.
Remove when golden brown and place on paper bags to absorb the oil.
Place warm Zeppoles in a paper bag with powdered sugar and SHAKE.
Cover with powdered sugar.

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn oil, flour, yeast, warm water, eggs, salt, and powdered sugar. Mix until the dough comes together.
2. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
3. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
4. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
5. Punch down the dough and roll it out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter, or use a spoon to create a hole in the center of each piece.
7. Heat some oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Carefully place the Zeppoles in the hot oil, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown.
8. Remove the Zeppoles from the oil and place them on a wire rack to drain and cool.

These steps will help you create delicious Zeppoles using the ingredients provided. Remember to be cautious while handling hot oil and to ensure that the dough is cooked evenly for a perfect result.

Unroll dough on lightly floured surface and press seams together.
Sprinkle one side of block of cream cheese with enough dill to cover.

Put all the ingredient in a slow cooker and mix thoroughly.
Cover and cook on high until apples are tender, about 3 hours.

This recipe provides a simple and delicious way to enjoy caramelized apples using a slow cooker. The combination of apples, brown sugar, butter, cinnamon, and nutmeg creates a warm, comforting, and sweet dish that can be enjoyed year-round.

dd261ac85d.gt:
