3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, rice vinegar mixture, and the dried seaweed (kombu).
4. Mix well to ensure the rice is evenly coated with the flavorful mixture.
5. If desired, add the optional ingredient, such as a small piece of fresh ginger, to enhance the flavor.
6. Serve the Sushi Rice immediately, or refrigerate it for up to 24 hours before serving.

By following these steps, you can create a delicious and satisfying Sushi Rice dish that is both easy to prepare and enjoyable to eat.

2878092da0.gt:
Combine all dry ingredients with a whisk.
In a separate bowl whisk all wet ingredients together.
Combine wet ingredients into dry by using a wooden spoon or spatula.
Batter needs to be very thick and lumpy -- This is correct.
Make sure that you either use a griddle set at 350 degrees or a cast iron skillet over medium heat.
(make sure that you put 2 tsp of cooking oil in the skillet before you start.
Once you start you don't need to add any cooking oil.
Cooking spray may be acceptable.
).
Using a 1/3 cup pour batter onto griddle using a swirling motion to flatten out.
When the batter starts to bubble, flip the pancake.
To keep warm we store them in a tortilla warmer.
For left overs they can be frozen, just place wax paper in between cakes and freeze in a zip lock.
When you want one just pull out and microwave.
2878092da0.pred:
To make a delicious Bryan's Buttermilk Pancakes dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine 14 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1 tablespoon of sugar, and 12 teaspoons of baking soda.
2. Add 12 teaspoons of salt, 3 tablespoons of cooking oil, and one egg to the dry ingredients.
3. Gradually mix in 1 cup of buttermilk until a smooth batter forms.
4. Preheat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium heat.
5. Pour the batter onto the pan, using a ladle or a spoon, to create evenly sized pancakes.
6. Cook the pancakes until they are golden brown on both sides and the edges are slightly crispy.
7. Serve the pancakes warm, with your favorite toppings, such as butter, syrup, or fruit.

The key ingredients in this recipe are flour, baking powder, sugar, baking soda, salt, cooking oil, egg, and buttermilk. These ingredients work together to create a delicious and fluffy pancake batter that is perfect for enjoying with your favorite toppings.

2fe8920d7b.gt:
Mix the one cup plus the two tablespoons of wheat gluten, oat flour, salt and soy protein powder in a large bowl.
You want to sift and combine the ingredients well.
I put mine in the bowl of my stand mixer and used the whisk to sift them together.
Heat the silk creamer to slightly warm and then add the warm water and egg, mixing well as you add the egg so it doesn't cook.
Add the oil to the bottom of the bread machine.
Then add into that your cream, water and egg mixture.
Carefully add the flour mixture to it floats on the top of the liquid.
I sprinkled some of it on top so it wouldn't go into the liquid, then I slowly spooned the rest on top.
Sprinkle the yeast packet evenly on top of the flour mixture.
Set according to your bread machine instructions.
I have a Breadman and I used setting 7 which is a 59 minute cycle.
It has only one rising and is perfect for this bread.
Cool completely on a metal rack.
Bon Appetit.
2fe8920d7b.pred:
[INSTRUCTIONS]
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the warm water, soy coffee creamer, and vegetable oil.
2. Add the liquid egg substitute and sea salt, and mix until well combined.
3. Gradually add the vital wheat gluten, mixing until smooth.
4. Add the oat flour, powdered soy protein concentrate, and fast rising yeast, mixing until well combined.
5. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it reaches a smooth and elastic consistency.
6. Place the dough in a lightly oiled bowl, cover it with a damp cloth, and let it rise in a warm place for about 1-2 hours, or until it has doubled in size.
7. Preheat your oven to 350'F (175'C).
8. Punch down the dough, and then shape it into a loaf on a lightly floured surface.
9. Place the loaf in a greased and floured loaf pan, and let it rise for another 30-60 minutes, or until it has reached the desired level of doneness.
10. Bake the loaf in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until it is golden brown and sounds hollow when tapped.
11. Remove the loaf from the oven, and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing it and serving.

[/INSTRUCTIONS]

[/SYS]

6a3e3c9a3b.gt:
Soften butter, add sugar and eggs, stir till creamy.
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Fold dry ingredients into creamy mixture.
Blend in almonds, raisins, lemon.
Add needed milk.
Pour into greased cake form/angel food cake pan.
Bake at 350 F for 30 to 40 minutes.
Remove from oven and cool.
If you wish to add a glaze use recipe below.
To create a glaze, combine 3 cups of powdered sugar, 3/4 cup of milk, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, and the zest (grated skin) of 1 orange in a large bowl.
Drizzle glaze on top of Gugelhopf and enjoy!
6a3e3c9a3b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
3. Add the milk, melted butter, and lemon zest and juice to the dry ingredients. Mix until a smooth dough forms.
4. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
5. Cover the dough and let it rest for about 30 minutes.
6. After the dough has rested, roll it out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
7. Cut the dough into circles using a cookie cutter or a round glass.
8. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake the Gugelhopf for about 25-30 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
10. Allow the Gugelhopf to cool for a few minutes on the baking sheet, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

a106242e0e.gt:
Preheat oven 350 degrees F.
Salt the zucchini lightly and let it sit for 15 minutes.
Squeeze out all the excess moisture using your hands.
I usually put enough into my palm and and squeeze.
Repeat as necessary.
Combine all crust ingredients except the olive oil, and spread into an olive oiled 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Bake 20-25 minutes until the surface is dry and firm.
Brush the top with olive oil and broil it, under moderate heat for 5 minutes.
Do not let it burn.
Spread the pizza or tomato sauce evenly over the crust and scatter olives, green peppers, onions, mushrooms, artichoke hearts, mozzarella cheese, Swiss cheese, and Parmesan cheese over the crust or use your own topping of choice and bake in a 350 F oven for about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from oven and scatter fresh basil leaves.
Return the pizza to oven and bake for additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot, cut into squares.
Eaten with fork and knife.
a106242e0e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 450°F (232°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the grated zucchini, eggs, flour, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, basil leaves, pepper, and olive oil. Mix well to form a smooth batter.
3. Spread the batter evenly on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
4. Bake the zucchini crust in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until it is golden brown and set.
5. Remove the crust from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Spread the pizza sauce or fresh tomato sauce evenly over the cooled crust.
7. Add the sliced green pepper, onion, mushroom, artichoke heart, mozzarella cheese, swiss cheese, and parmesan cheese on top of the sauce.
8. Return the pizza to the oven and bake for 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the crust is golden brown.
9. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

ca41742e50.gt:
Mix shortening, sugar and egg thoroughly.
Stir in pineapple.
Mix flour, baking soda, salt, nutmeg, and nuts.
Add to pineapple mixture.
Chill at least one hour.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Drop by teaspoonfuls on lightly greased cookie sheet, about 2 inches apart.
Bake for about 8 to 10 minutes, or until no imprint is made when touched lightly.
Variations: Add one cup of coconut (omit nutmeg) or add one cup of raisins, if desired
ca41742e50.pred:
To make a delicious Pineapple Cookies II dish, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the shortening and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and pineapple mixture, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, salt, and nutmeg.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until well combined.
6. If desired, fold in the chopped walnuts.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a greased or parchment-lined baking sheet.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden and the cookies are set.
9. Remove from the oven and let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Pineapple Cookies II!

97bb525c81.gt:
Heat 6 tablespoons olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and saute until deep golden brown, about 20 minutes; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Transfer onions to large bowl; mix in prunes, dates, apricots, sugar, and cinnamon.
Do ahead Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover and chill.
Preheat oven to 350F Spread fruit mixture over bottom of large roasting pan.
Tuck chicken wing tips under.
Rub each chicken with 1/2 tablespoon remaining olive oil and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric.
Sprinkle each with salt and pepper; place chickens, side by side, atop fruit mixture.
Pour 11/2 cups water around chickens.
Roast chickens 1 hour.
Turn pan around; add more water to fruit mixture by 1/4 cupfuls if beginning to dry.
Continue to roast chickens until brown and juices run clear when thigh is pierced, about 45 minutes.
Transfer chickens to carving board; let stand 10 minutes.
Spoon fruit onto platter; top with chickens and any accumulated juices.
Sprinkle with almonds and serve.
97bb525c81.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the 7 tablespoons of olive oil, sugar, ground cinnamon, and turmeric.
3. Season the chickens with salt and pepper, then place them in the prepared bowl. Toss the chickens to coat them evenly with the marinade.
4. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. In a large roasting pan, combine the onions, prunes, dates, apricots, and almonds.
6. Drain the chickens, discarding the marinade, and pat them dry.
7. Place the chickens on top of the vegetables in the roasting pan.
8. Pour the water over the chickens and vegetables, making sure to cover everything.
9. Roast the chickens in the preheated oven for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until the chickens are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
10. Remove the chickens from the oven and let them rest for 10-15 minutes before carving and serving.

[/INST]

The Roast Chicken With Dried Fruit and Almonds is a delicious and hearty meal that can be enjoyed with family and friends. The combination of the tender chicken, flavorful vegetables, and the sweetness of the dried fruits and almonds creates a satisfying and comforting dish.

d1a0efbcd6.gt:
Combine flour, salt and baking powder.
Beat eggs with milk and add melted shortening.
Combine the 2 mixtures lightly.
Drop from tablespoon into shallow shortening or oil heated to 365 degrees.
Fry until brown and cooked in center, 4 to 5 minutes.
Drain on absorbent paper.
Optionals: - 1 1/2 cups whole cooked corn for corn fritters - 1 cup apples for apple fritters - 1 cup cooked, chopped shrimp for shrimp fritters
d1a0efbcd6.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, salt, and baking powder.
3. Add the eggs, milk, and melted vegetable shortening or oil, and mix until a smooth batter is formed.
4. Heat a large frying pan or skillet over medium heat.
5. Pour the batter into the pan, creating small pancakes or fritters. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
6. Transfer the fritters to a wire rack or plate lined with paper towels to drain any excess oil.
7. Serve the fritters warm, with your favorite dipping sauce or topping.

[/INST]

0062ecba72.gt:
COMBINE flour, baking soda and salt in small bowl.
Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar and vanilla in large mixer bowl.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition; gradually beat in flour mixture.
Stir in morsels and nuts.
Drop by rounded tablespoon onto ungreased baking sheets.
BAKE in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 9 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Let stand for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
PAN COOKIE VARIATION: PREPARE dough as above.
Spread into greased 15"x10" jelly-roll pan.
Bake in preheated 375-degree [Fahrenheit] oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool in pan on wire rack.
FOR HIGH ALTITUDE BAKING (>5,200 feet): INCREASE flour to 2 1/2 cups; add 2 teaspoonfuls water with flour; reduce both granulated sugar and brown sugar to 2/3 cup each.
Bake at 375 degrees Fahrenheit, drop cookies for 8 to 10 minutes and pan cookies for 17 to 19 minutes.
0062ecba72.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the brown sugar and vanilla extract, mixing well after each addition.
6. Stir in the chopped nuts.
7. Fold in the Nestle Toll House Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
10. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

The process of preparing scrumptious Toll House Cookies involves several steps. First, preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Next, cream the softened butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy, then add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the brown sugar and vanilla extract, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the chopped nuts. Fold in the Nestle Toll House Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

87047dd9ed.gt:
Butter an 8x8 inch (20cmx20cm) pan or line it with parchment paper leaving a 2-inch/5 cm paper overhang on two sides.
In a bowl, mix together the crushed cookie crumbs, melted butter and sugar.
Transfer to the pan and press it down lightly and evenly with your fingers to cover the entire bottom of the dish.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
In a large microwave safe bowl combine condensed milk, butter and salt.
Microwave on high for 3 minutes.
Remove bowl from the microwave.
It will be very bubbly.
Add the chocolate chips or chopped chocolate.
Stir well until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is really smooth.
Add the lemon curd, lemon juice, lemon extract and lemon zest.
Mix one more time.
Pour the lemon mixture on top of the cookie crust and spread evenly to the edges of the prepared pan.
Smooth the top.
Sprinkle marshmallows on top and press lightly to make sure it will stick to the bars.
Refrigerate or freeze until completely set.
Using the parchment paper overhangs, lift bars from pan and transfer to a cutting board.
Use a kitchen torch to lightly brown the marshmallows if you want to and then cut into 25 squares.
Eat them all or try not to!
87047dd9ed.pred:
[/INST]

[INST]To make the crust, combine the melted butter, light brown sugar, and graham cracker crumbs in a small bowl. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to set.

To make the filling, combine the melted butter, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, lemon extract, and lemon zest in a medium bowl. Whisk until smooth.

Spread the lemon curd mixture evenly over the crust.

Sprinkle the white chocolate chips evenly over the lemon curd layer.

Refrigerate the pie bars for at least 2 hours or until the white chocolate chips are set.

To serve, cut the pie bars into bars and enjoy!

[/INST]

[/INST]

[INST]These No-Bake Lemon Meringue Pie Bars are a delicious and easy dessert that combines the flavors of lemon, meringue, and white chocolate. The crust provides a sturdy base, while the filling and topping add a delightful contrast of textures and flavors. The combination of graham cracker crumbs and white chocolate chips creates a satisfying crunch, while the lemon curd and meringue add a zesty, sweet, and creamy touch. These bars are perfect for a crowd-pleasing dessert or a special treat for yourself. Enjoy!

[/INST]

68e304f2da.gt:
Spread muffin halves with sauce; top with cheese.
Place on microwaveable plate.
Microwave on HIGH 30 to 40 sec.
or until cheese is melted.
68e304f2da.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Spread a thin layer of Classico di Napoli Tomato & Basil Pasta Sauce on one side of the split English muffin.
3. Sprinkle a generous amount of Touch of Philadelphia Shredded Creamy Mozza Cheese on the other side of the split English muffin.
4. Place the sauce-covered side of the English muffin on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
5. Bake the English Muffin Pizza in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious English Muffin Pizzas!

bac8cfe474.gt:
Microwave peanut butter and chocolate in large microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1-1/2 min.
; stir until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended.
Add cereal; toss to evenly coat.
Spread into single layer on waxed paper-covered baking sheets; separate cereal pieces.
Cool completely.
Transfer cereal mixture to clean brown paper bag or large resealable plastic bag.
Add sugar; close bag.
Shake gently to evenly coat cereal mixture with sugar.
bac8cfe474.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the creamy peanut butter and powdered sugar. Mix well.
3. Add the oven-toasted rice cereal squares to the bowl and mix until well coated.
4. In a separate bowl, melt the BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate over low heat.
5. Pour the melted chocolate over the rice cereal mixture and mix until well combined.
6. Spread the mixture onto a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for about 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chocolate is melted and the mixture is well combined.
8. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Using a spatula, spread the mixture evenly over the baking sheet.
10. Allow the mixture to cool completely before breaking it into small pieces.

Enjoy your Puppy Chow!

399c8a1881.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 deg Celsius.
Less for fan-forced.
Line 2 trays with non-stick paper.
In a small bowl cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.
Add egg yolk & beat well.
Sift together flour, soda, salt and nutmeg.
Fold half the sour cream and half the dry ingredients into the butter mixture.
Fold in remaining halves.
Mix well to combine.
With floured hands roll teaspoonfuls of mixture into small balls and place on prepared trays.
Press lightly on top with a fork.
Bake in oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until pale golden in colour.
Cool slightly on trays before moving to wire racks to cool.
Dip tops of biscuits in the Citrus Glaze.
Citrus Glaze: Combine icing sugar, juices and orange rind in a cup.
Place cup in saucepan of hot water, beat with fork until glossy.
Pour into a saucer to make icing the biscuits easier.
399c8a1881.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 175°C (350°F).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg yolk and vanilla extract, and mix well.
4. Sift together the flour, bicarbonate of soda, salt, and nutmeg.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Fold in the sour cream and lemon juice.
7. In a separate bowl, mix the icing sugar and orange rind.
8. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
9. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Sour Cream Cookies!

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.
1e5cac3aa5.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Place the beefsteak tomato slices on a baking sheet and drizzle them with extra virgin olive oil. Season the tomatoes with coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper.
3. Roast the tomatoes in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are slightly charred and tender.
4. While the tomatoes are roasting, prepare the avocado slices. Cut the avocado into 6 pieces, remove the pit, and season them with coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper.
5. Place the avocado slices on a separate baking sheet and drizzle them with extra virgin olive oil. Roast the avocado slices in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are slightly charred and tender.
6. Once the tomatoes and avocado are cooked, place them on a serving platter.
7. Slice the mozzarella cheese into small pieces and place them on top of the tomato and avocado slices.
8. Drizzle the balsamic vinegar over the cheese and tomato mixture.
9. Serve the Insalata Tricolore immediately.

[/INST]

This dish is a simple yet delicious salad that combines the flavors of roasted tomatoes, avocado, and mozzarella cheese. The combination of ingredients creates a satisfying and refreshing meal that can be enjoyed as a side dish or a light main course.

540bbf9ab0.gt:
For the muffins: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease 2 muffin tins.
In the bowl of a stand mixer, add butter and 1 cup sugar.
Cream for 3-5 minutes or until fluffy and pale in color.
Add the vanilla.
Add the eggs one a time, mixing after each addition.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cream of tartar, and nutmeg.
Add the flour mixture and sour cream alternately to the butter mixture, starting and ending with the flour.
Scrape down the bowl as needed.
Fold in the cinnamon chips.
In a small bowl, whisk together remaining 1 cup of sugar and tablespoons of cinnamon.
Using an ice cream scoop, scoop the batter into the cinnamon-sugar mixture and roll around to coat completely, making sure not to press your fingers into the batter while you roll.
Place the coated muffins into the prepared tins.
Bake for 20-22 minutes, or until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool in the pans for 5 minutes before removing them to a wire rack to cool completely.
For the glaze: In a small bowl, whisk together powdered sugar, vanilla and milk until smooth.
Drizzle the glaze over the warm muffins with a spoon or a fork.
540bbf9ab0.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, cream of tartar, nutmeg, cinnamon, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, alternating with the sour cream, and mix until just combined.
6. Fold in the cinnamon chips and cinnamon.
7. Divide the batter evenly among muffin cups in a muffin tin.
8. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
9. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INST]

[/INST]

These Glazed Snickerdoodle Muffins are a delicious and delightful treat, perfect for a morning or afternoon snack. The combination of the buttery, sweet glaze and the warm, cinnamon-y muffins creates a delightful balance of flavors. The cinnamon chips add a crunchy texture, while the nutmeg and vanilla extracts enhance the overall aroma and taste. These muffins are sure to be a hit with both children and adults alike.

903a5e2cd4.gt:
Pop Trader Joe's frozen brown rice in the microwave, or make a batch of rice the traditional way.
While rice is cooking, make the dressing by whisking together half of the chopped garlic, tahini, lemon zest, lemon juice, and 3 tbs.
olive oil.
Add the hot water to thin a bit, and then 2 teaspoons salt.
Set aside.
Add 3 tbs.
olive oil to a big skillet over medium-high heat, swirling to coat the pan.
Be sure the chickpeas are completely dry, or they'll spit at you during this next step!
Add the chickpeas and a sprinkling of salt.
Let the beans saute for a couple minutes, until they get a toasty little crust on them.
Add remaining garlic and onions.
Stir for a minute.
Stir in the asparagus with another pinch or two of salt, then cover with a lid for a minute to steam until the asparagus softens a touch.
Uncover and stir in the rice and almond slivers, reserving a few almonds for garnish.
Adjust seasonings, adding more salt if needed.
Serve family-style in a big bowl drizzled with a few tablespoons of the tahini dressing, letting each person add more dressing to their tastes.
Watch as this magical concoction disappears before your eyes!
903a5e2cd4.pred:
1. Cook the rice according to package instructions, using the appropriate amount of water.
2. In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, smashed garlic cloves, and lemon zest.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the tahini, lemon juice, and hot water.
4. Pour the tahini mixture over the rice mixture and stir to combine.
5. Add the chopped onion, asparagus, and slivered almonds to the rice mixture.
6. Season the rice mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Super-Quick Brown Rice With Asparagus, Chickpeas, and Almonds immediately.

[/INST]

50ad0077cb.gt:
Put all ingredients except the olive oil with the tuna steak to marinade.
Leave it for approximately 30 minutes to marinade (if you leave it longer it with take more in flavor but not necessary for this type.)
After marinating the tuna do not throw away the marinade you will use it as cooking liquid.
Start with a pan and place the olive oil to heat up, place in the tuna 1 minute per side to sear.
Return to low heat and leave it for 8 minutes per piece when the cooking liquid is getting low put some of the marinade.
It will enhance the taste and give it a great taste.
I decorated the plate with some coleslaw, tomatoes, lemon and deep fried potato shavings.
50ad0077cb.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, white wine, light soy sauce, and garlic cloves.
3. Season the tuna steak with salt and pepper.
4. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat, and add the tuna steak. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
5. Remove the tuna steak from the skillet and place it on a baking sheet.
6. Pour the olive oil mixture over the tuna steak, making sure it is evenly coated.
7. Roast the tuna steak in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the tuna steak from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

This Tuna Steak dish is delicious and easy to prepare, with a combination of flavors from the olive oil, white wine, light soy sauce, and garlic. The lemon juice adds a touch of brightness to the dish, making it a delightful and satisfying meal.

806674c46d.gt:
In a large bowl combine strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, raspberries and currants.
Sprinkle with sugar and gently stir in fennel.
Refrigerate for about 20 minutes.
Serve cold.
806674c46d.pred:
To create a delicious Summer Berry Compote, follow these steps:

1. Wash and sanitize all fruits and vegetables thoroughly.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, raspberries, and red currants.
3. Add the white sugar and fennel greens to the saucepan.
4. Cook the mixture over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the fruit is soft and the sugar has dissolved. This should take around 10-15 minutes.
5. Once the fruit is soft and the sugar has dissolved, remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully transfer the mixture to a blender or food processor, and blend until smooth.
7. Pour the compote into a clean, sterilized jar or container, and store in the refrigerator.

Enjoy your homemade Summer Berry Compote as a refreshing and healthy dessert or topping for yogurt, oatmeal, or ice cream.

e6f5055f34.gt:
Melt butter and cook minced onion in it.
Add rice; brown lightly.
Combine other ingredients with rice mixture and bring to boil.
Cover; reduce heat and steam until liquid is absorbed.
If rice is not done, add more water sparingly.
e6f5055f34.pred:
To make a delicious Savory Rice With Mushrooms (Johnny Cash's Mother's Recipe) dish, follow these steps:

1. In a large saucepan, melt 1 stick of butter over medium heat.
2. Add 1 cube of butter (use a butter knife to measure the size of the cube) and cook until it melts and turns golden brown.
3. Add 1 bunch of minced green onion and cook for 1 minute.
4. Add 1 teaspoon of salt, 1 teaspoon of basil, and stir to combine.
5. Add 1 cup of uncooked rice to the saucepan and stir to coat the rice with the melted butter and seasonings.
6. Add 1 (10 1/2 ounce) can consomme and stir to combine.
7. Add 1 (8 ounce) can mushrooms with their liquid, and stir to combine.
8. Add 1 teaspoon of thyme and 1 cup of water to the saucepan.
9. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cover the saucepan.
10. Simmer the rice and mushrooms for 18-20 minutes or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.

After following these steps, you will have a delicious Savory Rice With Mushrooms (Johnny Cash's Mother's Recipe) dish.

18f9bb7f6e.gt:
Mix all ingredients except the Romaine and the whole croutons in a small bowl or a "cruet".
Toss with Romaine and croutons.
Serve with a sprinkle of fresh shredded parmesan.
18f9bb7f6e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Dijon mustard, and minced garlic.
3. Add the crushed parmesan cheese and croutons to the bowl and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, toss the torn romaine lettuce with the dressing.
5. Arrange the romaine lettuce on a serving platter or individual plates.
6. If desired, add minced anchovies to the salad for an extra burst of flavor.
7. Garnish the salad with croutons.
8. Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Sam's Caesar Salad.

ea87319f86.gt:
Roast the eggplant directly over a gas flame, turning occasionally, until charred all over and soft, about 12 minutes.
Transfer to a colander and let cool slightly, then peel and let cool completely.
Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, cook the garlic in the oil over moderate heat until sizzling, about 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat and whisk in the vinegar, honey, rosemary, oregano and minced parsley.
Season the vinaigrette generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a large cast-iron skillet.
In batches if necessary, add the piquillos to the skillet in an even layer.
Cook over high heat, turning once, until lightly charred on both sides, about 2 minutes total.
Add the piquillos to the warm vinaigrette and let cool completely.
In a food processor, combine the eggplant with both cheeses and puree until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the whipped eggplant on toasts and, using a slotted spoon, spoon some of the marinated piquillos on top.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve with anchovies.
ea87319f86.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into 1/2-inch (1.5 cm) thick rounds, and season them with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until softened, about 1 minute.
4. Add the eggplant to the skillet, and cook until it is tender and slightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.
5. In a small bowl, mix the red wine vinegar, honey, rosemary, oregano, and parsley. Pour the mixture over the eggplant in the skillet, and stir to coat the eggplant evenly.
6. Transfer the eggplant to a baking dish, and bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the eggplant is tender and slightly caramelized.
7. While the eggplant is baking, prepare the piquillo peppers. In a small bowl, mix the piquillo peppers with a small amount of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
8. Once the eggplant is cooked, let it cool for a few minutes.
9. In a small bowl, mix the cream cheese, goat cheese, minced parsley, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
10. Spread the cream cheese mixture on the toasted bread slices.
11. Top each toasted bread slice with a piquillo pepper slice, and garnish with chopped parsley.
12. Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Marinated Piquillo Pepper and Whipped Eggplant Toasts dish.

102a7a90be.gt:
In a large pot, heat the 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add the onion and garlic and cook over moderate heat until softened, 5 minutes.
Add the chiles and cook until sizzling, 1 minute.
Add the dandelion greens and cook, stirring, until wilted, 1 minute.
Add the stock and pecorino rind and bring to a boil.
Simmer over low heat until the greens are very tender, about 1 hour.
Season with salt.
Rub the grilled bread with the lemon.
Place a baguette slice in each of 6 bowls.
Ladle in the greens and broth, drizzle with olive oil and garnish with pecorino.
Serve with the remaining toasts.
102a7a90be.pred:
1. In a large skillet or pot, heat the 2 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until it is softened and translucent, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the garlic and cook for another 2 minutes, until fragrant but not browned.
3. Add the ancho and guajillo chiles, breaking them into smaller pieces as you add them. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chiles are softened and slightly charred.
4. Add the dandelion greens to the skillet, stirring to combine with the chiles and onions. Cook for 5-7 minutes, until the greens are wilted and tender.
5. Pour in the chicken stock or low-sodium broth, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the liquid has been absorbed and the greens are tender.
6. Remove the skillet from the heat and let it sit, covered, for 5 minutes.
7. Stir in the pecorino rind and shavings, and let it sit for another 5 minutes.
8. Serve the Braised Dandelion Greens over the grilled baguette slices, and garnish with a squeeze of lemon juice.

[/INST]

This recipe is a delicious and healthy way to enjoy dandelion greens, which are a nutritious and versatile ingredient. The combination of the garlic, chiles, and chicken stock creates a rich and flavorful sauce that complements the earthy taste of the dandelion greens. The pecorino rind and shavings add a unique and savory touch to the dish, while the lemon juice provides a burst of citrusy freshness. The grilled baguette slices serve as a perfect accompaniment, providing a crispy and slightly chewy texture that complements the tender greens. Overall, this dish is a delightful and satisfying meal that showcases the versatility and deliciousness of d

a89cd4ec7b.gt:
Sprinkle all ingredients over 2 full slabs of pork/ribs
Light your grill and let coals cool to about 300F as to not over seer meat and fortify optimal flavor for an good medium paced cook
When ribs are 20 mins from finished brush both sides of ribs and continue to cook until finished (BBQ sauce should not be messy) BBQ sauce added to enhance flavor not overwhelm ribs
a89cd4ec7b.pred:
To create dangerously good ribs, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).

2. Season the ribs with a mixture of onion powder, garlic powder, and seasoned salt. Make sure to coat the ribs evenly.

3. In a large bowl, mix the Italian dressing, ensuring that the ribs are coated evenly.

4. Place the ribs in a baking dish, and pour the Italian dressing mixture over them.

5. Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil, and bake the ribs in the preheated oven for 1-1.5 hours, or until the meat is tender and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).

6. Remove the foil, and let the ribs rest for a few minutes before serving.

7. Enjoy your dangerously good ribs!

Please note that these are general guidelines, and the actual cooking time and temperature may vary depending on the specific type of ribs and your oven.

e834a54d65.gt:
Bring 2 medium saucepans of salted water to a strong boil.
Add the squid to 1 saucepan and the shrimp to the other and boil until just cooked, about 1 minute for the squid and 3 minutes for the shrimp.
Drain the squid and shrimp and immediately transfer to a bowl of ice water to cool.
Drain again and pat dry.
In a large bowl, mix the lemon juice with the peanut oil, parsley, cilantro, garlic and jalapeno.
Add the mushrooms, shrimp and squid.
Season with salt and pepper and refrigerate until chilled, about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, using a sharp knife, peel the oranges, removing all the bitter white pith.
Working over a bowl, cut in between the membranes to release the sections.
Squeeze the juice from the membranes over the chilled seviche.
Arrange the orange sections and avocado wedges around the edge of a platter.
Using a slotted spoon, spread the seviche in the center.
Spoon some of the marinade over the oranges and avocados and serve immediately.
e834a54d65.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cleaned medium squid, large shrimp, and lemon juice. Allow the mixture to marinate for 15-20 minutes.

2. In a small bowl, whisk together the peanut oil, flat-leaf parsley, cilantro, minced garlic, and jalapeno.

3. After the squid and shrimp have marinated, drain the mixture and transfer it to a large skillet. Cook over medium heat until the squid is cooked through and the shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.

4. Add the mushrooms to the skillet and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.

5. Carefully add the peanut oil mixture to the skillet, stirring to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the flavors are well-mixed and the dish is heated through.

6. Season the seviche with salt and pepper to taste.

7. Serve the seviche immediately, garnished with chopped avocado wedges.

[/INST]

This recipe for Flash-Cooked Seviche with Mushrooms and Avocado is a delicious and healthy dish that combines the flavors of shrimp, mushrooms, and avocado. The combination of ingredients creates a well-rounded and satisfying meal, perfect for a light lunch or a refreshing appetizer. The use of the peanut oil mixture adds a rich and savory touch to the dish, while the lemon juice and fresh herbs provide a burst of citrusy flavor and aroma. The seviche is a versatile dish that can be customized with different types of seafood, vegetables, and spices to suit individual preferences.

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.
27e3ef474d.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients: 12 ounces of fresh blackberries, 33 ounces of plain Greek yogurt (I used FAGE 2%), one cup of honey, and one drop of vanilla extract, if desired.

2. In a large bowl, mix the Greek yogurt, honey, and vanilla extract, if using.

3. Gently toss the blackberries in the yogurt mixture to coat them evenly.

4. Transfer the blackberries to a freezer-safe container or a plastic bag, and freeze for at least 4 hours or overnight.

5. After the blackberries have frozen, use a fork to scrape the frozen yogurt mixture from the container or bag, and transfer it to a blender or food processor.

6. Blend the frozen yogurt mixture until smooth and creamy.

7. If desired, add a bit more honey or vanilla extract to taste.

8. Serve the Blackberry Frozen Yogurt immediately or store it in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

Enjoy your delicious Blackberry Frozen Yogurt!

6b99a23505.gt:
Peel the bulb of garlic, which should equal around 10 cloves.
I prefer to mash it finely with a mortal and pestle (the old-fashioned way) but feel free to use a food processor.
Combine the salt and garlic cloves in whatever manner you choose, and grind them up well.
Then prepare the boxed mashed potatoes as directed for the smallest serving possible.
(Youll need about 1/2 cup.
2-3 servings on a box of mashed potatoes is about 1 cup.
So feel free to take out a spoon and eat the other half of the mashed potatoes.)
Let the mashed potatoes cool.
Go back to the garlic, and add the mayonnaise, the lemon juice and about half of the oil (about 1/4 of a cup).
Blend together in processor or blender.
Then add about 1/4 cup of the mashed potatoes and half of the oil you have left (about 1/8 of a cup).
Blend more.
(You may need to stick a spoon down in there to ensure that it mixes thoroughly).
Now add the remainder of your mashed potatoes and oil.
Give it a good final blend.
You may need to add more oil or potatoes, depending on whether you want it thicker or thinner.
Serve with pita bread, pita chips, chicken kabobs, or my Kafta (Kofta) recipe that Ive posted here in my recipe box.
Enjoy!
6b99a23505.pred:
1. First, peel and chop the garlic bulb into small pieces.
2. In a large bowl, combine the garlic, salt, and mashed potatoes.
3. Add the mayonnaise, lemon juice, and canola oil, stirring to combine.
4. Refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight for the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the garlic dip with pita bread, crackers, or vegetables of your choice. Enjoy!

3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.
Before adding the flour, mix the salt and baking powder into the flour - then mix the flour mixture into the batter.
Pour the completed mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch x 13 inch cake pan.
Sprinkle some chopped nuts on top if desired.
Bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.
Let cool at least 15 minutes.
3e392f1d33.pred:
[/INST]

Grandma Woodall's Brownies:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chocolate squares, canola oil, sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
4. Add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the broken nuts, if using.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Grandma Woodall's Brownies!

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.
Place skewers onto grill, glaze-side up.
Grill 2-4 minutes or until browned.
Turn skewers; brush grilled side with about 1/3 glaze.
Continue grilling, turning often and brushing with glaze, 8-12 minutes or until meat reaches desired doneness.
56045e7740.pred:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter and hoisin sauce.
3. Season the beef with salt and pepper, then toss it in the butter and hoisin sauce mixture.
4. Thread the beef onto the skewers, alternating with pineapple and red bell pepper pieces.
5. Soak the skewers in water for 15-20 minutes to prevent them from burning on the grill.
6. Grill the skewers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the beef is cooked through and the pineapple and red bell pepper are slightly charred.
7. Serve the Grilled Orange Teriyaki Beef Skewers immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Grilled Orange Teriyaki Beef Skewers!

4f53760524.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Grease and flour a 8x8-inch baking pan.
Dissolve instant coffee in hot water.
Mix coffee with remaining ingredients together in a large bowl, until just moistened.
Spread into prepared pan.
Bake 25 minutes.
Cool in pan and cut into 9 bars.
4f53760524.pred:
[<INST>]
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x9 inch baking dish.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the shredded zucchini, chopped nuts, and slightly beaten egg.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the hot water, instant coffee granules, and granulated sugar. Add the baking powder and salt, and whisk until well combined.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Do not overmix.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bars comes out clean.
7. Allow the bars to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
8. Once cooled, cut the bars into desired sizes and serve.

[/INST]

These Zucchini Coffee Bars are a delicious and healthy alternative to traditional coffee cake. The combination of zucchini, nuts, and coffee provides a unique flavor profile, while the addition of baking powder and salt adds a touch of depth and complexity. These bars are perfect for a breakfast or snack option, and can be enjoyed by both coffee and non-coffee lovers alike.

85ca6d6ceb.gt:
Mix all of ingredients.
Cook like pikelets.
(Take a tablespoon of the batter at a time and drop in a frypan with butter and basically cook as if it were an American pancake - brown underneath and then turn over - should be a lot smaller than normal pancakes).
85ca6d6ceb.pred:
1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, and baking powder.
2. Add the beaten egg and melted butter to the dry ingredients, stirring until a smooth batter forms.
3. Gradually add the milk, stirring until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
4. Preheat a non-stick frying pan or griddle over medium heat.
5. Pour a small amount of batter onto the pan, spreading it evenly to form a thin, circular shape.
6. Cook the pikelet until the edges are golden brown and the center is set, then flip it and cook the other side.
7. Repeat with the remaining batter, spacing the pikelets apart on the pan to allow for even cooking.
8. Serve the cooked pikelets warm, either on their own or with your favorite toppings, such as butter, jam, or honey.

[/INST]

8ff16b99b6.gt:
Cream the butter and sugar
Beat in the egg
Add malt and beat together
Add the flour & salt if using and mix into a ball I changed to a spoon half way as mixture was going every where lol.
Put dough in the fridge for 30-60 minutes.
I left mine for 60.
This makes the dough easier to roll out.
10 minutes before you roll out the dough Pre heat oven to 150 & line a baking tray with greaseproof paper
Roll out the dough to the thickness of a 1 coin and cut out in rectangular shapes or squares,
Place on the tray and bake for 15-20 minutes until edges go lightly brown.
Mine took 18 minutes
Leave to cool a while on the tray before transferring to a cooling rack
Enjoy with a glass of milk or favourite brew.
8ff16b99b6.pred:
To make Proper Malted Milk Biscuits, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.

3. Add the egg and malt extract, and mix until well combined.

4. Gradually add the self-raising flour and salt, mixing until a soft dough forms.

5. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead it gently until smooth.

6. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.5 cm).

7. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a biscuit cutter or a round cookie cutter.

8. Place the biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.

9. Bake the biscuits in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown.

10. Allow the biscuits to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Proper Malted Milk Biscuits!

119cbf367b.gt:
In a glass, muddle sugar and lime together.
Fill the glass with ice, add juice and Cachaca.
Enjoy!
119cbf367b.pred:
1. Crush the lime wedges using a lime juicer or a rolling pin to release the juice.
2. In a cocktail shaker, combine the crushed lime wedges, sugar, and ice.
3. Shake the mixture well for about 15-20 seconds.
4. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Add the passion fruit juice and cachaca (or light rum) to the shaker, and shake again for about 15-20 seconds.
6. Strain the mixture into the glass filled with ice.
7. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve immediately.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

bd3bd0a131.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, cream together margarine, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Add to egg mixture, and mix well.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Instead of just dropping them onto the cookie sheet, I roll the cookies into balls - it makes them all look very uniform and nice!
Bake in preheated oven for 12 to15 minutes, or until light brown.
Cool on a wire rack.
bd3bd0a131.pred:
[INSTR]
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and the flour mixture alternately in three parts, beginning and ending with the flour mixture.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons onto a prepared baking sheet, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
8. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

[/INSTR]

[/INST]

6206f8059f.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan.
In a large bowl, combine butter, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, baking soda, baking powder and salt, beating till smooth.
Add the mashed bananas, jam, honey and eggs, again beating until smooth.
Add the flour, then the walnuts, stirring just until smooth.
Spoon batter into the prepared loaf pan, smoothing the top.
Let rest at room temperature for 10 minutes.
Bake bread for 45 minutes.
Gently lay a piece of aluminum foil across the top, to prevent over-browning.
Bake for an additional 20 to 25 minutes.
Remove the bread from the oven; a long toothpick or cake tester inserted into the center should come out clean, with the most a few wet crumbs clinging to it.
The tester shouldn't allow any sign of uncooked batter.
If it does, bake the bread an additional 5 minutes, or until it tests done.
Allow the bread to cool 10 minutes in the pan.
Remove it from the pan, and cool it completely on a rack.
6206f8059f.pred:
[INST]
To make Banana Bread, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x5 inch loaf pan.

In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the vanilla extract and cinnamon, and mix well. Add the nutmeg, baking soda, baking powder, and salt, and mix until well combined.

Add the mashed bananas, apricot jam or orange marmalade, and honey to the mixing bowl. Mix until well combined.

Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the flour and chopped walnuts until just combined.

Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, and smooth the top with a spatula.

Bake for 60-70 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the loaf comes out clean.

Remove the loaf from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, transfer the loaf to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Banana Bread!

[/INST]

5bcccb4e9b.gt:
Heat 1 Tbsp.
oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.
Add potatoes and red pepper, cook 8 to 10 min.
or until tender; transfer to bowl; set aside.
Meanwhile in small bowl, whisk eggs and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in skillet.
Add egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until eggs are almost set, lifting edge with spatula and tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to flow underneath.
When egg mixture is set but top is still slightly moist, top with potato mixture and cheese.
Slip spatula underneath omelette, tip skillet to loosen and gently fold omelette in half.
Cook 1 to 2 min.
Slide or flip onto serving plate; cut in half.
5bcccb4e9b.pred:
1. Preheat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
2. In a small bowl, whisk together the 2 Tbsp. of oil, 1/4 tsp. black pepper, and a pinch of salt.
3. Add the diced Yukon gold potatoes to the bowl with the oil mixture, tossing to coat evenly.
4. Spread the potatoes evenly in the preheated skillet or frying pan. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.
5. Add the chopped red pepper to the skillet, stirring to combine with the potatoes. Cook for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the red pepper is tender.
6. Crack the eggs into the skillet, stirring gently to scramble them with the potatoes and red pepper. Cook for about 3-5 minutes, or until the eggs are cooked through and the mixture is well combined.
7. Add the Cracker Barrel Shredded Double Cheddar Cheese to the skillet, stirring gently to melt the cheese and combine with the other ingredients. Cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the omelette is heated through.
8. Serve the Cheesy Country Omelette immediately, garnished with fresh chopped parsley if desired.

[/INST]

4edb974667.gt:
Pre-heat broiler.
Prepare pan with non stick spray.
in a small bowl combine chili powder, paprika, cumin, pepper, & cinnamon.
Place steak on wax paper, sprinkle cinnamon mixture over both side of steak.
Let stand for 15 minutes.
Broil steal 5" from heat for approx 6 minutes on each side.
Slice steak against grain.
4oz per serving.
4edb974667.pred:
1. First, preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Season the London Broil with salt and pepper.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the chili powder, paprika, black pepper, ground cinnamon, and cumin.
4. Rub the spice mixture all over the London Broil, making sure to cover it evenly.
5. Place the London Broil in a baking dish, and roast it in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until it reaches your desired level of doneness.
6. Remove the London Broil from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
7. Serve the sliced London Broil with your favorite side dishes, such as rice, noodles, or a salad.

[/INST]

c3f6522e48.gt:
Pour the rum and pineapple juice into a cocktail mixing cup, and stir to combine.
Gently pour the strawberry soda into the mixture, pouring down the side of the mixing cup to prevent the soda from going flat.
Slowly tilt the mixing cup back and forth a few times to mix; pour into cocktail glasses.
c3f6522e48.pred:
1. In a blender, combine 10 fluid ounces of coconut flavored rum, 6 fluid ounces of pineapple juice, and 16 fluid ounces of strawberry-flavored soda (such as Crush Strawberry).
2. Blend the ingredients until smooth and well-combined.
3. Pour the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
4. Garnish the drink with a slice of pineapple and a strawberry slice.
5. Enjoy your Pink Crush!

This delightful Pink Crush is a refreshing and fruity cocktail that combines the flavors of coconut rum, pineapple juice, and strawberry soda. The blender ensures that the ingredients are well-mixed and smooth, while the ice and garnish add a touch of elegance and visual appeal to the drink.

e55ff056b8.gt:
1.
Mix soy sauce, lime juice, vegetable oil, chili garlic sauce and ketchup.
2.
Add chicken breasts to mixture and refrigerate for at least 6 hours.
3.
Remove from refrigerator and season chicken with salt and pepper.
4.
Place on a hot grill or bake in a 400 degree oven until cooked completely through.
A meat thermometer should read at least 155-160 degrees.
5.
Mix mayonnaise and Thai chili sauce.
Both the Thai chili sauce and the chili garlic sauce should be available in the Asian food section of the grocery store.
4.
Brush 1 Tbl of the mayonnaise-Thai chili sauce mixture over each hamburger bun.
5.
Place chicken on the bun and serve with lettuce and tomato.
e55ff056b8.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken breasts with the Thai sweet chili sauce, chili-garlic sauce, and mayonnaise. Allow the chicken to marinate for at least 30 minutes.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the ketchup, lime juice, vegetable oil, and soy sauce. Season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken to the skillet and cook until it is fully cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
5. Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes.
6. While the chicken is resting, place the hamburger buns on a baking sheet and toast them in the oven for about 2-3 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
7. To assemble the sandwiches, place a cooked chicken breast on each bun, and then spread a layer of the ketchup-soy sauce mixture on top of the chicken.
8. Serve the Thai Chicken Sandwiches immediately. Enjoy!

27d1b89ffe.gt:
For the dressing: In a small bowl, add Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, ranch seasoning and milk.
Mix until combined; refrigerate until ready to use.
For the salad: Divide romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, tomato, cucumber, avocado and chicken among plates.
Top with barbecue ranch dressing.
27d1b89ffe.pred:
1. In a large bowl, combine the cooked chicken, shredded romaine lettuce, corn, black beans, and diced plum tomatoes.
2. In a small bowl, mix the Greek yogurt, barbecue sauce, and seasoning packet.
3. Add the yogurt mixture to the large bowl with the chicken and vegetables, and toss everything together.
4. If desired, add milk to the bowl to achieve the desired consistency.
5. Toss the salad again to ensure everything is evenly coated with the dressing.
6. Serve the BBQ Chicken Salad immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

This BBQ Chicken Salad with BBQ Ranch Dressing is a delicious and healthy meal option that combines the flavors of barbecue and ranch dressing with the freshness of vegetables and protein from the chicken. The step-by-step procedure ensures that you can easily recreate this dish at home.

d3047450d6.gt:
Boil the water and pour a small amount in the teapot, swishing it around to warm the pot.
Combine the mint and green tea and sugar in the teapot, then fill it with the rest of the hot water.
Let the tea brew for three minutes.
Set out glasses for the tea.
A shot-glass is close to the slender glasses used in Morocco.
Fill just one glass with the tea, then pour it back in the pot.
Repeat.
This helps to dissolve and distribute the sugar.
Pour the tea.
You want a nice foam on the tea so always pour with the teapot a high distance above the glasses.
If you do not have at least a little foam on the top of the first glass, then pour it back into the teapot and try again until the tea starts to foam up nicely.
Garnish with the remaining sprigs of mint.
d3047450d6.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: 10 sprigs of fresh mint, green tea, sugar, and water.
2. In a large pot, combine the green tea, sugar, and water. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 5-10 minutes, or until the tea has infused and the sugar has dissolved.
3. While the tea is simmering, prepare the mint leaves by washing and drying them thoroughly.
4. Once the tea has infused and cooled slightly, strain it through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean pitcher or teapot.
5. Add the fresh mint leaves to the tea, stirring gently to release the mint's aroma and flavor.
6. Serve the Moroccan Mint Tea immediately, garnishing each cup with a sprig of fresh mint for added visual appeal and aroma.

[/INST]

f4cc4e5f98.gt:
Put the meat in the freezer for about 30 minutes, just until firm.
Slice it into strips about 1/4 inch thick across the grain.
Mix the other ingredients together in a bowl and mix well.
Let sit for 10 minutes.
Add the strips and marinade and store covered in the refrigerator overnight.
Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F. Place the strips on foil with the door propped open and dry the strips until they are pliable, 5-7 hours.
Store in a plastic container for up to 2 weeks.
Makes about 20-25 strips.
f4cc4e5f98.pred:
To cook a delightful Jerky dish, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the ingredients: Slice the Elk into thin strips, and chop the garlic and red pepper flakes.
2. Combine the ingredients: In a large bowl, mix the sliced Elk, Worcestershire sauce, red wine vinegar, salt, brown sugar, and cayenne pepper.
3. Marinate the ingredients: Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
4. Cook the Jerky: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil. Remove the marinated ingredients from the refrigerator and drain the excess liquid.
5. Cook the Jerky: Spread the marinated ingredients evenly on the prepared baking sheet. Roast the Jerky in the preheated oven for 1-1.5 hours, or until the meat is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 160°F (71°C).
6. Allow the Jerky to cool: Remove the Jerky from the oven and let it cool on the baking sheet for about 15-20 minutes.
7. Cut and serve: Once the Jerky has cooled, use a sharp knife to cut it into thin strips. Serve the Jerky as desired, either on its own or as part of a larger dish.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Jerky dish!

43c305486e.gt:
Combine butter and onion in small microwave-safe dish and cook on high for three minutes or until onion is soft and then stir it to make it sure it is combined.
Beat eggs with sour cream in a small cup or bowl and then pour over onion.
Cook on high about 1 1/2 minutes, stirring several times.
Sprinkle bacon along rim of dish and cook on high for 30 seconds.
43c305486e.pred:

9f7b08be0e.gt:
Preheat oven to 300 F. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment paper and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine oats, macadamia nuts, flax seed, wheat germ and salt.
Set aside.
In a small saucepan, combine brown sugar, honey and oil.
Cook over medium heat 2-3 minutes until sugar is dissolved.
Pour over the oat mixture, tossing gently to coat.
Bake for 45 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes, making sure not to burn the nuts.
Remove from the oven and let it cool.
Keep it flat and allow it to cool completely stirring a couple of times to break the mixture up.
Once cool, add the shredded coconut and the dried pineapple.
Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.

This Pina Colada Granola recipe combines the flavors of coconut, pineapple, and vanilla, creating a delicious and refreshing granola. The granola is made with a mix of oats, nuts, and seeds, providing a satisfying crunch and a nutritious boost. The addition of dried pineapple and coconut adds a sweet and tropical touch, while the sweetened shred

44b3907e95.gt:
Combine all the cupcake ingredients in a bowl and mix until smooth.
If you want them to be more pink, add a bit of red food coloring.
Fill lined cupcake tin 2/3 of the way full.
Bake cupcakes at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes.
Combine Frosting ingredients and beat until smooth.
When cupcakes are cooled, topped with frosting.
Top them off with a maraschino cherry.
44b3907e95.pred:
To make Think Pink Cherry Cupcakes, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.

3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.

4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the maraschino cherry juice, and mix until just combined.

8. Allow the cupcakes to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

9. Once the cupcakes are completely cooled, frost them with a generous layer of powdered sugar frosting.

10. If desired, use red food coloring to tint the frosting pink.

11. Decorate the cupcakes with additional maraschino cherries, if desired.

12. Serve and enjoy your Think Pink Cherry Cupcakes!

[/INST]

2af4ecd0e3.gt:
Mix butter, margarine, flour, sugar, vanilla together.
Keep dough in refrigerator overnight.
After the dough has refrigerated overnight, take it out of the fridge, and start making small balls (a little smaller than a golf ball I use a Tablespoon full) out of the dough.
After you make your balls, roll each one out into a flat disc, and add hoop cheese and nuts and a Tablespoon of preserves (or more if youd like) into the center of the disc.
Then roll the discs up.
Seal edges by pinching them together (you can add a little water too, if you need some adhesive) and bake at 350 degrees F until golden brown (roughly 8 10 minutes).
*Hoop cheese is also known as farmers cheese.
2af4ecd0e3.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and margarine together until smooth.
3. Add the flour and sugar, and mix until well combined.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract and hoop cheese or farmers cheese.
5. Gradually add the ground walnuts, mixing until well combined.
6. Add the preserves and mix until well combined.
7. Gradually add the ground walnuts, mixing until well combined.
8. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
9. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
10. Allow the Thrutkies to cool for a few minutes before cutting into squares.

[/INST]

[INST]<<SYS>>
Please note that this is a general guide and may not include all possible variations or adjustments based on individual preferences or dietary restrictions. Feel free to modify the recipe as needed to suit your specific needs.
<</SYS>>

b1e11bd33e.gt:
Toss zucchini and salt together in a large colander and place in sink to drain for 10 minutes.
Put zucchini in the middle of a piece of cheesecloth; wrap cheesecloth around zucchini and squeeze to drain as much moisture from zucchini as possible.
Mix flour, Parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, kosher salt, and pepper together in a large bowl.
Stir in zucchini.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Scoop batter by the tablespoon into the hot skillet and fry until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side.
b1e11bd33e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the zucchini, egg, grated Parmesan cheese, garlic, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour and olive oil.
4. Gradually add the flour mixture to the zucchini mixture, stirring until the batter is smooth and free of lumps.
5. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Using a spoon or a cookie scoop, scoop the batter and carefully drop it into the hot oil. Cook the fritters until they are golden brown on both sides, then transfer them to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until cooked through.
6. Serve the Easy Zucchini Fritters warm, with your favorite dipping sauce or topping.

[/INST]

a0561cb73c.gt:
Cook and stir mushrooms, onions and bacon in large skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 5 min.
Whisk eggs and milk until blended.
Add to ingredients in skillet; stir.
Cook 4 min.
or until eggs are set and no visible liquid remains, stirring occasionally.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Cover 4 salad plates with spinach; top with egg mixture and tomatoes.
a0561cb73c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, cook the sliced mushrooms and chopped onions over medium heat until the mushrooms are tender and the onions are translucent.
3. Add the peameal bacon to the skillet and cook until the bacon is crispy.
4. In a small bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, and Cracker Barrel Shredded Swiss Au Gratin Cheese.
5. Add the cooked mushrooms and onions to the skillet, and then pour the egg mixture over the top. Cook until the eggs are scrambled and cooked through.
6. Stir in the baby spinach leaves and chopped tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for about 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Serve the "Eggs-tremely" Good Bacon Scramble hot, garnished with additional chopped tomatoes if desired.

Enjoy your delicious homemade dish!

77d4a763dd.gt:
Add 1 tbsp oil into pan and add 1/2 tsp 'WK Seed Blend'
Cut the following into 1 1/2 inch long by 1/2 inch wide strips and set aside: - tofu (1 cup) - onions (1/2 cup) - tomatoes (1/2 cup) - bell pepper (1 cup)
Set to medium heat and heat oil into there is small movement in spices (usually 2 min)
Immediately add onions to pan; stir until golden brown (usually 3 min)
Add 2 tsp 'WK Sabji Blend' and 3/4 tsp salt (to your taste)
Add bell peppers and tomatoes to pan, stir; cover and cook for 3 min
Add tofu to pan; cover and cook for 3 min
Uncover pan and cook for 2 min
Optional: garnish with 2 tbsp coarsely chopped cilantro
For a full meal add: - Rice, naan, bread or heated whole wheat tortilla - Salad - Any bean curry - Yogurt - Red wine
77d4a763dd.pred:
1. First, prepare the tofu by draining it and pressing it to remove excess water. This step is important as it helps the tofu cook evenly and maintain its shape.
2. In a large bowl, combine the tofu, bell pepper, onion, and tomato.
3. Add the WK Seed Blend and WK Sabji Blend, along with the cooking oil of your choice. Mix well to ensure the spices are evenly distributed.
4. Season the mixture with salt, adjusting the amount to your taste.
5. Transfer the mixture to a non-stick pan and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
6. Cook the dish until the vegetables are tender and the tofu is cooked through. This may take around 15-20 minutes.
7. Once the vegetables are tender and the tofu is cooked, remove the pan from the heat and let it rest for a few minutes.
8. Serve the dish over rice or with your preferred side dish.

This dish is a delicious and healthy meal option, featuring tofu and bell peppers as the main ingredients. The WK Seed Blend and WK Sabji Blend add a unique flavor profile to the dish, enhancing its taste and making it a satisfying and enjoyable meal.

e05a7c1c5e.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F.
Stir together salt, allspice, and cayenne.
Pat pork dry and sprinkle spice rub all over pork, pressing to adhere.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown pork, 1 tenderloin at a time, on all sides, about 1 minute each.
Transfer as browned to a large roasting pan and arrange 2 inches apart.
Roast in middle of oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of each tenderloin registers 155F, 20 to 25 minutes.
Let pork stand 5 minutes before slicing.
e05a7c1c5e.pred:
To prepare Spiced Pork Tenderloin and Avocado Salsa, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork tenderloins with the coarse salt, ground allspice, and cayenne.
3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the pork tenderloins and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Transfer the pork to a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
5. Allow the pork to rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.

For the Avocado Salsa:
- 1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
- 1/2 red onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 red bell pepper, finely chopped
- 1/2 lime, juiced
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1/4 cup pineapple, diced
- 1/4 cup diced red onion
- 1/4 cup chopped red bell pepper
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1/4 cup pineapple juice
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste

To assemble the dish:
1. Combine the ingredients for the Avocado Salsa in a small bowl.
2. Serve the Spiced Pork Tenderloin with the Avocado Salsa on the side.

The essential ingredients for this dish include 2 1/2 tablespoons coarse salt, 1 tablespoon ground allspice, 1 tablespoon cayenne, 3 (3/4-pound) pork tenderloins, 1 tablespoon oil, and pineapple-Avocado Salsa.

ac2ebd1a37.gt:
Preheat oven to 450F.
Prebake fresh pizza crust, if using, for 3 to 4 minutes.
Remove from oven, and set aside to cool slightly.
Brush oil on crust.
Top crust with sauce and artichokes.
Sprinkle with soy mozzarella, goat cheese and sun-dried tomatoes.
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes.
Remove from oven, and serve.
ac2ebd1a37.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C).
2. Spread a thin layer of olive oil on the pizza crust, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust to cook properly.
3. In a small bowl, mix the pizza sauce, baby artichokes, and goat cheese.
4. Spread the pizza sauce mixture evenly over the pizza crust, leaving a small border around the edges.
5. Add the sun-dried tomatoes on top of the sauce mixture.
6. Sprinkle the mozzarella cheese evenly over the pizza.
7. Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/INST]

d1c9619b01.gt:
Mix and bake cake according to the package
In a large bowl combine and mix the evaporated, condensed and heavy cream...
When the cake is at room temperature pour the milks over the cake...slowly letting the cake absorb the milk...let it rest in the fridge for 2 to 4 hours and then frost the cake with the cool whip frosting and top it off with the cinammon and sprinkles...
Enjoy!!
!
d1c9619b01.pred:
[/INST]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the French Vanilla Cake Mix, evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy whipping cream. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the ground cinnamon and sprinkles to the mixture. Mix until the sprinkles are evenly distributed.
4. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan.
5. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the cake is cooled, use a sharp knife to slice it into equal portions.
8. To assemble the cake, place a layer of cake on a serving plate. Spread a layer of cool whip frosting over the cake. Repeat with another layer of cake and another layer of frosting.
9. Top the cake with the remaining cake layer.
10. Chill the cake in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or until the frosting is set.
11. Serve the Easy Three Milk Cake immediately.

[/INST]

This recipe for Easy Three Milk Cake (Tres Leches) requires the use of a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan, French Vanilla Cake Mix, evaporated milk, condensed milk, heavy whipping cream, ground cinnamon, and sprinkles. The cake is baked for 30-35 minutes, cooled, sliced, and assembled with layers of cake, frosting, and additional cake. The cake is then chilled in the refrigerator before serving.

59d1e62c4c.gt:
Heat a saucepan over medium heat.
Melt the butter and stir in the garlic and ginger.
Cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until the garlic is lightly browned.
Add the soy sauce, sake, pineapple juice, rice vinegar and brown sugar.
Bring up to a gentle boil and simmer for 3 minutes.
Whisk the water and the cornstarch together and then whisk mixture into the teriyaki sauce and simmer until thickened, 8 to 10 minutes.
Set aside.
Rinse the chicken wings and pat them dry.
Generously season the chicken with salt and black pepper.
Dredge the wings in flour, shaking off any excess flour, and set aside.
In a large saucepan or deep fryer, heat the oil to about 375.
Fry the chicken wings in small batches until golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes.
Shake off any excess oil and place on paper towels to drain.
Continue frying the chicken in batches until all of the wings are cooked.
Toss the wings in the teriyaki sauce and sprinkle with green onions.
Serve warm.
59d1e62c4c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the butter, minced garlic, minced ginger, and brown sugar. Mix well.
3. Add the soy sauce, sake, pineapple juice, rice vinegar, and cornstarch to the bowl. Mix until the cornstarch is fully incorporated and the sauce is smooth.
4. Season the chicken wings with salt and pepper.
5. In a separate bowl, mix the all-purpose flour with a little water to form a slurry.
6. Dip the chicken wings into the flour mixture, coating them evenly.
7. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Fry the chicken wings until they are golden brown and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side.
8. Remove the chicken wings from the skillet and place them on a wire rack or a baking sheet.
9. Return the skillet to the heat and add the green onions. Cook until they are slightly wilted, about 1-2 minutes.
10. Remove the chicken wings from the oven and transfer them to the skillet with the green onions.
11. Pour the sauce over the chicken wings and green onions, tossing everything together until the chicken is fully coated with the sauce.
12. Serve the Pineapple-Teriyaki Chicken Wings immediately, garnished with additional green onions if desired.

[/INST]

263a0fdd20.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Prepare cake batter as directed on package; pour into parchment-lined 15x10x1-inch pan.
Bake 18 to 20 min.
or until toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean.
Cool completely.
Beat cream cheese and butter in large bowl with mixer until creamy.
Blend in vanilla.
Gradually add sugar, beating well after each addition.
Cut cake lengthwise, then crosswise in half.
Stack cake layers on plate, spreading cream cheese frosting between layers and on top of cake.
